Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.

Author: William W. Purkey
Quote: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching,Love like you'll never be hurt,Sing like there's nobody listening,And live like it's heaven on earth.

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.,  A Testament of Hope: The Essential Writings and Speeches
Quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.

Author: André Gide,  Autumn Leaves
Quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  100 Love Sonnets
Quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 9: The Kindly Ones
Quote: Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up.

Author: William Shakespeare,  All's Well That Ends Well
Quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever
Quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

Author: Robert A. Heinlein,  Stranger in a Strange Land
Quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay
Quote: You love me. Real or not real?"I tell him, "Real.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough..

Author: William Shakespeare,  A Midsummer Night's Dream
Quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind,And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  A Walk to Remember
Quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: If you can make a woman laugh, you can make her do anything.

Author: Robert Fulghum,  True Love
Quote: We’re all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness—and call it love—true love.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  My Sister's Keeper
Quote: You don't love someone because they're perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that they're not.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space.

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.

Author: Jane Austen,  Northanger Abbey
Quote: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.

Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you...I could walk through my garden forever.

Author: Saint Augustine
Quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Where there is love there is life.

Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.

Author: Paul Valery
Quote: Love is being stupid together.

Author: Buddha
Quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.

Author: Claude Monet
Quote: People discuss my art and pretend to understand as if it were necessary to understand, when it's simply necessary to love.

Author: Orson Welles
Quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Intern
Quote: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.

Author: John Ruskin
Quote: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.

Author: Bradley Whitford
Quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.

Author: Ferdinand Foch
Quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.

Author: Lady Gaga
Quote: Every bit of me is devoted to love and art. And I aspire to try to be a teacher to my young fans who feel just like I felt when I was younger. I just felt like a freak. I guess what I'm trying to say is I'm trying to liberate them, I want to free them of their fears and make them feel that they can make their own space in the world.

Author: Torquato Tasso
Quote: Love is when he gives you a piece of your soul, that you never knew was missing.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.

Author: Dalai Lama
Quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.

Author: Basil Hume
Quote: The great gift of Easter is hope - Christian hope which makes us have that confidence in God, in his ultimate triumph, and in his goodness and love, which nothing can shake.

Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote: Love has reasons which reason cannot understand.

Author: Robert Frost
Quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.

Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.

Author: Brad Henry
Quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.

Author: John Lennon
Quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.

Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.

Author: Igor Stravinsky
Quote: What force is more potent than love?

Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.

Author: Kristin Chenoweth
Quote: If you can learn to love yourself and all the flaws, you can love other people so much better. And that makes you so happy.

Author: Barbara de Angelis
Quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.

Author: Buddha
Quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.

Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.

Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote: I consider myself Istanbul's storyteller. My subject matter is my town. I consider it my job to explore the hidden patterns of my city's clandestine corners, its shady, mysterious places, the things I love.

Author: Akon
Quote: That's my actual payment, the fact that I can actually make something that I actually enjoy and put on repeat, and it's not related to anything else or anyone else's thoughts and ideas, it all came from me; I just love that aspect of it.

Author: Mark Z. Danielewski
Quote: Write what you love. Love will hold you through the hard times and hold the world during the good times.

Author: Witold Gombrowicz
Quote: You are ugly when you love her, you are beautiful and fresh, vital and free, modern and poetic when you don't... you are more beautiful as an orphan than as your mother's son.

Author: Rachel Hunter
Quote: I'm very girly. I love to talk about diets, exercise, kids, make-up.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: So it's not gonna be easy. It's going to be really hard; we're gonna have to work at this everyday, but I want to do that because I want you. I want all of you, forever, everyday. You and me... everyday.

Author: David Frost
Quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.

Author: Joan Crawford
Quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.

Author: Peter Tosh
Quote: And I ask why am I black, they say I was born in sin, and shamed inequity. One of the main songs we used to sing in church makes me sick, 'love wash me and I shall be whiter than snow.

Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote: I accepted the face that as much as I want to lead others, and love to be around other people, in some essential way, I am something of a loner.

Author: Jonathan Swift
Quote: As love without esteem is capricious and volatile; esteem without love is languid and cold.

Author: J.M. Barrie,  Peter Pan
Quote: To die will be an awfully big adventure.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: Nashville is my home, and the reason why I get to do what I love.

Author: BeBe Winans
Quote: Love is so unconditional; love liberates; love is the reason why I do what I do, and so I think it is the greatest gift we have.

Author: J. C. Watts
Quote: The measure of a man is not how great his faith is, but how great his love is. We must not let government programs disconnect our souls from each other.

Author: Pietro Aretino
Quote: I love you, and because I love you, I would sooner have you hate me for telling you the truth than adore me for telling you lies.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.

Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.

Author: Beyonce Knowles
Quote: When you love and accept yourself, when you know who really cares about you, and when you learn from your mistakes, then you stop caring about what people who don't know you think.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.

Author: Rumi
Quote: The garden of love is green without limit and yields many fruits other than sorrow or joy. Love is beyond either condition: without spring, without autumn, it is always fresh.

Author: Theodore Isaac Rubin
Quote: I must learn to love the fool in me - the one who feels too much, talks too much, takes too many chances, wins sometimes and loses often, lacks self-control, loves and hates, hurts and gets hurt, promises and breaks promises, laughs and cries.

Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

Author: Pattie Boyd
Quote: I love life. There's so much to learn and see all the time, and nothing nicer for me than to wake up, and the sky is blue.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment.

Author: Celine Dion
Quote: Some people can't stand being alone. I love solitude and silence. But when I come out of it, I'm a regular talking machine. It's all or nothing for me.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Quote: Dumbledore watched her fly away, and as her silvery glow faded he turned back to Snape, and his eyes were full of tears."After all this time?""Always,"said Snape.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.

Author: Nick Cannon
Quote: Nobody can predict the future. You just have to give your all to the relationship you're in and do your best to take care of your partner, communicate and give them every last drop of love you have. I think one of the most important things in a relationship is caring for your significant other through good times and bad.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind.

Author: Rumi
Quote: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.

Author: Anne Frank
Quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!

Author: William Barclay
Quote: Love always involves responsibility, and love always involves sacrifice. And we do not really love Christ unless we are prepared to face His task and to take up His Cross.

Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote: Flatter me, and I may not believe you. Criticize me, and I may not like you. Ignore me, and I may not forgive you. Encourage me, and I will not forget you. Love me and I may be forced to love you.

Author: Joseph Addison
Quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  At First Sight
Quote: Just when you think it can't get any worse, it can. And just when you think it can't get any better, it can.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.

Author: Confucius
Quote: It is easy to hate and it is difficult to love. This is how the whole scheme of things works. All good things are difficult to achieve; and bad things are very easy to get.

Author: Sophia Loren
Quote: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.

Author: Sitting Bull
Quote: Behold, my friends, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embraces of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love!

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

Author: Al Lopez
Quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.

Author: Katy Perry
Quote: I'm kind of a good girl - and I'm not. I'm a good girl because I really believe in love, integrity, and respect. I'm a bad girl because I like to tease. I know that I have sex appeal in my deck of cards. But I like to get people thinking. That's what the stories in my music do.

Author: Jesus Christ
Quote: All the commandments: You shall not commit adultery, you shall not kill, you shall not steal, you shall not covet, and so on, are summed up in this single command: You must love your neighbor as yourself.

Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote: When you lose a person you love so much, surviving the loss is difficult.

Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote: The things that will destroy America are prosperity-at-any-price, peace-at-any-price, safety-first instead of duty-first, the love of soft living, and the get-rich-quick theory of life.

Author: Brene Brown
Quote: I spent a lot of years trying to outrun or outsmart vulnerability by making things certain and definite, black and white, good and bad. My inability to lean into the discomfort of vulnerability limited the fullness of those important experiences that are wrought with uncertainty: Love, belonging, trust, joy, and creativity to name a few.

Author: Karen Kain
Quote: Surround yourself with people who provide you with support and love and remember to give back as much as you can in return.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Love one another, but make not a bond of love: Let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.

Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote: The best smell in the world is that man that you love.

Author: Mao Zedong
Quote: Communism is not love. Communism is a hammer which we use to crush the enemy.

Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson,  In Memoriam
Quote: Tis better to have loved and lostThan never to have loved at all.

Author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross
Quote: The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well.

Author: A. J. McLean
Quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.

Author: James E. Faust
Quote: Femininity is not just lipstick, stylish hairdos, and trendy clothes. It is the divine adornment of humanity. It finds expression in your qualities of your capacity to love, your spirituality, delicacy, radiance, sensitivity, creativity, charm, graciousness, gentleness, dignity, and quiet strength.

Author: Pope Francis
Quote: We have observed that, in society and the world in which we live, selfishness has increased more than love for others, and that men of good will must work, each with his own strengths and expertise, to ensure that love for others increases until it is equal and possibly exceeds love for oneself.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.

Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote: The thing I loved the most - and still love the most about teaching - is that you can connect with an individual or a group, and see that individual or group exceed their limits.

Author: Lawrence Welk
Quote: Never trust anyone completely but God. Love people, but put your full trust only in God.

Author: Junot Diaz
Quote: Love is understood, in a historical way, as one of the great human vocations - but its counterspell has always been infidelity. This terrible, terrible betrayal that can tear apart not only another person, not only oneself, but whole families.

Author: Kyle Chandler
Quote: I really love to ride my motorcycle. When I want to just get away and be by myself and clear my head, that's what I do.

Author: Marina and the Diamonds
Quote: Everyone gets dumped and everyone gets hurt and there's karma to love in regards to what you've done to other people.

Author: Ellen DeGeneres
Quote: I would love for the world to be happier.

Author: Corita Kent
Quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Love is trembling happiness.

Author: George Best
Quote: Love is about mutual respect, apart from attraction.

Author: Pope Francis
Quote: A person once asked me, in a provocative manner, if I approved of homosexuality. I replied with another question: 'Tell me: when God looks at a gay person, does he endorse the existence of this person with love, or reject and condemn this person?' We must always consider the person.

Author: Jesus Christ
Quote: If you love those who love you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners love those who love them. And if you do good to those who do good to you, what credit is that to you? For even sinners do the same.

Author: Erich Fromm
Quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved.

Author: Domhnall Gleeson
Quote: Life is difficult for everyone; everyone has bad days. Everyone has trouble in their life, because it doesn't matter how rich you are: Sickness and trouble and worry and love, these things will mess with you at every level of life.

Author: Arthur Schopenhauer
Quote: A man can be himself only so long as he is alone, and if he does not love solitude, he will not love freedom, for it is only when he is alone that he is really free.

Author: Alain Badiou
Quote: There is a kind of serenity in love which is almost a paradise.

Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote: Love has its own instinct, finding the way to the heart, as the feeblest insect finds the way to its flower, with a will which nothing can dismay nor turn aside.

Author: Jean Anouilh
Quote: Things are beautiful if you love them.

Author: Kiefer Sutherland
Quote: I've always traveled with a picture of my daughter from 1989, her kindergarten school picture, that has 'I love you, Daddy' written on it. She's always made fun of me because I never changed that picture out. It's like my resistance to her getting older. It was the first thing she'd ever written to me and it means the world to me.

Author: Jeffrey Gitomer
Quote: The love of what you do, combined with your belief in what you do, will not determine your success. It will determine how hard you will work and how dedicated you will be to achieving it. Success just shows up from there.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Anxiety is love's greatest killer. It makes others feel as you might when a drowning man holds on to you. You want to save him, but you know he will strangle you with his panic.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: My great hope is to laugh as much as I cry; to get my work done and try to love somebody and have the courage to accept the love in return.

Author: Jewel
Quote: Love bravely, live bravely, be courageous, there's really nothing to lose. There's no wrong you can't make right again, so be kinder to yourself, you know, have fun, take chances. There's no bounds.

Author: Vin Scully
Quote: I really love baseball. The guys and the game, and I love the challenge of describing things. The only thing I hate - and I know you have to be realistic and pay the bills in this life - is the loneliness on the road.

Author: Cherie Lunghi
Quote: I can honestly say I love getting older. Then again, I never put my glasses on before looking in the mirror.

Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.

Author: Lou Holtz
Quote: Winners embrace hard work. They love the discipline of it, the trade-off they're making to win. Losers, on the other hand, see it as punishment. And that's the difference.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality. This is why right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Not necessity, not desire - no, the love of power is the demon of men. Let them have everything - health, food, a place to live, entertainment - they are and remain unhappy and low-spirited: for the demon waits and waits and will be satisfied.

Author: Marc Chagall
Quote: In our life there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.

Author: Alan Cohen
Quote: To love yourself right now, just as you are, is to give yourself heaven. Don't wait until you die. If you wait, you die now. If you love, you live now.

Author: LL Cool J
Quote: Do what you love; you'll be better at it. It sounds pretty simple, but you'd be surprised how many people don't get this one right away.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: Unable are the loved to die, for love is immortality.

Author: Norman Maclean
Quote: At sunrise everything is luminous but not clear. It is those we live with and love and should know who elude us. You can love completely without complete understanding.

Author: Lara Flynn Boyle
Quote: I love fast cars... and to go too fast in them.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.

Author: Ralph W. Sockman
Quote: Love is the outreach of self toward completion.

Author: Joseph Addison
Quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.

Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote: Love. Fall in love and stay in love. Write only what you love, and love what you write. The key word is love. You have to get up in the morning and write something you love, something to live for.

Author: Thomas Merton
Quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.

Author: Rick Astley
Quote: My success set me up for life, and it meant that I could retire from the music industry at 27 to spend time with my newborn daughter and my wife. My time away from the spotlight allowed me to rediscover my love for music, and I'm doing it for me now and no one else.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

Author: Josh Hutcherson
Quote: I don't think I've had love at first sight. But, I've definitely had moments where I've seen a person, and I'm like, 'Wow, there is something different about you, and I really want to get to know you.'

Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote: If you don't love the Dodgers, there's a good chance you may not get into Heaven.

Author: John Irving
Quote: If you are lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.

Author: Amy Lee
Quote: I love my cats more than I love most people. Probably more than is healthy.

Author: Max Muller
Quote: Would not the child's heart break in despair when the first cold storm of the world sweeps over it, if the warm sunlight of love from the eyes of mother and father did not shine upon him like the soft reflection of divine light and love?

Author: Melanie Fiona
Quote: I am a bit of a hopeless romantic. I really do have a faith and a belief in love, and when I love, I love hard.

Author: Ashton Shepherd
Quote: The Lord has been there from wanting to be a momma, to having a wonderful childhood life and dreaming of having a good motherhood as a child; always wanting to meet a good old country boy and having someone to love as much as I love my husband Roland and having a little boy that is a mixture of the both of us.

Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote: I'm always swimming forward like a shark. You just keep going and you don't rest. I love waking up knowing that I have a problem to solve.

Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote: Courage is like love; it must have hope for nourishment.

Author: Johnny Cash
Quote: My father was a man of love. He always loved me to death. He worked hard in the fields, but my father never hit me. Never. I don't ever remember a really cross, unkind word from my father.

Author: Helen Hayes
Quote: The story of a love is not important-what is important is that one is capable of love. It is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.

Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote: To control the breathing is to control the mind. With different patterns of breathing, you can fall in love, you can hate someone, you can feel the whole spectrum of feelings just by changing your breathing.

Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote: If you cannot inspire a woman with love of you, fill her above the brim with love of herself; all that runs over will be yours.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Invisible Monsters
Quote: The one you love and the one who loves you are never, ever the same person.

Author: Jason Bateman
Quote: I love a massage. I'd go every day if I could. I don't need to be wrapped in herbs like a salmon fillet, but I do love a massage.

Author: Robert Fulghum
Quote: I believe that imagination is stronger than knowledge. That myth is more potent than history. That dreams are more powerful than facts. That hope always triumphs over experience. That laughter is the only cure for grief. And I believe that love is stronger than death.

Author: Elizabeth Berkley
Quote: I love to sing. Mostly about love and sex.

Author: Irma S. Rombauer
Quote: The new 'Joy' was needed for a number of reasons. Recent developments in nutrition and new ingredients were two of the major reasons for the revision. One of the other big reasons was America's new love for big flavors. Yay!

Author: Julian Sands
Quote: The thing about Mumbai is you go five yards and all of human existence is revealed. It's an incredible cavalcade of life, and I love that.

Author: Charlie Sheen
Quote: You either love or you hate. You live in the middle, you get nothing.

Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote: It's possible to love a human being if you don't know them too well.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.

Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote: Animals have never betrayed me. They are an easy prey, as I have been throughout my career. So we feel the same. I love them.

Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote: The spirit of Christmas is the spirit of love and of generosity and of goodness. It illuminates the picture window of the soul, and we look out upon the world's busy life and become more interested in people than in things.

Author: E. M. Forster
Quote: Only a struggle twists sentimentality and lust together into love.

Author: David O. Russell
Quote: I just love real characters; they're not pretentious, and every emotion is on the surface, they're regular working people. Their likes, their dislikes, their loves, their hates, their passions; they're all right there on the surface.

Author: Kelly Clarkson
Quote: I love dressing up and doing the red carpet every once in a while, but I am very much a jeans kinda girl, so it's all a little embarrassing for me.

Author: Dionne Warwick
Quote: Brazil is where I belong, the place that feels like home. They love their family, their country and God, and are not afraid to let anybody know it.

Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.

Author: Eric Clapton
Quote: I'd love to knock an audience cold with one note, but what do you do for the rest of the evening?

Author: Sean Penn
Quote: I like to believe that love is a reciprocal thing, that it can't really be felt, truly, by one.

Author: Boris Becker
Quote: Girls had never been important. I'd had a girlfriend or two and had liked them a lot but it wasn't love, because my first love was tennis.

Author: Siobhan Fahey
Quote: I just can't seem to write songs about peace and love. Yeah right, how do you get that?

Author: Buddha
Quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.

Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.

Author: Paul Tillich
Quote: The first duty of love is to listen.

Author: Erich Segal
Quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.

Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote: We are all born for love. It is the principle of existence, and its only end.

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: Some people don't understand the promises they're making when they make them,"I said."Right, of course. But you keep the promise anyway. That's what love is. Love is keeping the promise anyway.

Author: Chris Messina
Quote: I would love to close my eyes and see myself with my girlfriend when we're 99 years old and I have a pipe and she's knitting a sweater, and I hope that's the way it goes. I think it's a challenge every day.

Author: Karl A. Menninger
Quote: One does not fall in love; one grows into love, and love grows in him.

Author: Sophia Loren
Quote: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.

Author: Edwin Louis Cole
Quote: The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  100 Love Sonnets
Quote: I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.

Author: Arthur Rimbaud
Quote: Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.

Author: Aphra Behn
Quote: Love ceases to be a pleasure when it ceases to be a secret.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.

Author: Alexander Smith
Quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others, and the delight in the recognition.

Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote: It is my goal to love everyone. I hate no one. Regardless of their race, religion, their proclivities, the desire of their heart and how they want to live their life and the decisions that they make. I can even respect people's decisions and lifestyle choices just as I hope they have the courtesy to respect my decisions and my choices.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote: True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself. It is equal and pure, without violent demonstrations: it is seen with white hairs and is always young in the heart.

Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.

Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote: Love is a sacred reserve of energy; it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.

Author: Al Lopez
Quote: Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it's business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don't love what you're doing and you can't give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You'll be an old man before you know it.

Author: Leigh Hunt
Quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: In the flush of love's light, we dare be brave. And suddenly we see that love costs all we are, and will ever be. Yet it is only love which sets us free.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.

Author: Charles Dickens
Quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.

Author: Marcel Proust
Quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.

Author: James M. Barrie
Quote: Let no one who loves be unhappy, even love unreturned has its rainbow.

Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote: Love is the difficult realization that something other than oneself is real.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: A pair of powerful spectacles has sometimes sufficed to cure a person in love.

Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote: Someday, after mastering the winds, the waves, the tides and gravity, we shall harness for God the energies of love, and then, for a second time in the history of the world, man will have discovered fire.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: I'm not saying that love always takes you to heaven. Your life can become a nightmare. But that said, it is worth taking the risk.

Author: Nikola Tesla
Quote: I do not think there is any thrill that can go through the human heart like that felt by the inventor as he sees some creation of the brain unfolding to success... such emotions make a man forget food, sleep, friends, love, everything.

Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote: Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings.

Author: Rita Rudner
Quote: Before I met my husband, I'd never fallen in love. I'd stepped in it a few times.

Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote: Love means to love that which is unlovable; or it is no virtue at all.

Author: Lord Byron
Quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!

Author: Will Durant
Quote: The love we have in our youth is superficial compared to the love that an old man has for his old wife.

Author: Kim Casali
Quote: Love is... never asking for more than you are prepared to give.

Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.

Author: Billy Graham
Quote: God proved His love on the Cross. When Christ hung, and bled, and died, it was God saying to the world, 'I love you.'

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.

Author: Bradley Whitford
Quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.

Author: George Sand
Quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby
Quote: Love is needing someone. Love is putting up with someone's bad qualities because they somehow complete you.

Author: Sai Baba
Quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.

Author: Charles Kuralt
Quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.

Author: Abhishek Bachchan
Quote: A birthday is just another day where you go to work and people give you love. Age is just a state of mind, and you are as old as you think you are. You have to count your blessings and be happy.

Author: David Frost
Quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.

Author: Johnny Weir
Quote: Love myself I do. Not everything, but I love the good as well as the bad. I love my crazy lifestyle, and I love my hard discipline. I love my freedom of speech and the way my eyes get dark when I'm tired. I love that I have learned to trust people with my heart, even if it will get broken. I am proud of everything that I am and will become.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.

Author: Richard Bach
Quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.

Author: Charles Stanley
Quote: There is only one secure foundation: a genuine, deep relationship with Jesus Christ, which will carry you through any and all turmoil. No matter what storms are raging all around, you'll stand firm if you stand on His love.

Author: Arthur Rubinstein
Quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.

Author: Stendhal
Quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

Author: Bernie Siegel
Quote: God wants us to know that life is a series of beginnings, not endings. Just as graduations are not terminations, but commencements. Creation is an ongoing process, and when we create a perfect world where love and compassion are shared by all, suffering will cease.

Author: Thomas Moore
Quote: No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.

Author: Stevie Wonder
Quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.

Author: Euripides
Quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.

Author: Joseph B. Wirthlin
Quote: The more often we see the things around us - even the beautiful and wonderful things - the more they become invisible to us. That is why we often take for granted the beauty of this world: the flowers, the trees, the birds, the clouds - even those we love. Because we see things so often, we see them less and less.

Author: Zoe Kravitz
Quote: Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.

Author: Pele
Quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: I am good, but not an angel. I do sin, but I am not the devil. I am just a small girl in a big world trying to find someone to love.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Blue-Eyed Devil
Quote: I no longer believed in the idea of soul mates, or love at first sight. But I was beginning to believe that a very few times in your life, if you were lucky, you might meet someone who was exactly right for you. Not because he was perfect, or because you were, but because your combined flaws were arranged in a way that allowed two separate beings to hinge together.

Author: Denis Waitley
Quote: Happiness cannot be traveled to, owned, earned, worn or consumed. Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.

Author: Basil Hume
Quote: The great gift of Easter is hope - Christian hope which makes us have that confidence in God, in his ultimate triumph, and in his goodness and love, which nothing can shake.

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: New International Version
Quote: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: We must develop and maintain the capacity to forgive. He who is devoid of the power to forgive is devoid of the power to love. There is some good in the worst of us and some evil in the best of us. When we discover this, we are less prone to hate our enemies.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality... I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.

Author: Washington Irving
Quote: There is a sacredness in tears. They are not the mark of weakness, but of power. They speak more eloquently than ten thousand tongues. They are the messengers of overwhelming grief, of deep contrition, and of unspeakable love.

Author: Jesus Christ
Quote: But I say to you, Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you, so that you may be sons of your Father who is in heaven; for he makes his sun rise on the evil and on the good, and sends rain on the just and on the unjust.

Author: John Lennon
Quote: We've got this gift of love, but love is like a precious plant. You can't just accept it and leave it in the cupboard or just think it's going to get on by itself. You've got to keep watering it. You've got to really look after it and nurture it.

Author: William P. Young
Quote: I really do believe that God is love, one of deep affection and grace and forgiveness and inspiration.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.

Author: Steve Vai
Quote: I have a deep love for life and my fellow human beings. I try to understand everything that everybody does, even if it seems wrong to me.

Author: John Keats
Quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants and murderers, and for a time, they can seem invincible, but in the end, they always fall. Think of it--always.

Author: Josh Billings
Quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.

Author: Douglas Adams
Quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.

Author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand
Quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.

Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.

Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.

Author: Carl Sagan
Quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: Man must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.

Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.

Author: C. S. Lewis
Quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.

Author: Francis of Assisi
Quote: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: You are, and always have been, my dream.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love.

Author: John Galsworthy
Quote: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.

Author: Joseph Joubert
Quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.

Author: Plato
Quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: You are my best friend as well as my lover, and I do not know which side of you I enjoy the most. I treasure each side, just as I have treasured our life together.

Author: Robert Frost
Quote: We love the things we love for what they are.

Author: Emily Bronte
Quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.

Author: Jesus Christ
Quote: As the Father has loved me, so have I loved you.

Author: William Law
Quote: Love has no errors, for all errors are the want for love.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke,  Letters to a Young Poet
Quote: Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love.

Author: e. e. cummings
Quote: Be of love a little more careful than of anything.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.

Author: Eva Gabor
Quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.

Author: Torquato Tasso
Quote: True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: I would die for you. But I won't live for you.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride And Prejudice
Quote: In vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you.

Author: Taraji P. Henson
Quote: Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.

Author: Cyrano de Bergerac
Quote: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.

Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.

Author: A.A. Milne
Quote: Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

Author: Ben Hecht
Quote: Love is a hole in the heart.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.

Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.

Author: Isabel Allende
Quote: I am happier when I love than when I am loved. I adore my husband, my son, my grandchildren, my mother, my dog, and frankly, I don't know if they even like me. But who cares? Loving them is my joy.

Author: Helen Rowland
Quote: Nowadays love is a matter of chance, matrimony a matter of money and divorce a matter of course.

Author: Ryan Sheckler
Quote: My life path has been a blessing and a great learning experience. Skateboarding is my passion and I don't see that changing. When I'm not skating, I love to surf. I'm open to the new experiences and opportunities.

Author: Lester Holt
Quote: The one thing I don't consume during 'Today' - which surprises many people - is coffee. I find that a lot of water helps wake me up, without the buzz. I love coffee, but usually reserve a double espresso as an afternoon pick-me-up before settling in to do the weekend 'Nightly News.'

Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote: I love a vintage look that's also a bit rock n' roll.

Author: William Butler Yeats
Quote: Wine comes in at the mouth And love comes in at the eye; That's all we shall know for truth Before we grow old and die.

Author: Erich Fromm
Quote: If a person loves only one other person and is indifferent to all others, his love is not love but a symbiotic attachment, or an enlarged egotism.

Author: Anne Hathaway
Quote: I think relationships are work, but love is a gift.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut
Quote: Lot's wife, of course, was told not to look back where all those people and their homes had been. But she did look back, and I love her for that, because it was so human.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote: It is in the thirties that we want friends. In the forties we know they won't save us any more than love did.

Author: Bernie Siegel
Quote: Being a survivor doesn't mean being strong - it's telling people when you need a meal or a ride, company, whatever. It's paying attention to heart wisdom, feelings, not living a role, but having a unique, authentic life, having something to contribute, finding time to love and laugh. All these things are qualities of survivors.

Author: Mary Hart
Quote: I honestly, sincerely love what I do.

Author: Graham Greene
Quote: They are always saying God loves us. If that's love I'd rather have a bit of kindness.

Author: Sammy Hagar
Quote: Sometimes you're afraid to fall in love with a chick, but she sucks you in anyway.

Author: Britney Spears
Quote: I went to a psychoanalyst. He explained things about my love life that I found very impressive... almost scary.

Author: Clare Balding
Quote: People like to think of you as a certain person, or a certain type of person, and they do love to give you a label. We like luggage labels, and we like people labels.

Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote: Love is not altogether a delirium, yet it has many points in common therewith.

Author: Jennette McCurdy
Quote: I love going to the movie theatre, seeing live comedy, and going to amusement parks.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: I love mankind; it's people I can't stand.

Author: Juliette Gordon Low
Quote: To put yourself in another's place requires real imagination, but by doing so each Girl Scout will be able to love among others happily.

Author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief
Quote: The only thing worse than a boy who hates you: a boy that loves you.

Author: Mick Jagger
Quote: The elusive nature of love... it can be such a fleeting thing. You see it there and it's just fluttering and it's gone.

Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote: Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it.

Author: Andre Leon Talley
Quote: I like the idea of being warm and secure. That's what home should be. That you have a sense of warmth, security, love, and you love the things around you and surround yourself with beauty.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Where there is love there is life.

Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote: I'm a big believer than a great bit is a great bit - if I go and see someone I love, like Robert Klein. I want to hear some classics and some new stuff. But a great stand-up bit takes a long time to really polish and perfect, and they're beautiful things when they're done.

Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote: I love Thanksgiving because it's a holiday that is centered around food and family, two things that are of utmost importance to me.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: Loving someone liberates the lover as well as the beloved. And that kind of love comes with age.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: So, I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.

Author: Morton Hunt
Quote: Americans, who make more of marrying for love than any other people, also break up more of their marriages, but the figure reflects not so much the failure of love as the determination of people not to live without it.

Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote: I love Christopher Bailey and Burberry, Mulberry for bags, and Hudson for jeans.

Author: Zygmunt Bauman
Quote: As far as love is concerned, possession, power, fusion and disenchantment are the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?

Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote: If you were to destroy the belief in immortality in mankind, not only love but every living force on which the continuation of all life in the world depended, would dry up at once.

Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote: One mustn't ask apple trees for oranges, France for sun, women for love, life for happiness.

Author: Ric Flair
Quote: If you don't like it, learn to love it!

Author: Salma Hayek
Quote: I have never denied my background or my culture. I have taught my child to embrace her Mexican heritage, to love my first language, Spanish, to learn about Mexican history, music, folk art, food, and even the Mexican candy I grew up with.

Author: Kevin DeYoung
Quote: God tells me that I need to provide for my family, discipline and teach my children, and love my wife as Christ loves the church. If I don't do that, I'm being unfaithful and sinful.

Author: Rufus Wainwright
Quote: I still believe that love is the most powerful force in the world, even though I am yet to experience it fully.

Author: Federica Montseny
Quote: The love of liberty and the sense of human dignity are the basic elements of the Anarchist creed.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: We fell in love, despite our differences, and once we did, something rare and beautiful was created. For me, love like that has only happened once, and that's why every minute we spent together has been seared in my memory. I'll never forget a single moment of it.

Author: Hannah More
Quote: Love never reasons, but profusely gives; it gives like a thoughtless prodigal its all, and then trembles least it has done to little.

Author: Jason Silva
Quote: There has always been this narrator in me - I loved ideas, and part of the great love affair I would have with ideas consisted of talking about them.

Author: Vince Vaughn
Quote: The thing about Chicago is that it really isn't like any other place. The architecture and the layout of the city are the best. I'm from the Midwest, and consider myself a Midwesterner. I feel most at home there. I love California. I have great friends in California. I just have always considered Illinois to be home.

Author: Bradley Cooper
Quote: There's got to be something you want to tell and that's the engine which spurs all of the work you have to do in order to create the story, but you have to love some sort of nugget of what you're telling to be a filmmaker.

Author: Zelda Fitzgerald
Quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.

Author: Michelle Paver
Quote: I wanted to write a very simple story about a boy, a wolf, a girl, a bear and a forest, so I thought I might set it in the past. I didn't realise that it went back to when I was 10: I used to love the Stone Age when I was a kid and wanted to live in it, and I got rid of my bed and slept on the floor, but I didn't remember it.

Author: Rick Astley
Quote: My success set me up for life, and it meant that I could retire from the music industry at 27 to spend time with my newborn daughter and my wife. My time away from the spotlight allowed me to rediscover my love for music, and I'm doing it for me now and no one else.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. And that's what you've given me. That's what I'd hoped to give you forever

Author: Nicole Krauss,  The History of Love
Quote: Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering.

Author: John Irving
Quote: If you are lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.

Author: Joyce Giraud
Quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.

Author: Bella Thorne
Quote: I love pointy nails! A cute way to add a pop of color to your nails is to make a V-shape at the ends of them in a pastel color.

Author: John Barrymore
Quote: Love is the delightful interval between meeting a beautiful girl and discovering that she looks like a haddock.

Author: Helen Rowland
Quote: To be happy with a man you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: I would always rather be happy than dignified.

Author: George Burns
Quote: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate.

Author: Jackie Kennedy
Quote: There are many little ways to enlarge your child's world. Love of books is the best of all.

Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver.

Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote: There is no love that is not an echo.

Author: Ursula K. Le Guin
Quote: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone; it has to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.

Author: Milla Jovovich
Quote: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.

Author: Slavoj Zizek
Quote: When I really love someone, I can only show it by making aggressive and bad-taste remarks.

Author: Jennifer Love Hewitt
Quote: I've always wanted to be a mom because I want to give a kid all of the magical gifts my mom gave to me, such as love and friendship. She and I had this incredible connection that was so unbelievable.

Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote: Pasta isn't just for Italian food anymore. Now there are tasty pasta recipes found in Asian cuisine, and it's emerging as a newfound love for vegans.

Author: Lady Gaga
Quote: Some women choose to follow men, and some women choose to follow their dreams. If you're wondering which way to go, remember that your career will never wake up and tell you that it doesn't love you anymore.

Author: Samuel Daniel
Quote: Beauty, sweet love, is like the morning dew, Whose short refresh upon tender green, Cheers for a time, but till the sun doth show And straight is gone, as it had never been.

Author: Nikola Tesla
Quote: I do not think there is any thrill that can go through the human heart like that felt by the inventor as he sees some creation of the brain unfolding to success... such emotions make a man forget food, sleep, friends, love, everything.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.

Author: Dylan O'Brien
Quote: Part of growing up is realizing you learn to love so many people. It's about forming those relationships and finding what will last forever.

Author: Andy Serkis
Quote: Every age has its storytelling form, and video gaming is a huge part of our culture. You can ignore or embrace video games and imbue them with the best artistic quality. People are enthralled with video games in the same way as other people love the cinema or theatre.

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?

Author: Pope Francis
Quote: We must restore hope to young people, help the old, be open to the future, spread love. Be poor among the poor. We need to include the excluded and preach peace.

Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote: I seriously feel like the best days are ahead, and I like the idea of getting to do everything I did before but with more knowledge, experience, and street smarts. There's a certain love, appreciation, and gratitude that you have at 40 that you don't have when you're younger, and it makes every accomplishment feel so much better.

Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.

Author: Saint Augustine
Quote: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.

Author: Lionel Messi
Quote: Money is not a motivating factor. Money doesn't thrill me or make me play better because there are benefits to being wealthy. I'm just happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love. If I wasn't paid to be a professional footballer I would willingly play for nothing.

Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote: Courage is like love; it must have hope for nourishment.

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: I love to go to the zoo. But not on Sunday. I don't like to see the people making fun of the animals, when it should be the other way around.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight
Quote: And so the lion fell in love with the lamb…"he murmured. I looked away, hiding my eyes as I thrilled to the word."What a stupid lamb,"I sighed."What a sick, masochistic lion.

Author: Theodore Zeldin
Quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.

Author: Claude Monet
Quote: People discuss my art and pretend to understand as if it were necessary to understand, when it's simply necessary to love.

Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.

Author: Thomas Paine
Quote: I love the man that can smile in trouble, that can gather strength from distress, and grow brave by reflection. 'Tis the business of little minds to shrink, but he whose heart is firm, and whose conscience approves his conduct, will pursue his principles unto death.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love
Quote: This is a good sign, having a broken heart. It means we have tried for something.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: It is necessary to fall in love... if only to provide an alibi for all the random despair you are going to feel anyway.

Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote: Love cannot endure indifference. It needs to be wanted. Like a lamp, it needs to be fed out of the oil of another's heart, or its flame burns low.

Author: Shana Abe
Quote: I heard what you said. I’m not the silly romantic you think. I don’t want the heavens or the shooting stars. I don’t want gemstones or gold. I have those things already. I want…a steady hand. A kind soul. I want to fall asleep, and wake, knowing my heart is safe. I want to love, and be loved.

Author: Britney Spears
Quote: I went to a psychoanalyst. He explained things about my love life that I found very impressive... almost scary.

Author: Waka Flocka Flame
Quote: No matter how you're feeling, a little dog gunna love you.

Author: Donald Trump
Quote: It's tangible, it's solid, it's beautiful. It's artistic, from my standpoint, and I just love real estate.

Author: Jeffrey Gitomer
Quote: The love of what you do, combined with your belief in what you do, will not determine your success. It will determine how hard you will work and how dedicated you will be to achieving it. Success just shows up from there.

Author: Nick Jonas
Quote: My thoughts on gay marriage are that everyone has the right to love and be loved, and that's the position I take.

Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.

Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote: Even from their infancy we frame them to the sports of love: their instruction, behavior, attire, grace, learning and all their words azimuth only at love, respects only affection. Their nurses and their keepers imprint no other thing in them.

Author: Emma Roberts
Quote: I love dressing up. It's the best part of being a girl, I think.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.

Author: Pope Francis
Quote: We must restore hope to young people, help the old, be open to the future, spread love. Be poor among the poor. We need to include the excluded and preach peace.

Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.

Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.

Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote: The only way of knowing a person is to love them without hope.

Author: Anthony Bourdain
Quote: Bad food is made without pride, by cooks who have no pride, and no love. Bad food is made by chefs who are indifferent, or who are trying to be everything to everybody, who are trying to please everyone... Bad food is fake food... food that shows fear and lack of confidence in people's ability to discern or to make decisions about their lives.

Author: Jose Rizal
Quote: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.

Author: Dave Matthews Band
Quote: A guy and a girl can be just friends, but at one point or another, they will fall for each other...Maybe temporarily, maybe at the wrong time, maybe too late, or maybe forever

Author: Paul Walker
Quote: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: Whatever you want to do, if you want to be great at it, you have to love it and be able to make sacrifices for it.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Knowledge is love and light and vision.

Author: Plato
Quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.

Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote: Love is what we were born with. Fear is what we learned here.

Author: Albert Ellis
Quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.

Author: Brene Brown
Quote: You're imperfect, and you're wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  South of the Border, West of the Sun
Quote: I think you still love me, but we can’t escape the fact that I’m not enough for you. I knew this was going to happen. So I’m not blaming you for falling in love with another woman. I’m not angry, either. I should be, but I’m not. I just feel pain. A lot of pain. I thought I could imagine how much this would hurt, but I was wrong.

Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote: It is really rare to find someone you really, really love and that you want to spend your life with and all that stuff that goes along with being married. I am one of those lucky people. And I think she feels that way too. So the romantic stuff is easy because you want them to be happy.

Author: Dustin Milligan
Quote: Thank you for reminding Canada that I'm a disappointment to them. I like hockey, I love it, but I'm not an avid hockey - let's face it, true Canadian - fan. I've always been more into snowboarding and skateboarding and sort of the alternative sports, I'm not crazy about hockey - but love it!

Author: Thomas Shadwell
Quote: Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.

Author: Robert Green Ingersoll
Quote: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.

Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote: When people get married because they think it's a long-time love affair, they'll be divorced very soon, because all love affairs end in disappointment. But marriage is a recognition of a spiritual identity.

Author: Brene Brown
Quote: Why, when we know that there's no such thing as perfect, do most of us spend an incredible amount of time and energy trying to be everything to everyone? Is it that we really admire perfection? No - the truth is that we are actually drawn to people who are real and down-to-earth. We love authenticity and we know that life is messy and imperfect.

Author: Jane Austen,  Sense and Sensibility
Quote: The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love. I require so much!

Author: Marla Gibbs
Quote: In my life I've learned that true happiness comes from giving. Helping others along the way makes you evaluate who you are. I think that love is what we're all searching for. I haven't come across anyone who didn't become a better person through love.

Author: Ashley Greene
Quote: I can still love an ex as a person, regardless if the breakup was bad. I would never wish anything negative on them. It takes more energy to hate them than to wish them well.

Author: Amelia Earhart
Quote: The more one does and sees and feels, the more one is able to do, and the more genuine may be one's appreciation of fundamental things like home, and love, and understanding companionship.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet
Quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire;Doubt that the sun doth move;Doubt truth to be a liar;But never doubt I love.

Author: Hippocrates
Quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.

Author: Napoleon Bonaparte
Quote: I love power. But it is as an artist that I love it. I love it as a musician loves his violin, to draw out its sounds and chords and harmonies.

Author: Diane Ackerman
Quote: Love is the best school, but the tuition is high and the homework can be painful.

Author: Trisha Yearwood
Quote: What's meant to be will always find a way

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.,  A Testament of Hope: The Essential Writings and Speeches
Quote: I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear.

Author: Jennifer Morrison
Quote: In life, there are those relationships where you really love someone, but they're just not right for you and there's a little bittersweet feel to it.

Author: Ashley Tisdale
Quote: I love Christmas, not just because of the presents but because of all the decorations and lights and the warmth of the season.

Author: Sania Mirza
Quote: I love salon days to pamper myself, do my nails.

Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: Try as you will, you cannot annihilate that eternal relic of the human heart, love.

Author: Mohsin Hamid
Quote: Love places someone else in the centre of your being and your own self is blurred.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby
Quote: No relationship is perfect, ever. There are always some ways you have to bend, to compromise, to give something up in order to gain something greater...The love we have for each other is bigger than these small differences. And that's the key. It's like a big pie chart, and the love in a relationship has to be the biggest piece. Love can make up for a lot.

Author: Diane Arbus
Quote: Love involves a peculiar unfathomable combination of understanding and misunderstanding.

Author: Christian Louboutin
Quote: If you do what you love, it is the best way to relax.

Author: George Sand
Quote: Women love always: when earth slips from them, they take refuge in heaven.

Author: Ben Hecht
Quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.

Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote: Choose your love, Love your choice.

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: New International Version
Quote: Love is always patient and kind. It is never jealous. Love is never boastful or conceited. It is never rude or selfish. It does not take offense and is not resentful. Love takes no pleasure in other people’s sins, but delights in the truth. It is always ready to excuse, to trust, to hope, and to endure whatever comes.

Author: T. S. Eliot
Quote: This love is silent.

Author: Ray Stannard Baker
Quote: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.

Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote: All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.

Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.

Author: W. H. Auden
Quote: If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving be me.

Author: Muriel Spark
Quote: It is impossible to repent of love. The sin of love does not exist.

Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote: Who so loves believes the impossible.

Author: Milan Kundera
Quote: Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful.

Author: Aphra Behn
Quote: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.

Author: Alphonsus Liguori
Quote: If you wish to strengthen your confidence in God still more, often recall the loving way in which He has acted toward you, and how mercifully He has tried to bring you out of your sinful life, to break your attachment to the things of earth and draw you to His love.

Author: Brendan Behan
Quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.

Author: Brigitte Bardot
Quote: Do you have to have a reason for loving?

Author: Luc de Clapiers
Quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.

Author: Christopher Marlowe
Quote: Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?

Author: Torquato Tasso
Quote: Any time not spent on love is wasted.

Author: Armistead Maupin
Quote: Being in love is the only transcendent experience.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: The heart was made to be broken.

Author: Henry Drummond
Quote: You will find as you look back upon your life that the moments when you have truly lived are the moments when you have done things in the spirit of love.

Author: Debbie Ford
Quote: Resentments and grudges are two of the main culprits that perpetuate cycles of self-abuse and victimhood. Stowed away inside you like parasites, they deplete you of your God-given life force and separate you from your inherent worth, your joy, and the love in your heart.

Author: Thomas Merton
