Quote: Love seeks one thing only: the good of the one loved. It leaves all the other secondary effects to take care of themselves. Love, therefore, is its own reward.

Author: Matthew Perry
Quote: I grew up babysitting and always enjoyed it. I love family. A couple of my closest friends have kids, and I'm their godfather, and that's one of my greatest pleasures in life, just picking them up from school and hanging out with them.

Author: Duke Ellington
Quote: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.

Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote: Loving others always costs us something and requires effort. And you have to decide to do it on purpose. You can't wait for a feeling to motivate you.

Author: Plato
Quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.

Author: John Lennon
Quote: Everything is clearer when you're in love.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet
Quote: This above all: to thine own self be true, And it must follow, as the night the day, Thou canst not then be false to any man.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: They didn’t agree on much. In fact, they didn’t agree on anything. They fought all the time and challenged each other ever day. But despite their differences, they had one important thing in common. They were crazy about each other.

Author: Vincent Nichols
Quote: Sexual living is a reflection of God's love for us. It has two key qualities, which is faithfulness and creativity of new life.

Author: Lawrence Durrell
Quote: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.

Author: Gwendolyn Brooks
Quote: When you love a man, he becomes more than a body. His physical limbs expand, and his outline recedes, vanishes. He is rich and sweet and right. He is part of the world, the atmosphere, the blue sky and the blue water.

Author: Shirley MacLaine
Quote: It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.

Author: Helen Rowland
Quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.

Author: Marc Chagall
Quote: Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: He's more myself than I am. Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.

Author: Martin Buber
Quote: The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.

Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.

Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.

Author: Pablo Picasso
Quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: You could have had anything else in the world, and you asked for me."She smiled up at him. Filthy as he was, covered in blood and dirt, he was the most beautiful thing she'd ever seen."But I don't want anything else in the world.

Author: Rumi
Quote: Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field.I'll meet you there.When the soul lies down in that grassthe world is too full to talk about.

Author: Lord Byron
Quote: Absence - that common cure of love.

Author: Nicole Scherzinger
Quote: I love a man with a great sense of humor and who is intelligent - a man who has a great smile. He has to make me laugh. I like a man who is very ambitious and driven and who has a good heart and makes me feel safe. I like a man who is very strong and independent and confident - that is very sexy - but at the same time, he's very kind to people.

Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  The Brothers Karamazov
Quote: Above all, don't lie to yourself. The man who lies to himself and listens to his own lie comes to a point that he cannot distinguish the truth within him, or around him, and so loses all respect for himself and for others. And having no respect he ceases to love.

Author: Bob Hope
Quote: People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.

Author: Nick Vujicic
Quote: If we went by the world's definition of who I'm supposed to be because I look weird... 'Well, surely, this guy can't have a productive life, surely, he doesn't have a sense of humor. Surely, he can't love life.' We stereotype people in this world. And so... if the world thinks you're not good enough, it's a lie, you know. Get a second opinion.

Author: Domhnall Gleeson
Quote: Life is difficult for everyone; everyone has bad days. Everyone has trouble in their life, because it doesn't matter how rich you are: Sickness and trouble and worry and love, these things will mess with you at every level of life.

Author: Andre Breton
Quote: All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: Eleanor was right. She never looked nice. She looked like art, and art wasn't supposed to look nice; it was supposed to make you feel something.

Author: Jon Katz
Quote: I think if I've learned anything about friendship, it's to hang in, stay connected, fight for them, and let them fight for you. Don't walk away, don't be distracted, don't be too busy or tired, don't take them for granted. Friends are part of the glue that holds life and faith together. Powerful stuff.

Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote: The best proof of love is trust.

Author: Karl A. Menninger
Quote: Love cures people - both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Love possesses not nor will it be possessed, for love is sufficient unto love.

Author: Hippocrates
Quote: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity.

Author: Princess Diana
Quote: Only do what your heart tells you.

Author: Andre Breton
Quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.

Author: Anatole France
Quote: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; in just the same way, you learn to love by loving.

Author: Stephanie Perkins,  Anna and the French Kiss
Quote: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home.

Author: Vin Scully
Quote: I really love baseball. The guys and the game, and I love the challenge of describing things. The only thing I hate - and I know you have to be realistic and pay the bills in this life - is the loneliness on the road.

Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote: There isn't any formula or method. You learn to love by loving - by paying attention and doing what one thereby discovers has to be done.

Author: Josh Billings
Quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.

Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote: We love because it's the only true adventure.

Author: Samuel Richardson
Quote: Love will draw an elephant through a key-hole.

Author: Jamie McGuire,  Beautiful Disaster
Quote: To douchebags!"he said, gesturing to Brad. "And to girls that break your heart,"he bowed his head to me. His eyes lost focus. "And to the absolute fucking horror of losing your best friend because you were stupid enough to fall in love with her.

Author: Michael Levitt
Quote: I love the Swedish people for their detective novels, their archipelago, their sense of humor, their carbonated vodka, and most especially, for their wonderful hospitality.

Author: Pierre Corneille
Quote: Self-love is the source of all our other loves.

Author: John Dryden
Quote: Love is love's reward.

Author: Helen Hunt Jackson
Quote: Love has a tide!

Author: Rachel Bilson
Quote: I just really love being in my pajamas.

Author: Don King
Quote: I would never know how good I was if I didn't have Bob Arum. Bob Arum is white, Jewish; He was working for prosecutor's office. I'm black, an ex-convict, ex-number runner. Who would be most likely to succeed? It would be Bob 100-1. Yet I beat Bob on everything we ever done, with love.

Author: Will Cotton
Quote: People's love of sweets and guilty feelings about overindulgence are pretty universal.

Author: Robert Duvall
Quote: I love the smell of juice boxes in the morning.

Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.

Author: Mary Oliver
Quote: I love the line of Flaubert about observing things very intensely. I think our duty as writers begins not with our own feelings, but with the powers of observing.

Author: Tom Bodett
Quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Choke
Quote: What I want is to be needed. What I need is to be indispensable to somebody. Who I need is somebody that will eat up all my free time, my ego, my attention. Somebody addicted to me. A mutual addiction.

Author: Orson Welles
Quote: On my tombstone, I want written: 'He never did 'Love Boat!'

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: My daddy said, that the first time you fall in love, it changes you forever and no matter how hard you try, that feeling just never goes away.

Author: Patti Stanger
Quote: I was single for a really long time, then I realized I had abandonment issues. Then I found love online.

Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote: I love to be comfortable, but I also love to play up the glamour.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.

Author: Jennifer Morrison
Quote: In life, there are those relationships where you really love someone, but they're just not right for you and there's a little bittersweet feel to it.

Author: Abraham Polonsky
Quote: Do you know what it's like to love and be alone?

Author: Candice Bergen
Quote: Men say they love independence in a woman, but they don't waste a second demolishing it brick by brick.

Author: Laura Lippman
Quote: I think Baltimore suffers from nostalgia and it keeps us from being honest in talking about what really happened here. A place doesn't have to be perfect to be beloved, and I love this city and I love it better for seeing its flaws.

Author: Stephen Fry
Quote: I'd probably want to teach at university, because children would drive me insane. I suspect it would be English literature, Shakespeare and so forth. I've always been deeply, deeply in love with that kind of thing.

Author: Gates McFadden
Quote: I love a lot of things, and I'm pretty much obsessive about most things I do, whether it be gardening, or architecture, or music. I'd be an obsessive hairdresser.

Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote: I love to beatbox and have been doing it before I even knew what it was.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  Love: Ten Poems
Quote: Love is so short, forgetting is so long.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Why should it be essential to love rarely in order to love much?

Author: Christine Teigen
Quote: My mother's from Thailand, and they're very strict about girls in bikinis, but I would love to do a shoot in the floating market in Thailand.

Author: Christina Milian
Quote: I enjoy my fun time and everything like that but I love what I do.

Author: Sid Meier
Quote: Our goal has been to stay true to what people most love about the original Pirates! while upgrading, enhancing, and in some cases, re-inventing the game to make it a great experience for today's gamers.

Author: Paul McCartney,  The Beatles Illustrated Lyrics
Quote: And, in the endThe love you takeis equal to the love you make.

Author: Chris Paul
Quote: You don't always have to be a leader and be as vocal as I am. I'm sure some people would love it if I didn't talk as much as I did.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Importance of Being Earnest and Other Plays
Quote: The very essence of romance is uncertainty.

Author: Sanjay Dutt
Quote: I have done all kinds of roles, but Tony Montana's role in 'Scarface' is something I would love to play.

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Fellowship of the Ring
Quote: The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places; but still there is much that is fair, and though in all lands love is now mingled with grief, it grows perhaps the greater.

Author: Michael Morpurgo
Quote: Write because you love it and not because it is something that you think you should do. Always write about something or somebody you know about - something that you feel deeply and passionately about. Never try and force it.

Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote: All life is a manifestation of the spirit, the manifestation of love.

Author: Greg LeMond
Quote: You don't suffer, kill yourself and take the risks I take just for money. I love bike racing.

Author: Evan Peters
Quote: But I love Halloween, and I love that feeling: the cold air, the spooky dangers lurking around the corner.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: If all else perished, and he remained, I should still continue to be; and if all else remained, and he were annihilated, the universe would turn to a mighty stranger.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: It may be true that the law cannot make a man love me, but it can keep him from lynching me, and I think that's pretty important.

Author: Joan Crawford
Quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.

Author: Alphonsus Liguori
Quote: If you wish to strengthen your confidence in God still more, often recall the loving way in which He has acted toward you, and how mercifully He has tried to bring you out of your sinful life, to break your attachment to the things of earth and draw you to His love.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay
Quote: What I need is the dandelion in the spring. The bright yellow that means rebirth instead of destruction. The promise that life can go on, no matter how bad our losses. That it can be good again.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: I am not sure exactly what heaven will be like, but I know that when we die and it comes time for God to judge us, he will not ask, 'How many good things have you done in your life?' rather he will ask, 'How much love did you put into what you did?

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote: This is the miracle that happens every time to those who really love: the more they give, the more they possess.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.

Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote: The only way of knowing a person is to love them without hope.

Author: B. F. Skinner
Quote: We shouldn't teach great books; we should teach a love of reading.

Author: Debbie Ford
Quote: Resentments and grudges are two of the main culprits that perpetuate cycles of self-abuse and victimhood. Stowed away inside you like parasites, they deplete you of your God-given life force and separate you from your inherent worth, your joy, and the love in your heart.

Author: Matthew Perry
Quote: I grew up babysitting and always enjoyed it. I love family. A couple of my closest friends have kids, and I'm their godfather, and that's one of my greatest pleasures in life, just picking them up from school and hanging out with them.

Author: King Krule
Quote: When I realized I could write lyrics and let someone that I knew listen to them, but not know that the song was about them - say it was a girl. I could write this song about how I feel about this girl, I could play it to them. I just loved it, because all of the words would speak to them. I could see them slowly falling in love with me.

Author: Jeffrey Bell
Quote: What television gets to do, and there's a reason why 'S.H.I.E.L.D.' works as well as it does, is that it deals with the relationships. It deals with the very small, interpersonal ways that people both love and hate each other.

Author: Seinabo Sey
Quote: I got introduced to Maps by my label, and I liked his sound. I had been living with the original version of 'Younger' for quite a long time when I heard the result of his remix, and I loved it. It actually made me find a new love for the track.

Author: Chris Rock
Quote: I've seen women who don't have great relationships with their dads, and it all comes down to this: You have to tell girls you love them every day.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  Airman's Odyssey
Quote: Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.

Author: Rebecca Wells
Quote: I now know that things I always thought I could depend on can crash in an instant. Because of the love that I have been shown, I now know what it means to be 'beloved.' I now know that no breath is to be taken for granted.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: You are the answer to every prayer I've offered. You are a song, a dream, a whisper, and I don't know how I could have lived without you for as long as I have.

Author: Vincent Nichols
Quote: Sexual living is a reflection of God's love for us. It has two key qualities, which is faithfulness and creativity of new life.

Author: Jonny Wilkinson
Quote: I never ever believed that I would be able to give up on this dream which has driven me to live, breathe, love and embrace the game of rugby from the earliest days that I can remember.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: I can feel Peeta press his forehead into my temple and he asks, 'So now that you've got me, what are you going to do with me?' I turn into him. 'Put you somewhere you can't get hurt.

Author: Petrarch
Quote: The aged love what is practical while impetuous youth longs only for what is dazzling.

Author: Shreya Ghoshal
Quote: A studio is like a meditation room where music is created. And a live performance is the place where the creation of the studio is taken ahead. I love both.

Author: Charles L. Allen
Quote: The hardest people to reach with the love of God are not the bad people. They know they are bad. They have no defense. The hardest ones to win for God are the self-righteous people.

Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote: Love is a friendship set to music.

Author: Ovid
Quote: If any person wish to be idle, let them fall in love.

Author: Morihei Ueshiba
Quote: Each and every master, regardless of the era or the place, heard the call and attained harmony with heaven and earth. There are many paths leading to the top of Mount Fuji, but there is only one summit - love.

Author: Hedy Lamarr
Quote: I have not been that wise. Health I have taken for granted. Love I have demanded, perhaps too much and too often. As for money, I have only realized its true worth when I didn't have it.

Author: Amelia Barr
Quote: But the lover's power is the poet's power. He can make love from all the common strings with which this world is strung.

Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote: I'm a bit of a clothes hoarder, admittedly. I try to weed out stuff. My girlfriends come over for cheese and wine and go shopping in my wardrobe. They especially love it when they get stuff with a tag still on.

Author: Candace Bushnell,  Sex and the City
Quote: Man may have discovered fire, but women discovered how to play with it.

Author: Bono
Quote: I used to love Kurt Cobain, when he was telling people we're a pop band. People would laugh, they thought of it as good old ironic Kurt. But he wasn't being ironic.

Author: Alicia Keys
Quote: As a lyricist, you love to hear other great lyrics or other great concepts.

Author: Tom Cruise
Quote: Here's how I've lived my life: I've never been late to a set. I make films I believe in. I feel privileged to be able to do what I love.

Author: Marisa Tomei
Quote: I love being outside and getting fresh air.

Author: Ursula K. Le Guin,  The Lathe of Heaven
Quote: Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new.

Author: Francis Bacon
Quote: It is impossible to love and to be wise.

Author: Paul McCartney
Quote: And I loved Fats Waller. I love his instrumental abilities, his vocal abilities and his sense of humor.

Author: Julia Roberts
Quote: If you love someone, you say it, right then, out loud. Otherwise, the moment just passes you by.

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version
Quote: And now these three remain: faith, hope and love. But the greatest of these is love.

Author: Maurice Maeterlinck
Quote: When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.

Author: Robert Burton
Quote: To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Message in a Bottle
Quote: If you like her, if she makes you happy, and if you feel like you know her---then don't let her go.

Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote: At the beginning and at the end of love, the two lovers are embarrassed to find themselves alone.

Author: Diane Ackerman
Quote: Touch seems to be as essential as sunlight.

Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.

Author: Christian Nestell Bovee
Quote: Our first and last love is self-love.

Author: Jeanette Winterson
Quote: The truth is that love smashes into your life like an ice floe, and even if your heart is built like the Titanic you go down.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: I don't trust people who don't love themselves and tell me, 'I love you.' ... There is an African saying which is: Be careful when a naked person offers you a shirt.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Where there is love there is life.

Author: David Byrne
Quote: Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.

Author: Judith Viorst
Quote: Love is much nicer to be in than an automobile accident, a tight girdle, a higher tax bracket or a holding pattern over Philadelphia.

Author: Shel Silverstein
Quote: How many slams in an old screen door? Depends how loud you shut it. How many slices in a bread? Depends how thin you cut it. How much good inside a day? Depends how good you live 'em. How much love inside a friend? Depends how much you give 'em.

Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote: The love which moves the world, according to common Christian belief, is God's love and the love of God.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Who, being loved, is poor?

Author: Tammy Wynette
Quote: Sometimes it's hard to be a woman giving all your love to just one man.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: I love you. Remember. They cannot take it

Author: Bryant H. McGill
Quote: True love is quiescent, except in the nascent moments of true humility.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Vampire Academy
Quote: Do you think I'm pretty?I think you're beautifulBeautiful?You are so beautiful, it hurts sometimes.

Author: Vladimir Nabokov,  Lolita
Quote: It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.

Author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach
Quote: We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack.

Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote: A man reserves his true and deepest love not for the species of woman in whose company he finds himself electrified and enkindled, but for that one in whose company he may feel tenderly drowsy.

Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote: Love him and let him love you. Do you think anything else under heaven really matters?

Author: Max Lucado
Quote: A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her.

Author: Geoffrey Chaucer
Quote: Love is blind.

Author: James Thurber
Quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.

Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote: Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept
Quote: If pain must come, may it come quickly. Because I have a life to live, and I need to live it in the best way possible. If he has to make a choice, may he make it now. Then I will either wait for him or forget him.

Author: James Baldwin
Quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Message in a Bottle
Quote: True love is rare, and it's the only thing that gives life real meaning.

Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
Quote: If you wished to be loved, love.

Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.

Author: Tom Robbins
Quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Battle of the Labyrinth
Quote: Be careful of love. It'll twist your brain around and leave you thinking up is down and right is wrong.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: Declarations of love amuse me. Especially when unrequited.

Author: George Eliot
Quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.

Author: Pedro Calderón de la Barca
Quote: When love is not madness it is not love.

Author: Iris Murdoch
Quote: We can only learn to love by loving.

Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.

Author: Rumi
Quote: We are born of love; Love is our mother.

Author: Gilbert Parker
Quote: Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.

Author: Princess Diana
Quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: What's this?"he demanded, looking from Clary to his companions, as if they might know what she was doing there."It's a girl,"Jace said,recovering his composure. "Surely you've seen girls before, Alec. Your sister Isabelle is one.

Author: Gillian Anderson
Quote: Well, it seems to me that the best relationships - the ones that last - are frequently the ones that are rooted in friendship. You know, one day you look at the person and you see something more than you did the night before. Like a switch has been flicked somewhere. And the person who was just a friend is... suddenly the only person you can ever imagine yourself with.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote: Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue, a wonderful living side by side can grow, if they succeed in loving the distance between them which makes it possible for each to see the other whole against the sky.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets.

Author: Friedrich Schiller
Quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.

Author: Dwight L. Moody
Quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.

Author: A. J. McLean
Quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.

Author: Erich Fromm
Quote: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.

Author: Robert Frost
Quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.

Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.

Author: Lucille Ball
Quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
Quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.

Author: Kahlil Gibran
Quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were.

Author: Harry Emerson Fosdick
Quote: Bitterness imprisons life; love releases it.

Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote: Though lovers be lost love shall not.

Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote: If you do not love me I shall not be loved If I do not love you I shall not love.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer
Quote: I love you also means I love you more than anyone loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that no one loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that I love no one else, and never have loved anyone else, and never will love anyone else.

Author: Henri Matisse
Quote: He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: I was smiling yesterday,I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow.Simply because life is too short to cry for anything.

Author: Lynda Barry
Quote: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.

Author: Thomas Moore
Quote: No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.

Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.

Author: Madame de Stael
Quote: We cease loving ourselves if no one loves us.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Nights in Rodanthe
Quote: The greater the love, the greater the tragedy when it's over.

Author: Lord Byron
Quote: Who loves, raves.

Author: Alfred de Musset
Quote: One must not trifle with love.

Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.

Author: R. Buckminster Fuller
Quote: Love is metaphysical gravity.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: If I can stop one heart from breaking, I shall not live in vain.

Author: William Congreve
Quote: Say what you will, 'tis better to be left than never to have been loved.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: I cannot fix on the hour, or the spot, or the look or the words, which laid the foundation. It is too long ago. I was in the middle before I knew that I had begun.

Author: Haniel Long
Quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modeled upon it.

Author: Joe Taslim
Quote: My favorite place in Indonesia is Bali. I was there with my family in Nusa Dua, and my kids loved it. I'm a workaholic, so for me, Bali is a place where you can have a vacation, but you can have your own moment as well. You feel like you blend with nature - and I love the beach.

Author: Ann Landers
Quote: If you have love in your life, it can make up for a great many things that are missing. If you don't have love in your life, no matter what else there is, it's not enough.

Author: Ovid
Quote: Love and dignity cannot share the same abode.

Author: Charlotte Bronte
Quote: I don't call you handsome, sir, though I love you most dearly: far too dearly to flatter you. Don't flatter me.

Author: Nora Roberts
Quote: Love and magic have a great deal in common. They enrich the soul, delight the heart. And they both take practice.

Author: Bob Marley
Quote: One love, one heart, one destiny.

Author: Robin Roberts
Quote: My mama told me in college, 'I love you, and you're God's child, but natural beauty will only take you so far.'

Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote: My dear,Find what you love and let it kill you.Let it drain you of your all. Let it cling onto your back and weigh you down into eventual nothingness.Let it kill you and let it devour your remains.For all things will kill you, both slowly and fastly, but it’s much better to be killed by a lover.~ Falsely yours

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Hate the sin, love the sinner.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby
Quote: You know, when it works, love is pretty amazing. It's not overrated. There's a reason for all those songs.

Author: Therese of Lisieux
Quote: I understood that the Church had a Heart, and that this Heart was burning with love.

Author: Agatha Christie,  An Autobiography
Quote: It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: If you want a love message to be heard, it has got to be sent out. To keep a lamp burning, we have to keep putting oil in it.

Author: Bertrand Russell,  The Conquest of Happiness
Quote: Of all forms of caution, caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness.

Author: Bryce Dallas Howard
Quote: You meet your soulmate, and you're like, 'Well, this is it. This is the feeling of falling in love, and it's the most intense it can ever be.' Then you have a child, and it's like - it's huge!

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  The Host
Quote: It's not the face, but the expressions on it. It's not the voice, but what you say. It's not how you look in that body, but the thing you do with it. You are beautiful.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Nineteen Minutes
Quote: If you gave someone your heart and they died, did they take it with them? Did you spend the rest of forever with a hole inside you that couldn't be filled?

Author: Scott Adams
Quote: I love you like a fat kid loves cake!

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: To me, Fearless is not the absense of fear. It's not being completely unafraid. To me, Fearless is having fears. Fearless is having doubts. Lots of them. To me, Fearless is living in spite of those things that scare you to death.

Author: Julian Lennon
Quote: As much as I love music, in my mind, photography is what makes me the happiest - that's for sure.

Author: Melissa Rosenberg
Quote: I love Charlie, Billy Burke's character. Writing for him is so spectacular, he's so funny and wry and every scene he's in he just takes. There's a scene in 'Eclipse' where Bella tells him she's a virgin, and it's the funniest, most awkward scene I've ever seen on film.

Author: Ellen G. White
Quote: True love is not a strong, fiery, impetuous passion. It is, on the contrary, an element calm and deep. It looks beyond mere externals, and is attracted by qualities alone. It is wise and discriminating, and its devotion is real and abiding.

Author: Vincent van Gogh
Quote: It is good to love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is well done.

Author: Mena Suvari
Quote: A year or so ago I went through all the people in my life and asked myself: does this person inspire me, genuinely love me and support me unconditionally? I wanted nothing but positive influences in my life.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: And when her lips met mine, I knew that I could live to be a hundred and visit every country in the world, but nothing would ever compare to that single moment when I first kissed the girl of my dreams and knew that my love would last forever.

Author: Shana Alexander
Quote: The mark of a true crush... is that you fall in love first and grope for reasons afterward.

Author: Janice Dickinson
Quote: The past explains how I got here, but the future is up to me - and I love to live life at full throttle.

Author: Scott Baio
Quote: I love driving cars, looking at them, cleaning and washing and shining them. I clean 'em inside and outside. I'm very touchy about cars. I don't want anybody leaning on them or closing the door too hard, know what I mean?

Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote: Love is the ability and willingness to allow those that you care for to be what they choose for themselves without any insistence that they satisfy you.

Author: Tom Robbins
Quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: I think... if it is true that there are as many minds as there are heads, then there are as many kinds of love as there are hearts.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.

Author: Tommy Lasorda
Quote: Guys ask me, don't I get burned out? How can you get burned out doing something you love? I ask you, have you ever got tired of kissing a pretty girl?

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: What Is Love? I have met in the streets a very poor young man who was in love. His hat was old, his coat worn, the water passed through his shoes and the stars through his soul

Author: Monica Raymund
Quote: Little white lies are part of everyday life. If you're in court being charged with a felony, you're probably going to be tempted to lie. Or if your girlfriend asks you if the sweater she is wearing makes her look fat; you're going to lie because you love that person. There are different reasons and justifications to lie; it's human nature.

Author: E.M. Forster,  A Room with a View
Quote: It isn't possible to love and part. You will wish that it was. You can transmute love, ignore it, muddle it, but you can never pull it out of you. I know by experience that the poets are right: love is eternal.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: If loving someone is putting them in a straitjacket and kicking them down a flight of stairs, then yes, I have loved a few people.

Author: Chris Messina
Quote: I would love to close my eyes and see myself with my girlfriend when we're 99 years old and I have a pipe and she's knitting a sweater, and I hope that's the way it goes. I think it's a challenge every day.

Author: Mary Oliver
Quote: To live in this world, you must be able to do three things: to love what is mortal; to hold it against your bones knowing your own life depends on it; and, when the time comes to let it go, to let it go.

Author: J.R. Ward,  Dark Lover
Quote: Welcome to the wonderful world of jealousy, he thought. For the price of admission, you get a splitting headache, a nearly irresistable urge to commit murder, and an inferiority complex. Yippee.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Last Song
Quote: Life, he realize, was much like a song. In the beginning there is mystery, in the end there is confirmation, but it's in the middle where all the emotion resides to make the whole thing worthwhile.

Author: Thomas Merton
Quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.

Author: Amy Chua
Quote: I am definitely a Type A personality, always rushing around, trying to do too much, not good at just lying on the beach. But I'm so thankful for everything I have: wonderfully supportive parents and sisters, the best husband in the world, terrific students I love teaching and hanging out with, and above all, my two amazing daughters.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

Author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu
Quote: The cavemen, when they saw the antelopes, they had to scratch them on to the caves because they needed to express the immediacy of what they were being affected by - and I love that. That is why I do what I do. I need to express myself.

Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote: I have moments of weakness, but mostly I brush the criticism off... Who cares if I'm not a size zero? I don't want to be. I love my body; I'm healthy, I work out.

Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote: They say when you are missing someone that they are probably feeling the same, but I don't think it's possible for you to miss me as much as I'm missing you right now

Author: Erich Fromm
Quote: Just as love is an orientation which refers to all objects and is incompatible with the restriction to one object, so is reason a human faculty which must embrace the whole of the world with which man is confronted.

Author: James E. Faust
Quote: A grateful heart is a beginning of greatness. It is an expression of humility. It is a foundation for the development of such virtues as prayer, faith, courage, contentment, happiness, love, and well-being.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: Adapt yourself to the things among which your lot has been cast and love sincerely the fellow creatures with whom destiny has ordained that you shall live.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote: I fell in love with her courage, her sincerity, and her flaming self respect. And it's these things I'd believe in, even if the whole world indulged in wild suspicions that she wasn't all she should be. I love her and it is the beginning of everything.

Author: Bob Marley,  Guitar Chord Songbook - Bob Marley
Quote: If she's amazing, she won't be easy. If she's easy, she won't be amazing. If she's worth it, you wont give up. If you give up, you're not worthy. ... Truth is, everybody is going to hurt you; you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.

Author: Tom Bodett
Quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.

Author: Vera Wang
Quote: When I design a wedding dress with a bustle, it has to be one the bride can dance in. I love the idea that something is practical and still looks great.

Author: Henry Fielding
Quote: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.

Author: Clive Barker,  Days of Magic, Nights of War
Quote: Any fool can be happy. It takes a man with real heart to make beauty out of the stuff that makes us weep.

Author: Evel Knievel
Quote: I love the feeling of the fresh air on my face and the wind blowing through my hair.

Author: Kelly Brook
Quote: What I am is how I came out. No one's perfect and you just have to accept your flaws and learn to love yourself.

Author: Billy Graham
Quote: Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: And then he gives me a smile that just seems so genuinely sweet with just the right touch of shyness that unexpected warmth rushes through me.

Author: Allan Hamilton
Quote: I call horses 'divine mirrors' - they reflect back the emotions you put in. If you put in love and respect and kindness and curiosity, the horse will return that.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Eclipse
Quote: Look after my heart - I've left it with you.

Author: Brad Pitt
Quote: A family is a risky venture, because the greater the love, the greater the loss... That's the trade-off. But I'll take it all.

Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote: Respect is what we owe; love, what we give.

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: Love is not affectionate feeling, but a steady wish for the loved person's ultimate good as far as it can be obtained.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.

Author: David Byrne
Quote: Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.

Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote: Jealousy contains more of self-love than of love.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Shatter Me
Quote: All I ever wanted was to reach out and touch another human being not just with my hands but with my heart.

Author: Thomas Hood
Quote: Oh, if it be to choose and call thee mine, love, thou art every day my Valentine!

Author: Tom Cruise
Quote: Here's how I've lived my life: I've never been late to a set. I make films I believe in. I feel privileged to be able to do what I love.

Author: Simon Cowell
Quote: People confuse ego, lust, insecurity with true love.

Author: Gary Zukav
Quote: Caregivers attract caregivers and live in a community of love. They are energized by their caring, fulfilled, and they love life. Caretakers attract caretakers and live in the company of resentful victims who see themselves as misused and are fatigued from constant giving with no return.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  A Room of One's Own
Quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.

Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.

Author: Og Mandino
Quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.

Author: Charles Dickens
Quote: Never close your lips to those whom you have already opened your heart.

Author: Milan Kundera
Quote: You can't measure the mutual affection of two human beings by the number of words they exchange.

Author: P. J. O'Rourke
Quote: Anyway, no drug, not even alcohol, causes the fundamental ills of society. If we're looking for the source of our troubles, we shouldn't test people for drugs, we should test them for stupidity, ignorance, greed and love of power.

Author: Christina Perri
Quote: You need to love yourself and be yourself one hundred percent before you can actually love someone else.

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  The Brothers Karamazov
Quote: What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love.

Author: Katharine Lee Bates
Quote: Love planted a rose, and the world turned sweet.

Author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
Quote: If you were to destroy the belief in immortality in mankind, not only love but every living force on which the continuation of all life in the world depended, would dry up at once.

Author: Chill Wills
Quote: Win, lose or draw, you're all my cousins and I love you.

Author: Drake
Quote: Jealousy is just love and hate at the same time.

Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote: I would like to be the air that inhabits you for a moment only. I would like to be that unnoticed and that necessary.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: I don't know that love changes. People change. Circumstances change.

Author: Emma Watson
Quote: It sounds like a cliche but I also learnt that you're not going to fall for the right person until you really love yourself and feel good about how you are.

Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote: One mustn't ask apple trees for oranges, France for sun, women for love, life for happiness.

Author: Chelsea Leyland
Quote: The best thing about being a DJ is making people happy. There is nothing like seeing people get up from a table to dance or the expression on their face when they hear a song they love. I also love to educate people on music they have never heard.

Author: Lord Byron
Quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.

Author: Karen Marie Moning,  Bloodfever
Quote: One day you will kiss a man you can't breathe without, and find that breath is of little consequence.

Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  Halfway to the Grave
Quote: I'm saying that I'm a moody, insecure, narrow-minded, jealous, borderline homicidal bitch, and I want you to promise me that you're okay with that, because it's who I am, and you're what I need.

Author: Joan Chen
Quote: The romantic love we feel toward the opposite sex is probably one extra help from God to bring you together, but that's it. All the rest of it, the true love, is the test.

Author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief
Quote: He does something to me, that boy. Every time. It’s his only detriment. He steps on my heart. He makes me cry.

Author: Deborah Reber,  Chicken Soup for the Teenage Soul
Quote: Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself.

Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote: Find what you love and let it kill you.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  Twenty Love Poems and a Song of Despair
Quote: I wantTo do with you what spring does with the cherry trees.

Author: Virginia Satir
Quote: We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.

Author: A.A. Milne
Quote: How do you spell 'love'?"- Piglet"You don't spell it...you feel it."- Pooh

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.

Author: Samuel Lover
Quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent
Quote: Then I realize what it is. It's him. Something about him makes me feel like I am about to fall. Or turn to liquid. Or burst into flames.

Author: A.A. Milne
Quote: Promise me you'll never forget me because if I thought you would, I'd never leave.

Author: Charles Dickens,  Great Expectations
Quote: I loved her against reason, against promise, against peace, against hope, against happiness, against all discouragement that could be.

Author: Javan
Quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.

Author: Judy Garland
Quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.

Author: Erich Fromm
Quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.

Author: Chuck Klosterman,  Killing Yourself to Live: 85% of a True Story
Quote: Art and love are the same thing: It’s the process of seeing yourself in things that are not you.

Author: Stewart O'Nan,  The Odds: A Love Story
Quote: You couldn't relive your life, skipping the awful parts, without losing what made it worthwhile. You had to accept it as a whole--like the world, or the person you loved.

Author: Lisa Schroeder
Quote: Was it hard?"I ask.Letting go?"Not as hard as holding on to something that wasn't real.

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Quote: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.

Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.

Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote: Anyone who falls in love is searching for the missing pieces of themselves. So anyone who's in love gets sad when they think of their lover. It's like stepping back inside a room you have fond memories of, one you haven't seen in a long time.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.

Author: J. D. Salinger
Quote: I was about half in love with her by the time we sat down. That's the thing about girls. Every time they do something pretty... you fall half in love with them, and then you never know where the hell you are.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: If conversation was the lyrics, laughter was the music, making time spent together a melody that could be replayed over and over without getting stale.

Author: Ovid
Quote: If you want to be loved, be lovable.

Author: David Gest
Quote: Liza, I love you more than any words can say. You have made me a complete person. You are everything to me. And I cannot think of living life without you. And I love you forever.

Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote: If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.

Author: Charles Morgan
Quote: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.

Author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief
Quote: A DEFINITION NOT FOUNDIN THE DICTIONARYNot leaving: an act of trust and love,often deciphered by children

Author: W. Somerset Maugham
Quote: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: The saddest people I've ever met in life are the ones who don't care deeply about anything at all. Passion and satisfaction go hand in hand, and without them, any happiness is only temporary, because there's nothing to make it last.

Author: Saint Teresa of Avila
Quote: Accustom yourself continually to make many acts of love, for they enkindle and melt the soul.

Author: Petrarch
Quote: Love is the crowning grace of humanity, the holiest right of the soul, the golden link which binds us to duty and truth, the redeeming principle that chiefly reconciles the heart to life, and is prophetic of eternal good.

Author: Thomas Merton,  No Man Is an Island
Quote: The beginning of love is the will to let those we love be perfectly themselves, the resolution not to twist them to fit our own image. If in loving them we do not love what they are, but only their potential likeness to ourselves, then we do not love them: we only love the reflection of ourselves we find in them

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: You could have fooled me. Everytime I called you, Luke said you were sick. I figured you were avoiding me. Again.""I wasn't. I did want to talk to you. I've been thinking about you all the time.""I've been thinking about you, too.""I really was sick. I swear. I almost died back there on the ship, you know.""I know. Everytime you almost die, I almost die myself.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
Quote: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.

Author: Ernest Hemingway,  A Farewell to Arms
Quote: Maybe...you'll fall in love with me all over again.""Hell,"I said, "I love you enough now. What do you want to do? Ruin me?""Yes. I want to ruin you.""Good,"I said. "That's what I want too.

Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.

Author: Theophile Gautier
Quote: To love is to admire with the heart; to admire is to love with the mind.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  Twenty Love Poems and a Song of Despair
Quote: Tonight I can write the saddest linesI loved her, and sometimes she loved me too.

Author: E. M. Forster
Quote: Love is always being given where it is not required.

Author: Jon Krakauer,  Into the Wild
Quote: Happiness [is] only real when shared

Author: Marc Chagall
Quote: In our life there is a single color, as on an artist's palette, which provides the meaning of life and art. It is the color of love.

Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.

Author: John Morton
Quote: There is no limit to the power of loving.

Author: Lydia M. Child
Quote: The cure for all the ills and wrongs, the cares, the sorrows, and the crimes of humanity, all lie in the one word 'love'. It is the divine vitality that everywhere produces and restores life.

Author: Gautama Buddha
Quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection

Author: John Dryden
Quote: But love's a malady without a cure.

Author: Pablo Neruda
Quote: As if you were on fire from within.The moon lives in the lining of your skin.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince
Quote: I could not tell you if I loved you the first moment I saw you, or if it was the second or third or fourth. But I remember the first moment I looked at you walking toward me and realized that somehow the rest of the world seemed to vanish when I was with you.

Author: Richard Bach
Quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?

Author: Zora Neale Hurston
Quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.

Author: Rumi
Quote: When I am with you, we stay up all night.When you're not here, I can't go to sleep.Praise God for those two insomnias!And the difference between them.

Author: Charles Bukowski,  Love is a Dog from Hell
Quote: I loved you like a man loves a woman he never touches, only writes to, keeps little photographs of.

Author: Alexandra Cassavetes
Quote: I think vampires are different from human beings, but they're sentenced to eternity on this planet. They have the same confusion about love and permanence, integrity, and denial. These qualities really are the same in vampire characters as in humans. I think they're universal themes.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever
Quote: I like flaws. I think they make things interesting.

Author: Deborra-Lee Furness
Quote: My secret indulgent food is dessert. I have an incredible sweet tooth - chocolate pudding with vanilla ice-cream or trifle and pavlova. I do love dessert.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  The Great Gatsby
Quote: I wasn't actually in love, but I felt a sort of tender curiosity.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: What do I care about the purring of one who cannot love, like the cat?

Author: Orhan Pamuk,  Snow
Quote: Happiness is holding someone in your arms and knowing you hold the whole world.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

Author: Johnny Weir
Quote: I'm not ashamed to be me. More than anyone else I know, I love my life and accept myself. What's wrong with being unique? I am proud of everything that I am and will become.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.

Author: C.S. Lewis,  The Silver Chair
Quote: I'm on Aslan's side even if there isn't any Aslan to lead it. I'm going to live as like a Narnian as I can even if there isn't any Narnia.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant
Quote: I fell in love with him. But I don't just stay with him by default as if there's no one else available to me. I stay with him because I choose to, every day that I wake up, every day that we fight or lie to each other or disappoint each other. I choose him over and over again, and he chooses me.

Author: Juan Pablo Galavis
Quote: In life, you have to take the pace that love goes. You don't force it. You just don't force love, you don't force falling in love, you don't force being in love - you just become. I don't know how to say that in English, but you just feel it.

Author: José N. Harris,  MI VIDA: A Story of Faith, Hope and Love
Quote: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.

Author: Mitch Albom
Quote: Lost love is still love. It takes a different form, that's all. You can't see their smile or bring them food or tousle their hair or move them around a dance floor. But when those senses weaken another heightens. Memory. Memory becomes your partner. You nurture it. You hold it. You dance with it.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Who, being loved, is poor?

Author: Sai Baba
Quote: Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: I fell in love with her when we were together, then fell deeper in love with her in the years we were apart.

Author: Rita Mae Brown,  Riding Shotgun
Quote: Sorrow is how we learn to love. Your heart isn't breaking. It hurts because it's getting larger. The larger it gets, the more love it holds.

Author: Bradley Whitford
Quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: Enlightened leadership is spiritual if we understand spirituality not as some kind of religious dogma or ideology but as the domain of awareness where we experience values like truth, goodness, beauty, love and compassion, and also intuition, creativity, insight and focused attention.

Author: Arrigo Boito
Quote: When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  An Ideal Husband
Quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.

Author: George Sand
Quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.

Author: Barbara Walters
Quote: Motherhood is tough. If you just want a wonderful little creature to love, you can get a puppy.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected. Maybe they always have been and will be. Maybe we've lived a thousand lives before this one and in each of them we've found each other. And maybe each time, we've been forced apart for the same reasons. That means that this goodbye is both a goodbye for the past ten thousand years and a prelude to what will come.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Death is a challenge. It tells us not to waste time... It tells us to tell each other right now that we love each other.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected. Maybe they always have been and will be. Maybe we've lived a thousand lives before this one and in each of them we've found each other. And maybe each time, we've been forced apart for the same reasons. That means that this goodbye is both a goodbye for the past ten thousand years and a prelude to what will come.

Author: Stieg Larsson,  The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Quote: What she had realized was that love was that moment when your heart was about to burst.

Author: David Mitchell,  Cloud Atlas
Quote: A half-read book is a half-finished love affair.

Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote: Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings.

Author: Huey Newton
Quote: I think what motivates people is not great hate, but great love for other people.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  This Side of Paradise
Quote: I'm not sentimental--I'm as romantic as you are. The idea, you know,is that the sentimental person thinks things will last--the romanticperson has a desperate confidence that they won't.

Author: Ambrose Bierce
Quote: Women in love are less ashamed than men. They have less to be ashamed of.

Author: Brian Andreas,  Story People: Selected Stories & Drawings of Brian Andreas
Quote: I read once that the ancient Egyptians had fifty words for sand & the Eskimos had a hundred words for snow. I wish I had a thousand words for love, but all that comes to mind is the way you move against me while you sleep & there are no words for that.

Author: Carl Sagan,  Cosmos
Quote: Every one of us is, in the cosmic perspective, precious. If a human disagrees with you, let him live. In a hundred billion galaxies, you will not find another.

Author: Ernest Hemingway,  Men Without Women
Quote: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.

Author: Tyra Banks
Quote: I love the confidence that makeup gives me.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Fight Club
Quote: You know how they say you only hurt the ones you love? Well, it works both ways.

Author: Hugh Jackman
Quote: I love food, all types of food. I love Korean food, Japanese, Italian, French. In Australia, we don't have a distinctive Australian food, so we have food from everywhere all around the world. We're very multicultural, so we grew up with lots of different types of food.

Author: Johnny Depp
Quote: The only creatures that are evolved enough to convey pure love are dogs and infants.

Author: Lemony Snicket,  Horseradish
Quote: Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby- awkwardly, and often with a great deal of mess.

Author: Sophocles
Quote: One wordFrees us of all the weight and pain of life:That word is love.

Author: Nick Vujicic
Quote: If we went by the world's definition of who I'm supposed to be because I look weird... 'Well, surely, this guy can't have a productive life, surely, he doesn't have a sense of humor. Surely, he can't love life.' We stereotype people in this world. And so... if the world thinks you're not good enough, it's a lie, you know. Get a second opinion.

Author: John Rhys-Davies
Quote: In the film world, we can all be heroes. In the real world, where heroism can cost you your life or the life of the ones you love, people aren't so willing to make those sacrifices. When they do, they are set apart from the rest of us.

Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote: It takes courage to love, but pain through love is the purifying fire which those who love generously know. We all know people who are so much afraid of pain that they shut themselves up like clams in a shell and, giving out nothing, receive nothing and therefore shrink until life is a mere living death.

Author: Johnny Depp
Quote: If someone were to harm my family or a friend or somebody I love, I would eat them. I might end up in jail for 500 years, but I would eat them.

Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote: You should hurry up and acquire the cigar habit. It's one of the major happinesses. And so much more lasting than love, so much less costly in emotional wear and tear.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  South of the Border, West of the Sun
Quote: Sometimes when I look at you, I feel I'm gazing at a distant star. It's dazzling, but the light is from tens of thousands of years ago.Maybe the star doesn't even exist any more. Yet sometimes that light seems more real to me than anything.

Author: John Ruskin
Quote: The purest and most thoughtful minds are those which love colour the most.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: I guess that’s just part of loving people: You have to give things up. Sometimes you even have to give them up.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert
Quote: There were times, especially when I was traveling for 'Eat, Pray, Love,' when, I swear to God, I would feel this weight of my female ancestors, all those Swedish farmwives from beyond the grave who were like, 'Go! Go to Naples! Eat more pizza! Go to India, ride an elephant! Do it! Swim in the Indian Ocean. Read those books. Learn a language.'

Author: Honoré de Balzac,  Physiologie Du Mariage
Quote: The more one judges, the less one loves.

Author: Bernie Siegel
Quote: God wants us to know that life is a series of beginnings, not endings. Just as graduations are not terminations, but commencements. Creation is an ongoing process, and when we create a perfect world where love and compassion are shared by all, suffering will cease.

Author: Ray Kroc
Quote: We provide food that customers love, day after day after day. People just want more of it.

Author: Melissa Marr,  Ink Exchange
Quote: Sometimes love means letting go when you want to hold on tighter.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  The Sirens of Titan
Quote: A purpose of human life, no matter who is controlling it, is to love whoever is around to be loved.

Author: John Updike,  My Father's Tears and Other Stories
Quote: It is easy to love people in memory; the hard thing is to love them when they are there in front of you.

Author: M. C. Escher
Quote: We adore chaos because we love to produce order.

Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.

Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote: I don't like any kind of negativity. I try to be good to everyone, whether it's a love, a friend, an ex. I'll always try to treat people the way I want to be treated.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Shatter Me
Quote: I'm oxygen and he's dying to breathe.

Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote: The love of learning, the sequestered nooks,And all the sweet serenity of books

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  At First Sight
Quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it...

Author: Aron Ralston
Quote: Bring love and peace and happiness and beautiful lives into the world in my honor. Thank you. Love you.

Author: Nelson Mandela
Quote: I cannot say for certain if there is such a thing as love at first sight, but I do know that the moment I first glimpsed Winnie Nomzamo, I knew that I wanted to have her as my wife.

Author: Barbara de Angelis
Quote: Difficult times always create opportunities for you to experience more love in your life.

Author: Thomas Mann
Quote: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death.

Author: H. L. Mencken
Quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Love... it surrounds every being and extends slowly to embrace all that shall be.

Author: Albert Ellis
Quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.

Author: Gayle Forman,  If I Stay
Quote: If you stay, I'll do whatever you want. I'll quit the band, go with you to New York. But if you need me to go away, I'll do that, too. I was talking to Liz and she said maybe coming back to your old life would be too painful, that maybe it'd be easier for you to erase us. And that would suck, but I'd do it. I can lose you like that if I don't lose you today. I'll let you go. If you stay.

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: Be with me always - take any form - drive me mad! only do not leave me in this abyss, where I cannot find you! Oh, God! it is unutterable! I can not live without my life! I can not live without my soul!

Author: Barbara de Angelis
Quote: Difficult times always create opportunities for you to experience more love in your life.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.

Author: François de La Rochefoucauld,  Maxims
Quote: Absence diminishes small loves and increases great ones, as the wind blows out the candle and fans the bonfire.

Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote: How do I love thee? Let me count the ways.I love thee to the depth and breadth and heightMy soul can reach

Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.

Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote: Don't cry over someone who wouldn't cry over you.

Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote: Love is the only reality and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth that lies at the heart of creation.

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: When someone is in your heart, they're never truly gone. They can come back to you, even at unlikely times.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: Respect was invented to cover the empty place where love should be.

Author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
Quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer
Quote: Time was passing like a hand waving from a train I wanted to be on. I hope you never have to think about anything as much as I think about you.

Author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath
Quote: Yes, I was infatuated with you: I am still. No one has ever heightened such a keen capacity of physical sensation in me. I cut you out because I couldn't stand being a passing fancy. Before I give my body, I must give my thoughts, my mind, my dreams. And you weren't having any of those.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Crescendo
Quote: Being with you never felt wrong. It's the one thing I did right. You're the one thing I did right.

Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote: From childhood's hour I have not been. As others were, I have not seen. As others saw, I could not awaken. My heart to joy at the same tone. And all I loved, I loved alone.

Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote: Love is suffering. One side always loves more.

Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote: It is my goal to love everyone. I hate no one. Regardless of their race, religion, their proclivities, the desire of their heart and how they want to live their life and the decisions that they make. I can even respect people's decisions and lifestyle choices just as I hope they have the courtesy to respect my decisions and my choices.

Author: Billie Holiday
Quote: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain.

Author: David Nicholls,  One Day
Quote: This is where it all begins. Everything starts here, today.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Message in a Bottle
Quote: Without you in my arms, I feel an emptiness in my soul. I find myself searching the crowds for your face - I know it's an impossibility, but I cannot help myself.

Author: John Donne
Quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.

Author: Mary Oliver
Quote: Someone I loved once gave me a box full of darkness. It took me years to understand that this too, was a gift.

Author: Erich Segal
Quote: Love means not ever having to say you're sorry.

Author: Zora Neale Hurston
Quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: When you trip over love, it is easy to get up. But when you fall in love, it is impossible to stand again.

Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote: Love is the best thing in the world, and the thing that lives the longest.

Author: Thomas Shadwell
Quote: Words may be false and full of art; Sighs are the natural language of the heart.

Author: Steven Adler
Quote: Every musician, their goal in life is to play music that people love, and I've accomplished my goal. I was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and left that chapter of my life and those people in the past. Good and bad, I've loved and am thankful for that chapter.

Author: Ovid
Quote: Fortune and love favor the brave.

Author: Julio Cortázar
Quote: Come sleep with me: We won't make Love,Love will make us.

Author: Helen Hayes
Quote: The truth is that there is only one terminal dignity - love. And the story of a love is not important - what is important is that one is capable of love. It is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.

Author: Fulton J. Sheen
Quote: Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.

Author: Barbara de Angelis
Quote: Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.

Author: Fannie Flagg,  Fried Green Tomatoes at the Whistle Stop Cafe
Quote: I wonder how many people don't get the one they want, but end up with the one they're supposed to be with.

Author: E.E. Cummings
Quote: Trust your heart if the seas catch fire, live by love though the stars walk backward.

Author: Rumi
Quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.

Author: Sting
Quote: Love is stronger than justice.

Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote: Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love.

Author: John Henry Newman
Quote: The love of our private friends is the only preparatory exercise for the love of all men.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  The Little Prince
Quote: It is the time you have wasted for your rose that makes your rose so important.

Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote: To good and true love fear is forever affixed.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage
Quote: To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved anyhow - this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.

Author: Joseph Conrad
Quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.

Author: Kahlil Gibran
Quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.

Author: Stephanie Lennox,  I Don't Remember You
Quote: I’ve been fighting to be who I am all my life. What’s the point of being who I am, if I can’t have the person who was worth all the fighting for?

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: Holding Eleanor's hand was like holding a butterfly. Or a heartbeat. Like holding something complete, and completely alive.

Author: Anne Campbell
Quote: Love means to commit yourself without guarantee.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Mercy
Quote: You know it's never fifty-fifty in a marriage. It's always seventy-thirty, or sixty-forty. Someone falls in love first. Someone puts someone else up on a pedestal. Someone works very hard to keep things rolling smoothly; someone else sails along for the ride.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: Nothing takes the taste out of peanut butter quite like unrequited love.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love: One Woman's Search for Everything Across Italy, India and Indonesia
Quote: To lose balance sometimes for love is part of living a balancedlife.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: My wife, my family, my friends - they've all taught me things about love and what that emotion really means. In a nutshell, loving someone is about giving, not receiving.

Author: Anne Sexton,  The Complete Poems
Quote: Watch out for intellect,because it knows so much it knows nothingand leaves you hanging upside down,mouthing knowledge as your heartfalls out of your mouth.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote: If you would be loved, love, and be loveable.

Author: Ben Okri
Quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.

Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote: If you love something set it free, but don't be surprised if it comes back with herpes.

Author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables
Quote: The power of a glance has been so much abused in love stories, that it has come to be disbelieved in. Few people dare now to say that two beings have fallen in love because they have looked at each other. Yet it is in this way that love begins, and in this way only.

Author: Rudyard Kipling
Quote: Heaven grant us patience with a man in love.

Author: John Henry Newman
Quote: I sought to hear the voice of God and climbed the topmost steeple, but God declared: "Go down again - I dwell among the people.

Author: Fred Rogers
