Quote: The future for me is already a thing of the past -You were my first love and you will be my last

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: If you ever looked at me once with what I know is in you, I would be your slave.

Author: Elif Shafak,  The Forty Rules of Love
Quote: Every true love and friendship is a story of unexpected transformation. If we are the same person before and after we loved, that means we haven't loved enough.

Author: Richard Bach
Quote: True love stories never have endings.

Author: Rumi
Quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.

Author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife
Quote: Why is love intensified by absence?

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Witch Of Portobello
Quote: After all, what is happiness? Love, they tell me. But love doesn't bring and never has brought happiness. On the contrary, it's a constant state of anxiety, a battlefield; it's sleepless nights, asking ourselves all the time if we're doing the right thing. Real love is composed of ecstasy and agony.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Iron Queen
Quote: You are my heart, my life, my entire existence."-Ash

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Devilin Fey
Quote: I envy people that know love. That have someone who takes them as they are.

Author: William Shakespeare,  The Two Gentlemen of Verona
Quote: They do not love that do not show their love.

Author: Robert Browning
Quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  The Pact
Quote: I love you,"he whispered, and that was the moment he knew what he was going to do. When you loved someone, you put their needs before your own. No matter how inconceivable those needs were; no matter how fucked up; no matter how much it made you feel like you were ripping yourself into pieces.

Author: Rumi,  Words of Paradise: Selected Poems of Rumi
Quote: A thousand half-loves must be forsaken to take one whole heart home.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: I have little left in myself -- I must have you. The world may laugh -- may call me absurd, selfish -- but it does not signify. My very soul demands you: it will be satisfied, or it will take deadly vengeance on its frame.

Author: J.D. Salinger
Quote: She wasn't doing a thing that I could see, except standing there leaning on the balcony railing, holding the universe together.

Author: Elle Newmark,  The Book of Unholy Mischief
Quote: ...unrequited love does not die; it's only beaten down to a secret place where it hides, curled and wounded. For some unfortunates, it turns bitter and mean, and those who come after pay the price for the hurt done by the one who came before.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Heavenly Fire
Quote: We are all the pieces of what we remember. We hold in ourselves the hopes and fears of those who love us. As long as there is love and memory, there is no true loss.

Author: Paul Sweeney
Quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.

Author: Drew Barrymore
Quote: Kissing - and I mean like, yummy, smacking kissing - is the most delicious, most beautiful and passionate thing that two people can do, bar none. Better than sex, hands down.

Author: Tom Hiddleston
Quote: This generation has lost the true meaning of romance. There are so many songs that disrespect women. You can’t treat the woman you love as a piece of meat. You should treat your love like a princess. Give her love songs, something with real meaning. Maybe I’m old fashioned but to respect the woman you love should be a priority.

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Perfect Chemistry
Quote: I want to try making things right because picking up the pieces is way better than leaving them the way they are.

Author: Mary Zimmerman,  Metamorphoses
Quote: Let me die the moment my love dies. Let me not outlive my own capacity to love. Let me die still loving, and so, never die.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  The Little Prince
Quote: If you love a flower that lives on a star, it is sweet to look at the sky at night. All the stars are a-bloom with flowers...

Author: James Herriot
Quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.

Author: Toni Morrison,  Beloved
Quote: She is a friend of my mind. She gather me, man. The pieces I am, she gather them and give them back to me in all the right order.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: When you are missing someone, time seems to move slower, and when I'm falling in love with someone, time seems to be moving faster.

Author: Mark Twain,  The Diaries of Adam & Eve
Quote: After all these years, I see that I was mistaken about Eve in the beginning; it is better to live outside the Garden with her than inside it without her.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: True love is the best thing in the world, except for cough drops.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: Life is a series of pulls back and forth... A tension of opposites, like a pull on a rubber band. Most of us live somewhere in the middle. A wrestling match...Which side win? Love wins. Love always wins

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I AM BETTER THAN THAT...Goodbye.

Author: Larry Flynt
Quote: The two most misused words in the entire English vocabulary are love and friendship. A true friend would die for you, so when you start trying to count them on one hand, you don't need any fingers.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: One ought to hold on to one's heart; for if one lets it go, one soon loses control of the head too.

Author: Robert A. Heinlein,  Stranger in a Strange Land
Quote: Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy - in fact, they are almost incompatible; one emotion hardly leaves room for the other.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: All my heart is yours, sir: it belongs to you; and with you it would remain, were fate to exile the rest of me from your presence forever.

Author: Laini Taylor,  Daughter of Smoke & Bone
Quote: Love is a luxury.""No. Love is an element."An element. Like air to breathe, earth to stand on.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: I'm a little pencil in the hand of a writing God, who is sending a love letter to the world.

Author: Joyce Giraud
Quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: Her heart was a secret garden and the walls were very high.

Author: Kahlil Gibran
Quote: No human relation gives one possession in another—every two souls are absolutely different. In friendship or in love, the two side by side raise hands together to find what one cannot reach alone.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Other Side of Life
Quote: Friends are the family you choose (~ Nin/Ithilnin, Elven rogue).

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Hush, Hush
Quote: But if I hadn't fallen, I wouldn't have met you.

Author: Donald Trump
Quote: Love him or hate him, Trump is a man who is certain about what he wants and sets out to get it, no holds barred. Women find his power almost as much of a turn-on as his money.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  100 Love Sonnets
Quote: In this part of the story I am the one whodies, the only one, and I will die of love because I love you,because I love you, Love, in fire and in blood.

Author: Alexandre Dumas,  The Count of Monte Cristo
Quote: Woman is sacred; the woman one loves is holy.

Author: Willa Cather
Quote: Where there is great love, there are always miracles.

Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote: Sometimes, you just have to clear your head and get out to see other things. It is very important to be nourished. I love to go to museums and galleries, I like to see theatre, film, dance - anything creative. It doesn't promise you inspiration, but it nourishes your creative soul, and that's good.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me
Quote: It's the kind of kiss that inspires stars to climb into the sky and light up the world.

Author: Jane Austen,  Sense and Sensibility
Quote: If I could but know his heart, everything would become easy.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: Each relationship between two persons is absolutely unique. That is why you cannot love two people the same. It simply is not possible. You love each person differently because of who they are and the uniqueness that they draw out of you.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Rescue
Quote: Loving someone and having them love you back is the most precious thing in the world.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness Of Being
Quote: He suddenly recalled from Plato's Symposium: People were hermaphrodites until God split then in two, and now all the halves wander the world over seeking one another. Love is the longing for the half of ourselves we have lost.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Baby Proof
Quote: I miss him in so many ways, but right now I miss him in the way you always miss someone when you're single among a room full of couples.

Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote: Being with you and not being with you is the only way I have to measure time.

Author: Sean Lennon
Quote: There are only really a few stories to tell in the end, and betrayal and the failure of love is one of those good stories to tell.

Author: Tabitha Suzuma,  Forbidden
Quote: I mean, at the end of the day, what the hell does it matter who I end up with if it can't be you?

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: I'd love to, she finally said,"on one condition."I steadied myself, hoping it wasn't something too awful."Yes?""You have to promise that you won't fall in love with me."I knew she was kidding me by the way she laughed, and I couldn't help but breathe a sigh of relief.Sometimes, I had to admit, Jamie had a pretty good sense of humor.I smiled and gave her my word.

Author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer
Quote: Moving on is easy. It's staying moved on that's trickier.

Author: Tabitha Suzuma,  Forbidden
Quote: I mean, at the end of the day, what the hell does it matter who I end up with if it can't be you?

Author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent
Quote: Okay. Then...I can talk. Ask me something.""Okay."He laughs shakily in my ear. "Why is your heart racing Tris?"I cringe and say, "Well, I...I barely know you. I barely know you and I'm crammed up against you in a box, Four, what do you think?"..."Maybe you were cut out for Candor,"he says, "because you're a terrible liar.

Author: Ella Fitzgerald
Quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.

Author: Gary Zukav
Quote: Caregivers attract caregivers and live in a community of love. They are energized by their caring, fulfilled, and they love life. Caretakers attract caretakers and live in the company of resentful victims who see themselves as misused and are fatigued from constant giving with no return.

Author: Bernie Siegel
Quote: Being a survivor doesn't mean being strong - it's telling people when you need a meal or a ride, company, whatever. It's paying attention to heart wisdom, feelings, not living a role, but having a unique, authentic life, having something to contribute, finding time to love and laugh. All these things are qualities of survivors.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is what you make it. Unfortunately, I can’t make it today, as I have a doctor’s appointment.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Perfect Chemistry
Quote: One of the things that makes me who I am is the loyalty I have to people I hold close to my heart.

Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: Don’t sacrifice yourself too much, because if you sacrifice too much there’s nothing else you can give and nobody will care for you.

Author: Gillian Flynn,  Gone Girl
Quote: Love makes you want to be a better man—right, right. But maybe love, real love, also gives you permission to just be the man you are.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess
Quote: She leaned forward and caught at his hand, pressing it between her own. The touch was like white fire through his veins. He could not feel her skin only the cloth of her gloves, and yet it did not matter. You kindled me, heap of ashes that I am, into fire. He had wondered once why love was always phrased in terms of burning. The conflagration in his own veins, now, gave the answer.

Author: Roman Payne
Quote: She is free in her wildness, she is a wanderess, a drop of free water. She knows nothing of borders and cares nothing for rules or customs. 'Time' for her isn’t something to fight against. Her life flows clean, with passion, like fresh water.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades Freed
Quote: Christian, you are the state lottery, the cure for cancer, and the three wishes from Aladdin's lamp all rolled into one

Author: J.R. Ward,  Lover Mine
Quote: You never knew the last time you were seeing someone. You didn't know when the last argument happened, or the last time you had sex, or the last time you looked into their eyes and thanked God they were in your life.After they were gone?That was all you thought about.Day and night.

Author: Lady Gaga
Quote: Every bit of me is devoted to love and art. And I aspire to try to be a teacher to my young fans who feel just like I felt when I was younger. I just felt like a freak. I guess what I'm trying to say is I'm trying to liberate them, I want to free them of their fears and make them feel that they can make their own space in the world.

Author: Diana Gabaldon,  Outlander
Quote: Ye are Blood of my Blood, and Bone of my Bone,I give ye my Body, that we Two might be One.I give ye my Spirit, 'til our Life shall be Done.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Crescendo
Quote: Did I really want to stay on this road longer, knowing it was only going to end in devastation?

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: Dusk is just an illusion because the sun is either above the horizon or below it. And that means that day and night are linked in a way that few things are there cannot be one without the other yet they cannot exist at the same time. How would it feel I remember wondering to be always together yet forever apart?

Author: Andy Warhol
Quote: People should fall in love with their eyes closed.

Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.

Author: Leo Tolstoy
Quote: All, everything that I understand, I understand only because I love.

Author: David Levithan,  Every Day
Quote: I want love to conquer all. But love can't conquer anything. It can't do anything on it's own.It relies on us to do the conquering on its behalf.

Author: Rumi
Quote: I know you're tired but come, this is the way.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Never rearrange your life in order to meet Mr. Darcy half way. If he couldn’t see your worth at the moment you met then he won’t two years later. May the halls of Pemberly be filled with his regrets and your life filled with thankfulness because of this revelation.

Author: Walt Disney
Quote: Disneyland is a work of love. We didn't go into Disneyland just with the idea of making money.

Author: Yann Martel,  Life of Pi
Quote: I've never forgotten him. Dare I say I miss him? I do. I miss him. I still see him in my dreams. They are nightmares mostly, but nightmares tinged with love. Such is the strangeness of the human heart. I still cannot understand how he could abandon me so unceremoniously, without any sort of goodbye, without looking back even once. The pain is like an axe that chops my heart.

Author: Dylan Thomas
Quote: Though lovers be lost, love shall not; And death shall have no dominion.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Wedding
Quote: I guess what I'm trying to say is that you are there, in everything I am, in everything I've ever done, and looking back, I know that I should have told you know much you've always meant to me.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: to love is to destroy, and that to be loved is to be the one destroyed.

Author: Warren Buffett
Quote: The only way to get love is to be lovable. It's very irritating if you have a lot of money. You'd like to think you could write a check: 'I'll buy a million dollars' worth of love.' But it doesn't work that way. The more you give love away, the more you get.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: I've always loved you, and when you love someone, you love the whole person, just as he or she is, and not as you would like them to be.

Author: Sara Teasdale,  The Collected Poems
Quote: Stephen kissed me in the spring,Robin in the fall,But Colin only looked at meAnd never kissed at all.Stephen’s kiss was lost in jest,Robin’s lost in play,But the kiss in Colin’s eyesHaunts me night and day.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: And now I know why they invented words for love, why they had to: It's the only thing that can come close to describing what I feel in that moment, the baffling mixture of pain and pleasure and fear and joy, all running sharply through me at once.

Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.

Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote: It is good to realize that if love and peace can prevail on earth, and if we can teach our children to honor nature's gifts, the joys and beauties of the outdoors will be here forever.

Author: John Ortberg
Quote: Art is built on the deepest themes of human meaning: good and evil, beauty and ugliness, life and death, love and hate. No other story has incarnated those themes more than the story of Jesus.

Author: Jennifer E. Smith,  The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight
Quote: Love is the strangest, most illogical thing in the world.

Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote: The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.

Author: Louisa May Alcott
Quote: The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven
Quote: She wasnt exactly sure when it happened. Or even when it started. All she knew for sure was that right here and now, she was falling hard and she could only pray that he was feeling the same way.

Author: Ella Fitzgerald
Quote: I'm very shy, and I shy away from people. But the moment I hit the stage, it's a different feeling I get nerve from somewhere; maybe it's because it's something I love to do.

Author: Anne Frank
Quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!

Author: Adrienne Shelly
Quote: The way I see it is that love can put an end to this bureaucracy people go through in their relationships. But it can't blind you to the fact that maybe there are bombs, there are problems and the ozone layer is depleting.

Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote: The story of life is quicker than the wink of an eye, the story of love is hello and goodbye...until we meet again

Author: Walt Disney
Quote: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.

Author: Zayn Malik
Quote: Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Choice
Quote: How far would you go to keep the hope of love alive?

Author: William S. Burroughs
Quote: There is no intensity of love or feeling that does not involve the risk of crippling hurt. It is a duty to take this risk, to love and feel without defense or reserve.

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote: Only love of a good woman will make a man question every choice, every action. Only love makes a warrior hesitate for fear that his lady will find him cruel. Only love makes a man both the best he will ever be, and the weakest. Sometimes all in the same moment. -Wicked

Author: Alice Hoffman,  Practical Magic
Quote: There are some things, after all, that Sally Owens knows for certain: Always throw spilled salt over your left shoulder. Keep rosemary by your garden gate. Add pepper to your mashed potatoes. Plant roses and lavender, for luck. Fall in love whenever you can.

Author: Dorothy Parker,  The Complete Poems of Dorothy Parker
Quote: Inventory:"Four be the things I am wiser to know:Idleness, sorrow, a friend, and a foe.Four be the things I'd been better without:Love, curiosity, freckles, and doubt.Three be the things I shall never attain:Envy, content, and sufficient champagne.Three be the things I shall have till I die:Laughter and hope and a sock in the eye.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Live your truth. Express your love. Share your enthusiasm. Take action towards your dreams. Walk your talk. Dance and sing to your music. Embrace your blessings. Make today worth remembering.

Author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips,  Kiss an Angel
Quote: I don't love you anymore", she whispered. "I don't love you at all."His throat closed. "It's all right, sweetheart. I love you enough for both of us.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent
Quote: Fear doesn't shut you down; it wakes you up. I've seen it. It's fascinating."He releases me but doesn't pull away, his hand grazing my jaw, my neck. "Sometimes I just...want to see it again. Want to see you awake.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant
Quote: But when I do feel all the strength go out of me, and I fall to my knees beside the table and I think I cry, then, or at least I want to, and everything inside me screams for just one more kiss, one more word, one more glance, one more.

Author: Aldo Leopold
Quote: We abuse land because we regard it as a commodity belonging to us. When we see land as a community to which we belong, we may begin to use it with love and respect.

Author: Marie Lu,  Legend
Quote: Forever and ever, kid, until you're sick and tired of seeing me.

Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote: Choose your love. Love your choice.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me
Quote: The tattoo is just setting below his hp bone. H e l l i s e m p t y a n d a l l t h e d e v i l s a r e h e r eI kiss my way across the words.Kissing away the devils.Kissing away the pain.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: Yes... it wasn't over, it still isn't over.

Author: Sarah Ockler,  Twenty Boy Summer
Quote: Weeping is not the same thing as crying. It takes your whole body to weep, and when it's over, you feel like you don't have any bones left to hold you up.

Author: Jon Krakauer,  Into the Wild
Quote: When you forgive, you love. And when you love, God’s light shines upon you.

Author: Thomas Pynchon,  Gravity's Rainbow
Quote: They're in love. Fuck the war.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: Are you upset little friend? Have you been lying awake worrying? Well, don't worry...I'm here. The flood waters will recede, the famine will end, the sun will shine tomorrow, and I will always be here to take care of you.

Author: Kristin Hannah,  Summer Island
Quote: As mothers and daughters, we are connected with one another. My mother is the bones of my spine, keeping me straight and true. She is my blood, making sure it runs rich and strong. She is the beating of my heart. I cannot now imagine a life without her.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

Author: Mark Cuban
Quote: I love to compete. To me, business is the ultimate sport. It's always on. There is always someone trying to beat me.

Author: Carol Rifka Brunt,  Tell the Wolves I'm Home
Quote: Maybe I was destined to forever fall in love with people I couldn’t have. Maybe there’s a whole assortment of impossible people waiting for me to find them. Waiting to make me feel the same impossibility over and over again.

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
Quote: To love someone means to see them as God intended them.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Norwegian Wood
Quote: I have a million things to talk to you about. All I want in this world is you. I want to see you and talk. I want the two of us to begin everything from the beginning.

Author: Patrick Rothfuss,  The Wise Man's Fear
Quote: Anyone can love a thing because. That's as easy as putting a penny in your pocket. But to love something despite. To know the flaws and love them too. That is rare and pure and perfect.

Author: Sapardi Djoko Damono
Quote: aku ingin mencintaimu dengan sederhana;dengan kata yang tak sempat diucapkankayu kepada api yang menjadikannya abuaku ingin mencintaimu dengan sederhana;dengan isyarat yang tak sempat disampaikan awan kepada hujan yang menjadikannya tiada

Author: Robert Goolrick,  The End of the World as We Know It: Scenes from a Life
Quote: If you don't receive love from the ones who are meant to love you, you will never stop looking for it.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.

Author: Myles Munroe
Quote: The Kingdom is the love of God prevailing in politics, in business, in government, in media. It is all the impact of the laws of God creating a social environment where the strong help the weak, where those who have give to those who don't. It's a society where relationships are built on love.

Author: Stephanie Laurens,  The Edge of Desire
Quote: My heart only ever had one thought, one want. One need. Despite all, in spite of all...All my heart has ever wanted is you.

Author: E.E. Cummings
Quote: Love is the voice under all silences, the hope which has no opposite in fear; the strength so strong mere force is feebleness: the truth more first than sun, more last than star...

Author: Suze Orman
Quote: True generosity is an offering; given freely and out of pure love. No strings attached. No expectations. Time and love are the most valuable possession you can share.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Moon and Sixpence
Quote: As lovers, the difference between men and women is that women can love all day long, but men only at times.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  Veinte poemas de amor y una canción desesperada; Cien sonetos de amor
Quote: Then love knew it was called love. And when I lifted my eyes to your name, suddenly your heart showed me my way

Author: W.B. Yeats,  The Wind Among the Reeds
Quote: Had I the heavens' embroidered cloths,Enwrought with golden and silver light,The blue and the dim and the dark clothsOf night and light and the half light,I would spread the cloths under your feet:But I, being poor, have only my dreams;I have spread my dreams under your feet;Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.

Author: Johnny Depp
Quote: The only creatures that are evolved enough to convey pure love are dogs and infants.

Author: Vita Sackville-West,  The Letters of Vita Sackville-West and Virginia Woolf
Quote: Damn you, spoilt creature; I shan’t make you love me any the more by giving myself away like this.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Hush, Hush
Quote: Are you gloating inside? That's what this is about, isn't it? Getting me to trust you so you could blow it up in my face!"[...]"I get that you're angry—,"said Patch."I am ripped apart!"I shouted.

Author: John Keats
Quote: I have been astonished that men could die martyrsfor their religion--I have shuddered at it,I shudder no more.I could be martyred for my religion.Love is my religionand I could die for that.I could die for you.My Creed is Love and you are its only tenet.

Author: Thomas Merton,  Love and Living
Quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.

Author: David Nicholls,  One Day
Quote: You're gorgeous, you old hag, and if I could give you just one gift ever for the rest of your life it would be this. Confidence. It would be the gift of confidence. Either that or a scented candle

Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote: The things that will destroy America are prosperity-at-any-price, peace-at-any-price, safety-first instead of duty-first, the love of soft living, and the get-rich-quick theory of life.

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: New Age values are conscious evolution, a non-sectarian society, a non-military culture, global sharing, healing the environment, sustainable economies, self-determination, social justice, economic empowerment of the poor, love, compassion in action, going beyond religious fundamentalism, going beyond nationalism-extreme nationalism, culture.

Author: Marissa Meyer,  Scarlet
Quote: I knew they would kill me when they found out, but…” He struggled for words, releasing a sharp breath. “I think I realized that I would rather die because I betrayed them, than live because I betrayed you.

Author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath
Quote: How we need another soul to cling to, another body to keep us warm. To rest and trust; to give your soul in confidence: I need this, I need someone to pour myself into.

Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote: And all I loved, I loved alone.

Author: Richard Rodgers,  Rodgers & Hammerstein's Cinderella
Quote: Do I love you because you're beautiful, or are you beautiful because I love you?

Author: John Lennon
Quote: Limitless undying love which shines around me like a million suns it calls me on and on across the universe.

Author: John Keats
Quote: I am certain of nothing but the holiness of the Heart's affections and the truth of the Imagination.

Author: Lorrie Moore,  Like Life
Quote: This is what happened in love. One of you cried a lot and then both of you grew sarcastic.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Tender Is the Night
Quote: Actually that’s my secret — I can’t even talk about you to anybody because I don’t want any more people to know how wonderful you are.

Author: Ben Okri
Quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.

Author: Cameron Diaz
Quote: I'd kiss a frog even if there was no promise of a Prince Charming popping out of it. I love frogs.

Author: Sarah Kay
Quote: I have seen the best of you, and the worst of you, and I choose both.

Author: Frank Sinatra
Quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.

Author: Susan Polis Schutz
Quote: Love is being honest with yourself at all timesbeing honest with the other person at all timestelling, listening, respecting the truthand never pretendingLove is the source of reality

Author: Adora Svitak
Quote: America, you're sending girls a mixed message. On one hand, you're saying to have positive body image and love who we are; on the other, we're being marketed makeup and clothing that obviously turns us into someone different.

Author: Plato,  Phaedrus
Quote: Love is a serious mental disease.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince
Quote: I've never minded it,"he went on. "Being lost, that is. I had always thought one could not truly be lost if one knew one's own heart. But I fear I may be lost without knowing yours.

Author: Emmet Fox
Quote: If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Everything Is Illuminated
Quote: The more you love someone, he came to think, the harder it is to tell them. It surprised him that strangers didn't stop each other on the street to say I love you.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote: If you love something so much let it go. If it comes back it was meant to be; if it doesn't it never was

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: The only drink I like ice in is water, because you can’t water down water. I’m like that with love, too. Don’t you dare add any ice to the hot liquid loving I’m trying to pour all over you.

Author: Elizabeth Chandler,  Kissed by an Angel
Quote: When you love someone, its never over. You move on, because you have to but you take them with you in your heart

Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote: To love is to recognize yourself in another.

Author: James Patterson,  Saving the World and Other Extreme Sports
Quote: You looove me. (holds out arms) You love me this much.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: Do what you love. Know your own bone; gnaw at it, bury it, unearth it, and gnaw it still.

Author: Anaïs Nin,  Henry and June: From "A Journal of Love"--The Unexpurgated Diary of Anaïs Nin
Quote: Everything with me is either worship and passion or pity and understanding. I hate rarely, though when I hate, I hate murderously. For example now, I hate the bank and everything connected with it. I also hate Dutch paintings, penis-sucking, parties, and cold rainy weather. But I am much more preoccupied with loving.

Author: Bill Wilson
Quote: To the world you may be one person but to one person you may be the world.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33
Quote: Patience and wisdom walk hand in hand, like two one-armed lovers.

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer
Quote: In my rush, I hadn’t tied my shoelaces. Noah was now tying them for me. He looked up at me through his dark fringe of lashes and smiled. The expression on his face melted me completely. I knew I had the goofiest grin plastered on my lips, and didn’t care. “There,” he said as he finished tying the laces on my left shoe. “Now you won’t fall.”Too late.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke,  The Selected Poetry of Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote: For one human being to love another human being: that is perhaps the most difficult task that has been given to us, the ultimate, the final problem and proof, the work for which all other work is merely preparation.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  Twenty Love Poems and a Song of Despair
Quote: I am no longer in love with her, that's certain, but maybe I love her. Love is so short, forgetting is so long.

Author: Adam Sandler
Quote: Chemistry can be a good and bad thing. Chemistry is good when you make love with it. Chemistry is bad when you make crack with it.

Author: Demi Lovato
Quote: I can't set my hopes too high,'Cause every hello ends with a goodbye.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: First best is falling in love. Second best is being in love. Least best is falling out of love. But any of it is better than never having been in love.

Author: Jess C. Scott
Quote: A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement

Author: Candace Bushnell,  Sex and the City
Quote: Maybe mistakes are what make our fate... without them what would shape our lives? Maybe if we had never veered off course we wouldn't fall in love, have babies, or be who we are. After all, things change, so do cities, people come into your life and they go. But it's comforting to know that the ones you love are always in your heart... and if you're very lucky, a plane ride away

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: Augustus,"I said. "Really. You don't have to do this.""Sure I do,"he said. "I found my Wish.""God, you're the best,"I told him."I bet you say that to all the boys who finance your international travel,"he answered.

Author: Og Mandino
Quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.

Author: William Blake
Quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Second Glance
Quote: Love meant jumping off a cliff and trusting that a certain person would be there to catch you at the bottom.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  The Great Gatsby
Quote: Ah,"she cried, "you look so cool."Their eyes met, and they stared together at each other, alone in space. With an effort she glanced down at the table.You always look so cool,"she repeated.She had told him that she loved him, and Tom Buchanan saw.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: You don’t take away my choices. You are my choice.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: The only love that I really believe in is a mother’s love for her children.

Author: Bipasha Basu
Quote: I want to tell women that you need to love yourself and make yourself a priority. It's only when you are happy yourself, can you make everyone else around you happy. I am still a dreamer and still believe in fairy tales, but there is only that much one should give another person. You need to keep something for yourself.

Author: Rob Sheffield,  Love Is a Mix Tape
Quote: It’s the same with people who say, ‘Whatever doesn’t kill you makes you stronger.’ Even people who say this must realize that the exact opposite is true. What doesn’t kill you maims you, cripples you, leaves you weak, makes you whiny and full of yourself at the same time. The more pain, the more pompous you get. Whatever doesn’t kill you makes you incredibly annoying.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: you're an expert at sorry and keeping the lines blurry

Author: Jodi Picoult,  My Sister's Keeper
Quote: Until this moment, I had not realized that someone could break your heart twice, along the very same fault lines.

Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.

Author: Saint Francis de Sales
Quote: Through devotion, your family cares become more peaceful, mutual love between husband and wife becomes more sincere, the service we owe to the prince more faithful, and our work, no matter what it is, becomes more pleasant and agreeable.

Author: Stieg Larsson,  The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
Quote: Then I discovered that being related is no guarantee of love!

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: What about when someone doesn't need a shoulder? What if they need the arms?

Author: Richelle Mead,  Shadow Kiss
Quote: Wait. You think I'm going to die? That's why you slept with me?

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: You picked a lemon, throw it away lemonade is overrated. Freaks should remain at the circus, not in your apartment. You already have one asshole. You don’t need another. Make a space in your life for the glorious things you deserve. Have faith.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: You will never be able to escape from your heart. So it's better to listen to what it has to say.

Author: Julio Cortazar
Quote: Everything can be killed except nostalgia for the kingdom, we carry it in the color of our eyes, in every love affair, in everything that deeply torments and unties and tricks.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire
Quote: But I have to confess, I'm glad you two had at least a few months of happiness together."I'm not glad,"says Peeta. "I wish we had waited until the whole thing was done officially."This takes even Caesar aback. "Surely even a brief time is better than no time?"Maybe I'd think that, too, Caesar,"says Peeta bitterly, "If it weren't for the baby.

Author: Lauren Kate,  Torment
Quote: Would he find her?Without question.Would he save her?Always.

Author: Alicia Keys
Quote: When I was a kid, I'd practise Chopin on piano - and I love Chopin! He's my dawg! Then I'd go out on the stoop and blast the radio. I'm from New York, the concrete jungle. Hip-hop influenced me from day one.

Author: pleasefindthis,  I Wrote This For You
Quote: You’re just another story I can’t tell anymore.

Author: Melina Marchetta,  On the Jellicoe Road
Quote: But grief makes a monster out of us sometimes . . . and sometimes you say and do things to the people you love that you can't forgive yourself for.

Author: Henri J.M. Nouwen
Quote: Forgiveness is the name of love practiced among people who love poorly. The hard truth is that all people love poorly. We need to forgive and be forgiven every day, every hour increasingly. That is the great work of love among the fellowship of the weak that is the human family.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  Of Human Bondage
Quote: He did not care if she was heartless, vicious and vulgar, stupid and grasping, he loved her. He would rather have misery with one than happiness with the other.

Author: Ingrid Bergman
Quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
Quote: In bed that night I invented a special drain that would be underneath every pillow in New York, and would connect to the reservoir. Whenever people cried themselves to sleep, the tears would all go to the same place, and in the morning the weatherman could report if the water level of the Reservoir of Tears had gone up or down, and you could know if New York is in heavy boots.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: It does good to no woman to be flattered [by a man] who does not intend to marry her; and it is madness in all women to let a secret love kindle within them, which, if unreturned and unknown, must devour the life that feeds it; and, if discovered and responded to, must lead, ignis-fatuus-like, into miry wilds whence there is no extrication.

Author: Alice Temperley
Quote: Lingerie is my next love after clothing; I think it is what is worn underneath that really inspires a woman to feel beautiful in her clothes - that inner, secret glamour.

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Sexing the Cherry
Quote: As your lover describes you, so you are.

Author: Jane Austen,  Persuasion
Quote: There could have been no two hearts so open, no tastes so similar, no feelings so in unison

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I wanted to tell her “I love you” back, but I guess in waiting for the perfect moment (the next commercial break), I ended up completely forgetting.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Heavenly Fire
Quote: There are memories that time does not erase... Forever does not make loss forgettable, only bearable.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: So don't you worry your pretty little mind because people throw rocks at things that shine. [Ours]

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Dreamland
Quote: If you didn't love him, this never would have happened. But you did. And accepting that love and everything that followed it is part of letting it go.

Author: Julianne Moore
Quote: Loving someone is giving them the power to break your heart, but trusting them not to.

Author: Landon Donovan
Quote: You got me: I do Pilates. I love Pilates because we do very specific training in soccer for the same six or seven muscles, but we neglect so many other muscles. So when I do Pilates, it helps get all the rest of the muscles in shape and gets them working together.

Author: David Levithan,  The Lover's Dictionary
Quote: It scares me how hard it is to remember life before you. I can't even make the comparisons anymore, because my memories of that time have all the depth of a photograph. It seems foolish to play games of better and worse. It's simply a matter of is and is no longer.

Author: Niall Horan
Quote: I'm the kind of boy that can fall in love with any girl because I love with the heart, not the eyes.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Shakespeare's Sonnets
Quote: Love is not loveWhich alters when it alteration finds,Or bends with the remover to remove.O no, it is an ever-fixed markThat looks on tempests and is never shaken;It is the star to every wand'ring bark,Whose worth's unknown, although his height be taken."(Sonnet 116)

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: We’d met at a carefree time, a moment full of promise, in its place now were the harsh lessons of the real world.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  Wicked Lovely
Quote: I felt like an animal, and animals don’t know sin, do they?

Author: Steve Vai
Quote: I have a deep love for life and my fellow human beings. I try to understand everything that everybody does, even if it seems wrong to me.

Author: G.K. Chesterton
Quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Lost Souls
Quote: Of course he loves me. I’m his sister.”“Blood isn’t love,” said Magnus, and his voice was bitter.

Author: Katie McGarry,  Pushing the Limits
Quote: I love you enough to never make you choose.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: The Queen's Pride was his ship, and he loved her. (That was the way his sentences always went: It is raining today and I love you. My cold is better and I love you. Say hello to Horse and I love you. Like that.)

Author: Helen Garner
Quote: As in all matters involving love, which has so many different meanings, you find that the feeling that we label 'love' is not a simple feeling, it's a very complex one. Under the heading 'love' can come all sorts of rage and desperation.

Author: Patrick Rothfuss,  The Name of the Wind
Quote: My parents danced together, her head on his chest. Both had their eyes closed. They seemed so perfectly content. If you can find someone like that, someone who you can hold and close your eyes to the world with, then you're lucky. Even if it only lasts for a minute or a day. The image of them gently swaying to the music is how I picture love in my mind even after all these years.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Quote: True love begins when nothing is looked for in return.

Author: Charles Bukowski,  Love is a Dog from Hell
Quote: I drive around the streetsan inch away from weeping,ashamed of my sentimentality andpossible love.

Author: Sara Evans
Quote: Even on my weakest daysI get a little bit stronger

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: If you spend your time hoping someone will suffer the consequences for what they did to your heart, then you're allowing them to hurt you a second time in your mind.

Author: Virat Kohli
Quote: I want my wardrobe to be full of good clothes, so that when I'm deciding what to wear, I don't run out of options. I love shopping!

Author: Gerard Way
Quote: Would you destroy Something perfect in order to make it beautiful?

Author: Charles Bukowski,  War All the Time
Quote: some moments are nice, some arenicer, some are even worthwritingabout.

Author: Jeffrey McDaniel
Quote: Even when I'm dead, I'll swim through the Earth,like a mermaid of the soil, just to be next to your bones.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Keeping Faith
Quote: I don't think we get a choice in who we fall for,"Ian whispers. "I think we just do.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: You tell me you love me, but I’m not sure you know what love is, or how fast it flies, or how much it resembles a UFO, or what kind of weapon you’d use to shoot it down.

Author: Chris Evans
Quote: What do I geek out about? What am I? Hmmm. I love movies. I watch movies. I like big, sweeping epics, like Ed Zwick stuff: 'The Last Samurai,' 'Legends of the Fall,' 'Blood Diamond,' 'Glory.'

Author: Taylor Swift,  Taylor Swift
Quote: The way you walk, way you talk, way you say my name; it's beautiful, wonderful, don't you ever change.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for.

Author: Rumi
Quote: That which God said to the rose, and caused it to laugh in full-blown beauty, He said to my heart, and made it a hundred times more beautiful.

Author: Susan Polis Schutz
Quote: This life is yours. Take the power to choose what you want to do and do it well. Take the power to love what you want in life and love it honestly. Take the power to walk in the forest and be a part of nature. Take the power to control your own life. No one else can do it for you. Take the power to make your life happy.

Author: Tabitha Suzuma,  Forbidden
Quote: At the end of the day it's about how much you can bear, how much you can endure. Being together, we harm nobody; being apart, we extinguish ourselves.

Author: David Nicholls,  One Day
Quote: You can live your whole life not realizing that what you're looking for is right in front of you.

Author: William Faulkner
Quote: The saddest thing about love, Joe, is that not only the love cannot last forever, but even the heartbreak is soon forgotten.

Author: Danka V.,  The Unchosen Life
Quote: What irritated me most in that entire situation was the fact that Iwasn’t feeling humiliated, or annoyed, or even fooled. Betrayal waswhat I felt, my heart broken not just by a guy I was in love with, butalso by, as I once believed, a true friend.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: Looking at him now-even if she hadn't been in love with him, that part of her that was her mother's daugher, that loved every beautiful thing for its beauty alone, would still have wanted him.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Tempt Me at Twilight
Quote: I want you any way I can get you. Not because you’re beautiful or clever or kind or adorable, although devil knows you’re all those things. I want you because there’s no one else like you, and I don’t ever want to start a day without seeing you.

Author: John Krasinski
Quote: I'm a huge classics fan. I love Ernest Hemingway and J.D. Salinger. I'm that guy who rereads a book before I read newer stuff, which is probably not all that progressive, and it's not really going to make me a better reader. I'm like, 'Oh, my God, you should read To Kill a Mockingbird.'

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Attachments
Quote: Every woman wants a man who'll fall in love with her soul as well as her body.

Author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables
Quote: You who suffer because you love, love still more. To die of love, is to live by it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want Two apply for a job at our country's largest funeral home, and then wear a suit and noose to the job interview.
Quote: I want to gather up all the ink cartridges in the universe, because somewhere, mixed in with all that ink, is the next great American novel. And I’d love nothing more than to drink it.

Author: Charles Dickens,  A Tale of Two Cities
Quote: I wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Invisible Monsters
Quote: I thought we were a real love relationship. I did. I was very invested in love, but it was just this long long sex thing that could end at any moment because after all, it's just about getting off. Almost all the time, you tell yourself you're loving somebody when you're just using them. This only looks like love.

Author: Pattie Boyd
Quote: I love life. There's so much to learn and see all the time, and nothing nicer for me than to wake up, and the sky is blue.

Author: Becky G
Quote: I love people who dress how they feel and change it depending on the day.

Author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath
Quote: Living with him is like being told a perpetual story: his mind is the biggest, most imaginative I have ever met. I could live in its growing countries forever.

Author: Alexandra Adornetto,  Halo
Quote: A man in love can do extraordinary things, I don’t care if you’re an angel, you’re my angel, and I won’t let you go.

Author: Toni Morrison,  Jazz
Quote: Don't ever think I fell for you, or fell over you. I didn't fall in love, I rose in it.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Lucky One
Quote: He was the toast to her butter.

Author: Ken Wilber
Quote: I rise to taste the dawn, and find that love alone will shine today.

Author: William Shakespeare,  A Midsummer Night's Dream
Quote: And yet,to say the truth, reason and love keep little company together nowadays.

Author: William Wilberforce
Quote: You may choose to look the other way but you can never say again that you did not know.

Author: Erica Jong,  Fear of Flying
Quote: Do you want me to tell you something really subversive? Love is everything it's cracked up to be. That's why people are so cynical about it. It really is worth fighting for, being brave for, risking everything for. And the trouble is, if you don't risk anything, you risk even more.

Author: Anatole France
Quote: Until one has loved an animal, a part of one's soul remains unawakened.

Author: Lauren Conrad
Quote: Love is not a maybe thing, you know when you love someone.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: We can’t be lovers because we both have mustaches. But since you’re a lady, and I’m a gentleman, I’ll shave mine off.

Author: Khaled Hosseini,  A Thousand Splendid Suns
Quote: I will follow you to the ends of the world.

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Cerulean Sins
Quote: Neither love nor evil conquers all, but evil cheats more.

Author: Julian Sands
Quote: The thing about Mumbai is you go five yards and all of human existence is revealed. It's an incredible cavalcade of life, and I love that.

Author: Kiera Cass,  The Elite
Quote: You’ve changed me forever. And I’ll never forget you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It’s true, I can’t make you love me. But I can refuse to let you out of your cage.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant
Quote: I love you"I say."I love you, too"he says. "I'll see you soon.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: Do not swear by the moon, for she changes constantly. then your love would also change.

Author: Nina LaCour,  Hold Still
Quote: I don't want to hurt you or anybody so please forget about me. Just try. Find yourself a better friend.

Author: Woody Allen
Quote: Sex without love is a meaningless experience, but as far as meaningless experiences go its pretty damn good.

Author: Larry the Cable Guy
Quote: I'm a huge NASCAR fan, but I'm not a gearhead. I've never been into fixing cars. It's not because I don't like it. I would love to know more. It's just my dad never taught me that stuff because my dad wasn't a mechanic.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: One should always be in love. That's the reason one should never marry.

Author: Saša Stanišić,  How the Soldier Repairs the Gramophone
Quote: Missing someone, they say, is self-centered.I self-center you more than ever.

Author: Gregory David Roberts,  Shantaram
Quote: Sometimes we love with nothing more than hope. Sometimes we cry with everything except tears.

Author: Augustine of Hippo
Quote: To fall in love with God is the greatest romance; to seek him the greatest adventure; to find him, the greatest human achievement.

Author: Sherman Alexie,  The Toughest Indian in the World
Quote: He loved her, of course, but better than that, he chose her, day after day. Choice: that was the thing.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me
Quote: His hands are holding my cheeks, and he pulls back just to look me in the eye and his chest is heaving and he says, "I think,"he says, "my heart is going to explode,"and I wish, more than ever, that I knew how to capture moments like these and revisit them forever. Because this.This is everything.

Author: John Carpenter
Quote: When I was a kid, I loved 'The Curse of Frankenstein,' 'The Creeping Unknown,' 'X: The Unknown.' I love 'Forbidden Planet,' 'The Thing from Another World.' They were science fiction/horror movies, generally.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Valkyries
Quote: He knew one of the women well, and had shared his universe with her. They had seen the same mountains, and the same trees, although each of them had seem them differently. She knew his weaknesses, his moments of hatred, of despair. Yet she was there at his side. They shared the same universe.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: I've been saying it so long to you, you just wouldn't listen. Every time you said 'Farm Boy do this' you thought I was answering 'As you wish' but that's only because you were hearing wrong. 'I love you' was what it was, but you never heard.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My girlfriend bought me a collared shirt for my birthday, mainly so I don’t get too far ahead of her when she takes me for a walk.

Author: Paul McCartney
Quote: Close your eyes and I'll kiss you, Tomorrow I'll miss you.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Crescendo
Quote: Any happiness, no matter how brief, seemed better than the long, simmering torture of waking up day after day, knowing I could never have him.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Amor Fati – “Love Your Fate”, which is in fact your life.

Author: Marvin J. Ashton
Quote: Be the one who nurtures and builds. Be the one who has an understanding and a forgiving heart one who looks for the best in people. Leave people better than you found them.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Much Ado About Nothing
Quote: I had rather hear my dog bark at a crow, than a man swear he loves me.

Author: Deborah Cox
Quote: So I placed my heart under lock and key To take some time, and take care of me But I turn around and you're standing here

Author: Stefon Harris
Quote: I love Amsterdam. The city is vibrant and alive. It's fresh and so open. It's definitely one of my favorite places.

Author: Madonna
Quote: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return. To just give. That takes courage, because we don't want to fall on our faces or leave ourselves open to hurt.

Author: Richard Bach,  The Bridge Across Forever: A True Love Story
Quote: I’m here not because I am supposed to be here, or because I’m trapped here, but because I’d rather be with you than anywhere else in the world.

Author: James Patterson
Quote: A friend of mine once defined love as finding someone you can talk to late into the night

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  The Little Prince
Quote: She cast her fragrance and her radiance over me. I ought never to have run away from her... I ought to have guessed all the affection that lay behind her poor little stratagems. Flowers are so inconsistent! But I was too young to know how to love her...

Author: David Levithan,  Every Day
Quote: It's one thing to fall in love. It's another to feel someone else fall in love with you, and to feel a responsibility toward that love.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
Quote: I wanted to tell her everything, maybe if I'd been able to, we could have lived differently, maybe I'd be there with you now instead of here. Maybe... if I'd said, 'I'm so afraid of losing something I love that I refuse to love anything,' maybe that would have made the impossible possible. Maybe, but I couldn't do it, I had buried too much too deeply inside me. And here I am, instead of there.

Author: Scott Dikkers,  You Are Worthless: Depressing Nuggets of Wisdom Sure to Ruin Your Day
Quote: Statistically speaking, there is a 65 percent chance that the love of your life is having an affair. Be very suspicious.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  Winter's Passage
Quote: His breath hitched, and he regarded me hungrily. “You’re playing with fire, you know that?” “That’s weird, considering you’re an ice prin—” I didn’t get any further, as Ash leaned in and kissed me.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Survivor
Quote: Six hundred and forty fish later, the only thing I know is everything you love will die. The first time you meet someone special, you can count on them one day being dead and in the ground.

Author: Dale Evans
Quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: The Simple PathSilence is PrayerPrayer is FaithFaith is LoveLove is ServiceThe Fruit of Service is Peace

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Nineteen Minutes
Quote: So much of the language of love was like that: you devoured someone with your eyes, you drank in the sight of him, you swallowed him whole. Love was substance, broken down and beating through your bloodstream.

Author: David Levithan
Quote: It doesn't have to be on Valentine's Day. It doesn't have to be by the time you turn eighteen or thirty-three or fifty-nine. It doesn't have to conform to whatever is usual. It doesn't have to be kismet at once, or rhapsody by the third date.It just has to be. In time. In place. In spirit.It just has to be.

Author: David Levithan,  Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List
Quote: Things that matter are not easy. Feelings of happiness are easy. Happiness is not. Flirting is easy. Love is not. Saying you’re friends is easy. Being friends is not.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem
Quote: And you can't love, not fully, unless you are loved in return.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Last Sacrifice
Quote: She was right about something else too,"Dimitri said after a long pause. My back was to him, but there was a strange quality to his voice that made me turn around."What's that?"I asked."That I do still love you."With that one sentence, everything in the universe changed.

Author: Thomas S. Monson
Quote: The spirit of Christmas is the spirit of love and of generosity and of goodness. It illuminates the picture window of the soul, and we look out upon the world's busy life and become more interested in people than in things.

Author: J.M. Darhower,  Sempre
Quote: Colpo di fulmine. The thunderbolt, as Italians call it. When love strikes someone like lightning, so powerful and intense it can’t be denied. It’s beautiful and messy,cracking a chest open and spilling their soul out for the world to see. It turns a person inside out, and there’s no going back from it. Once the thunderbolt hits, your life isirrevocably changed.

Author: Ernest Hemingway,  A Farewell to Arms
Quote: When you love you wish to do things for. You wish to sacrifice for. You wish to serve.

Author: John Grogan,  Marley and Me: Life and Love With the World's Worst Dog
Quote: Such short little lives our pets have to spend with us, and they spend most of it waiting for us to come home each day. It is amazing how much love and laughter they bring into our lives and even how much closer we become with each other because of them.

Author: Ernest Hemingway,  The Sun Also Rises
Quote: Oh Jake,"Brett said, "We could have had such a damned good time together."Ahead was a mounted policeman in khaki directing traffic. He raised his baton. The car slowed suddenly, pressing Brett against me.Yes,"I said. "Isn't it pretty to think so?

Author: Jack Kerouac,  The Dharma Bums
Quote: Down on the lake rosy reflections of celestial vapor appeared, and I said, "God, I love you"and looked to the sky and really meant it. "I have fallen in love with you, God. Take care of us all, one way or the other."To the children and the innocent it's all the same.

Author: Marian Keyes,  Watermelon
Quote: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: It is the possibility that keeps me going, and though you may call me a dreamer or a fool or any other thing, I believe that anything is possible.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels
Quote: But maybe you never really had someone, she thought now. Maybe, no matter how much you loved them, they could slip through your fingers like water, and there was nothing you could do about it.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: V-Day…if you need this one day in a year to show everyone else you truly care for “your loved one” I think it’s quite stupid. I hate this commercialism. It’s all artificial, and has nothing to do with real love.

Author: Marissa Meyer,  Cress
Quote: Maybe there isn’t such a thing as fate. Maybe it’s just the opportunities we’re given, and what we do with them. I’m beginning to think that maybe great, epic romances don’t just happen. We have to make them ourselves.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: When you love someone, you don't have a choice. Love takes your choices away.- Clary Fray

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: Love can do much, but duty more.

Author: Katherine Allred,  The Sweet Gum Tree
Quote: You can’t turn love on and off like a light switch, no matter how hard you try. All you can do is wall it off, one brick at a time, until you’ve created an impenetrable fortress around your emotions. And once that fortress is built, you camouflage it so well that even you can’t see it anymore.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Shadow Kiss
Quote: He sighed and then focused his eyes right on me. It was like drowning, drowning in seas of green. There was nothing in the world except for those eyes."I want to kiss you, Rose,"he said softly. "And I want you to want me too.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Spirit Bound
Quote: I'll find you. There is no place in this world you can hide from me. I'm watching.Love, Dimitri

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  One Foot in the Grave
Quote: She's my kitten, and no one else's.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  It Happened One Autumn
Quote: There is nothing on earth more beautiful to me than your smile...no sound sweeter than your laughter...no pleasure greater than holding you in my arms. I realized today that I could never live without you, stubborn little hellion that you are. In this life and the next, you’re my only hope of happiness. Tell me, Lillian, dearest love...how can you have reached so far inside my heart?

Author: Rumi
Quote: Grief can be the garden of compassion. If you keep your heart open through everything, your pain can become your greatest ally in your life's search for love and wisdom.

Author: George Eliot
Quote: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love.

Author: Patricia Briggs,  Moon Called
Quote: I don't like it when I outweigh my men.

Author: Jenny Han,  It's Not Summer Without You
Quote: That's when I finally got it. I finally understood. It wasn't the thought that counted. It was the actual execution that mattered, the showing up for somebody. The intent behind it wasn't enough. Not for me. Not anymore. It wasn't enough to know that deep down, he loved me. You had to actually say it to somebody, show them you cared. And he just didn't. Not enough.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Love is always open arms. If you close your arms about love you will find that you are left holding only yourself.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage
Quote: Desiring another person is perhaps the most risky endeavor of all. As soon as you want somebody—really want him—it is as though you have taken a surgical needle and sutured your happiness to the skin of that person, so that any separation will now cause a lacerating injury.

Author: Kiera Cass,  The One
Quote: I want everything with you, America. I want the holidays and the birthdays, the busy season and lazy weekends. I want peanut butter fingertips on my desk. I want inside jokes and fights and everything. I want a life with you.

Author: Louisa May Alcott,  Little Women
Quote: Love Jo all your days, if you choose, but don't let it spoil you, for it's wicked to throw away so many good gifts because you can't have the one you want.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: Love wins, love always wins.

Author: Gayle Forman,  Where She Went
Quote: There are so many things that demand to be said. Where did you go? Do you ever think about me? You've ruined me. Are you okay? But of course, I can't say any of that.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Dear Scott, Dearest Zelda: The Love Letters of F. Scott and Zelda Fitzgerald
Quote: I love her, and that's the beginning and end of everything.

Author: David Levithan,  The Lover's Dictionary
Quote: misgivings, n.Last night, I got up the courage to ask you if you regretted us. "There are things I miss,"you said. "But if I didn't have you, I'd miss more.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven
Quote: Love doesn't mean anything if you're not willing to make a commitment, and you have to think not only about what you want, but about what he wants. Not just now, but in the future.

Author: Hermann Hesse,  Wer lieben kann, ist glücklich. Über die Liebe
Quote: Oh, love isn't there to make us happy. I believe it exists to show us how much we can endure.

Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote: One does not kill oneself for love of a woman, but because love - any love - reveals us in our nakedness, our misery, our vulnerability, our nothingness.

Author: E.E. Cummings,  Selected Poems
Quote: i carry your heart with me(i carry it in my heart)

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead. The consciousness of loving and being loved brings a warmth and a richness to life that nothing else can bring.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince
Quote: You had to know a person well to make them laugh like that.

Author: Ellen Schreiber,  Vampire Kisses
Quote: He looked so lost, so soulful, so lonely. I wanted him to kiss me now. I wanted to let him know I was his for all eternity.

Author: Margaret Weis,  Dragons of a Lost Star
Quote: Words can never fully say what we want them to say, for they fumble, stammer, and break the best porcelain. The best one can hope for is to find along the way someone to share the path, content to walk in silence, for the heart communes best when it does not try to speak.

Author: Melissa de la Cruz,  The Van Alen Legacy
Quote: You cannot be with someone just because you don’t want to hurt him. You have your own happiness to think about.

Author: Andrea Gibson
Quote: Autumn is the hardest season. The leaves are all falling, and they're falling likethey're falling in love with the ground.

Author: Michelangelo
Quote: I live and love in God's peculiar light.

Author: Helen Fielding,  Bridget Jones's Diary
Quote: Can officially confirm that the way to a man's heart these days is not through beauty, food, sex, or alluringness of character, but merely the ability to seem not very interested in him.

Author: Jenny Han,  To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Quote: Love is scary: it changes; it can go away. That's the part of the risk. I don't want to be scared anymore.

Author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Origin
Quote: Did you think you could stop me? I'll burn the world down to save her.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.

Author: Jacqueline Carey,  Kushiel's Chosen
Quote: Why is there ever this perverse cruelty in humankind, that makes us hurt most those we love best?

Author: Stephanie Laurens,  A Rogue's Proposal
Quote: Just because I'm not forever by your side doesn't mean that's not precisely where I want to be.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse
Quote: The fact is…I’m in love with you, and I have been for some time.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote: After all, life hasn't much to offer except youth, and I suppose for older people, the love of youth in others.

Author: Warsan Shire
Quote: With you, intimacy colours my voice.even ‘hello’ sounds like ‘come here'.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Painted Veil
Quote: If a man hasn't what's necessary to make a woman love him, it's his fault, not hers.

Author: Steve Hall
Quote: The truest form of love is how you behave toward someone, not how you feel about them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you were to ask me the best time of day to fall in love, I'd say, "Now."But you'd also have to remember to factor in the fact that my watch is eleven minutes fast.

Author: Karen Marie Moning,  Shadowfever
Quote: Dying is overrated. Human sentimentality has twisted it into the ultimate act of love. Biggest load of bullshit in the world. Dying for someone isn't the hard thing. The man that dies escapes. Plain and simple. Game over. End of pain...Try living for someone. Through it all-good, bad, thick, thin, joy, suffering. That's the hard thing.

Author: Joseph Addison
Quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.

Author: Lewis Carroll
Quote: Oh, 'tis love, 'tis love that makes the world go round.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: Work without love is slavery.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: A man can be happy with any woman as long as he does not love her.

Author: John Lennon
Quote: Love is a promise, love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: You're a hero and a gentleman, you're kind and honest, but more than that, you're the first man I ever truly loved. And no matter what the future brings, you always will be, and I know that my life is better for it.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: Transformation is my favorite game and in my experience, anger and frustration are the result of you not being authentic somewhere in your life or with someone in your life. Being fake about anything creates a block inside of you. Life can’t work for you if you don’t show up as you.

Author: Roman Payne
Quote: You must give everything to make your life as beautiful as the dreams that dance in your imagination.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: Now I'd rather be infected with love for the tiniest sliver of a second than live a hundred years smothered by a lie.

Author: Agatha Christie
Quote: It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Iron King
Quote: You made me feel alive again.

Author: Leigh Bardugo,  Shadow and Bone
Quote: I don't care if you danced naked on the roof of the Little Palace with him. I love you, Alina, even the part of you that loved him.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Pandemonium
Quote: If you’re smart, you care. And if you care, you love.

Author: J.M. Barrie
Quote: If you have it [love], you don't need to have anything else, and if you don't have it, it doesn't matter much what else you have.

Author: Jeanette Winterson
Quote: What should I do about the wild and the tame? The wild heart that wants to be free, and the tame heart that wants to come home. I want to be held. I don't want you to come too close. I want you to scoop me up and bring me home at nights. I don't want to tell you where I am. I want to keep a place among the rocks where no one can find me. I want to be with you.

Author: Adolf Hitler
Quote: And I can fight only for something that I love, love only what I respect, and respect only what I at least know.

Author: Jim Henson
Quote: Only time can heal your broken heart. Just as only time can heal his broken arms and legs.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Hush, Hush
Quote: One more secret smile. One more shared laugh. One more electric kiss. Finding him was like finding someone I didn't know I was searching for.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love is like whoa! Actually, it's closer to woe.

Author: Jonathan Antin
Quote: The minute I stopped trying to find the right girl, and started trying to become the right guy...the girl came.

Author: Lang Leav,  Love & Misadventure
Quote: You were you,and I was I;we were twobefore our time.I was yoursbefore I knew,and you have always been mine too.

Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote: The dawn is not distant, nor is the night starless; love is eternal.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: I don't care if you say we can't be together. I don't care if you think I'm the most evil, unnatural creature walking on earth. You can think whatever you want, go whatever you want. I'm going to just go on loving you, even if it's hopeless.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Love is the strongest force the world possesses and yet it is the humblest imaginable.

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: If two people love each other there can be no happy end to it.

Author: Eminem
Quote: Love, when spelled backwards and read phonetically, reads evil

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  The Dream Thieves
Quote: I wish you could be kissed, Jane,' he said. 'Because I would beg just one off you. Under all this.' He flailed an arm toward the stars.

Author: Zelda Fitzgerald
Quote: I don't want to live, I want to love first and live incidentally.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
Quote: Love like rain, can nourish from above, drenching couples with soaking joy. But sometimes, under the angry heat of life, love dries on the surface and must nourish from below, tending to its roots, keeping itself alive.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Invisible Monsters
Quote: Make me into anything, but just love me.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: A busy, vibrant, goal-oriented woman is so much more attractive than a woman who waits around for a man to validate her existence.

Author: Tom Stoppard,  Arcadia
Quote: It is a defect of God's humor that he directs our hearts everywhere but to those who have a right to them.

Author: Hanh Nhat Thich,  Teachings on Love
Quote: Through my love for you, I want to express my love for the whole cosmos, the whole of humanity, and all beings. By living with you, I want to learn to love everyone and all species. If I succeed in loving you, I will be able to love everyone and all species on Earth... This is the real message of love.

Author: Evelyn Waugh,  Vile Bodies
Quote: After all, damn it, what does being in love mean if you can't trust a person.

Author: Caitlyn Siehl,  Literary Sexts: A Collection of Short & Sexy Love Poems
Quote: When is a monster not a monster? Oh, when you love it.

Author: Moliere
Quote: The more we love our friends, the less we flatter them; it is by excusing nothing that pure love shows itself.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept
Quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels
Quote: And now,"Eric yelled into his mircophone, "we're going to sing a new song-one we just wrote. This one's for my girlfriend. We've been going out for three weeks, and, damn, our love is true. We're gonna be together forever, baby. This one's called 'Bang You Like a Drum.

Author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife
Quote: I go to sleep alone, and wake up alone. I take walks. I work until I'm tired. I watch the wind play with the trash that's been under the snow all winter. Everything seems simple until you think about it. Why is love intensified by abscence?

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Mercy
Quote: How could you go about choosing something that would hold the half of your heart you had to bury?

Author: Gunnar Ardelius,  I Need You More Than I Love You and I Love You to Bits
Quote: How do you know when it's over?""Maybe when you feel more in love with your memories than with the person standing in front of you.

Author: Kahlil Gibran,  The Prophet
Quote: Love one another, but make not a bond of love:Let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  Stardust
Quote: I am the most miserable person who ever lived,"he said... "You are young, and in love,"said Primus. "Every young man in your position is the most miserable young man who ever lived.

Author: Jocelyn Soriano,  Mend My Broken Heart
