Quote: To be rejected by someone doesn't mean you should also reject yourself or that you should think of yourself as a lesser person. It doesn't mean that nobody will ever love you anymore. Remember that only ONE person has rejected you at the moment, and it only hurt so much because to you, that person's opinion symbolized the opinion of the whole world, of God.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  Airman's Odyssey
Quote: Love consists of not looking each other in the eye, but of looking outwardly in the same direction.

Author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom
Quote: Every friendship travels at sometime through the black valley of despair. This tests every aspect of your affection. You lose the attraction and the magic. Your sense of each other darkens and your presence is sore. If you can come through this time, it can purify with your love, and falsity and need will fall away. It will bring you onto new ground where affection can grow again.

Author: Corrie ten Boom,  The Hiding Place
Quote: Do you know what hurts so very much? It's love. Love is the strongest force in the world, and when it is blocked that means pain. There are two things we can do when this happens. We can kill that love so that it stops hurting. But then of course part of us dies, too. Or we can ask God to open up another route for that love to travel.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight
Quote: Surely it was a good way to die, in the place of someone else, someone I loved.

Author: James A. Baldwin
Quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.

Author: Anna Godbersen,  The Luxe
Quote: Don't go looking for boys in the darkThey will say pretty things thenleave you with scars.Do go looking for boys in the parkFor that is where the true gentlemen are.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: Oh, Lizzy! do anything rather than marry without affection.

Author: Raymond Carver,  Where I'm Calling From: New and Selected Stories
Quote: I loved you so much once. I did. More than anything in the whole wide world. Imagine that. What a laugh that is now. Can you believe it? We were so intimate once upon a time I can't believe it now. The memory of being that intimate with somebody. We were so intimate I could puke. I can't imagine ever being that intimate with somebody else. I haven't been.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  Slapstick or Lonesome No More!
Quote: Love is where you find it. I think it is foolish to go around looking for it, and I think it can be poisonous. I wish that people who are conventionally supposed to love each other would say to each other, when they fight, 'Please — a little less love, and a little more common decency'.

Author: W.H. Auden,  Collected Poems
Quote: He was my North, my South, my East and West,My working week and my Sunday rest,My noon, my midnight, my talk, my song;I thought that love would last forever: I was wrong.

Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote: Often it is the most deserving people who cannot help loving those who destroy them.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: All of sudden, this shooting star went by, and all I could think was that they were listening to us somehow.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Quote: I want you to be weak. As weak as I am.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?

Author: Katie Kacvinsky,  Awaken
Quote: Don't worry about hurting me, if that's what you're afraid of. I want to get hurt. At least I´ll feel something for a change.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  The Raven Boys
Quote: If I were a tree, I would have no reason to love a human.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life
Quote: I’m willing to die for the woman I love. I just want to take 75 years to do it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If love had feathers and tasted like dog food, then I suggest you wear shoes with your banana pudding. (This statement also defines my political beliefs).

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Brida
Quote: But how will I know who my Soulmate is?” Brida felt that this was one of the most important questions she had ever asked in her life. By taking risks’ she said to Brida. ‘ By risking failure, disappointment, disillusion, but never ceasing in you search for Love. As long as you keep looking, you will triumph in the end.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I have learned that you can go anywhere you want to go and do anything you want to do and buy all the things that you want to buy and meet all the people that you want to meet and learn all the things that you desire to learn and if you do all these things but are not madly in love: you have still not begun to live.

Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.

Author: Arthur Conan Doyle
Quote: We can't command our love, but we can our actions.

Author: Marie Lu,  Prodigy
Quote: Love is illogical, love had consequences--I did this to myself, and I should be able to take it.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.

Author: Coco Chanel
Quote: There is no time for cut-and-dried monotony. There is time for work. And time for love. That leaves no other time.

Author: Victoria Moran,  Lit From Within: Tending Your Soul For Lifelong Beauty
Quote: To the people who love you, you are beautiful already. This is not because they’re blind to your shortcomings but because they so clearly see your soul. Your shortcomings then dim by comparison. The people who care about you are willing to let you be imperfect and beautiful, too. (20)

Author: Adriana Trigiani,  Very Valentine
Quote: That's when you know for sure somebody loves you. They figure out what you need and they give it to you -- without you asking.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.

Author: James Joyce,  A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man
Quote: You made me confess the fears that I have. But I will tell you also what I do not fear. I do not fear to be alone or to be spurned for another or to leave whatever I have to leave. And I am not afraid to make a mistake, even a great mistake, a lifelong mistake and perhaps as long as eternity too.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  Wampeters, Foma and Granfalloons
Quote: If somebody says 'I love you' to me, I feel as though I had a pistol pointed at my head. What can anybody reply under such conditions but that which the pistol holder requires? 'I love you, too'.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: Being with her I feel a pain, like a frozen knife stuck in my chest. An awful pain, but the funny thing is I'm thankful for it. It's like that frozen pain and my very existence are one.The pain is an anchor, mooring me here.

Author: Graham Greene,  The Comedians
Quote: Like some wines our love could neither mature nor travel.

Author: Ann Landers
Quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.

Author: Ken Kesey
Quote: People think love is an emotion. Love is good sense.

Author: Diana Gabaldon,  Dragonfly in Amber
Quote: Blood of my Blood,"he whispered, "and bone of my bone. You carry me within ye, Claire, and ye canna leave me now, no matter what happens, You are mine, always, if ye will it or no, if ye want me or nay. Mine, and I wilna let ye go.

Author: Marissa Meyer,  Scarlet
Quote: But you're the only one, Scarlet. You'll always be the only one.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Don’t try to hog loneliness and keep it all to yourself. Share it with a special someone.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: O serpent heart hid with a flowering face!Did ever a dragon keep so fair a cave?Beautiful tyrant, feind angelical, dove feather raven, wolvish-ravening lamb! Despised substance of devinest show, just opposite to what thou justly seemest - A dammed saint, an honourable villain!

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Wedding
Quote: But love, I’ve come to understand, is more than three words mumbled before bedtime. Love is sustained by action, a pattern of devotion in the things we do for each other every day.

Author: Joshua Harris,  I Kissed Dating Goodbye: A New Attitude Toward Relationships and Romance
Quote: When God knows you're ready for the responsibility of commitment, He'll reveal the right person under the right circumstances.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Sometimes the best and worst times of your life can coincide. It is a talent of the soul to discover the joy in pain—-thinking of moments you long for, and knowing you’ll never have them again. The beautiful ghosts of our past haunt us, and yet we still can’t decide if the pain they caused us out weighs the tender moments when they touched our soul. This is the irony of love.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Fangirl
Quote: She smiled, and her eyes started to drift downward. "Cather..."Back up to his eyes."You know that I'm falling in love with you, right?

Author: Douglas Adams,  The Salmon of Doubt
Quote: There's always a moment when you start to fall out of love, whether it's with a person or an idea or a cause, even if it's one you only narrate to yourself years after the event: a tiny thing, a wrong word, a false note, which means that things can never be quite the same again.

Author: Marilyn Monroe,  My Story
Quote: I could never pretend something I didn't feel. I could never make love if I didn't love, and if I loved I could no more hide the fact than change the color of my eyes.

Author: James Herriot,  All Creatures Great and Small
Quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.

Author: Julie Andrews
Quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer
Quote: Why are you leaving me?He wrote, I do not know how to live.I do not know either but I am trying.I do not know how to try.There were some things I wanted to tell him. But I knew they would hurt him. So i buried them and let them hurt me

Author: T.H. White,  The Once and Future King
Quote: She hardly ever thought of him. He had worn a place for himself in some corner of her heart, as a sea shell, always boring against the rock, might do. The making of the place had been her pain. But now the shell was safely in the rock. It was lodged, and ground no longer.

Author: L.M. Montgomery,  Anne of the Island
Quote: Anne laughed."I don't want sunbursts or marble halls, I just want you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Love is a circular emotion that surrounds you, like a hug. Or a noose.

Author: Kaui Hart Hemmings,  The Descendants
Quote: That's how you know you love someone, I guess, when you can't experience anything without wishing the other person were there to see it, too.

Author: Orson Welles
Quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.

Author: William Blake
Quote: Love seeketh not itself to please, nor for itself hath any care, but for another gives its ease, and builds a Heaven in Hell's despair.

Author: Alexandra Bracken,  The Darkest Minds
Quote: Never, never, never. I am never going to forget you.

Author: Kahlil Gibran
Quote: It is wrong to think that love comes from long companionship and persevering courtship. Love is the offspring of spiritual affinity and unless that affinity is created in a moment, it will not be created for years or even generations.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: Being in love, I find myself smiling for no reason at all...

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: The first time he'd held her hand, it felt so good that it crowded out all the bad things. It felt better than anything had ever hurt.

Author: غادة السمان
Quote: ما أحلى الكلمات التي لا نقولها عندما نحس أن الحرف عاجز عن إستيعاب انفعالاتنا

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Rules of Attraction
Quote: Tonight was... well, it was perfect for me too. You've turned my world upside down. I've fallen in love with you, chica, and it scares the fuckin' shit outta me. I've been shakin' all night, because I knew it.I've tried to deny it, to make you think I wanted you as a fake girlfriend, but that was a lie.

Author: Kristan Higgins,  My One and Only
Quote: You asked why I couldn't forgive you,"Nick said, very quietly, and I jumped a little. "It was because you were the love of my life, Harper. And you didn't want to be. That's hard to let go.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Last Song
Quote: I’m stuck babysitting turtle eggs while a volleyball player slash grease monkey slash aquarium volunteer tries to hit on me.” I’m not hitting on you,” he protested.No?”Believe me, you’d know if I was hitting on you. You wouldn’t be able to stop yourself from succumbing to my charms.

Author: Francois Rabelais
Quote: Gestures, in love, are incomparably more attractive, effective and valuable than words.

Author: Philip Roth,  The Dying Animal
Quote: The only obsession everyone wants: 'love.' People think that in falling in love they make themselves whole? The Platonic union of souls? I think otherwise. I think you're whole before you begin. And the love fractures you. You're whole, and then you're cracked open.

Author: Emily Brontë
Quote: I love the ground under his feet, and the air over his head, and everything he touches and every word he says. I love all his looks, and all his actions and him entirely and all together.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: No matter where it is in the sky... No matter where you are in the world... the moon is never bigger than your thumb. -John

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Before, I wanted to say: "I found love!"But now, I want to say: "I found a person. And he belongs to me and I belong to him.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  Mother Night
Quote: And yet another moral occurs to me now: Make love when you can. It's good for you.

Author: Ann Brashares,  Girls In Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood
Quote: When you feel someone else's pain and joy as powerfully as if it were your own, then you know you really loved them.

Author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom
Quote: If you send out goodness from yourself, or if you share that which is happy or good within you, it will all come back to you multiplied ten thousand times. In the kingdom of love there is no competition; there is no possessiveness or control. The more love you give away, the more love you will have.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: This is part of what a family is about, not just love. It's knowing that your family will be there watching out for you. Nothing else will give you that. Not money. Not fame. Not work.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  Machu Picchu
Quote: Love! Love until the night collapses!

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Sing You Home
Quote: You know someone's right for you when the things they don't have to say are even more important than the things they do.

Author: Robert Frost
Quote: The heart can think of no devotionGreater than being shore to the ocean-Holding the curve of one position,Counting an endless repetition.

Author: Jack Llawayllynn,  Indulgence
Quote: I desire to be with you. I miss you. I feel lonely when I can't see you. I am obsessed with you, fascinated by you, infatuated with you. I hunger for your taste, your smell, the feel of your soul touching mine.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love is like jumping out of an airplane with no parachute. But there’s no need to be frightened, because that plane is still on the ground.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Macbeth
Quote: ...Who could refrain, That had a heart to love, and in that heart Courage to make love known?

Author: Larry Flynt
Quote: The two most misused words in the entire English vocabulary are love and friendship. A true friend would die for you, so when you start trying to count them on one hand, you don't need any fingers.

Author: George Sand
Quote: Don't walk in front of me, I may not follow. Don't walk behind me, I may not lead. There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.

Author: Madeline Miller,  The Song of Achilles
Quote: In the darkness, two shadows, reaching through the hopeless, heavy dusk. Their hands meet, and light spills in a flood like a hundred golden urns pouring out of the sun.

Author: Amanda Grace,  But I Love Him
Quote: But even when I stop crying, even when we fall asleep and I'm nestled in his arms, this will leave another scar. No one will see it. No one will know. But it will be there. And eventually all of the scars will have scars, and that's all I'll be--one big scar of a love gone wrong.

Author: Jess Rothenberg,  The Catastrophic History of You and Me
Quote: You can obsess and obsess over how things ended—what you did wrong or could have done differently—but there's not much of a point. It's not like it'll change anything. So really, why worry?

Author: Christina Westover
Quote: Unrequited love is the infinite curse of a lonely heart.

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: Sometimes people don’t understandthe promises they’re making when they make them,” I said.Isaac shot me a look. “Right, of course.But you keep the promise anyway. That’swhat love is. Love is keeping the promise anyway. Don’t you believe in true love?

Author: J.A. Redmerski,  The Edge of Never
Quote: You were the missing piece of my soul, the breath in my lungs, and the blood in my veins.

Author: Michael Jackson
Quote: If you enter this world knowing you are loved and you leave this world knowing the same, then everything that happens in between can be dealt with.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  One Hundred Years of Solitude
Quote: Then he made one last effort to search in his heart for the place where his affection had rotted away, and he could not find it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Stairs, are they going up or are they going down? They’re so confusing! If love were a physical thing, it would be stairs.

Author: محمد حسن علوان,  طوق الطهارة
Quote: أوجع الأيام بعد الحب، ليس أولها، لأن النبتة لا تتألم فور انقطاع الماء، بل عندما يبدأ الجفاف فعلاً.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Ultimately, it is the desire, not the desired, that we love.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Handle with Care
Quote: People always say that, when you love someone, nothing in the world matters. But that's not true, is it? You know, and I know, that when you love someone, everything in the world matters a little bit more.

Author: Henry Drummond
Quote: To love abundantly is to live abundantly, and to love forever is to live forever.

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: What I cannot love, I overlook.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: Experts on romance say for a happy marriage there has to be more than a passionate love. For a lasting union, they insist, there must be a genuine liking for each other. Which, in my book, is a good definition for friendship.

Author: Vincent Van Gogh
Quote: The way to know life is to love many things.

Author: Dorothy Parker,  The Portable Dorothy Parker
Quote: I won't telephone him. I'll never telephone him again as long as I live. He'll rot in hell, before I'll call him up. You don't have to give me strength, God; I have it myself. If he wanted me, he could get me. He knows where I am. He knows I'm waiting here. He's so sure of me, so sure. I wonder why they hate you, as soon as they are sure of you.

Author: Savage Garden
Quote: I knew I loved you before I met youI think I dreamed you into lifeI knew I loved you before I met youI have been waiting all my life

Author: Robert Louis Stevenson,  Lay Morals
Quote: So long as we love we serve; so long as we are loved by others, I would almost say that we are indispensable; and no man is useless while he has a friend.

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  Halfway to the Grave
Quote: Would you mind repeating that? I'm afraid I might have lost my wits altogether and just hallucinated what I've longed to hear.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I saw you, I saw love. When I saw you naked, I saw lust. When I saw you with my clone in a dream, I saw the future.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't being said. The art of reading between the lines is a life long quest of the wise.

Author: Bill Ayers
Quote: Your kids require you most of all to love them for who they are, not to spend your whole time trying to correct them.

Author: Harlan Coben
Quote: ..."better to have loved and lost"bullshit. Don't show me paradise and then burn it down.

Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote: If you cannot inspire a woman with love of you, fill her above the brim with love of herself ~ all that runs over will be yours.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: Love is not a habit, a commitment, or a debt. It isn't what romantic songs tell us it is - love simply is.

Author: Ellen Hopkins
Quote: This time when we kiss, I feel it in the pit of my stomach, I feel it in my heart. And I realize love isn't about sex. It's about connection.

Author: Amit Ray,  Meditation: Insights and Inspirations
Quote: It does not matter how long you are spending on the earth, how much money you have gathered or how much attention you have received. It is the amount of positive vibration you have radiated in life that matters,

Author: Jamie McGuire,  Providence
Quote: Time will make it worse! You're...the other half of his soul. He's never going to get over you. And no matter how much you hope that you will... you'll never get over him. You're going to wake up one day and realize what you've done, and you're going to regret the time you wasted apart from him for the rest of your life.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: It’s strange how dreams get under your skin and give your heart a test for what’s real and what’s imaginary.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: You and I have a love so secret that not even you know about it. But first, let me introduce myself.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: They've got no idea what happiness is, they don't know that without this love there is no happiness or unhappiness for us--there is no life.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.

Author: Harry Connick, Jr.
Quote: It is really rare to find someone you really, really love and that you want to spend your life with and all that stuff that goes along with being married. I am one of those lucky people. And I think she feels that way too. So the romantic stuff is easy because you want them to be happy.

Author: Barbara Pym
Quote: How absurd and delicious it is to be in love with somebody younger than yourself. Everybody should try it.

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: I didn't want to kiss you goodbye — that was the trouble — I wanted to kiss you good night — and there's a lot of difference.

Author: Homer,  The Iliad
Quote: …There is the heat of Love, the pulsing rush of Longing, the lover’s whisper, irresistible—magic to make the sanest man go mad.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Shadow Kiss
Quote: Did you mean it... that if Victor did tell...that you'd..."I couldn't finish. I couldn't bring myself to say the words have him killed."I don't have much influence in the upper levels of Moroi royalty, but I have plenty among the guardians who handle the dirty work in our world.""You didn't answer the question. If you'd really do it.""I'd do a lot of things to protect you, Roza.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.

Author: Michael Bassey Johnson,  The Infinity Sign
Quote: If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Landline
Quote: I love you more than I hate everything else.

Author: Holly Black
Quote: Those who really love you don't mean to hurt you and if they do, you can't see it in their eyes but it hurts them too.

Author: Julie de Lespinasse
Quote: You know that when I hate you, it is because I love you to a point of passion that unhinges my soul.

Author: Isabel Allende,  Of Love and Shadows
Quote: For women, the best aphrodisiacs are words. The G-spot is in the ears. He who looks for it below there is wasting his time.

Author: David Levithan,  Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
Quote: The way you're singing in your sleepThe way you look before you leapThe strange illusions that you keepYou don't knowBut I'm noticingThe way your touch turns into arcsThe way you slide into the darkThe beating of my open heartYou don't knowBut I'm noticing

Author: Saint Basil
Quote: A tree is known by its fruit; a man by his deeds. A good deed is never lost; he who sows courtesy reaps friendship, and he who plants kindness gathers love.

Author: Virgil
Quote: Love conquers all.

Author: Pramoedya Ananta Toer,  Bumi Manusia
Quote: Berterimakasihlah pada segala yang memberi kehidupan.

Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote: Love cannot be forced, love cannot be coaxed and teased. It comes out of heaven, unasked and unsought.

Author: Melina Marchetta,  On the Jellicoe Road
Quote: When I turn around, he cups my face in his hands and he kisses me so deeply that I don't know who is breathing for who, but his mouth and tongue taste like warm honey. I don't know how long it lasts, but when I let go of him, I miss it already.

Author: Julia Quinn,  The Viscount Who Loved Me
Quote: Love's about finding the one person who makes your heart complete. Who makes you a better person than you ever dreamed you could be. Its about looking in the eyes of your wife and knowing all the way to your bones that she's simply the best person you've ever known.

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  A Stroke of Midnight
Quote: Love is too precious to be ashamed of.

Author: Harry Styles
Quote: I don't think you can define love.

Author: Jenny Downham,  Before I Die
Quote: I wish I had a boyfriend. I wish he lived in the wardrobe on a coat hanger. Whenever I wanted, I could get him out and he'd look at me the way boys do in films, as if I'm beautiful.

Author: Ian McEwan,  Enduring Love
Quote: When its gone, you'll know what a gift love was. you'll suffer like this. So go back and fight to keep it.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades Darker
Quote: I hug him tightly. “I can’t imagine my life without you, Christian. I love you so much it frightens me.” “Me, too,” he breathes. “My life would be empty without you. I love you so much.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Winner Stands Alone
Quote: If you love someone, you must be prepared to set them free.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The House of Hades
Quote: Annabeth pressed her lips to Percy’s ear. “I love you.”She wasn’t sure he could hear her—but if they died, she wanted those to be her last words.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature.

Author: Graham Greene,  The End of the Affair
Quote: It's a strange thing to discover and to believe that you are loved when you know that there is nothing in you for anybody but a parent or a God to love.

Author: Tabitha Suzuma,  Forbidden
Quote: How can something so wrong feel so right?

Author: Brene Brown
Quote: Why, when we know that there's no such thing as perfect, do most of us spend an incredible amount of time and energy trying to be everything to everyone? Is it that we really admire perfection? No - the truth is that we are actually drawn to people who are real and down-to-earth. We love authenticity and we know that life is messy and imperfect.

Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote: Love is the only gold.

Author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables
Quote: When love has fused and mingled two beings in a sacred and angelic unity, the secret of life has been discovered so far as they are concerned; they are no longer anything more than the two boundaries of the same destiny; they are no longer anything but the two wings of the same spirit. Love, soar.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride
Quote: It didn't make you noble to step away from something that wasn't working, even if you thought you were the reason for the malfunction. Especially then. It just made you a quitter. Because if you were the problem, chances were you could also be the solution. The only way to find out was to take another shot.

Author: Stephen Kendrick,  The Love Dare
Quote: The only way love can last a lifetime is if it's unconditional. The truth is this: love is not determined by the one being loved but rather by the one choosing to love.

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: If you love deeply, you're going to get hurt badly. But it's still worth it.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: I just...I just miss him. And I hate being so alone.

Author: Alexandra Adornetto,  Halo
Quote: I thought you were gone forever, I thought you’d walked away from everything, because I failed, because I destroyed the only thing that ever mattered to me. I waited for you to come, but you didn’t.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever
Quote: I realized how truly hard it was, really, to see someone you love change right before your eyes. Not only is it scary, it throws your balance off as well.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I don’t want to make love last, I want to make love second to last. The last thing we’ll do is cuddle.

Author: Theodore Dreiser
Quote: I believe in the compelling power of love. I do not understand it. I believe it to be the most fragrant blossom of all this thorny existence.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: And yes, I’ll admit, I am jealous. I’m jealous of every minute you spend with him, of every concerned expression you send his way, of every tear shed, of every glance, every touch, and every thought. I want to rip him to pieces and purge him from your mind and from your heart. But I can’t.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince
Quote: She had loved him for such a long time, she thought. How was it that she did now know him at all?

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  The Little Prince
Quote: When someone blushes, doesn't that mean 'yes'?

Author: Gregory David Roberts,  Shantaram
Quote: Some feelings sink so deep into the heart that only loneliness can help you find them again. Some truths are so painful that only shame can help you live with them. Some things are so sad that only your soul can do the crying for them.

Author: Meister Eckhart,  Sermons of Meister Eckhart
Quote: The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me; my eye and God's eye are one eye, one seeing, one knowing, one love.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: Absence makes the heart grow fonder, but it sure makes the rest of you lonely.

Author: Mario Puzo,  Fools Die
Quote: Do you believe a man can truly love a woman and constantly betray her?Never mind physically but betray her in his mind,in the very "poetry of his soul".Well,it's not easy but men do it all the time.

Author: Edith Wharton,  The Age of Innocence
Quote: Each time you happen to me all over again.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Everything Is Illuminated
Quote: You are the only one who has understood even a whisper of me, and I will tell you that I am the only person who has understood even a whisper of you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  99 Cents For Some Nonsense
Quote: Between hello and goodbye is I love you.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: She is tolerable, but not handsome enough to tempt me, and I am in no humor at present to give consequence to young ladies who are slighted by other men.

Author: Robert Browning
Quote: Love is energy of life.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Want to keep Christ in Christmas? Feed the hungry, clothe the naked, forgive the guilty, welcome the unwanted, care for the ill, love your enemies, and do unto others as you would have done unto you.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: But when I touch you, your aura … it smolders. The colors deepen, it burns more intensely, the purple increases. Why? Why, Sydney?” He used that hand to pull me closer. “Why do you react that way if I don’t mean anything to you?” There was a desperation in his voice, and it was legitimate.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I am the broth of love. Make soup to me.

Author: S.C. Stephens,  Thoughtless
Quote: Do you really think anyone in this world, compares to you in my eyes?

Author: Sarah Dessen,  What Happened to Goodbye
Quote: I mean, it's not surprising, really. Once you love something, you always love it in some way. You have to. It's, like, part of you for good.

Author: Dave Eggers,  What is the What
Quote: I will not wait to love as best as I can. We thought we were young and that there would be time to love well sometime in the future. This is a terrible way to think. It is no way to live, to wait to love.

Author: Charles Dickens,  A Tale of Two Cities
Quote: ‎And yet I have had the weakness, and have still the weakness, to wish you to know with what a sudden mastery you kindled me, heap of ashes that I am, into fire.

Author: Amy Harmon,  Making Faces
Quote: Everybody is a main character to someone...

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: It was the nicest thing she could imagine. It made her want to have his babies and give him both of her kidneys.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant
Quote: I think you're still the only person sharp enough to sharpen someone like me.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez
Quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.

Author: Marla Gibbs
Quote: In my life I've learned that true happiness comes from giving. Helping others along the way makes you evaluate who you are. I think that love is what we're all searching for. I haven't come across anyone who didn't become a better person through love.

Author: Max Muller
Quote: The spring of love becomes hidden and soon filled up.

Author: Ally Carter,  Heist Society
Quote: And I didn't choose it, Kat. I chose you.

Author: John Joseph Powell,  The Secret of Staying in Love
Quote: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.

Author: Rachel Vincent,  Shift
Quote: If I love you more than you love me, I’m as good as dead. Yet I can’t make myself take it back. I can’t just walk away from you, because every time you pass by me without smiling, without touching my hand, or at least making eye contact, it feels like I’m dying inside.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: Every night I cuddle with a blob of unbaked clay I fashioned in the shape of a woman. But that’s what being in love is all about.

Author: Abraham Cowley,  The Poems of Abraham Cowley
Quote: A mighty pain to love it is,And 't is a pain that pain to miss;But of all pains, the greatest painIt is to love, but love in vain.

Author: Tyler Knott Gregson,  Love Language
Quote: I would love to saythat youmake meweak in the kneesbutto be quite upfrontand completelytruthfulyoumake my bodyforgetit has kneesat all.

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Rules of Attraction
Quote: Look at me, chica."When she does, I repeat, "Eres hermosa.""What does it mean?""You're beautiful.

Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote: The more boys I meet the more I love my dog.

Author: Hanh Nhat Thich,  Living Buddha, Living Christ
Quote: If you love someone but rarely make yourself available to him or her, that is not true love.

Author: Matthew Arnold,  Dover Beach and Other Poems
Quote: Ah, love, let us be true To one another! for the world, which seems To lie before us like a land of dreams, So various, so beautiful, so new, Hath really neither joy, nor love, nor light, Nor certitude, nor peace, nor help for pain; And we are here as on a darkling plain Swept with confused alarms of struggle and flight, Where ignorant armies clash by night.

Author: Hermann Hesse,  Wer lieben kann, ist glücklich. Über die Liebe
Quote: When you like someone, you like them in spite of their faults. When you love someone, you love them with their faults.

Author: Ernest Hemingway,  A Moveable Feast
Quote: We ate well and cheaply and drank well and cheaply and slept well and warm together and loved each other.

Author: Margaret Atwood,  Cat's Eye
Quote: Love blurs your vision; but after it recedes, you can see more clearly than ever. It's like the tide going out, revealing whatever's been thrown away and sunk: broken bottles, old gloves, rusting pop cans, nibbled fishbodies, bones. This is the kind of thing you see if you sit in the darkness with open eyes, not knowing the future. The ruin you've made.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  Tongue-Tied
Quote: Last night I was seriously considering whether I was a bisexual or not but I don’t think so though I’m not sure if I’d like to be and argh I don’t think there’s anything wrong with that, if you like a person, you like the person, not their genitals.

Author: Natalie Clifford Barney
Quote: When you're in love you never really know whether your elation comes from the qualities of the one you love, or if it attributes them to her; whether the light which surrounds her like a halo comes from you, from her, or from the meeting of your sparks.

Author: John Milton
Quote: Freely we serveBecause we freely love, as in our willTo love or not; in this we stand or fall.

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  Notes from Underground
Quote: To love is to suffer and there can be no love otherwise.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.
Quote: The wind blew my words away from you. So while I told you I love you, the phrase was carried in the opposite direction and landed 333 miles away in the ears of a confused farmer. He was nice, though. He sent me a kind letter saying that while he was flattered, I wasn’t really his type.

Author: Colleen Hoover
Quote: Sometimes two people have to fall apart, to realize how much they need to fall back together.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote: It's easy to cry when you realize that everyone you love will reject you or die.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: Falling in love is very real, but I used to shake my head when people talked about soul mates, poor deluded individuals grasping at some supernatural ideal not intended for mortals but sounded pretty in a poetry book. Then, we met, and everything changed, the cynic has become the converted, the sceptic, an ardent zealot.

Author: Pythagoras
Quote: As long as Man continues to be the ruthless destroyer of lower living beings, he will never know health or peace. For as long as men massacre animals, they will kill each other. Indeed, he who sows the seed of murder and pain cannot reap joy and love.

Author: Hermann Hesse,  Demian: Die Geschichte von Emil Sinclairs Jugend
Quote: Love must not entreat,' she added, 'or demand. Love must have the strength to become certain within itself. Then it ceases merely to be attracted and begins to attract.

Author: Tom Wolfe
Quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Your naked body should only belong to those who fall in love with your naked soul.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
Quote: Every life has one true love snapshot.

Author: Kris Carr,  Crazy Sexy Diet: Eat Your Veggies, Ignite Your Spark, and Live Like You Mean It!
Quote: There's no need to wait for the bad things and bullshit to be over. Change now. Love now. Live now. Don't wait for people to give you permission to live, because they won't.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess
Quote: I thought perhaps that when you told me you did not love me that my own feelings would fall away and atrophy, but they have not. They have grown every day. I love you now more desperately, this moment, than I have ever loved you before, and in an hour I will love you more than that

Author: Richelle Mead,  Last Sacrifice
Quote: I'm backing down now. I really do love you. That's why I'm doing this.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  100 Love Sonnets
Quote: And I, infinitesima­l being, drunk with the great starry void, likeness, image of mystery, I felt myself a pure part of the abyss, I wheeled with the stars, my heart broke loose on the wind.

Author: Marie de France
Quote: For above all things Love means sweetness, and truth, and measure; yea, loyalty to the loved one and to your word. And because of this I dare not meddle with so high a matter.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Heavenly Fire
Quote: Every time I think I'm missing a piece of me, you give it back.

Author: Emilie Autumn,  The Asylum for Wayward Victorian Girls
Quote: I am my heart’s undertaker. Daily I go and retrieve its tattered remains, place them delicately into its little coffin, and bury it in the depths of my memory, only to have to do it all again tomorrow.

Author: H.L. Mencken,  Prejudices: First Series
Quote: Every normal man must be tempted, at times, to spit on his hands, hoist the black flag, and begin slitting throats.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy to a friend.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: If love be rough with you, be rough with love. Prick love for pricking and you beat love down.

Author: Ally Condie,  Matched
Quote: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham)

Author: Jennifer Salaiz
Quote: When you're missing a peice of yourself, aching, gut wrenching emptiness begins to take over. Until you find the link that completes your very soul, the feeling will never go away. Most people find a way to fill this void, material possessions, a string of relationships, affairs, food...I bear my soul, with words, for all to see.

Author: Lauren Kate,  Torment
Quote: Love never dies.

Author: John Ruskin
Quote: It is better to lose your pride with someone you love rather than to lose that someone you love with your useless pride.

Author: Gerard Way
Quote: Tears are words the heart can't express

Author: مريد البرغوثي,  ولدت هناك، ولدت هنا
Quote: والقهوة يجب أن يقدّمها لك شخصٌ ما. القهوةُ كالوَرْد، فالورد يقدّمه لك سِواك، ولا أحدَ يقدّم ورداً لنفسه. وإن أعددتها لنفسك فأنت لحظتها في عزلة حرة بلا عاشق أو عزيز، غريبٌ في مكانك. وإن كان هذا اختياراً فأنت تدفع ثمن حريتك، وإن كان اضطراراً فأنت في حاجةٍ إلى جرس الباب.

Author: Sam Keen,  To Love and Be Loved
Quote: We come to love not by finding a perfect person, but by learning to see an imperfect person perfectly.

Author: Brian Andreas
Quote: Wanting him to come back before anyone notices part of the world has not moved since he left.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  I've Got Your Number
Quote: Lover? I don't know. I don't know if she loves me. I don't know if I love her. All I can say is, she's the one I think about. All the time. She's the voice I want to hear. She's the face I hope to see.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: If you have the woman you love, what more do you need? Well, besides an alibi for the time of her husband’s murder.

Author: Truman Capote
Quote: Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.

Author: Lauren Kate
Quote: Fight for the only thing she knew was good enough, noble enough, powerful enough to be worth risking everything... Love.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet
Quote: Sweets to the sweet.

Author: Anne Lamott,  Operating Instructions: A Journal of My Son's First Year
Quote: I don't remember who said this, but there really are places in the heart you don't even know exist until you love a child.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince
Quote: She had never imagined she had the power to make someone else so happy. And not a magical power, either--a purely human one.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Witch Of Portobello
Quote: Love simply is.

Author: Plato,  The Symposium
Quote: ...and when one of them meets the other half, the actual half of himself, whether he be a lover of youth or a lover of another sort, the pair are lost in an amazement of love and friendship and intimacy and one will not be out of the other's sight, as I may say, even for a moment...

Author: Ann Brashares
Quote: Let me love you, but don't love me back. Do love me and let me hate you for a while. Let me feel like I have some control, because I know I never do.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: If you love me as you say you do,' she whispered, 'make it so that I am at peace.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  Can You Keep a Secret?
Quote: Relationships are all about trust and equality. If one person shares, then the other person should share, too.

Author: Kiera Cass,  The Elite
Quote: Sometimes I feel like we're a knot, too tangled to be taken apart.

Author: Tiffany Madison
Quote: Most men claim to desire driven, independent and confident women. Yet when confronted with such a creature reverence often evolves into resent. For just like women, men need to be needed.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love is the jelly to sunshine’s peanut butter. And if I tell you that I’m in sandwich with you, I’m not just saying it to get in your Ziploc bag.

Author: Anaïs Nin,  Delta of Venus
Quote: Only the united beat of sex and heart together can create ecstasy.

Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Quote: What do I care how 'e looks? I am good-looking enough for both of us, I theenk! All these scars show is zat my husband is brave!

Author: Osho
Quote: Falling in love you remain a child; rising in love you mature. By and by love becomes not a relationship, it becomes a state of your being. Not that you are in love - now you are love.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades Freed
Quote: I think you can only be truly mad at someone you really love.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby
Quote: Love is so unpredictable. That's what makes it so great.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.

Author: Ann Brashares,  My Name Is Memory
Quote: Love who you love while you have them. That's all you can do. Let them go when you must. If you know how to love, you'll never run out.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: My head’ll explode if I continue with this escapism.

Author: Maggi Richard
Quote: Two words. Three vowels. Four constenants. Seven letters. It can either cut you open to the core and leave you in ungodly pain or it can free your soul and lift a tremendous weight off you shoulders. The phrase is: It's over.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: A true gentleman is one that apologizes anyways, even though he has not offended a lady intentionally. He is in a class all of his own because he knows the value of a woman's heart.

Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own... Jealousy is a disease, love is a healthy condition. The immature mind often mistakes one for the other, or assumes that the greater the love, the greater the jealousy.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I make love like the 13th floor is the 14th floor of a hotel. I give it that little extra that takes it to a whole new level.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive—to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love—then make that day count!

Author: E. Lockhart,  We Were Liars
Quote: He was contemplation and enthusiasm. Ambition and strong coffee. I could have looked at him forever.

Author: Yukio Mishima
Quote: True beauty is something that attacks, overpowers, robs, and finally destroys.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Hope for love, pray for love, wish for love, dream for love…but don’t put your life on hold waiting for love.

Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote: A truth should exist,it should not be usedlike this. If I love youis that a fact or a weapon?

Author: Hermann Hesse,  Siddhartha
Quote: It may be important to great thinkers to examine the world, to explain and despise it. But I think it is only important to love the world, not to despise it, not for us to hate each other, but to be able to regard the world and ourselves and all beings with love, admiration and respect.

Author: Mary M. Ricksen
Quote: Know that love is truly timeless.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  A Wild Sheep Chase
Quote: Sometimes I get real lonely sleeping with you.

Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote: The moment you have in your heart this extraordinary thing called love and feel the depth, the delight, the ecstasy of it, you will discover that for you the world is transformed.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: Were you always such a stubborn, blind, obtuse girl?”“Are you calling me stupid?”“Yes, but in a more poetic way!”“Well, here’s a poem for you. Get lost!

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: I'm in love with you, and I'm not in the business of denying myself the simple pleasure of saying true things.

Author: Anne Lamott,  Plan B: Further Thoughts on Faith
Quote: Hope is not about proving anything. It's about choosing to believe this one thing, that love is bigger than any grim, bleak shit anyone can throw at us.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: Submission is not about authority and it is not obedience; it is all about relationships of love and respect.

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: I reserve the right to love many different people at once, and to change my prince often.

Author: Wally Lamb,  She's Come Undone
Quote: Love is like breathing, you take it in and let it out.

Author: George Orwell,  1984
Quote: Confession is not betrayal. What you say or do doesn't matter; only feelings matter. If they could make me stop loving you-that would be the real betrayal.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Seriously delirious, but not at all serious
Quote: Roses may say “I love you,” but the cactus says “Fuck off.

Author: Arthur Golden,  Memoirs of a Geisha
Quote: If you aren't the woman I think you are, then this isn't the world I thought it was.

Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse of impossibility; for it thinks all things lawful for itself, and all things possible.

Author: David Levithan,  The Lover's Dictionary
Quote: abyss, n.There are times when I doubt everything. When I regret everything you've taken from me, everything I've given you, and the waste of all the time I've spent on us.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight
Quote: You are the most important thing to me now. The most important thing to me ever.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: People wait around too long for love. I'm happy with all of my lusts!

Author: Jenny Han,  The Summer I Turned Pretty
Quote: Would you rather live one perfect day over and over or live your life with no perfect days but just decent ones?

Author: Colleen Hoover,  November 9
Quote: You’ll never be able to find yourself if you’re lost in someone else.

Author: Allen Ginsberg
Quote: We're all golden sunflowers inside.

Author: Coco J. Ginger
Quote: When you miss someone....it’s weird…your body doesn’t function normally..as it should. Because I miss you, and my heart…it’s not steady…my soul it sings numb. Fingers are cold…like you…your soul.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: I love like a leaf in the wind. Please, hold your applause until the end of the performance (the last day of fall).

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe,  The Sorrows of Young Werther
Quote: I have so much in me, and the feeling for her absorbs it all; I have so much, and without her it all comes to nothing.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: Jace looked as if she had slapped him. "Why are you determined not to believe us?""Because she loves you,"said Valentine.Clary felt the blood drain out of her face.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: See how she leans her cheek upon her hand. O, that I were a glove upon that hand That I might touch that cheek!

Author: Christopher Paolini,  Eldest
Quote: Those whom we most love are often the most alien to us.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love flows like flowers, and grows like water. I’m so thirsty for romance I could drink a dozen roses.

Author: Matt Groening,  The Big Book of Hell
Quote: Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: My girlfriend is sad and quiet and keeps me up all night worrying about her.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is a bicycle with two pancakes for wheels. You may see love as more of an exercise in hard work, but I see it as more of a breakfast on the go.

Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote: In itself, homosexuality is as limiting as heterosexuality: the ideal should be to be capable of loving a woman or a man; either, a human being, without feeling fear, restraint, or obligation.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Lost Hero
Quote: But beauty is about finding the right fit, the most natural fit, To be perfect, you have to feel perfect about yourself --- avoid trying to be something you're not. For a goddess, that's especially hard. We can change so easily.-Aphrodite

Author: Paulo Coelho,  By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept
Quote: Love like rain, can nourish from above, drenching couples with a soaking joy. But sometimes under the angry heat of life, love dries on the surface and must nourish from below, tending to its roots keeping itself alive.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: 0 plus 100 equals 100. But so does 50 plus 50, only with more balance. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: The first question which the priest and the Levite asked was: 'If I stop to help this man, what will happen to me?' But...the good Samaritan reversed the question: 'If I do not stop to help this man, what will happen to him?

Author: Bob Marley
Quote: There will never be no love at all.

Author: Lev Grossman,  The Magicians
Quote: I got my heart's desire, and there my troubles began.

Author: Jack Kerouac
Quote: And the story of love is a long sad tale ending in graves.

Author: Raymond Carver,  A New Path to the Waterfall
Quote: Late FragmentAnd did you get whatyou wanted from this life, even so?I did.And what did you want?To call myself beloved, to feel myselfbeloved on the earth.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels
Quote: I think everything that happened in Idris-Valentine, Max, Hodge, even Sebastian-I kept shoving it all down, trying to forget, but it's catching up with me. I... I'll get help. I'll get better. I promise.""You promise.""I swear on the Angel."He ducked his head down, kissed her cheek."The hell with that. I swear on us.

Author: Rumi
Quote: I was dead, then alive.Weeping, then laughing.The power of love came into me,and I became fierce like a lion,then tender like the evening star.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Much Ado About Nothing
Quote: I do love nothing in the world so well as you- is not that strange?

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Crescendo
Quote: I needed him like I'd never needed anyone.

Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours.In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.

Author: Francine Rivers,  And the Shofar Blew
Quote: Love God and He will enable you to love others even when they disappoint you.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Crescendo
Quote: I couldn't stand here, hanging on, when the very thing I held disappeared more with each passing day.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Book of Laughter and Forgetting
Quote: Oh lovers! be careful in those dangerous first days! once you've brought breakfast in bed you'll have to bring it forever, unless you want to be accused of lovelessness and betrayal.

Author: Gilbert Parker
Quote: Imagination is at the root of much that passes for love.

Author: Chelsea Fine,  Sophie & Carter
Quote: Love.Not the kind you see in the movies or hear about on the radio.The real kind.The kind that gets beaten down and bloody, yet perseveres.The kind that hopes even when hope seems foolish.The kind that can forgives. The kind that believes in healing. The kind that can sit in silence and feel renewed.The real kind of love.It's rare and we have it..

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Leaving Paradise
Quote: Love is honesty. Love is a mutual respect for one another.

Author: Andrea Gibson
Quote: That night when you kissed me, I left a poem in your mouth, and you can hear some of the lines every time you breathe out.

Author: Ashly Lorenzana
Quote: You know all that sympathy that you feel for an abused child who suffers without a good mom or dad to love and care for them? Well, they don't stay children forever. No one magically becomes an adult the day they turn eighteen. Some people grow up sooner, many grow up later. Some never really do. But just remember that some people in this world are older versions of those same kids we cry for.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Love the One You're With
Quote: ...love is the sum of our choices, the strength of our commitments, the ties that bind us together.

Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel,  Prozac Nation
Quote: I need the thing that happens when your brain shuts off and your heart turns on.

Author: Bob Ong
Quote: Makakapili ka ng lugar na uupuan mo, pero hindi mo mapipili ang taong uupo sa puwang sa tabi mo... Ganyan ang senaryo sa bus. Ganyan din sa pag-ibig... Lalong 'di mo kontrolado kung kelan siya bababa.

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit
Quote: I want someone who is fierce and will love me until death and knows that love is as strong as death, and be on my side forever and ever. I want someone who will destroy and be destroyed by me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Two become one when two are in love—or when the waitress asks about our dinner bill. I’ll pay next time, I promise.

Author: Kazuo Ishiguro,  Never Let Me Go
Quote: I half closed my eyes and imagined this was the spot where everything I'd ever lost since my childhood had washed up, and I was now standing here in front of it, and if I waited long enough, a tiny figure would appear on the horizon across the field and gradually get larger until I'd see it was Tommy, and he'd wave, and maybe even call.

Author: Tabitha Suzuma,  Forbidden
Quote: As the light begins to intensify, so does my misery, and I wonder how it is possible to hurt so much when nothing is wrong.

Author: Paul Auster,  Moon Palace
Quote: I had jumped off the edge, and then, at the very last moment, something reached out and caught me in midair. That something is what I define as love. It is the one thing that can stop a man from falling, powerful enough to negate the laws of gravity.

Author: Sitting Bull
Quote: Strangely enough, they have a mind to till the soil, and the love of possessions is a disease in them.

Author: Joseph E. Morris
Quote: I love you and it's getting worse.

Author: Marcel Proust,  In Search of Lost Time
Quote: Love is a striking example of how little reality means to us.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: What are you doing?”“Kneeling before a goddess.”“I’m not a goddess.”“You are. A goddess, a princess, a queen. As a soldier, I pledge myself to your service. As a prince, I grant you any boon within my power. As a man, I ask to sit at your feet and worship you. Ask me to do anything for you and I will do it.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: To find out if she really loved me, I hooked her up to a lie detector. And just as I suspected, my machine was broken.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My brain is divided into two butterflies, and both are in love with your rose-shaped heart. If you've got the garden, I've got my whole life.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  Remember Me?
Quote: It's like I'm thirteen again and he's my crush. All I'm aware of in this entire roomful of people is him. Where he is, what he's doing, who he's talking to.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I gave her a broken watch, to symbolize that my love for her is forever and timeless. And as an excuse to why I’m always late.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Everything Is Illuminated
Quote: I imagine a line, a white line, painted on the sand and on the ocean, from me to you.

Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote: my mother, poor fish,wanting to be happy, beaten two or three times aweek, telling me to be happy: "Henry, smile!why don't you ever smile?"and then she would smile, to show me how, and it was thesaddest smile I ever saw

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: My shoulder will never be the same. I expect you to nurse me back to health.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Prince
Quote: Must I go bound while you go freeMust I love a manwho doesn't love meMust I be born with so little artAs to love a man who'll break my Heart

Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote: We are not held back by the love we didn't receive in the past, but by the love we're not extending in the present.

Author: Aaliyah
Quote: You have to love what you do to want to do it everyday.

Author: M. Scott Peck
Quote: Love is the will to extend one's self for the purpose of nurturing one's own or another's spiritual growth... Love is as love does. Love is an act of will -- namely, both an intention and an action. Will also implies choice. We do not have to love. We choose to love.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  The Tenth Circle
Quote: What if love wasn't the act of finding what you were missing but the give-and-take that made you both match?

Author: Coco J. Ginger
Quote: I wore your promise on my finger for one yearI'll wear your name on my heart til I dieBecause you were my boy, you were my only boy forever.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Fiery Heart
Quote: Don’t take the high ground and assume you already know what you’ll do. The truth is, when it comes to someone you love, you’ll find there isn’t anything you won’t do.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven
Quote: Deep in her heart, she wasn't sure she deserved to be happy, nor did she believe that she was worthy of someone who seemed...normal.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Iron Knight
Quote: I have come from the End of the World. From the River of Dreams, through the gauntlet and the Briar and the Deep Wyld, in order to stand before you today. I have but one request—to take my place at your side. To resume my duty as your knight, and to protect you and your kingdom for as long as I draw breath.

Author: James Baldwin
Quote: Love takes off the masks we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.

Author: Christopher Poindexter
Quote: And in the end, we were all just humans.. drunk on the idea that love, only love, could heal our brokenness.

Author: Tahereh Mafi
Quote: Hate looks like everybody else until it smiles

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If it’s the last kiss, we’d better make it last. I hope you don’t have anywhere to be, because I have the rest of my life free.

Author: Julie Anne Peters,  Keeping You a Secret
Quote: Cut the ending. Revise the script. The man of her dreams is a girl.

Author: Henry B. Eyring
Quote: For each of us, life is a journey. Heavenly Father designed it for us out of love. Each of us has unique experiences and characteristics, but our journey began in the same place before we were born into this world.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant
Quote: We are not people who touch each other carelessly; every point of contact between us feels important, a rush of energy and relief.

Author: Amanda Grace,  But I Love Him
Quote: I wanted to be his life preserver, the thing that would keep him afloat. Instead, he became my anchor. And I’m tired of drowning.

Author: Taylor Swift,  Taylor Swift
Quote: We should love, not fall in love, because everything that falls, gets broken.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Unreturned love is like trying to make a sandwich with one slice of bread. Don’t stress—fold it in half and love yourself.

Author: Rumi
Quote: Remember. The way you make love is the way God will be with you.

Author: Megan McCafferty,  Second Helpings
Quote: It's so much easier to convince yourself you're madly in love with someone when you know nothing about him.

Author: Abdul Rahman Munif,  الأشجار واغتيال مرزوق
Quote: كما قلت لك : ( قلب الرجل لا يخلو من امرأة ) , قد تكون امرأة حية أو ميتة, قد تكون زوجة أو صديقة, وقد تكون شيئًا آخر. دائمًا توجد امرأة.أمّا إذا رأيت رجلاً ليس في قلبه امرأة فتأكّد أن ما تراه ليس رجلاً, إنه جثّة تريد قبرًا.

Author: Raymond Carver
Quote: It ought to make us feel ashamed when we talk like we know what we're talking about when we talk about love.

Author: Ellen Hopkins,  Crank
Quote: You were a summer gift, one I'll always treasure. You were a dream I never wanted to wake up from. You opened my eyes to things I'll never really see. You're the best thing that will ever happen to me.

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: I don't want to be somebody's crush. If somebody likes me, I want them to like the real me, not what they think I am.

Author: Hannah Harrington,  Speechless
Quote: Hate is... It's too easy. Love. Love takes courage.

Author: Jessica Sorensen,  The Coincidence of Callie & Kayden
Quote: I can do pain. That’s the easy part of life. It’s everything else, happiness, laughter, love, that’s fucking complicated.

Author: Warren W. Wiersbe
Quote: Truth without love is brutality, and love without truth is hypocrisy.

Author: Rita Mae Brown
Quote: The only queer people are those who don't love anybody.

Author: Jonathan Tropper,  The Book of Joe
Quote: Everyone always wants to know how you can tell when it's true love, and the answer is this: when the pain doesn't fade and the scars don't heal, and it's too damned late.

Author: Katharine McPhee
Quote: I love the spirit of Halloween and the energy that comes with it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: She has a sly smile, and eyes that seem to see my essence as they explore my soul and implore my spirit to enter her. I look at her and I see love.

Author: Renee Ahdieh,  The Wrath and the Dawn
Quote: My soul sees its equal in you.

Author: Jessica Howell
Quote: Sometimes good things fall apart, so better things can fall together.

Author: Gillian Flynn,  Gone Girl
Quote: I don't understand the point of being together if you're not the happiest.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Slammed
Quote: And life  definitely  doesn't want me To just let it  tell  me that the  girl  I met,The  beautiful, amazing, strong, resilient girl That I fell so  hard  forShould only come in  third Life  knows. Life is trying to  tell  neThat the  girl  I  love The girl I fellSo  hard  for?There's room for her in  first. I'm putting  her  first.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse
Quote: A girl can still admire, can’t she? Even those who can’t afford to go in the store can still window-shop. Right? Knowing he wasn’t for me didn’t mean I couldn’t covet the merchandise.

Author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz,  Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe
Quote: How could I have ever been ashamed of loving Dante Quintana?

Author: Lady Gaga
Quote: Well my music was different in high school; I was singing about love—you know, things I don't care about anymore.

Author: David Nicholls,  One Day
Quote: Dexter, I love you so much. So, so much, and I probably always will. I just don't like you anymore. I'm sorry.

Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote: It's interesting. People go to an animal shelter and pick a dog that's been kicked, beaten, and has lost a leg and an eye, and they'll take that dog home and give it love and support, but they don't do that with people.

Author: Henry Miller
Quote: What's a fuck when what I want is love?

Author: Italo Calvino,  If on a Winter's Night a Traveler
Quote: If one wanted to depict the whole thing graphically, every episode, with its climax, would require a three-dimensional, or, rather, no model: every experience is unrepeatable. What makes lovemaking and reading resemble each other most is that within both of them times and spaces open, different from measurable time and space.

Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote: I love you because no two snowflakes are alike, and it is possible, if you stand tippy-toe, to walk between the raindrops.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire
Quote: Not like this. He wanted it to be real.

Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote: Love's gift cannot be given, it waits to be accepted.

Author: Staness Jonekos
Quote: Don't marry a rich man. Marry a good man. He will spend his life trying to keep you happy. No rich man can buy that!

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: Heart, we will forget him,You and I, tonight!You must forget the warmth he gave,I will forget the light.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: Because...because...she came here with me.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: The world is so empty if one thinks only of mountains, rivers & cities; but to know someone who thinks & feels with us, & who, though distant, is close to us in spirit, this makes the earth for us an inhabited garden.

Author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
Quote: I'm sorry. I know you loved her. It was hard not to.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: I don't let nobody see me wishin' he was mine

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Evolution of Mara Dyer
Quote: You can't hurt me the way you think you can. But even if you could? I would rather die with the taste of you on my tongue than live and never touch you again. I'm in love with you, Mara. I love you. No matter what you do.

Author: Margaret Atwood,  Lady Oracle
Quote: How could I be sleeping with this particular man.... Surely only true love could justify my lack of taste.

Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote: Perhaps people like us cannot love. Ordinary people can - that is their secret.

Author: Edna St. Vincent Millay
Quote: After all my erstwhile dear, my no longer cherished; Need we say it was not love, just because it perished?

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
Quote: A kiss on the beach when there is a full moon is the closest thing to heaven.

Author: Tim Burton
Quote: We all know interspecies romance is weird.

Author: George Foreman
Quote: Forgiveness is that subtle thread that binds both love and friendship. Without forgiveness, you may not even have a child one day.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Life, it’s made up of two things—time and love. A watch tells one, but what tells the other? We tell each other.

Author: Nina LaCour,  Hold Still
Quote: There used to be days that I thought I was okay, or at least that I was going to be. We'd be hanging out somewhere and everything would just fit right and I would think 'it will be okay if it can just be like this forever' but of course nothing can ever stay just how it is forever.

Author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables
Quote: I have been loving you a little more every minute since this morning.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The House of Hades
Quote: Huh,"Leo said. "Well, if you ever get off this island and want a job, let me know. You're not a total klutz."She smirked. "A job, eh?"Making things in your forge?""Nah, we could start our own shop,"Leo said, surprising himself. Starting a machine shop had always been one of his dreams, but he'd never told anyone about it. "Leo and Calypso's Garage: Auto Repair and Mechanical Monsters.

Author: Pablo Neruda,  100 Love Sonnets
Quote: I crave your mouth, your voice, your hair.Silent and starving, I prowl through the streets. Bread does not nourish me, dawn disrupts me, all day I hunt for the liquid measure of your steps.

Author: Jandy Nelson,  I'll Give You the Sun
Quote: When people fall in love, they burst into flames.

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: When it comes to men, deal with them as they are, not how you’d like them to be.

Author: Scott Turow
Quote: Nobody ever gets what they want when it comes to love.

Author: Sarah J. Maas,  A Court of Thorns and Roses
Quote: I love you,’ he whispered, and kissed my brow. ‘Thorns and all.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Heavenly Fire
Quote: Herondales."Zachariah's voice was a breath, half laughter, half pain. "I had almost forgotten. No other family does so much for love, or feels so much guilt for it. Don't carry the weight of the world on you, Jace. It's too heavy for even a Herondale to bear.

Author: Dee Henderson,  The Healer
Quote: I love you, in my mind where my thoughts reside, in my heart where my emotions live, and in my soul where my dreams are born. I love you.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: One of the best times for figuring out who you are & what you really want out of life? Right after a break-up.

Author: Ernesto Che Guevara
Quote: Every day People straighten up the hair, why not the heart?

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: It's hard to love a woman and do anything.

Author: أحلام مستغانمي,  الأسود يليق بك
Quote: الحب هو ذكاء المسافة، ألّا تقترب كثيرًا فتلغي اللهفة، ولا تبتعد طويلًا فتُنسى.

Author: Junior Seau
Quote: I had parents who instilled in me the importance of love, morals and hard work. I give God all the glory because he has brought me through so much.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  Of Human Bondage
Quote: Oh, it's always the same,' she sighed, 'if you want men to behave well to you, you must be beastly to them; if you treat them decently they make you suffer for it.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: Love is not patronizing and charity isn't about pity, it is about love. Charity and love are the same -- with charity you give love, so don't just give money but reach out your hand instead.

Author: Greg Behrendt
Quote: We're taught that in life, we should try to look on the bright side. Not in this case. In this case, assume rejection first. Assume you're the rule, not the exception. It's liberating. But we also know it's not an easy concept. -He's not just into you

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: Making love to me is amazing. Wait, I meant: making love, to me, is amazing. The absence of two little commas nearly transformed me into a sex god.

Author: Leona Lewis
Quote: Thought I couldn't live without youIt's gonna hurt when it heals tooEven though I really love youI'm gonna smile cause I deserve toQuickly I'm learning to love againAll I know is I'mma be ok

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Dance. Smile. Giggle. Marvel. TRUST. HOPE. LOVE. WISH. BELIEVE. Most of all, enjoy every moment of the journey, and appreciate where you are at this moment instead of always focusing on how far you have to go.

Author: Aberjhani,  Elemental: The Power of Illuminated Love
Quote: The words ‘I Love You’ kill, and resurrect millions, in less than a second.

Author: James Patterson,  Sundays at Tiffany's
Quote: This time I wouldn't forget him, because I couldn't ever forgive him - for breaking my heart twice.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love went from fly to flower to butterfly, and it was meant to beautifully flutter, not sit still on a shelf like a trophy to be collected.

Author: Charlotte Featherstone,  Addicted
Quote: It hurts to breathe. It hurts to live. I hate her, yet I do not think I can exist without her.

Author: Beth Moore
Quote: I didn't have a fireworks moment for my salvation. I had a falling in love with Jesus in Sunday school when I was a very young child.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Graveyard Book
Quote: Kiss a lover, Dance a measure, Find your name And buried treasure. Face your life, It's pain, It's pleasure, Leave no path untaken.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  Le Petit Prince
Quote: Voici mon secret. Il est très simple: on ne voit bien qu'avec le cœur. L'essentiel est invisible pour les yeux.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Love is like breakfast with Mildred. Who’s Mildred? How the heck should I know? I don’t eat breakfast.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Diary
Quote: Just for the record, she still loves you. She wouldn't bother to torture you if she didn't.

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  Halfway to the Grave
Quote: Aside from the obvious, Francesca, what do you want in return for supplying information?” Bones asked, getting back to the subject. “You to take me,” she replied at once. “Not gonna happen!” I spat, squeezing him possessively. Three sets of widened eyes fixed on me. That’s when I realized that what I had a firm grip on was no longer his hand.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: ...the opposite of love is not hate -- it's apathy. It's not giving a damn. If somebody hates me, they must "feel"something ... or they couldn't possibly hate. Therefore, there's some way in which I can get to them.

Author: David Levithan,  The Lover's Dictionary
Quote: The key to a successful relationship isn’t just in the words, it’s in the choice of punctuation. When you’re in love with someone, a well-placed question mark can be the difference between bliss and disaster, and a deeply respected period or a cleverly inserted ellipsis can prevent all kinds of exclamations.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: But I miss screamin' and fightin' and kissin' in the rain and it's 2 a.m. and I'm cursin' your name. You're so in love the you act insane, and that's the way I loved you.
