Author: Janet Fitch,  White Oleander
Quote: Isn't it funny.I'm enjoying my hatred so much more than i ever enjoyed love. Love is temperamental. Tiring. It makes demands. Love uses you, changes its mind. But hatred, now, that's something you can use. Sculpt. Wield. It's hard, or soft, however you need it. Love humiliates you, but Hatred cradles you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: We made eyes at each other, and then we made love. We also made other things too, like meatloaf.

Author: George Eliot,  Adam Bede
Quote: What greater thing is there for two human souls, than to feel that they are joined for life--to strengthen each other in all labor, to rest on each other in all sorrow, to minister to each other in all pain, to be one with each other in silent unspeakable memories at the moment of the last parting?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: When we make love, I orgasm much sooner than her. That’s because I know a shortcut on my bicycle.

Author: John Mayer,  John Mayer - Battle Studies
Quote: I love you more than songs can say, but I can't keep running after yesterday...

Author: Joshua Harris,  I Kissed Dating Goodbye: A New Attitude Toward Relationships and Romance
Quote: The right thing at the wrong tme is the wrong thing.

Author: J.R. Ward,  Lover Mine
Quote: The truth was...he was in love with her. Totally over-the-line, no-going-back, not-even-dead-would-he-part kind of shit.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  Mrs. Dalloway
Quote: What does the brain matter compared with the heart?

Author: Kirsten Miller,  The Eternal Ones
Quote: All the most powerful emotions come from chaos -fear,anger,love- especially love. Love is chaos itself. Think about it! Love makes no sense. It shakes you up and spins you around. And then, eventually , it falls apart.

Author: Ruby Dee
Quote: When you know my love, my love will warm you.

Author: Gayle Forman,  If I Stay
Quote: But the you who you are tonight is the same you I was in love with yesterday, the same you I’ll be in love with tomorrow.

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: I believe in love the verb, not the noun.

Author: Roger A. Caras
Quote: Dogs have given us their absolute all. We are the center of their universe. We are the focus of their love and faith and trust. They serve us in return for scraps. It is without a doubt the best deal man has ever made.

Author: Daniel Handler,  Why We Broke Up
Quote: The thing with your heart's desire is that your heart doesn't even know what it desires until it turns up.

Author: Georgina Chapman
Quote: What I love about my husband is that he really allows me to be the best person I can.

Author: Gustave Flaubert,  Sentimental Education
Quote: It’s hard to communicate anything exactly and that’s why perfect relationships between people are difficult to find.

Author: Cormac McCarthy,  The Road
Quote: You have my whole heart. You always did.

Author: Sarah J. Maas,  Throne of Glass
Quote: I'm not married,"he said softly, "because I can't stomach the idea of marrying a woman inferior to me in mind and spirit. It would mean the death of my soul.

Author: Lang Leav,  Love & Misadventure
Quote: Before I fellin love with words,with setting skies and singing birds—it was you I fellin love with first.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Slammed
Quote: This thing about you that you think is your flaw - it's the reason I'm falling in love with you.

Author: Laini Taylor,  Days of Blood & Starlight
Quote: It was brave,"countered Issa. "It was rare. It was love, and it was beautiful.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: It’s me and you, or me and knitting. Don’t make me choose. Ugh, #love.

Author: Veronica Rossi,  Through the Ever Night
Quote: Love is a rebellious bird that nobody can tame.

Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson,  Maud, and other poems
Quote: Half the night I waste in sighs,Half in dreams I sorrow afterThe delight of early skies;In a wakeful dose I sorrowFor the hand, the lips, the eyes,For the meeting of the morrow,The delight of happy laughter,The delight of low replies.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: New streets should be Twitter friendly and be named with hashtags up front. I’d build a house on ‪#‎LoversLane‬.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: Their fingers seemed to fit together in just the right way- effortlessly clasped,like perfect complements.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: Had I been in love, I could not have been more wretchedly blind. But vanity, not love, has been my folly.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Of Love and Other Demons
Quote: Do not allow me to forget you

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Zebra is the Piano of the Animal Kingdom
Quote: Empty packets of hot sauce remind me of the love I used to have for her. Now all I’m left with is this yummy taco.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Merits of Marthaism, and How Being Named Susan Can Benefit You
Quote: I love sleepwalking, because when else would I get to combine exercise and rest?

Author: Blake Shelton
Quote: I love to deer hunt and fish and drive down the back roads in my truck. All those things basically equal freedom to me - and not having to return that message or call from my record company or management. At some point, I need to recharge.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: Frustration and Love can’t exist in the same place at the same time, so get real and start doing what you would rather be doing in life. Love your life. All of it. Even the heavy shit that happened to you when you were 8. All of it was and IS perfect.

Author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration
Quote: Love is made up of three unconditional properties in equal measure:1. Acceptance2. Understanding3. AppreciationRemove any one of the three and the triangle falls apart.Which, by the way, is something highly inadvisable. Think about it — do you really want to live in a world of only two dimensions?So, for the love of a triangle, please keep love whole.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  My love can only occupy one person at a time
Quote: When red fights with white, pink is always the winner. Let that be a lesson in love.

Author: Leigh Bardugo,  Shadow and Bone
Quote: The moment our lips met, I knew with pure and piercing certainty that I would have waited for him forever.

Author: Leonard Cohen,  Stranger Music: Selected Poems and Songs
Quote: And I'll dance with you in Vienna,I'll be wearing a river's disguise.The hyacinth wild on my shouldermy mouth on the dew of your thighs.And I'll bury my soul in a scrapbook,with the photographs there and the moss.And I'll yield to the flood of your beauty,my cheap violin and my cross.

Author: Matthew Quick,  The Silver Linings Playbook
Quote: Let me tell ya. You gotta pay attention to signs. When life reaches out with a moment like this it's a sin if you don't reach back... I'm telling you.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Fiery Heart
Quote: The center will hold.” “How do you know?” “Because we are the center.

Author: Dora J. Arod,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: My love is pizza shaped. Won’t you have a slice? It’s circular, so there’s enough to go around.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: My love is expansive. Your love is expensive.

Author: John Lennon
Quote: Everything is clearer when you're in love.

Author: Alicia Keys
Quote: Love me like you'll never see me again.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Handle with Care
Quote: All any of us wanted, really, was to know that we counted. That someone else's life would not have been as rich without us here.

Author: Brennan Manning,  Abba's Child: The Cry of the Heart for Intimate Belonging
Quote: Define yourself radically as one beloved by God. This is the true self. Every other identity is illusion.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: All the problem of women, starts with men. All the problem of men, ends with women.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Brida
Quote: When you were in love, you were capable of learning everything and of knowing things you had never dared even to think, because love was the key to understanding all of the mysteries.

Author: Brad Pitt
Quote: I'm satisfied with making true choices and finding the woman I love, Angie, and building a family that I love so much.

Author: Maureen Medved,  The Tracey Fragments
Quote: One day you fall for this boy. And he touches you with his fingers. And he burns holes in your skin with his mouth. And it hurts when you look at him. And it hurts when you don’t. And it feels like someone’s cut you open with a jagged piece of glass.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Silence
Quote: I had fun last night,"I told Patch, flicking off my chin strap and handing over my helmet. "I'm officially on love with your sheets.""That the only thing you're in love with?""Nope. Your mattress, too."Some smile crept into Patch's eyes. "My bed's an open invitation.

Author: Tammara Webber,  Easy
Quote: The truth was, he now belonged only to my past, and it was time I begin to accept it, as much as it hurt to do so.

Author: Dante Alighieri,  The Divine Comedy
Quote: L'amor che move il sole e l'altre stelle.

Author: Gerard Way
Quote: Well my gun fires seven different shades of shit, so what's your favorite color, punk?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m hard to love, but I love hard, like my heart is the sun yearning to tan your naked body. I promise I won’t burn you.

Author: L.M. Montgomery
Quote: And if you couldn't be loved, the next best thing was to be let alone.

Author: Mario Benedetti
Quote: Five minutes are enough to dream a whole life, that is how relative time is.

Author: Cynthia Hand,  Unearthly
Quote: Tucker: Why would you tell me now if it's against the rules?Clara: Because I love you.

Author: Ann Brashares,  Forever in Blue: The Fourth Summer of the Sisterhood
Quote: some people fall in love over and over again while some people can only do it once.

Author: Rosamund Hodge,  Cruel Beauty
Quote: Where you go, I shall go; where you die, I shall die, and there will I be buried.

Author: E. Lockhart,  We Were Liars
Quote: Someone once wrote that a novel should deliver a series of small astonishments. I get the same thing spending an hour with you.

Author: Nicole Yatsonsky
Quote: Your truest friends are the ones who will stand by you in your darkest moments--because they're willing to brave the shadows with you--and in your greatest moments--because they're not afraid to let you shine.

Author: E.E. Cummings
Quote: twice I have lived forever in a smile

Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote: A woman should soften but not weaken a man.

Author: Sarah J. Maas,  A Court of Thorns and Roses
Quote: I threw myself into that fire, threw myself into it, into him, and let myself burn.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace
Quote: You can love a person dear to you with a human love, but an enemy can only be loved with divine love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: The race is long, and I am sprinting. If I ever see her again, I’ll probably be too out of breath to tell her I love her.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I both made the knife-fighting team, and I got cut. If only love were so easy to understand.

Author: Madeline Miller,  The Song of Achilles
Quote: When he died, all things soft and beautiful and bright would be buried with him.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: That I survived the Holocaust and went on to love beautiful girls, to talk, to write, to have toast and tea and live my life - that is what is abnormal.

Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote: People should be allowed to marry, and gay marriage should be out there. If a man or a woman has a good partner and they love each other with their heart and soul, let them marry. I am very much for gay marriage.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I have learned, that the person I have to ask for forgiveness from the most is: myself. You must love yourself. You have to forgive yourself, everyday, whenever you remember a shortcoming, a flaw, you have to tell yourself "That's just fine". You have to forgive yourself so much, until you don't even see those things anymore. Because that's what love is like.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: Maybe you could be mine / or maybe we’ll be entwined / aimless in this sexless foreplay.

Author: Jane Austen
Quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: New International Version
Quote: I love the Lord, for he heard my voice; he heard my cry for mercy. Because he turned his ear to me, I will call on him as long as I live. (Psalms 116:1-2 NIV)

Author: Jocelyn Soriano,  Mend My Broken Heart
Quote: Yes, I understand why things had to happen this way. I understand his reason for causing me pain. But mere understanding does not chase away the hurt. It does not call upon the sun when dark clouds have loomed over me. Let the rain come then if it must come! And let it wash away the dust that hurt my eyes!

Author: Kazuo Ishiguro,  Never Let Me Go
Quote: You say you’re sure? Sure that you’re in love? How can you know it? You think love is so simple?

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  The Brothers Karamazov
Quote: Love in action is a harsh and dreadful thing compared to love in dreams.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: She called it a slap, but I called it a high-five to my face. Love is so encouraging!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Her love was like cigarette smoke stirred into coffee. I drank it so fast it made me cough, but she’s not offering a refill at any price.

Author: Joseph Roux
Quote: What is love? two souls and one flesh; friendship? two bodies and one soul.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Attachments
Quote: I didn't know love could leave the lights on all the time.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Quote: You are protected, in short, by your ability to love!

Author: Erin Morgenstern,  The Night Circus
Quote: Do you remember all of your audiences?"Marco asks. "Not all of them,"Celia says. "But I remember the people who look at me the way you do.""What way might that be?""As though they cannot decide if they are afraid of me or they want to kiss me.""I am not afraid of you,"Marco says.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: Can't you just like a girl who likes you back?''None of them likes me back. I may as well like the one I really want.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels
Quote: Love is the most powerful force in the world. That love can do anything.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love now, not later. Also, love later.

Author: Ariana Grande
Quote: Love is a really scary thing, and you never know what's going to happen. It's one of the most beautiful things in life, but it's one of the most terrifying. It's worth the fear because you have more knowledge, experience, you learn from people, and you have memories.

Author: Nalini Singh,  Kiss of Snow
Quote: You’re in my every breath and every thought, intertwined so deep inside me that love’s not a strong enough word—you have my devotion, your name branded on my soul, my wolf yours to command. A hundred years? It’ll never be enough. I want eternity.

Author: Deb Caletti,  The Secret Life of Prince Charming
Quote: This is what I know. Don't settle for 40, 50, or even 80 percent. A relationship-it shouldn't be too small or too tight or even a little scratchy. It shouldn't take up space in your closet out of guilty conscience or convenience or a moment of desire. Do you hear me? It shold be perfect for you. It should be lasting. Wait. wait for 100 percent.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Hearts Live By Being Wounded

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My hands will get dirty holding your rose-shaped heart, because love is like gardening—it’s earthy and takes work to keep it alive.

Author: أحمد خالد توفيق
Quote: لماذا يموت الحب يا ملاكي الصغير ؟‎ ‎‏ ‏لماذا تخبو تلك الجمرة المقدسة لتصير رمادًا برغم لهيبها الذي أحرقنا يوماً ؟يبدأ فقدان الحب بأن نكف عن العطاء بعدها نكف عن الأخذ...

Author: Andrew Davidson
Quote: If you listen to the wind very carefully, you'll be able to hear me whisper my love for you.

Author: Ernest Hemingway,  A Farewell to Arms
Quote: Why, darling, I don't live at all when I'm not with you.

Author: Alysha Speer
Quote: Love is hard to find, hard to keep, and hard to forget.

Author: Louis C.K.
Quote: Shut up…let me tell you, LET ME. Every time I look at your face or even remember it, it wrecks me. And the way you are with me and you’re just fun and you shit all over me and you make fun of me and you’re real. I don’t have enough time in any day to think about you enough...I don’t even think about women anymore. I think about you.

Author: Criss Jami,  Salomé: In Every Inch In Every Mile
Quote: If love is blind, then maybe a blind person that loves has a greater understanding of it.

Author: G.K. Chesterton,  Orthodoxy
Quote: Love is not blind; that is the last thing that it is. Love is bound; and the more it is bound the less it is blind.

Author: Nick Hornby
Quote: Sometimes you know you've got a chance with a girl because she wants to fight with you. If the world wasn't so messed up, it wouldn't be like that. If the world was normal, a girl being nice to you would be a good sign, but in the real world, it isn't.

Author: Nina LaCour,  Hold Still
Quote: You might be looking for reasons but there are no reasons.

Author: Jodi Lynn Anderson,  Tiger Lily
Quote: She did not believe he could have really gone, because for her, to leave the person you loved was impossible.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Quote: Physical love is unthinkable without violence.

Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote: In love, one and one are one.

Author: Radhanath Swami
Quote: The essence of Hinduism is the same essence of all true religions: Bhakti or pure love for God and genuine compassion for all beings.

Author: Marissa Meyer,  Scarlet
Quote: We met less than a week ago and in that time I've done nothing but lie and cheat and betray you. I know. But if you give me a chance...all I want is to protect you. To be near you. For as long as I'm able.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: Westley: This is true love — you think this happens every day?

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez
Quote: Don't let yourself die without knowing the wonder of fucking with love.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: Because I’ve got a lot more terms of endearment to use. Honey pie. Sugarplum. Bread pudding."“Why are they all high-calorie foods?

Author: Nicole Krauss
Quote: If I had a camera,' I said, 'I'd take a picture of you every day. That way I'd remember how you looked every single day of your life.

Author: Jenny Downham,  Before I Die
Quote: I love you. It hurts more than anything ever has, but I do. So don't you dare tell me I don't. Don't you ever say it again!

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: Nelly, I am Heathcliff - he's always, always in my mind - not as a pleasure, any more then I am always a pleasure to myself - but, as my own being.

Author: Jenny Downham,  Before I Die
Quote: I love you. I love you. I send this message through my fingers and into his, up his arm and into his heart. Hear me. I love you. And I'm sorry to leave you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  My love can only occupy one person at a time
Quote: I’m a book lover. I’ve probably already fucked a whole library.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: There comes a time in your life when you have to choose to turn the page, write another book or simply close it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drank her essence, and it’s like she never existed and now I’m thirsty again. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Rumi
Quote: I am your moon and your moonlight tooI am your flower garden and your water tooI have come all this way, eager for youWithout shoes or shawlI want you to laughTo kill all your worriesTo love youTo nourish you.

Author: Tiffany Reisz,  The Siren
Quote: There are only two reasons why you leave someone you're still in love with - either it's the right thing to do, or it's the only thing to do.

Author: Laini Taylor,  Days of Blood & Starlight
Quote: So,"he called to her back, "Just out of curiosity, you know, purely conversation and all, at what age will you be entertaining offers of marriage?""You think it'll be so easy?"she called back over her shoulder. "No way. There will be tasks. Like in a fairy tale.""Sounds dangerous.""Very, so think twice.""No need,"he said. "You're worth it.

Author: Francois Sagon
Quote: I have loved to the point of madness; that which is called madness, that which to me, is the only sensible way to love.

Author: Ellen Hopkins
Quote: Happiness, you see, its just an illusion of Fate, a heavenly sleight of hand designed to make you believe in fairy tales. But there's no happily ever after. You'll only find happy endings in books. Some books.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse
Quote: He then put both hands on the door on either side of my head and leaned in close, pinning me against it. I trembled like a downy rabbit caught in the clutches of a wolf. The wolf came closer. He bent his head and began nuzzling my cheek. The problem was…I wanted the wolf to devour me.

Author: Rebecca Mader
Quote: If I have the power to post 'Happy Birthday' on someone's Facebook page and make them feel really good, it feels really good to make other people feel really good. I love it. I'm a huge Facebook and Twitter person. And I love talking to my fans. It's fun.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love isn’t in a hurry like a flurry of flowery words on paper. It’s lush and slow to grow its aroma in the garden of time.

Author: Roger de Bussy-Rabutin
Quote: Absence is to love what wind is to fire; it extinguishes the small, it inflames the great.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t want my love with her to wither like grapes on a vine, so I’ll water it with romance to turn it into wine.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Me: On time. Love: Late. Death: Early. Seriously, why are you late?

Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote: I like being the girl nobody can have.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: Ever since time began, people have recognized their true Love by the light in their eyes.

Author: Ruskin Bond,  Scenes from a Writer's Life
Quote: and when all the wars are over, a butterfly will still be beautiful.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Your love story, I don’t want to give away the ending, but both you and your lover die.

Author: Ann Brashares,  My Name Is Memory
Quote: Love demands everything, they say, but my love demands only this: that no matter what happens or how long it takes, you`ll keep faith in me, you`ll remember who we are, and you`ll never feel despair.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Linger
Quote: I just looked at her, feeling utterly empty. I didn’t know what I was supposed to say to her. My life is in that bed. Please let me stay.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I had a dream about you 2
Quote: I had a dream about you. No words were exchanged, but we spoke with our eyes. My eyes said, “I love you,” while your eyes told me, “I’m asleep.” You always were more romantic than me.

Author: Timothy Keller,  The Meaning of Marriage: Facing the Complexities of Commitment with the Wisdom of God
Quote: To be loved but not known is comforting but superficial. To be known and not loved is our greatest fear. But to be fully known and truly loved is, well, a lot like being loved by God. It is what we need more than anything. It liberates us from pretense, humbles us out of our self-righteousness, and fortifies us for any difficulty life can throw at us.

Author: Dalai Lama XIV
Quote: The more you are motivated by Love, The more Fearless & Free your action will be.

Author: Tonya Hurley,  Ghostgirl
Quote: Being in love with someone who doesn't even know you exist isn't the worst thing in the world. In fact, it's quite the oppostie. Almost like passing in a term paper that you know sucked, but having that period of time where you haven't gotten your grade back yet -- that kind of exhale where you haven't been rejected, although you pretty much know how it's going to turn out.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: He was too perfect, despite being one of the most imperfect people I knew.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love the sound of the trees in the breeze. If the forest is so clearly musical, why can’t it play the guitar while I sing Nirvana covers?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll wear a maze on a necklace, dangling over my chest, because if you want to get at my heart, you have to be ready to lose yourself.

Author: Rumi,  The Essential Rumi
Quote: God turns you from one feeling to another and teaches by means of opposites so that you will have two wings to fly, not one

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I used to think how lucky she was to have me, but now I realize that’s backwards. A spirit of gratitude yields patience, love, and forgiveness.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My shadow follows me during the day, and then surrounds me at night as it clones itself into complete darkness. Now that’s self-love.

Author: Anna Godbersen,  The Luxe
Quote: The first stab of love is like a sunset, a blaze of color -- oranges, pearly pinks, vibrant purples...

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace
Quote: The whole world is divided for me into two parts: one is she, and there is all happiness, hope, light; the other is where she is not, and there is dejection and darkness...

Author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby
Quote: Are those the only options? Nothing or forever?

Author: Saint Ignatius
Quote: I have no doubt concerning that Supreme Goodness, who is so eager to share His blessings, or of that everlasting love which makes Him more eager to bestow perfection on us than we are to receive it.

Author: Gillian Flynn,  Gone Girl
Quote: Because isn’t that the point of every relationship: to be known by someone else, to be understood? He gets me. She gets me. Isn’t that the simple magic phrase?

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: If you're not comfortable enough with yourself or with your own truth when entering a relationship, then you're not ready for that relationship.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: String several words together in a sentence and you have a language necklace. My I love you would look great with your favorite red dress.

Author: William Faulkner,  The Town
Quote: She was bored. She loved, had capacity to love, for love, to give and accept love. Only she tried twice and failed twice to find somebody not just strong enough to deserve it, earn it, match it, but even brave enough to accept it.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  A Walk to Remember
Quote: What's your heart telling you to do?I don't know.'Maybe, you're trying too hard to hear it.

Author: Robert Frost,  Birches
Quote: I'd like to get away from earth awhileAnd then come back to it and begin over.May no fate wilfully misunderstand meAnd half grant what I wish and snatch me awayNot to return. Earth's the right place for love:I don't know where it's likely to go better.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Dreaming is for lovers
Quote: I had a dream about you. I said green was blue and yellow, and you said green was yellow and blue. You were like that with everything I said, taking the exact opposite stance, yet completely agreeing with me. That’s how I knew you loved me.

Author: Kelly White
Quote: You have to, take a deep breath. and allow the music to flow through you. Revel in it, allow yourself to awe. When you play allow the music to break your heart with its beauty.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Love in the Time of Cholera
Quote: He is ugly and sad... but he is all love.

Author: Pandora Poikilos,  Excuse Me, My Brains Have Stepped Out
Quote: Learn to deal with the fact that you are not a perfect person but you are a person that deserves respect and honesty.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: No, this trick won't work... How on earth are you ever going to explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love?

Author: Veronica Roth,  Insurgent
Quote: I'll be your family now,"he says. "I love you,"I say. (....)He stares at me. I wait with my hands clutching his arms for stability as he considers his response. He frowns at me. "Say it again.""Tobias,"I say, "I love you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Most scars are invisible. Damn transparent knives. Does anything cut deeper than love? I need to get some new body armor.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: And I'm dying to know, is it killing you like it's killing me? And the story of us looks a lot like a tragedy now.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem
Quote: Who knows? Maybe they’re right. Maybe we are driven crazy by our feelings. Maybe love is a disease, and we would be better off without it. But we have chosen a different road. And in the end that is the point of escaping the cure: We are free to choose.We are even free to choose the wrong thing.

Author: Anna Nalick
Quote: But, my God, it's so beautiful when the boy smiles

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When she’s cuddled close, I feel there’s nothing I can’t do, and I can’t do nothing about it, because my heart is her heart for as long as she wants it.

Author: Christina Rossetti,  Goblin Market and Other Poems
Quote: For there is no friend like a sisterIn calm or stormy weather; To cheer one on the tedious way, To fetch one if one goes astray,To lift one if one totters down, To strengthen whilst one stands

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Hide things everywhere. Forget about them. Find them randomly and feel surprised like a pirate finding buried treasure. Avoid scurvy. Love more.

Author: Bill Hicks
Quote: The whole image is that eternal suffering awaits anyone who questions God's infinite love. That's the message we're brought up with, isn't it? Believe or die! Thank you, forgiving Lord, for all those options.

Author: Cornel West
Quote: Never forget that justice is what love looks like in public.

Author: Cecily von Ziegesar,  I Like It Like That
Quote: Not that she didn't love almost every boy she'd ever met, and not that every boy in the world didn't totally love her. It was impossible not to. But she wanted someone to love her and shower her with attention the way only a boy who was completely in love with her could. The rare sort of love. True love. The kind of love she'd never had.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A tree with red leaves is like an old man with gray hair. Likewise, my love for you was blue, but now it’s orange, and that’s a compliment.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drank so much booze I was bamboozled. Alcohol makes my mind as discombobulated as love makes my heart. I’d sure appreciate it if you poured me a large glass of romance.

Author: Tracy Morgan
Quote: What you have to understand is that my thing is not glamour. I love stretch marks and C-section scars and all of that. I'm a grown man. You don't gotta put on no makeup with me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: The sunset faded and blended from pink to peach to mango in a smoothie in the sky. For as long as she doesn’t love me, I will love her.

Author: Heather Dixon,  Entwined
Quote: He's around the twist,' said Azalea. 'Breaking all the windows? He's mad.''Ah, no,' said the King. 'It's only madness if you actually do it. If you want to break all the windows in the house and drown yourself in a bucket but don't actually do it, well, that's love.

Author: Joshua Harris
Quote: ‎True love isn't expressed in passionately whispered words an intimate kiss or a embrace; before two people are married, love is expressed in self-control, patience, even words left unsaid.

Author: James Frey,  A Million Little Pieces
Quote: There is emotion in the hug, and there is respect and a form of love. Emotion that comes from honesty, respect that comes from challenge, and the form of love that exists between people whose minds have touched, whose hearts have touched, whose souls have touched. Our minds touched. Our hearts touched. Our souls touched.We separate.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: I make love with a focus and intensity that most people reserve for sleep.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Maybe Someday
Quote: I...will never...regret you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My I love you was a measured response, like one gallon of coffee in one cup of sugar. It was just overflowing with an awakening of my soul.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: We fell in love like two medium pizzas in one large stomach. I wish dad would have saved a few slices for us.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Nobody peels a banana before stabbing themselves with it. But that’s exactly how I love—dangerously.

Author: Mark Twain,  Notebook
Quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The curve of her smile, the curve of the small of her back, the curve of her laugh, everything about her makes me want to be more well-rounded.

Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote: Someday, after mastering the winds, the waves, the tides and gravity, we shall harness for God the energies of love, and then, for a second time in the history of the world, man will have discovered fire.

Author: Graham Greene,  The End of the Affair
Quote: I had to touch you with my hands, I had to taste you with my tongue; one can't love and do nothing.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Silence
Quote: I would lay down everything I possess, even my soul, for you. If that isn't love, it's the best I have.

Author: Mark Helprin,  A Soldier of the Great War
Quote: If it weren't for music, I would think that love is mortal.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: As a fiction writer, let me make it up, and let me make it up to you. I’ll pen our love story, if you’ll be my co-author.

Author: Melissa Jensen,  The Fine Art of Truth or Dare
Quote: sometimes no matter how many eyelashes or dandelion seeds you blow, no matter how much of your heart you tear out and slap on your sleeve, it just ain't gonna happen.

Author: Mandy Hale
Quote: Two things you will never have to chase: True friends & true love.

Author: Rachel Ward,  Numbers
Quote: You get use to someone—start to like them, even—and they leave. In the end, everyone leaves.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love one person at a time, that’s the motto I’ll try to get my clones to live by.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: Love those you hate you.

Author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
Quote: A weed is but an unloved flower.

Author: Elizabeth Berg,  The Year of Pleasures
Quote: There is love in holding and there is love in letting go.

Author: E. Lockhart,  The Boyfriend List: 15 Guys, 11 Shrink Appointments, 4 Ceramic Frogs and Me, Ruby Oliver
Quote: It shattered something inside me that hadn't been broken before.

Author: Fiona Apple
Quote: Life is all about the friendship and the love and the music. It sounds silly, but it is. I want to have that experience as much as I can as an adult, not as a kid doing something that people are telling her she has to do. If anyone gets in my way, I'm going to get them out of my way.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I don't understand dating.. and the other things that people do.. all I know is that you ought to find the one you recognize. The one who gives you four arms, four legs, four eyes, and has the other half of your heart. There's only one of those, so what are all the other things for? Like dating?

Author: Doug Fetherling
Quote: Your absence has not taught me to be alone, it merely has shown that when together we cast a single shadow on the wall.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A stick won’t stick to a wall, so why is it called a stick? Likewise, why aren’t love and ghost the same word? Both are dead and invisible.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I wish I could grow swords like I can roses. Wouldn’t war be so romantic then? Then the U.S. could really show the world how much it loves it.

Author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Half-Blood
Quote: People do the damndest things when they’re in love.

Author: Ayn Rand,  The Fountainhead
Quote: I love you so much that nothing can matter to me - not even you...Only my love- not your answer. Not even your indifference

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A flowing flurry of flowers fell to the floor when I fell in love, as if my heart were a garden that gushed forth and flooded her being with the fragrance of romance.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said, “I’m having the stairs rebuilt,” and I replied, “No need to get sexual with me.” I’m a bring my own elevator kind of lover anyway.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Instead of reciting her an original love poem using words, I think I’ll use my tongue to more creatively explore the deepest parts of her.

Author: Jon Krakauer,  Into the Wild
Quote: What if I were smiling and running into your arms? Would you see then what I see now?

Author: Charlotte Eriksson,  Empty Roads & Broken Bottles; in search for The Great Perhaps
Quote: Let me wake up next to you, have coffee in the morning and wander through the city with your hand in mine, and I'll be happy for the rest of my fucked up little life.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Attachments
Quote: I want someone whose heart is big enough to hold me.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Quote: Perhaps all the questions we ask of love, to measure, test, probe, and save it, have the additional effect of cutting it short. Perhaps the reason we are unable to love is that we yearn to be loved, that is, we demand something (love) from our partner instead of delivering ourselves up to him demand-free and asking for nothing but his company.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  New Moon
Quote: Sometimes you have to learn to love what's good for you.

Author: Jerry Spinelli,  Stargirl
Quote: She was bendable light: she shone around every corner of my day.

Author: Tabitha Suzuma,  Forbidden
Quote: I might appear confident and chatty, but I spend most of my time laughing at jokes I don't find funny, saying things I don't really mean - because at the end of the day that's what we're all trying to do: fit in, one way or another, desperately trying to pretend we're all the same.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: In a bookstore you can find me in the romance section, because I’m not a lover, I’m a reader.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: As the ice melted, we fell in love—slowly. I just wish the ice were in two glasses of vodka, and not surrounding our bodies.

Author: Turcois Ominek
Quote: I'm guilty of giving people more chances than they deserve but when I'm done, I'm done.

Author: George Muller
Quote: I desire many things concerning myself; but I desire nothing so much, as to have a heart filled with love to the Lord. I long for a warm personal attachment to Him.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She looked so sexy with her sixteen cats that I just had to swipe right, but when she messaged me first quoting Monty Python, I knew it was Tinder love. Maybe on the first date we’ll knit the blanket we’ll make love under.

Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote: Don't be reckless with other people's hearts. Don't put up with people who are reckless with yours.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I said I made a special trip to get her favorite item, because it sounded more romantic than admitting I randomly had it already. Now that’s love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love letting her know how much she means to me. A love in secret is but a shadow that’s cold and lonely.

Author: Demi Lovato
Quote: Who saidI can't wear my ConverseWith my dress, well babyThat's just me!

Author: Susan Kay,  Phantom
Quote: None of us can choose where we shall love...

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I didn’t tackle him. I gave him a flying hug. Sometimes love is up in the air until it hits you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: He said he came in second place, so I assumed there were only two competitors. But you never know with love, there may have been a third party involved.

Author: George R.R. Martin,  A Storm of Swords
Quote: I crossed a thousand leagues to come to you, and lost the best part of me along the way. Don't tell me to leave.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Insurgent
Quote: I regret..."Tobias tilts his head, and sighs. "I regret my choice.""What Choice?""Dauntless,"he says. "I was born Abnegation. I was planning on leaving Dauntless, and becoming factionless. But I met her, and... I felt like maybe I could make something more of my decision."Her.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Brida
Quote: She didn't need to understand the meaning of life; it was enough to find someone who did, and then fall asleep in his arms and sleep as a child sleeps, knowing that someone stronger than you is protecting you from all evil and all danger

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: The waves were choppy, like Chuck Norris' karate hands. The ocean would have been still, if I weren't making love in it.

Author: Rita Mae Brown,  Riding Shotgun
Quote: Loving's pretty easy. It's letting someone love you that's hard.

Author: Leslye Walton,  The Strange and Beautiful Sorrows of Ava Lavender
Quote: Love makes us such fools.

Author: Michael Bassey Johnson,  The Infinity Sign
Quote: True friends are those who came into your life, saw the most negative part of you, but are not ready to leave you, no matter how contagious you are to them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The cat hair floated in the air like a sound vibration, and I plucked it like a guitar string. Sometimes I can be so musical I’m like a living love song.

Author: Gayle Forman,  Just One Day
Quote: We are born in one day. We die in one day. We can change in one day. And we can fall in love in one day. Anything can happen in just one day.

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Evolution of Mara Dyer
Quote: I want YOU to be the one wanting me first. Pushing me first. Kissing me first. Don't be careful with me,"he said. "Because I won't be careful with you.

Author: Julia Quinn,  Romancing Mister Bridgerton
Quote: I love you with everything I am, everything I've been, and everything I hope to be. I love you with my past, and I love you for my future. I love you for the children we'll have and for the years we'll have together. I love you for every one of my smiles and even more, for every one of your smiles.

Author: Jane Clayson
Quote: I am a Mormon because I love the Lord Jesus Christ. And as I exercise faith in Him, I am blessed with the Holy Spirit in my life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love burns. Whiskey burns. George Burns. What do all three have in common? They’re all dead to me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t kind of like to be kind and like you—I love to be kind and love you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: To become one who believes two become one, you need love in your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said she loved me, and I didn’t believe it for a minute. Maybe 59 seconds, but not a whole minute. I may be gullible, but I’m not without an accurate way to measure time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Myth, mist, and mystery all add to the illusion of love. If you need me I’ll be by the fog machine wearing a tunic and writing an epic poem in Greek.

Author: William Faulkner
Quote: You don’t love because: you love despite; not for the virtues, but despite the faults.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The chair I want for my office has wheels, so I can put it on my treadmill and get some exercise while I work. Likewise, we can’t let a love like ours just roll on by without trying to work things out.

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: And I pray one prayer--I repeat it till my tongue stiffens--Catherine Earnshaw, may you not rest as long as I am living! You said I killed you--haunt me, then!...Be with me always--take any form--drive me mad! only do not leave me in this abyss, where I cannot find you!

Author: George Eliot
Quote: Poor fellow! I think he is in love with you.'I am not aware of it. And to me it is one of the most odious things in a girl's life, that there must always be some supposition of falling in love coming between her and any man who is kind to her... I have no ground for the nonsensical vanity of fancying everybody who comes near me is in love with me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll sit on a soda and drink a sofa. It’s just healthier. You should see how I make love. Show starts at 8:00. Tickets are ten bucks at the window.

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer
Quote: Everyone's a little crazy. Some people just hide it better than others.

Author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife
Quote: Right now we are here, and nothing can mar our perfection, or steal the joy of this perfect moment.

Author: Lemony Snicket,  The Penultimate Peril
Quote: Deciding whether or not to trust a person is like deciding whether or not to climb a tree because you might get a wonderful view from the highest branch or you might simply get covered in sap and for this reason many people choose to spend their time alone and indoors where it is harder to get a splinter.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  My love can only occupy one person at a time
Quote: My ashtray is full, the carton of cigarettes is empty, and I just cremated grandpa. But I never inhaled—or told him I loved him.

Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote: Whoever loves becomes humble. Those who love have , so to speak , pawned a part of their narcissism.

Author: Margaret Atwood,  Cat's Eye
Quote: Hatred would have been easier. With hatred, I would have known what to do. Hatred is clear, metallic, one-handed, unwavering; unlike love.

Author: Maurice Sendak,  Where the Wild Things Are
Quote: And Max, the king of all wild things, was lonely and wanted to be where someone loved him best of all.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of happy mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I was young, I was 13 going on 31. Then when I was 30 going on 31, I was 30 going on 29. Now I’m in love and I’ve lost all sense of time—and all the rest of my sense.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Of all sports, wrestling is the most like cuddling. I’m all sweaty because I’m training hard to show her how much I love her.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: With a palindrome of a name, like Bob, I’d be both right thinking and dyslexic. Would you love me more as a Bob, or as a Bob?

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Perfect love is the most beautiful of all frustrations because it is more than one can express.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I win, it’s because I’m skilled. When I lose, it’s because my opponent is lucky. But when I fall in love, it’s because I’m lucky and she’s skilled.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Making benches is no walk in the park. It takes one a lot of love to make a bench, and then it takes two to make love on that bench.

Author: Coco J. Ginger
Quote: Her heart had grown so familiar to the pain of life without him, that to respond now seemed too large a pleasure she could not endure. If pain was love, then she loved fiercely. Yet knew she could not be near that boy again.

Author: Edith Hamilton,  Mythology: Timeless Tales of Gods and Heroes
Quote: Love cannot live where there is no trust.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My heart only grows more powerful the more my flowing love goes unabsorbed, unobserved, and unappreciated.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You don’t need to have a fight before great sex. I can keep my cool and still bring the heat every time.

Author: Dan Millman,  Way of the Peaceful Warrior: A Book That Changes Lives
Quote: A warrior does not give up what he loves, he finds the love in what he does

Author: Federico García Lorca
Quote: But hurry, let's entwine ourselves as one, our mouth broken, our soul bitten by love, so time discovers us safely destroyed.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I love you because I love you, and if you don’t like it you can use my circular logic as a noose and hang yourself.

Author: Christine Feehan,  Water Bound
Quote: And maybe that was love. Being so vulnerable and allowing someone else in so far they could hurt you, but they also give you everything.

Author: Aloe Blacc
Quote: People need to spread love towards strangers. We all bleed the same blood and we are all part of a global community now.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Instead of a vow of silence, I took a vow of invisibility. At that time you were looking for someone to love, and that’s why you couldn’t see me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Based on the questions we both answered, we’re a 0% love match. That means we’re 100% compatible, once I enlighten her to the correct perspective on life.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: Well, you can think what you want, so long as you remember - no matter how ordinary things seem between us - I'm still here, still in love with you, and care about you more than any other guy, evil or otherwise, ever will.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love will blend together like turquoise is blue and green. There’s no depression or envy when both blur into one.

Author: Alice Hoffman,  The Story Sisters
Quote: When I walk, I walk with you. Where I go, you're with me always.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Everyone’s different, and in that way everyone’s the same. Stand out by sitting down. Try my love seat—it’s made for two people, so you can be comfortably obese.

Author: Amit Ray,  Meditation: Insights and Inspirations
Quote: Looking at beauty in the world, is the first step of purifying the mind.

Author: Courtney Love,  Dirty Blonde: The Diaries of Courtney Love
Quote: The language of love letters is the same as suicide notes.

Author: Ursula Hegi
Quote: That's the nature of being a parent, Sabine has discovered. You'll love your children far more than you ever loved your parents, and -- in the recognition that your own children cannot fathom the depth of your love -- you come to understand the tragic, unrequited love of your own parents.

Author: Coco J. Ginger
Quote: He brought out the worst in me, and was the best thing that ever happened to me.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Keeping Faith
Quote: I close my eyes, thinking that there is nothing like an embrace after an absence, nothing like fitting my face into the curve of his shoulder and filling my lungs with the scent of him.

Author: Jane Austen,  Sense and Sensibility
Quote: I come here with no expectations, only to profess, now that I am at liberty to do so, that my heart is and always will be yours.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My heart is spinning. Love is a tornado. Will you be my Kansas?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Quicksand is nature’s way of saying slow down. Me pushing you in quicksand is my way of saying be still and let me love you. Isn’t it funny how a lasso looks like a noose?

Author: Rick Riordan,  The House of Hades
Quote: She held up her calloused, grimy fingers. Leo couldn't help thinking there was nothing hotter than a girl who didn't mind getting her hands dirty. But of course, that was just a general comment. Didn't apply to Calypso. Obviously.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love is the best gift because it’s free to give and priceless to receive.

Author: Leo Tolstoy
Quote: He felt now that he was not simply close to her, but that he did not know where he ended and she began.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I believe in true love. But my opinion is tainted, because I also believe in Bigfoot, aliens, and in the existence of honest politicians.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I remember her words about remembering my words, and that’s when it hit me: the quickest way to scalpel open a heart is with a declaration of love.

Author: Mik Everett
Quote: If a writer falls in love with you, you can never die.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love firm hugs. Statues are so affectionate. Well, at least compared to my ex wife.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: In a blind taste-test, my kisses were rated as Helen Kelleresque. Women love how the only sense I keenly possess is nonsense.

Author: Alison Croggon,  The Riddle
Quote: Love is one of the true mysteries,' he said at last. 'The truest and the deepest of all. One thing, Maerad: to love is never wrong. It may be disastrous; it may never be possible; it may be the deepest agony. But it is never wrong.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: I realized I’m in love. It's always been right in front of me.

Author: Isabel Wilkerson
Quote: What I love about the stories of the Great Migration is that this is not ancient history; this is living history. Most people of color can find someone in their own family who had experienced a migration of some kind, knowing the sense of dislocation, longing and fortitude.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve got a nice racket going. I make tennis ball swatters. My favorite score is love all. That’s also how I live my life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I am a slave to your love. Well, more like indentured servant.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: 2 out of 4 numbers prefer being in the bottom 50 percent. Half of all lovers also prefer being on the bottom.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: We made love like two folding lawn chairs. We were both motionless, but the possibility of movement permeated the moment.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When forever becomes a place...when forever ceases to be just a word… when it ceases to be just a measurement of time…but instead becomes a place where soul mates can dance to the song in their hearts... that is a reflection of true love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I make love like I make coffins—with my bare hands, alone in my garage. On sale through Thursday—Buy One Funeral, Get A Second One Free!

Author: Elizabeth Scott,  Love You Hate You Miss You
Quote: The thing is, that world doesn't exist. All growing up means is that your realize no one will come along to fix things. No one will come along to save you.

Author: Henry Rollins,  The Portable Henry Rollins
Quote: Love heals scars love left

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Importance of Being Earnest
Quote: I really don't see anything romantic in proposing. It is very romantic to be in love. But there is nothing romantic about a definite proposal. Why, one may be accepted. One usually is, I believe. Then the excitement is all over. The very essence of romance is uncertainty. If ever I get married, I'll certainly try to forget the fact.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: She’ll come to love me or she won’t. I’m a fisherman, not a hunter.

Author: Shannon Hale
Quote: You are my butterfly and refuse to set you free.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll stand by you forever. Or at least until noon, and then I’ll go stand under the cabana. Isn’t love amazing?

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: He’s dozed off again, but I kiss him awake, which seems to startle him. Then he smiles as if he’d be happy to lie there gazing at me forever.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  An Ideal Husband
Quote: It takes great courage to see the world in all its tainted glory, and still to love it. And even more courage to see it in the one you love

Author: Jandy Nelson,  The Sky Is Everywhere
Quote: Remember how it was when we kissed? Armfuls and armfuls of light thrown right at us. A rope dropping down from the sky. How can the word love and the word life even fit in the mouth?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Flower petals in the breeze look like a butterfly flapping its wings. My love for you takes flight like a white orchid blushing pink.

Author: Chad Sugg
Quote: Love the trees until their leaves fall off, then encourage them to try again next year.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I loved her as long as a midget. It was gruesome, and then I grew some.

Author: Kelley Armstrong,  The Calling
Quote: Remembering. Forgetting. I'm not sure which is worse.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: My boxers should require batteries, because I’m such an exceptional lover that pizza delivery people call me for carry out. 30 minutes or less—as if!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I water fake plants, because I’m growing a garden of fake mustaches. Lest no man (or woman) question my ability as a lover.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I ordered a beer and then I ordered another beer, because why finish one when I can finish two? Having only one is great for love, but bad for beer.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: A crate full of discreet would appear to be empty. But it’s not. It’s full of my love for you.

Author: Sylvain Reynard,  Gabriel's Inferno
Quote: You, of all people, deserve a happy ending. Despite everything that happened to you, you aren't bitter. You aren't cold. You've just retreated a little and been shy, and that's okay. If I were a fairy godmother, I would give you your heart's desire in an istant. And I would wipe away your tears and tell you not to cry.-Rachel to Julia

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have a tongue like a rose petal, and when I say I love you, it has the fragrance of truth. My words are my garden, and I’m planting our future.

Author: Jenny Han,  We'll Always Have Summer
Quote: I love Jere more than anybody. He’s my brother, my family. I hate myself for doing this. But when I see you two together, I hate him too.” His voice broke.“Don’t marry him. Don’t be with him. Be with me.

Author: Yelawolf
Quote: Yeah, I have animosity, a chip on my shoulder. But I love, too.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: He was afraid of defiling the love which filled his soul.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: Love is something to be treated with awe. Or should it be aww? People don’t know my capacity for love. If you tried to bottle it up, I’m sure it would take at least three thermoses to contain it. And if it did get contained, would you drink my love black, or would you add cream and sugar?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: If I had no penis, how would I pee? How would I make love? How would I think?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Drink my Distraction Juice (not from concentrate). It tastes like love, only not so focused on just one ingredient.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: I believe that every single event in life happens in an opportunity to choose love over fear.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A fridge will keep your steaks fresh, but keeping a live cow in grandmother’s room will keep the meat fresher. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Anne Rice,  The Vampire Lestat
Quote: I never lie,"I said offhand. "At least not to those I don't love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m late to dinner, but I’m early to being in love. I’m such a gentleman that I hold every door open—even if the guy sitting in the bathroom stall is protesting.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: I'd rather die on my own terms than live on theirs. I'd rather die loving Alex than live without him.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m half chameleon, half camouflage, and wholly in love with you, though you’d never be able to see it.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept
Quote: In fairy tales, the princesses kiss the frogs, and the frogs become princes. In real life, the pricesses kiss princes, and the princes turn into frogs.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you need me I’ll be sitting over there, on the ground, next to the empty chair. The emptiness always reminds me of your love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To attract a lover, you need to craft the perfect Craigslist ad. Here’s mine: Free TV with purchase of potato chips and couch.

Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
Quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me. I love you for the part of me that you bring out.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I morphed from a fly to a flower to a butterfly, which is like a combination flower and fly. I thought I was in love, but I was merely asleep.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  My love can only occupy one person at a time
Quote: They should make bubblegum that tastes like mashed potatoes. You know, for lovers.

Author: Jennifer E. Smith,  The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight
Quote: He looks at her and smiles. "You're sort of dangerous, you know?"She stares at him. "Me?""Yeah,"he says sitting back. "I'm way too honest with you.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: I haven't had that one great love, which is good. I don't want that to be in the past, I want it to be in the future.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She looked, but she couldn’t see. She was wearing an emotional blindfold, and though she heard me say I love you, she just didn’t listen.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: You’ll drown in my love story, if I ever write it using a fountain pen.

Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote: the world is not a pleasant place to be without someone to hold and be held by.

Author: Tyga
Quote: Sour Patch, Swedish Fish. I love candy, man. I can't go without candy. And when I'm recording, I always have a TV on with cartoons - on mute, though. When I'm recording, I like to look at the TV now and then and see some crazy, wacky stuff. When you're thinking creative, it just keeps you creative. Everybody got their way of making music.

Author: Tarryn Fisher,  Dirty Red
Quote: Love is illogical. You fall into it like a manhole. Then you're just stuck. You die in love more than you live in love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My eyes are bronze, my hair is turning silver, and my heart is gold. Oh, and my love for you belongs in the Olympics, because it’s Special.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: William Hurt has a painful last name. Kevin Love has a name perfect for February 14th. But what about Johnny Longdong? Where does he fit?

Author: Margaret Mitchell,  Gone with the Wind
Quote: Child, it's a very bad thing for a woman to face the worst that can happen to her, because after she's faced the worst she can't ever really fear anything again. ...Scarlett, always save something to fear— even as you save something to love...

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: We made love like two coiled up fire hoses. When there’s no fire in the romance, why not act like a couple of sleeping snakes?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’d fight for your love like I’m Tyler Durden. I want you to hit on me as hard as you can.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Love is a state in which a man sees things most decidedly as they are not.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Both of the items were used in an attempted murder, but hers was a dagger, and mine was a baby’s rubber bottle nipple. That was the last time I took a stab at love.

Author: Alain de Botton
Quote: One rarely falls in love without being as much attracted to what is interestingly wrong with someone as what is objectively healthy.

Author: Mary Zimmerman,  Metamorphoses
Quote: A: The soul wanders in the dark, until it finds love. And so, wherever our love goes, there we find our soul.Q: It always happens?A: If we're lucky. And if we let ourselves be blind. Q: Instead of watching out?A: Instead of always watching out.

Author: Deb Caletti,  The Secret Life of Prince Charming
Quote: You've got to have someone who loves your body. Who doesn't define you, but sees you. Who loves what he sees. Who you don't have to struggle to be good enough for.

Author: Euripides,  Medea
Quote: Stronger than lover's love is lover's hate. Incurable, in each, the wounds they make.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Being a waiter is a waste of time, because think of all that waiting. But it’s better than loving someone who doesn’t love you back, because if you’re going to wait around, you might as well get paid for it.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Lost Hero
Quote: My point is that love is the most powerful motivator in the world. It spurs mortals to greatness. Their noblest, bravest acts are done for love.

Author: Christopher Moore,  Coyote Blue
Quote: Love: the sickest of Irony’s sick jokes. The place where logic and order go to die.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: The Heart wants what it wants - or else it does not care

Author: Eve Ensler,  I am an Emotional Creature
Quote: I finally know the difference between pleasing and loving, obeying and respecting. It has taken me so many years to be okay with being different, and with being this alive, this intense. (xxvi)

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: There's someone for everyone. And when my clones get here, everyone will be able to have that someone. Prices start at $99.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can’t use my intellect to figure out how to bypass my intellect. Love lies through the spirit, not the mind, and love never lies.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Buy one I love you for $3.99. Buy twelve for $48.00. That’s a savings of twelve cents—directly into my bank account. WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD—Objects not intended for individuals who tend to put forever objects in their mouths.

Author: Laini Taylor,  Daughter of Smoke & Bone
Quote: Yearning for love made her feel like a cat that was always twining around ankles, meowing Pet me, pet me, look at me, love me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You used to love me. Let me help jog your memory by buying you some running shoes. The shoes will be wooden, and nailed to the floor.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The harmonica has musical wind, and is the breath of soul. It’s like a sad, lonely I love you lost in the breeze.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Microwavable ice cream is the future. Don’t wait for love to melt all over your crotch. Scoop some Ice Cream Soup today.

Author: Arthur Golden,  Memoirs of a Geisha
Quote: Can't you see? Every step I have taken, since I was that child on the bridge, has been to bring myself closer to you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Last night my shadow exploded into hundreds of fluttering black birds, foreshadowing my love taking flight under the cover of camouflage.

Author: Nick Hornby,  How to Be Good
Quote: It seems to me now that the plain state of being human is dramatic enough for anyone; you don't need to be a heroin addict or a performance poet to experience extremity. You just have to love someone.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  Twenties Girl
Quote: It's not enough to believe! Don't you see that, you stupid girl? You could spend your whole life hoping and believing! If a love affair is one-sided, then it's only ever a question, never an answer. You can't live your life waiting for an answer.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  November 9
Quote: When you find love, you take it. You grab it with both hands and you do everything in your power not to let it go. You can’t just walk away from it and expect it to linger until you’re ready for it.

Author: Lucinda Franks
Quote: Christmas in Bethlehem. The ancient dream: a cold, clear night made brilliant by a glorious star, the smell of incense, shepherds and wise men falling to their knees in adoration of the sweet baby, the incarnation of perfect love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I bleed ink for her, because her name is written on my heart. She’s the author of all the love I have to give.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A turtle is like a lizard in a bicycle helmet, and I think that’s romantic. That reminds me, I should write a love song called, “Dinner for two—plus one.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Great earrings would be little speakers, so she can hear better. Or maybe she just wasn’t listening all those times I told her I loved her.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She brews a bruise on my heart, and drinks it like a beer. She calls it love, but she would, because she’s drunk on my torment.

Author: Rafael Ortiz
Quote: Love is not finding someone to live with. It's finding someone you can't live without.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Do you want some fresh tomato soup to go? I’ll put it in a mesh strainer. Oh, if only love were as easy to contain as soup in a strainer.

Author: Rachel Caine,  Feast of Fools
Quote: Jealous?""Maybe.""No reason. I like my ladies with a pulse.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Invisible Monsters
Quote: Almost all the time, you tell yourself you're loving somebody when you're just using them. This only looks like love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I spray-paint my underwear gold, because it makes me feel like a winner. When two people are in love, one is always in second place.

Author: Thomas Hardy,  Far from the Madding Crowd
Quote: Love is a possible strength in an actual weakness.

Author: Richard Matheson,  What Dreams May Come
Quote: Thank you...for gracing my life with your lovely presence, for adding the sweet measure of your soul to my existence.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Shiver
Quote: And then I opened my eyes and it was just Grace and me - nothing anywhere but Grace and me - she pressing her lips together as though she were keeping my kiss inside her, and me, holding this moment that was as fragile as a bird in my hands.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m the Director of Redundancy. I’m also the Director. I make love like I make love, and that is why I am the Director of Redundancy.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t like my circle of friends, so I’m changing them to a square. Love shapes our lives, so why not shape who we love?

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote: That’s love: Two lonely persons keep each other safe and touch each other and talk to each other.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Asking me if I’m in love is like asking a mortician if now is the best time to die.

Author: Sharon Creech,  Walk Two Moons
Quote: Sometimes you know in your heart you love someone, but you have to go away before your head can figure it out.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: I know what it is to live entirely for and with what I love best on earth. I hold myself supremely blest -- blest beyond what language can express; because I am my husband's life as fully as he is mine.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Quest
Quote: You didn’t think I’d let you go alone, did you?”“No, but I’m grateful that I had you with me.”“Grateful is all I’m going to get, isn’t it?”“What else were you hoping for?”“Adoration, devotion, affection, infatuation, or just plain finding me irresistible.”“Sorry, Don Juan. You’ll have to live with my undying gratitude.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
Quote: He promised us that everything would be okay. I was a child, but I knew that everything would not be okay. That did not make my father a liar. It made him my father.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Anything disguised as anything is chameleon. A ghost disguised as an unobservable and invisible object is a great example. Still, that’s easier to see than the love my ex wife had for me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Seven Sisters Sinister Murder Mystery Dinner
Quote: When three women all ignore each other, and each ignores me, it reminds me of Dark Jar Tin Zoo’s definition of love. Love is isn’t—even when it isn’t.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’d rather sell one thing for one million dollars, than sell one million things for one dollar each. I feel the same about my love and women.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Prophesies are dark and don’t need a flashlight to illuminate. I’m a bring my own lighthouse kind of lover.

Author: Ashly Lorenzana
Quote: The end of a relationship is not always a failure. Sometimes all the love in the world is not enough to save something. In these cases, it is not a matter of fault from either person. Some things cannot be, it's as simple as that.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  My Sister's Keeper
Quote: He smiles at me, and I am suddenly seventeen again - the year I realize that love doesn't follow the rules, the year I understood that nothing is worth having so much as something unattainable

Author: Leigh Bardugo,  Siege and Storm
Quote: I have loved you all my life, Mal,"I whispered through my tears. "There is no end to our story.

Author: Zelda Fitzgerald
Quote: I love you, even if there isn’t any me, or any love, or even any life. I love you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drive as fast as four tire swings hanging from a tree branch in the middle of winter. I also make love with as much speed and rotation.

Author: Truman Capote,  Summer Crossing
Quote: He loved her, he loved her, and until he'd loved her she had never minded being alone....

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: He rose like heroes, and I rose like rows of red roses. Love grows wherever you plant it, so I try to farm it wherever I go.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said love her or be tortured by her. I replied, "Torture would be less painful."She didn't realize that I'm a true romantic.

Author: Kahlil Gibran,  The Forerunner: His Parables and Poems
Quote: Thus with my lips have I denounced you, while my heart, bleeding within me, called you tender names.It was love lashed by its own self that spoke. It was pride half slain that fluttered in the dust. It was my hunger for your love that raged from the housetop, while my own love, kneeling in silence, prayed your forgiveness.

Author: Rick Warren
Quote: The best use of life is love. The best expression of love is time. The best time to love is now.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: It doesn’t take a hurricane to blow out a birthday candle. Let this be a lesson in love—and cake etiquette.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  South of the Border, West of the Sun
Quote: For a long time, she held a special place in my heart. I kept this special place just for her, like a "Reserved"sign on a quiet corner table in a restaurant. Despite the fact that I was sure I'd never see her again.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A can’t in a can—it’s carbonated failure that’s ready to drink. It tastes like the back half of love.

Author: Elizabeth Gaskell,  North and South
Quote: One word more. You look as if you thought it tainted you to beloved by me. You cannot avoid it. Nay, I, if I would, cannotcleanse you from it. But I would not, if I could. I have neverloved any woman before: my life has been too busy, my thoughtstoo much absorbed with other things. Now I love, and will love.But do not be afraid of too much expression on my part.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: I know I’m not supposed to say this, but I love you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love burns for you like I’m an arsonist and marshmallows-on-sticks salesman. $2.99 each, or 5 for $10.

Author: Taylor Swift
Quote: But no matter what love throws at you, you have to believe in it. You have ot believe in love stories and prince charmings and happily ever after. That's why I write these songs. Because I think love is FEARLESS.

Author: Walter Benjamin
Quote: The only way of knowing a person is to love them without hope.

Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, and compassion

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I need to be gentler, I said definitively to myself, as I clenched my fist and shook it in the air. Love takes flight like two powerful wings, but hits like a collection of feathers.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Professional wrestling is a lot like cuddling, I thought as I hugged a tree. As far as lumberjacks go, I’m slow, but when the tree finally falls for me, it falls hard.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Nostalgia is being blind to the bad and only remembering the good. Thinking about all the love I had for her is a positively Helen-Kelleresque experience.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: I’m not a warrior or a goddess,” I said at last.Adrian leaned closer. “As far as I’m concerned, you’re both.

Author: Stewart Udall
