Quote: Cherish sunsets, wild creatures and wild places. Have a love affair with the wonder and beauty of the earth.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Married By Morning
Quote: I love you, Marks. My heart is completely and utterly yours. And unfortunately for you, the rest of me comes with it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: She was washing all the dishes by hand, so I bought her a machine. I bought her a lawnmower. That’s what you do when you’re in love.

Author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom
Quote: Real friendship or love is not manufactured or achieved by an act of will or intention. Friendship is always an act of recognition.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My name represents me, but it’s not who I am. It’s just a collection of letters. Unfortunately, none of them are love letters.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Sleepwalking is restercise
Quote: Here’s what I’d love to see: A vending machine that dispenses cats for petting on your lunch break. Instead of money, the machine accepts hugs.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I cook. My favorite thing to make is love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You haven’t seen nothing until you’ve seen zero. You also haven’t seen nothing until you’ve seen all the love I have for politicians.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love isn’t all flowers, candles, and dancing midgets. No, it is much, much taller than all that.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I think I’m mouth blind and that’s why all food tastes bland. The only things that have any flavor are the words I love you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I left a jar in the doorway to leave the door ajar, but love never walked in.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Finale
Quote: Nice costume,"he said. "Ditto. I can tell you put a lot of thought into yours."Amusement curled his mouth. "If you don't like it, I can take it off.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: Everything about her has to do with me.

Author: William Blake,  The Marriage of Heaven and Hell
Quote: Eternity is in love with the productions of time.

Author: Tim Farrington,  The Monk Downstairs
Quote: We are born to love as we are born to die, and between the heartbeats of those two great mysteries lies all the tangled undergrowth of our tiny lives. There is nowhere to go but through. And so we walk on, lost, and lost again, in the mapless wilderness of love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you converted a water fountain into a fire fountain, then you’d have what it takes to stoke the heat I have for you in my heart.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Fiery Heart
Quote: Centrum permanebit.

Author: Lemony Snicket
Quote: In love, as in life, one misheard word can be tremendously important. If you tell someone you love them, for instance, you must be absolutely certain that they have replied "I love you back"and not "I love your back"before you continue the conversation.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I deal in the ideal idea. Buy, sell, or trade, I am offering the best prices on Love.

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Why Be Happy When You Could Be Normal?
Quote: Why is the measure of love loss?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I know a thing or two about love. Well, maybe just a thing. A big, blurry thing, like Bigfoot.

Author: Leigh Bardugo,  Shadow and Bone
Quote: They are orphans again, with no true home but each other and whatever life they can make together on the other side of the sea.

Author: Diana Gabaldon,  Outlander
Quote: When I asked my da how ye knew which was the right woman, he told me when the time came, I'd have no doubt. And I didn't. When I woke in the dark under that tree on the road to Leoch, with you sitting on my chest, cursing me for bleeding to death, I said to myself 'Jamie Fraser, for all ye canna see what she looks like, and for all she weights as much as a good draft horse, this is the woman.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem
Quote: We wanted the freedom to love. We wanted the freedom to choose. Now we have to fight for it.

Author: Richard Feynman
Quote: Physics isn't the most important thing. Love is.

Author: Bob Dylan
Quote: You can never be wise and be in love at the same time.

Author: مريد البرغوثي
Quote: الحب هو ارتباك الأدوار بين الآخذ و المعطي

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I miss her like 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, and 5 misses 8. When we made love, our two bodies formed one spiral that seemed to cycle to the sky.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My instant love in a box is perfect for Florida. Just add water.

Author: Dave Eggers,  What is the What
Quote: But everyone disappears, no matter who loves them.

Author: Robert Crumb
Quote: You can't make everybody love you. It's an exercise in futility, and it's probably not even a good idea to try.

Author: bell hooks
Quote: Living simply makes loving simple.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: When I make love, I make extra, and then I keep it in my pants pockets. Well, not all of it. I give an inappropriate amount to the tax collectors.

Author: Osho
Quote: With me, illusions are bound to be shattered. I am here to shatter all illusions. Yes, it will irritate you, it will annoy you - that's my way of functioning and working. I will sabotage you from your very roots! Unless you are totally destroyed as a mind, there is no hope for you.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Nineteen Minutes
Quote: Love [is] supposed to move mountains, to make the world go round, to be all you need, but it [falls] apart at the deatils. It [can't] save a single person.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: Friendship is selfless love, care, respect, and honor not a profitable opportunity.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I run like I walk—only slower. And I make love like a one-man circus show.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I need to take loving to the extreme, as if it were a sport requiring a helmet and parachute. I wonder if @redbull would sponsor me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: My nickname isn’t Scarface—it’s Scarf Ace. I make knitted neck warmers like I make love—one grandmother at a time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll convert a school desk into a tricycle, because how else am I supposed to learn to love? It’s not like baseball gloves are very effective oven mitts.

Author: Philip Pullman,  The Amber Spyglass
Quote: I told him I was going to betray you, and betray Lyra, and he believed me because I was corrupt and full of wickedness; he looked so deep I felt sure he'd see the truth. But I lied too well. I was lying with every nerve and fiber and everything I'd ever done...I wanted him to find no good in me, and he didn't. There is none.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Nothing in life is worth,turning your back on,if you love it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When it’s raining, instead of using an umbrella, try holding an empty drinking glass above your head. That’s exactly how I thirst for your love.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Lost Souls
Quote: Not enough,"he said, letting her hair slip through his fingers. "If I kiss you all day, everyday, for the rest of my life, it won't be enough.

Author: Jude Deveraux
Quote: Time has no meaning,Love will endure..

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve only been in love one time, I said as I held up my pinky finger. I could have held up my index finger, but I wasn’t in love that long.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To show you I love you, I bought you an antique watch. You can tell it's old because it doesn't even work. I got a great deal on it.

Author: Kristan Higgins,  My One and Only
Quote: I'll tell you something, Harpy,"he said, his voice almost a whisper now. "It never even occurred to me that we wouldn't make it. And it never occurred to you that we would. You were just waiting for us to go down in flames. I thought we could get through anything.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: I’d rather fake my own fog, than fake a steamy love scene. Can I interest you in some mist? It’s homemade.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Quit making shade while I’m trying to make noon. Go put on a blindfold and act like midnight. There’s leftover love in the freezer if you get cold.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Francis Bacon has the most delicious last name ever, followed closely by Johnny Scrambledeggs. I make love like those two guys make breakfast out of family reunions.

Author: James Joyce,  The Dead
Quote: Why is it that words like these seem dull and cold? Is it because there is no word tender enough to be your name?

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Memories of My Melancholy Whores
Quote: No matter what, nobody can take away the dances you've already had.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: Love means never having to say you’re sorry for a minor stab wound.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Be mindful and heartempty, because you've got no love left in it due to you having given it all away.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I just developed a gun that shoots mustaches. Sometimes a disguise can be deadly, especially if it’s your love you’re trying to camouflage.

Author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Onyx
Quote: That kind of love should've been able to beat sickness. That kind of love should've conquered anything.

Author: Jacqueline Carey,  Kushiel's Chosen
Quote: Love as thou wilt

Author: Coco J. Ginger
Quote: When we are in love, we are convinced nobody else will do. But as time goes, others do do, and often do do, much much better.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I want to create a 3-4 deal—buy three for the price of four. Offer valid for any product but love, which is one for the price of two only.

Author: Paul Walker
Quote: I love doing the action stuff. It's soooo much fun!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When you give everything and expect nothing in return, only then will you be in a position to gain anything. When you love loving, you give because giving is getting. Giving is a gift unto itself, and when you realize this you understand that you can’t network if you can’t love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Tennis is the only sport with love in the score, and that makes it the most romantic. I would be a player, but I wisely use the net to go fishing instead.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: An empty ketchup bottle full of romantic quotes is just what I need to turn my cheeseburger into the perfect lover. Now you can get more romantic for an upcharge of just 69 cents.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  A Walk to Remember
Quote: I might kiss you.I might be bad at it.That's not possible.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The love of my life has made me the happiest man ever. This ever-smiling man/mannequin is so happy because he’s got no brain, and in this way is identical to anyone who still rah-rahs for either a Republican or a Democrat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I keep water in my pockets, as portable fish tanks. My love letters often get soggy with sentimentality.

Author: David Levithan,  The Lover's Dictionary
Quote: libidinous, adj.I never understood why anyone would have sex on the floor. Until I was with you and I realized: you don't realize you're on the floor.

Author: Stephen King,  It
Quote: Calling it a simple schoolgirl crush was like saying a Rolls-Royce was a vehicle with four wheels, something like a hay-wagon. She did not giggle wildly and blush when she saw him, nor did she chalk his name on trees or write it on the walls of the Kissing Bridge. She simply lived with his face in her heart all the time, a kind of sweet, hurtful ache. She would have died for him..

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: All I want from you is to trust me with what little you can, and grow in loving people around you with the same love I share with you. It's not your job to change them, or to convince them. You are free to love without an agenda.

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  One Foot in the Grave
Quote: Why did he have to be so gorgeous? Why did he have to stand so close, and why did I still love him so much?

Author: Edith Wharton
Quote: There is one friend in the life of each of us who seems not a separate person, however dear and beloved, but an expansion, an interpretation, of one's self, the very meaning of one's soul.

Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote: Friendship often ends in love. But love in friendship; never.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m passionate about being compassionate. It takes a lot to give of yourself, and that’s why it’s such a gift—for both the recipient and the giver.

Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne,  The Scarlet Letter
Quote: Love, whether newly born or aroused from a deathlike slumber, must always create sunshine, filling the heart so full of radiance, that it overflows upon the outward world.

Author: Dora J. Arod,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: I’m a fake fact factory. The things I make are the things I make up. Also, as a side business, I make love. Actually, I just made that up.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: In the long run, even a marathon looks like a sprint. This is how I can love with such Roger Bannisteresque intensity.

Author: Francis Chan,  Crazy Love: Overwhelmed by a Relentless God
Quote: God's definition of what matters is pretty straightforward. He measures our lives by how we love.

Author: Jasper Fforde,  First Among Sequels
Quote: Two minds with but a single thought, two hearts that beat as one.

Author: Selena Gómez
Quote: Everything happens for a reason and, something better will come along for me!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The word very will vary in muchiness. I love you very much, and that won’t vary from day to day.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: I am surprised how difficult for people is to say "I love you". They only say the three magic words when they are sure they will hear "I love you too"back. C'mon! Spread the energy of love without expecting anything! Cowards are incapable of expressing love; it is the prerogative of the brave

Author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent
Quote: Eric called Al's suicide brave, and he was wrong. My mother's death was brave. I remember how calm she was, how determined. It isn't just brave that she died for me; it is brave that she did it without announcing it, without hesitation, and without appearing to consider another option.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: Our love was a two-person game. At least until one of us died, and the other became a murderer.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: Till I loved I never lived.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: It is only with true love and compassion that we can begin to mend what is broken in the world. It is these two blessed things that can begin to heal all broken hearts.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I make love like I make coffee. Tuesdays and Thursdays I offer free refills.

Author: Charles Haddon Spurgeon
Quote: Faith goes up the stairs that love has built and looks out the windows which hope has opened.

Author: Chelsea M. Cameron,  My Favorite Mistake
Quote: I can't promise not to make you mad. I can't promise that I won't hurt you. All I can promise is that I want you in my life, and I'll do anything to keep you there.

Author: Tom Hanks
Quote: There isn't any great mystery about me. What I do is glamorous and has an awful lot of white-hot attention placed on it. But the actual work requires the same discipline and passion as any job you love doing, be it as a very good pipe fitter or a highly creative artist.

Author: William Shakespeare,  The Complete Sonnets and Poems
Quote: Love comforteth like sunshine after rain.

Author: Graham Greene,  Our Man in Havana
Quote: I don't care a damn about men who are loyal to the people who pay them, to organizations...I don't think even my country means all that much. There are many countries in our blood, aren't there, but only one person. Would the world be in the mess it is if we were loyal to love and not to countries?

Author: Nora Roberts,  Black Hills
Quote: Do you know how many ways love can hit you? So it makes you happy, or miserable? It makes you sick in the belly or hurt in the heart. It makes everything brighter and sharper, or it blurs all the edges. It makes you feel like a king or a fool. Every way love can hit you, it's hit me when it comes to you

Author: Masashi Kishimoto
Quote: There's only one thing that can heal the heart... Only one... It's love, Gaara.

Author: Margaret Stohl,  Beautiful Chaos
Quote: When I first met you, that's what I remember. I looked up at the sky and thought, I'm going to love this person because even the sky looks different.

Author: Richard Siken,  Crush
Quote: If you love me, Henry, you don’t love me in a way I understand.

Author: Deb Caletti,  The Six Rules of Maybe
Quote: I shouldn't have to be a liar to make someone love me. I shouldn't be so afraid of losing someone that I'll do anything to make them stay.

Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Lock and Key
Quote: The worst thing you can do if you miss or need someone is let them know it.

Author: Dalai Lama XIV
Quote: We can live without religion and meditation, but we cannot survive without human affection.

Author: C.S. Lewis,  The Problem of Pain
Quote: Love may forgive all infirmities and love still in spite of them: but Love cannot cease to will their removal.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  Cat's Cradle
Quote: Americans... are forever searching for love in forms it never takes, in places it can never be. It must have something to do with the vanished frontier.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Hush, Hush
Quote: Right then, I wanted to go back in time and relive every moment with him. One more secret smile, one more shared laugh. One more electric kiss. Finding him was like finding someone I didn't know I was searching for. He’d come into my life too late, and now was leaving too soon. I remembered him telling me he’d give up everything for me. He already had.

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: Love is keeping the promise anyway.

Author: Hilary Duff
Quote: Waiting for you is like waiting for rain in this drought. Useless and disappointing."~ Sam (Hilary Duff), A Cinderella Story

Author: Sarah Addison Allen,  The Sugar Queen
Quote: I think Heaven will be like a first kiss.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I wrote an edible cookbook. The pages are made out of tortillas. It’s also the Book of Love. (Batteries and hot sauce sold separately.)

Author: William Shakespeare,  Much Ado About Nothing
Quote: For which of my bad parts didst thou first fall in love with me?

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Devil in Winter
Quote: Mysteries of attraction could not always be explained through logic. Sometimes the fractures in two separate souls became the very hinges that held them together.

Author: Nick Cannon
Quote: Mariah is a beautiful and talented person, and I've had a crush on her for as long as I can remember. Every day, my respect for Mariah continues to grow higher. She's a caring, warm and funny person. People have no idea how funny she is! I feel like I've always known she was my forever love.

Author: أحمد خيري العمري,  إدرينالين
Quote: من قال لك أن درب الجنة معبد بالورود؟

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love
Quote: Zen masters say you cannot see your reflection in running water, only in still water.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I was gardening when I saw this snail/slug thing disguised as a leaf. Ah, isn't fall a wonderful time to slowly fall in love?

Author: Orhan Pamuk,  My Name is Red
Quote: Tell me then, does love make one a fool or do only fools fall in love?

Author: B.F. Skinner
Quote: We shouldn't teach great books; we should teach a love of reading. Knowing the contents of a few works of literature is a trivial achievement. Being inclined to go on reading is a great achievement.

Author: Amy Carmichael
Quote: You can give without loving, but you cannot love without giving.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: Find the things that matter, and hold on to them, and fight for them, and refuse to let them go.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Love is like a river flowing through your heart. I’ll bring the boat, if you bring the bridge.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I sleep when I blink. I dream like I love—continuously.

Author: Jamie McGuire,  Beautiful Disaster
Quote: I was his exception, and as much as I had tried to fight my feelings, he was mine.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Are you tired, irritable, or suffering from heartburn? Ask your doctor if my love is right for you. 9 out of 10 doctors agree that 9 out of 10 is 90%.

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: She put one hand on mine. “When someone is in your heart, they’re never truly gone. They can come back to you, even at unlikely times.

Author: Charles Dickens,  A Tale of Two Cities
Quote: Before I go,"he said, and paused -- "I may kiss her?"It was remembered afterwards that when he bent down and touched her face with his lips, he murmured some words. The child, who was nearest to him, told them afterwards, and told her grandchildren when she was a handsome old lady, that she heard him say, "A life you love.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  New Order
Quote: I suppose it’s not a social norm, and not a manly thing to do — to feel, discuss feelings. So that’s what I’m giving the finger to. Social norms and stuff…what good are social norms, really? I think all they do is project a limited and harmful image of people. It thus impedes a broader social acceptance of what someone, or a group of people, might actually be like.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A gumble bee is half gum ball, half bumble bee, and it’s so chewy it stings. Makes me want to be a better lover and tractor salesman.

Author: Milan Kundera
Quote: Perhaps the reason we are unable to love is that we yearn to be loved, that is, we demand something (love) from our partner instead of delivering ourselves up to him demand-free and asking for nothing but his company.

Author: Kahlil Gibran,  Love Letters in the Sand: The Love Poems of Khalil Gibran
Quote: They say: 'If a man knew himself,he would know all mankind.'I say: 'If a man loved mankind,he would know something of himself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Last time I arm-wrestled, I broke my leg. Boy, what I wouldn’t do for love.

Author: Joyce Carol Oates
Quote: The worst thing: to give yourself away in exchange for not enough love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I often wear camouflaged pants so when I walk I look like a floating torso. I love with the same air of mystery.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: I love being in love, but I also love other things, like not being jealous, overly sensitive, or needy.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’d row a gondola like a column is not a row. My coffee may be cold, but my love is warm. When are you going to wake up and drink it?

Author: Truman Capote,  Breakfast at Tiffany's
Quote: You can love somebody without it being like that. You keep them a stranger, a stranger who's a friend.

Author: Graeme Simsion,  The Rosie Project
Quote: I asked you here tonight because when you realise you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If love were a dolphin with wings and a unicorn’s horn, being ridden by a blind leprechaun dressed like Rasputin, would you believe in second chances for love at first sight?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love stays with me wherever I go. That’s because I have it on a leash, like a dog, and I take it for walks like I do with my pet wheelchair.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: O, hereWill I set up my everlasting rest,And shake the yoke of inauspicious starsFrom this world-wearied flesh. Eyes, look your last!Arms, take your last embrace! and, lips, O youThe doors of breath, seal with a righteous kissA dateless bargain to engrossing death!

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Love in the Time of Cholera
Quote: Age has no reality except in the physical world. The essence of a human being is resistant to the passage of time. Our inner lives are eternal, which is to say that our spirits remain as youthful and vigorous as when we were in full bloom. Think of love as a state of grace, not the means to anything, but the alpha and omega. An end in itself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I am a fisherman among farmers, and as a farmer what I grow is tired of waiting for her to love me.

Author: Carol Rifka Brunt,  Tell the Wolves I'm Home
Quote: Nothing had changed. I was the stupid one again. I was the girl who never understood who she was to people.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Just when you thought you’d considered all the angles, life goes from a square to a cube. Love should also be 3D.

Author: Cristina Marrero,  The Unsung Love Story
Quote: You had to be willing to fight in order for a love story to last a life time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I just got done digging a hole shaped like a human body. But I have no idea what to bury. I’ll probably hide all my love for you, like I would with any other treasure.

Author: Rumi
Quote: When someone beats a rug,the blows are not against the rug, but against the dust in it.

Author: Nick Cave
Quote: I'm kind of old-school and love nothing more than sitting, opening a book, and reading it. But I also love listening to audio books.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Devil in Winter
Quote: It’s impossible,” he snapped. “Why?” “Because I’m Sebastian, Lord St. Vincent. I can’t be celibate. Everyone knows that.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Why take the stairs when someone else can take them for you? Love is like a flight of stairs—somebody’s going to take them, so I may as well be unselfish and take the elevator.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: You think that holding someone hard will bring them closer. You think that you can hold them so hard that you'll still feel them, embossed on you, when you pull away.Every time Eleanor pulled away from Park, she felt the gasping loss of him.

Author: D.H. Lawrence
Quote: It was not the passion that was new to her, it was the yearning adoration. She knew she had always feared it, for it left her helpless; she feared it still, lest if she adored him too much, then she would lose herself, become effaced, and she did not want to be effaced, a slave, like a savage woman. She must not become a slave. She feared her adoration, yet she would not at once fight against it.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Iron Queen
Quote: Her desires are mine. Her wishes are mine. Should even the world stand against her, my blade will be at her side. And should it fail to protect her, let my own existence be forfeit."- Ash

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit
Quote: There are many forms of love and affection, some people can spend their whole lives together without knowing each other's names. Naming is a difficult and time-consuming process; it concerns essences, and it means power. But on the wild nights who can call you home? Only the one who knows your name.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: Everyone has choices to make; no one has the right to take those choices away from us. Not even out of love..

Author: Warsan Shire
Quote: You are terrifying and strange and beautiful. Something not everyone knows how to love.

Author: Anthony de Mello,  Awareness
Quote: Perfect love casts out fear. Where there is love there are no demands, no expectations, no dependency. I do not demand that you make me happy; my happiness does not lie in you. If you were to leave me, I will not feel sorry for myself; I enjoy your company immensely, but I do not cling.

Author: pleasefindthis,  I Wrote This For You
Quote: You can be in love and you can be in a relationship. But they’re not always the same thing.

Author: Jim Morrison,  Wilderness: The Lost Writings, Vol. 1
Quote: I am troubled, immeasurablyby your eyes. I am struck by the featherof your soft reply.The sound of glassspeaks quick, disdainand concealswhat your eyes fightto explain.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  Can You Keep a Secret?
Quote: A real relationship is two-way.

Author: Elif Shafak,  The Forty Rules of Love
Quote: How can love be worthy of its name if one selects solely the pretty things and leaves out the hardships? It is easy to enjoy the good and dislike the bad. Anybody can do that. The real challenge is to love the good and the bad together, not because you need to take the rough with the smooth but because you need to go beyond such descriptions and accept love in its entirety.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Married By Morning
Quote: There are some experiences in life they haven't invented the right words for.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I want to sprint into her open arms, but I run as fast as two shoes tied together and thrown over a telephone wire. I’m like Roger Bannister, now that he’s in a wheelchair.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I wrote you a love letter, and I sent it snail mail. Love is forever, and that’s about how long it’ll take to get to you.

Author: Amy Carmichael
Quote: Give me the Love that leads the wayThe Faith that nothing can dismayThe Hope no disappointments tireThe Passion that'll burn like fireLet me not sink to be a clodMake me Thy fuel, Flame of God

Author: pleasefindthis,  I Wrote This For You
Quote: I could’ve sworn I was telling the truth when I told you I didn’t miss you.

Author: Sarah Addison Allen,  The Peach Keeper
Quote: Every life needs a little space. It leaves room for good things to enter it.

Author: George Sand
Quote: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Xazaqazax
Quote: If my favorite three letters are X, Z, and Q, then my favorite word is Xazaqazax. It means “a lover of love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: We made love like flamingoes are pink. You know what else was pink? My cheeks, because I was so embarrassed when I found out that she was the wrong woman.

Author: E. Lockhart,  We Were Liars
Quote: Better than chocolate, being with you last night. Silly me, I thought that nothing was better than chocolate.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Dreaming is for lovers
Quote: I had a dream about you. Our relationship faded from red to white, and somewhere in the middle, in the pink zone, I told you I loved you and you returned it. However, at white, our relationship went black and I sought red in the arms of another woman.

Author: John Donne,  The Complete English Poems
Quote: I am two fools, I know,For loving, and for saying so.

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer
Quote: You are what happiness means to me. And I would rather have today with you than forever with anyone else.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: I knew, you would do me good, in some way, at some time;- I saw it in your eyes when I first beheld you: their expression and smile did not- (again he stopped)- did not (he proceeded hastily) strike delight to my very inmost heart so for nothing.

Author: Emery Allen
Quote: I feel like a part of my soul has loved you since the beginning of everything.Maybe we’re from the same star.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I want a moon canoe, because have you ever tried paddling through dirt? Love is a journey, and I try to travel as efficiently as I can.

Author: Robert Jordan,  The Shadow Rising
Quote: You have made a place in my heart where I thought there was no room for anything else. You have made flowers grow where I cultivated dust and stones. Remember this, on this journey you insist on making. If you die, I will not survive you long.

Author: Tristan Wilds
Quote: I haven't experienced love at first sight yet. I've seen very, very beautiful girls and been awestruck but never love at first sight. I think confidence goes such a long way with women. A girl who is confident with who she is and she can really flaunt that is really sexy.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I arose like a rose, and this is how I knew I was in love. In the garden of life, I’m better off in your neighbor’s yard.

Author: Natalie Clifford Barney
Quote: When you're in love you never really know whether your elation comes from the qualities of the one you love, or if it attributes them to her; whether the light which surrounds her like a halo comes from you, from her, or from the meeting of your sparks.

Author: R.J. Palacio,  Wonder
Quote: Do people look the same when they go to heaven, mommy?""I don't know. I don't think so.""Then how do people recognize each other?""I don't know, sweetie. They just feel it. You don't need your eyes to love, right?

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: Love didn't make you weak, it made you stronger.

Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote: She's mad, but she's magic. There's no lie in her fire.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: Let us not seek to satisfy our thirst for freedom by drinking from the cup of bitterness and hatred.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Two empty chairs are not a good use of space. Fill them up with love.

Author: Graeme Simsion,  The Rosie Project
Quote: But why, why, why can't people just say what they mean?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: One butterfly wing reflected wholly in a mirror won’t give flight. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Jasmine Warga,  My Heart and Other Black Holes
Quote: You're like a grey sky. You're beautiful, even though you don't want to be.

Author: Katie McGarry,  Pushing the Limits
Quote: We’d read about sirens in English this fall; Greek mythology bullshit about women so beautiful, their voices so enchanting, that men did anything for them. Turned out that mythology crap was real because every time I saw her, I lost my mind.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You wash the horse, and I’ll wash the horse trainer. Then we’ll wash the dishes while we gallop into the sunset like two dirty lovers.

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  The Passion
Quote: Perhaps all romance is like that; not a contract between equal parties but an explosion of dreams and desires that can find no outlet in everyday life. Only a drama will do and while the fireworks last the sky is a different colour.

Author: Zora Neale Hurston,  Their Eyes Were Watching God
Quote: Love is like the sea. It's a moving thing, but still and all, it takes its shape from the shore it meets, and it's different with every shore.

Author: Jojo Moyes,  Me Before You
Quote: ...I told him a story of two people. Two people who shouldn't have met, and who didn't like each other much when they did, but who found they were the only two people in the world who could possibly have understood each other.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: A coffin would make a great suitcase. If I folded it neatly, I’ll bet I could pack in all my love for you.

Author: Rachel Caine,  Lord of Misrule
Quote: In this whole screwed-up town, you're the only thing that's always been right to me,"he whispered. "I love you, Claire."She saw something that might have been just a flash of panic go across his expression, but then he steadied again. "I can't believe I'm saying this, but I do. I love you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Life goal: Swim in a lake full of soup, and instead of bathing suits we’ll wear Ziploc bags while we make love like we’re feeding the homeless.

Author: Thomas Mann,  The Magic Mountain
Quote: It is love, not reason, that is stronger than death.

Author: Nat King Cole
Quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.

Author: Dodie Smith,  I Capture the Castle
Quote: Perhaps watching someone you love suffer can teach you even more than suffering yourself can.

Author: Gayle Forman,  Where She Went
Quote: You dumb-ass,"I crooned, kissing her on the forehead. "You don't share me. You own me.

Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote: Soul meets soul on lovers lips.

Author: Natalie Massenet
Quote: As much as I love to shop online, I also love walking the streets on a beautiful day and seeing what finds I can discover in a small shop or vintage store.

Author: Andrea Gibson,  How It Ends
Quote: But whateverHoweverWhenever this ends I want you to knowThat right nowI love you forever

Author: Françoise Sagan
Quote: Love lasts about seven years. That's how long it takes for the cells of the body to totally replace themselves.

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
Quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
Quote: Love lets us ride on its back as if it were a camel. But you’ve got to water it, or it won’t grow into a healthy rose bush.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I make love like my afternoon shadow is long. I'll bring the foreplay, if you bring the guacamole. (Yes, I know there is a 99-cent upcharge.)

Author: J. Sterling,  The Perfect Game
Quote: It's not that I can't live without you; it's that I don't want to. There's a difference. We all make choices in life and I choose you.My heart belongs to you. And I'm not asking for it back, even if you won't want it anymore. I'm just asking for a chance to have your again. I promise I'll be more careful with it this time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: When you're here, I'm there for you. And when you're there, I'm here for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her and I, we have a two chairs and a table kind of love. You should pull up a feeling and have a seat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I waste all my charity, all I’ll wind up with in the end is the wind. Still, I think I want to be the Dandelion of Love.

Author: Nalini Singh,  Archangel's Blade
Quote: I will love you even when I am dust on the wind.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Hush, Hush
Quote: It isn't about love,"Vee said. "It's about fun.

Author: Clive Barker
Quote: Nothing else wounds so deeply and irreparably. Nothing else robs us of hope so much as being unloved by one we love

Author: Julie Hockley,  Crow's Row
Quote: Whoever said that love hurts was wrong. Love is excruciating, especially when you can feel it slipping through your fingers and there is nothing you can do about it. Like someone was playing tug-of-war with my limbs, ripping to shreds whatever was left behind. What it would feel like when love was lost...I wouldn't survive that

Author: Claudia Adrienne Grandi
Quote: If I had a single flower for every time I think about you, I could walk forever in my garden.

Author: Craig M. Mullaney,  The Unforgiving Minute: A Soldier's Education
Quote: Long distance is hard. You have to trust that as you each change on your own, your relationship will also change along with you. It takes hope, good humor, and idealism. It takes a massive dose of courage to protect the relationship at all odds. It is hard, but worth it. You'll both be stronger as a result.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Using a mannequin and some rope, could you ride two bicycles at once? Next time, try three bikes. Then truly love someone, because that’s even harder.

Author: Patrick Rothfuss,  The Wise Man's Fear
Quote: There are so many men, all endlessly attempting to sweep me off my feet. And there is one of you, trying just the opposite. Making sure my feet are firm beneath me, lest I fall.

Author: Roman Payne,  The Wanderess
Quote: I was an adventurer, but she was not an adventuress. She was a 'wanderess.' Thus, she didn’t care about money, only experiences - whether they came from wealth or from poverty, it was all the same to her.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: Love, like everything else in life, should be a discovery, an adventure, and like most adventures, you don’t know you’re having one until you’re right in the middle of it.

Author: Leslye Walton,  The Strange and Beautiful Sorrows of Ava Lavender
Quote: Just because love don't look the way you think it should, don't mean you don't have it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I’d rather have 100% of 5 than 50% of 10—especially with love.

Author: Cecelia Ahern
Quote: There's no limit to what you can dream. You expect the unexpected, you believe in magic, in fairy tales, and in possibilities. Then you grow older and that innocence is shattered and somewhere along the way the reality of life gets in the way and you're hit by the realization that you can't be all you wanted to be, you just might have to settle for a little bit less.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  We Had A #Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. You took a cruise, and I took a canoe. I paddled alongside your ship out into the Atlantic Ocean and down to the Caribbean. I shouted “I love you” the whole way, but you couldn’t hear me, probably because that man you were with was talking the whole time.

Author: Anna Louise Strong
Quote: To fall in love is easy, even to remain in it is not difficult; our human loneliness is cause enough. But it is a hard quest worth making to find a comrade through whose steady presence one becomes steadily the person one desires to be.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Meatloaf is graphable in how far ahead it is in likeability categories. You can also play Mop the Floor with it. I make love like I make dinner that makes cleaning the kitchen more fun for the whole family.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Eclipse
Quote: You know I love you right?”“I know,” he breathed, his arm tightening automatically around my waist. “You know how much I wish it was enough.

Author: Jane Austen,  Northanger Abbey
Quote: No man is offended by another man's admiration of the woman he loves; it is the woman only who can make it a torment.

Author: Nora Roberts,  Vision in White
Quote: I’ve never been the one. Not for anybody.”He closed the distance between them. “You’ll get used to it.” He tipped her face up to his, kissed her.“Why? Why am I the one?”“Because my life opened up, and it flooded with color when you walked back into it.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Shadow Kiss
Quote: Vladimir did great things—so could she. Besides, they come first, right?""Not always."I stared. I'd had they come first drilled into me since I was a child. It was what all guardians believed. Only the dhampirs who'd run away from their duty didn't subscribe to that. What he said was almost like treason."Sometimes, Rose, you have to know when to put yourself first.

Author: Niall Horan
Quote: If a man whistles at you, don't turn around. You are a lady not a dog.

Author: David Morrissey
Quote: Nothing is my guiltiest pleasure. I love it. I love doing it. I love planning to do it, I love loafing and pottering and chilling and daydreaming.

Author: Andrew Solomon,  The Noonday Demon: An Atlas of Depression
Quote: Depression is the flaw in love. To be creatures who love, we must be creatures who can despair at what we lose, and depression is the mechanism of that despair.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Aleph
Quote: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When you give yourself permission to communicate what matters to you in every situation you will have peace despite rejection or disapproval. Putting a voice to your soul helps you to let go of the negative energy of fear and regret.

Author: Ann Brashares,  The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants
Quote: You know what the secret is? It's so simple. We love one another. We're nice to one another. Do you know how rare that is? - Carmen

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I want the gift of a guitar—no strings attached. I want your love to also have no strings attached—and be just as musical.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I am an orange construction cone, and I say to you, “Caution.” This is my advice for love—and for driving while blindfolded, which is safer than love.

Author: Christopher Poindexter
Quote: Sometimes I sit alone under the stars and think of the galaxies inside my heart and truly wonder if anyone will ever want to make sense of all that I am

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Nobody looks at what can’t look. We don’t see what doesn’t see. If love is blind, then so are we, because it’s all around us.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: To love is easy, to be in a relationship is extremely difficult.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: The difference between a karate chop and a high five is the same as the difference between a knife and a paddle. My love can slice like a piece of pizza.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I had a dream about you 2
Quote: I had a dream about you. I told you I loved you, and you stopped folding clothes, turned to look me in my eyes, and replied, “The cat food on the moon is probably all dry.” Then I started crying, because up until that point I had no idea that I meant that much to you and I was overjoyed with raw emotion.

Author: bell hooks,  Communion: The Female Search for Love
Quote: Love is a combination of care, commitment, knowledge, responsibility, respect and trust.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels
Quote: Everything that happens to you matters to me.

Author: Osho
Quote: Millions of people are suffering: they want to be loved but they don't know how to love. And love cannot exist as a monologue; it is a dialogue, a very harmonious dialogue.

Author: Cornelia Funke,  Inkheart
Quote: Dustfinger still clearly remembered the feeling of being in love for the first time. How vulnerable his heart had suddenly been! Such a trembling, quivering thing, happy and miserably unhappy at once.

Author: Yevgeny Zamyatin,  We
Quote: You are afraid of it because it is stronger than you; you hate it because you are afraid of it; you love it because you cannot subdue it to your will. Only the unsubduable can be loved.

Author: أحلام مستغانمي
Quote: ماعاد تعريف الحب اليوم إثنان ينظران بالإتجاه نفسه، بل إثنان ينظران إلى الجهاز نفسه! ولا صارت فرحتنا في أن نلتقي من نحب، بل في تلقّي رسالة هاتفية منه!ماتت الأحاسيس العاطفية الكبيرة بسبب تلك الأفراح التكنولوجية الصغيرة، التي تأتي وتختفي بزرّ منذ سلمنا مصيرنا العاطفي للآلات!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: She had two lips like strawberries, and the seeds gave her kisses texture. I preferred kissing her over two scoops of vanilla ice cream.

Author: James Joyce,  Dubliners
Quote: and yet her name was like a summons to all my foolish blood.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I knocked on her door twice. The second time was from the inside. That’s how love works. At first you want in, and then you want out.

Author: Anne Tyler,  The Accidental Tourist
Quote: I'm beginning to think that maybe it's not just how much you love someone. Maybe what matters is who you are when you're with them.

Author: Jean Anouilh
Quote: There is love of course. And then there's life, its enemy.

Author: Leigh Hunt
Quote: Traveling in the company of those we love is home in motion.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The most confused you will ever get is when you try to convince your heart and spirit of something your mind knows is a lie.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: I am as wrapped up in her as a vine that clings to a tree seeking for sustenance. She’s tied me to her for eternity. She’s my home. She’s my reason for being. To win and hold her heart is my only purpose.

Author: Joyce Maynard
Quote: When I was 12 years old, I read 'Nancy Drew' mysteries and biographies of Madame Curie and Florence Nightingale and books about girls who love horses or go to nursing school. I belonged to the Girl Scouts and got A's in school and rarely disobeyed my parents. I still kept a collection of Barbie dolls in my room, and I almost never spoke to boys.

Author: Garth Nix,  Sabriel
Quote: Touchstone watched, suddenly conscious that he probably only had five seconds left to be alone with Sabriel, to say something, to say anything. Perhaps the last five seconds they ever would have alone together.I am not afraid, he said to himself."I love you,"he whispered. "I hope you don't mind.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Two butterflies in two socks could walk faster than I can run. A love song will jog your memory like I jog like Roger Bannister in a wheelchair.

Author: Marissa Meyer,  Cress
Quote: Knees suddenly weak, she reached for his forearms to stabilize herself. “You came for me.”He beamed, looking for all the world like a selfless, daring hero.“Don’t sound so surprised.” Dropping the cane, he pulled her into a crushing embrace that tore her away from Wolf and lifted her clean off the floor. “It turns out you are worth a lot of money on the black market.

Author: رشاد حسن,  مرآة تبحث عن وجه
Quote: صديقي..الذي تحوّلَ إلى عدوِّي فجأة..بلا سببٍ تحوَّل!رغم أني لم أكُن سببًا في عداوته!ولا أعرفُ ما الدّاعي من غضبهِ وتحوّله..إنك عالقٌ في رأسي على شكلكَ القَديم..شكلكَ وأنت صَديقي!

Author: Euripides,  Medea and Other Plays
Quote: The fiercest anger of all, the most incurable,Is that which rages in the place of dearest love.

Author: Andrew Davidson,  The Gargoyle
Quote: You are mine,I am yours; you may be sure of this. You've been locked inside my heart, the key has been thrown away; within it, you must always stay.

Author: Deb Caletti,  The Queen of Everything
Quote: It's good to let God pick a man for you. We don't do so well when we pick them ourselves. They end up lipsticks in a drawer, all those wrong colors you thought looked so good in the package.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: If my last name were Hunter, I’d probably be a fisherman. That’s just the kind of lover I am.

Author: Jennifer Crusie,  Bet Me
Quote: Nobody in my life has ever known me the way you do. Nobody in my life has ever made me feel as good as you do. You know me, you know everything about me, and when you leave me, you're going to be leaving the real me, the me nobody else has ever seen, that's who you're going to be rejecting.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The salesman said the sale was happening because all the gizmos in the store had to be liquidated. It was a lot of solidfluid, and I would have bought something, but the only thing I was thirsty for was her love.

Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote: Time is too slow for those who wait, too swift for those who fear, too long for those who grieve, too short for those who rejoice, but for those who love, time is eternity.

Author: Rebecca Stead,  When You Reach Me
Quote: Well, it's simple to love someone,"she said. "But it's hard to know when you need to say it out loud.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: We live in a dark and romantic and quite tragic world.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Relationships are like water. If you grab tight, clamping and clenching to gain control, you’ll lose it all. Instead, cup your hand gently, so she feels free to drink until her thirst is quenched.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: It’s easier to hide your smoking habit on a foggy day. Let that be a lesson for you and your secret lover.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me
Quote: I love you,"I whisper. "I love you exactly as you are.

Author: Rachel Vail,  If We Kiss
Quote: I didn't care who kissed you first as long as I kissed you last."-George from If We Kiss

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word in reality. This is why right, temporarily defeated, is stronger than evil triumphant.

Author: Elizabeth Wurtzel,  Prozac Nation
Quote: In a strange way, I had fallen in love with my depression. Dr. Sterling was right about that. I loved it because I thought it was all I had. I thought depression was the part of my character that made me worthwhile. I thought so little of myself, felt that I had such scant offerings to give to the world, that the one thing that justified my existence at all was my agony.

Author: Jessica Chastain
Quote: I don't want to be in my car all day. I love getting up in the morning in Venice and walking my dogs down to the cafe to get my tea, and then perhaps going to a bookstore and sitting and reading, then walking to the beach.

Author: Leigh Bardugo,  Ruin and Rising
Quote: They had an ordinary life, full of ordinary things-if love can ever be called that.

Author: Jenny Han,  P.S. I Still Love You
Quote: I say, “In the contract we said we wouldn’t break each other’s hearts. What if we do it again?” Fiercely he says, “What if we do? If we’re so guarded, it’s not going to be anything. Let’s do it fucking for real, Lara Jean. Let’s go all in. No more contract. No more safety net. You can break my heart. Do whatever you want with it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Love is a bronze statue sinking in quicksand. But if I hand you a lasso, will you try to save the statue—or use the lasso to hang yourself? If you need me, I’ll be here to kick the chair out from under your feet.

Author: Maria V. Snyder,  Poison Study
Quote: But you've slipped under my skin, invaded my blood and seized my heart.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When you say "I"and "my"too much, you lose the capacity to understand the "we"and "our".

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: What is pink, blurry, and always leaving when you’re arriving? Love.

Author: Barbara Kingsolver,  The Poisonwood Bible
Quote: A first child is your own best foot forward, and how you do cheer those little feet as they strike out. You examine every turn of flesh for precocity, and crow it to the world. But the last one: the baby who trails her scent like a flag of surrender through your life when there will be no more coming after--oh, that' s love by a different name.

Author: Anne Tyler
Quote: It is very difficult to live among people you love and hold back from offering them advice.

Author: Ellen Hopkins,  Burned
Quote: God is love,"she said. "And he respects love, whether it's between a parents, and child, a man and woman, or friends. I don't think he cares about religion one little bit. Live your life right. Love with all your heart. Don't hurt others, and help those in need. That is all you need to know. And don't worry about heaven. If it exists, you'll be welcome.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  My love can only occupy one person at a time
Quote: With friends like me, who needs mannequins? My love for you is statuesque. Come, let us dance like we’re made of stone.

Author: Kathryn Stockett,  The Help
Quote: That's what I love about Aibileen, she can take the most complicated things in life and wrap them up so small and simple, they'll fit right in your pocket.

Author: Rumi
Quote: Love comes with a knife, not some shy question, and not with fears for its reputation!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Combine a fog machine and a cotton candy maker to create delicious mystery. This is the heart of romance.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Fiery Heart
Quote: No matter how long or how difficult, we will undo whatever that Moroi boy has done to you."I managed a wavering smile, tasting blood in my mouth. "You sure about that, Dad? Because he's done everything to me.

Author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón,  The Shadow of the Wind
Quote: Man...heats up like a lightbulb: red hot in the twinkling of an eye and cold again in a flash. The female, on the other hand...heats up like an iron. Slowly, over a low heat, like tasty stew. But then, once she has heated up, there's no stopping her.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace
Quote: We are asleep until we fall in Love!

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: She asked if I loved another woman, so I answered honestly and said, “Dinner was great, but I could go for dessert.

Author: Jamie McGuire,  Beautiful Disaster
Quote: I thought I was going to sweat five years before I'd feel like this.""I wanted it as much as you did. I've just got a hell of a poker face"I smiled, pressing my lips against his.

Author: Nick Vujicic
Quote: If we went by the world's definition of who I'm supposed to be because I look weird... 'Well, surely, this guy can't have a productive life, surely, he doesn't have a sense of humor. Surely, he can't love life.' We stereotype people in this world. And so... if the world thinks you're not good enough, it's a lie, you know. Get a second opinion.

Author: Lee Konitz
Quote: A first love always occupies a special place.

Author: Salma Hayek
Quote: I have never denied my background or my culture. I have taught my child to embrace her Mexican heritage, to love my first language, Spanish, to learn about Mexican history, music, folk art, food, and even the Mexican candy I grew up with.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Time Keeper
Quote: I made such a fool of myself,” she lamented.“Love does not make you a fool.”“He didn’t love me back.”“That does not make you a fool, either.”“Just tell me …” Her voice cracked. “When does it stop hurting?”“Sometimes never.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I have never seduced a fish taco for selfish reasons. I am an altruistic lover.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: A string of burglaries is a crime necklace. Everything I have can be stolen except love, because I give it all away.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The summer temperature outside was 45 degrees, so I turned 45 degrees and went right back inside. It was so cold outside because that’s where all her love for me was.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have an inconsequential errand to run tomorrow so I’ll get up at 5, be there at 5:30, and wait for them to open up at 10. I’m never late, except in love.

Author: Charles Dickens
Quote: A man is lucky if he is the first love of a woman. A woman is lucky if she is the last love of a man.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: I coiled my empty straw wrapper around like a snake. Then I bit it before it could bite me. My love is as dangerous as my drinking habits.

Author: J.M. Barrie,  Peter Pan
Quote: You know that place between sleep and awake, that place where you still remember dreaming? That’s where I’ll always love you. That’s where I’ll be waiting.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: We made love like a goat has four legs like a table. If your dining room table can walk, it’s best to eat while sitting in wheelchairs.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Shiver
Quote: I could still smell her on my fur. It clung to me, a memory of another world.I was drunk with it, with the scent of her. I'd got too close.The smell of summer on her skin, the half-recalled cadence of her voice, the sensation of her fingers on my fur. Every bit of me sang with the memory of her closeness.Too close.I couldn't stay away.

Author: Gayle Forman,  Just One Day
Quote: Stains are even worse when you're the only one who can see them.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Iron Knight
Quote: I will be with her again, or I will die. There aren’t any other options

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: A kiss may ruin a human life

Author: Saul Bellow
Quote: It's usually the selfish people who are loved the most. They do what you deny yourself, and you love them for it. You give them your heart.

Author: Jennifer Niven,  All the Bright Places
Quote: I do my best thinking at night when everyone else is sleeping. No interruptions. No noise. I like the feeling of being awake when no one else is.

Author: Mikhail Bulgakov,  The Master and Margarita
Quote: Follow me, reader! Who told you that there is no true, faithful, eternal love in this world! May the liar's vile tongue be cut out! Follow me, my reader, and me alone, and I will show you such a love!

Author: Khaled Hosseini,  The Kite Runner
Quote: The problem, of course, was that [he] saw the world in black and white. And he got to decide what was black and what was white. You can't love a person who lives that way without fearing him too. Maybe even hating him a little.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I am the three minutes of 180 seconds, and I don’t do refills. I’m a lover, not a farmer.

Author: Dora J. Arod,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: My love is meatloaf flavored. I just wish my meatloaf was also meatloaf flavored.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is like 9.75 plus .25. That’s 10, for all of you people trying to add fractions on your fingers. I can only count using eight, because I’m too busy using my middle fingers to tell the politicians how much I love them.

Author: Marguerite Duras
Quote: You have to be very fond of men. Very, very fond. You have to be very fond of them to love them. Otherwise they're simply unbearable.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love waits patiently. In the lobby. I’ll be with you as soon as I can.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: And besides . . . I don’t want to leave you. Er, you guys.”He smiled, and it lit up his whole face. “Well, ‘we’ are certainly happy to hear that. Oh, and I’m also happy to watch our darling little love child dragon while you’re in St. Louis.”I grinned back.

Author: Kiera Cass,  The Elite
Quote: He must love you very much,' Gavril said once I had my footing.I couldn't look at him. 'What makes you say that?' Gavril sighed. 'I've known Maxon since he was a child. He's never stood up to his father like that.

Author: John Rhys-Davies
Quote: In the film world, we can all be heroes. In the real world, where heroism can cost you your life or the life of the ones you love, people aren't so willing to make those sacrifices. When they do, they are set apart from the rest of us.

Author: Sri Chinmoy
Quote: Listen to the inner light; it will guide you. Listen to inner peace; it will feed you. Listen to inner love; it will transform you, it will divinise you, it will immortalise you.

Author: Rosamund Hodge,  Cruel Beauty
Quote: They said that love was terrifying and tender, wild and sweet, and none of it made any sense.But now I knew that every mad word was true.

Author: David Levithan,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson
Quote: You know what’s a great metaphor for love? Sleeping beauty. Because you have to plow through this incredible thicket of thorns in order to get to beauty, and even then, when you get there, you still have to wake her up.— Tiny Cooper

Author: bell hooks,  All About Love: New Visions
Quote: To return to love, to get the love we always wanted but never had, to have the love we want but are not prepared to give, we seek romantic relationships. We believe these relationships, more than any other, will rescue and redeem us. True love does have the power to redeem but only if we are ready for redemption. Love saves us only if we want to be saved.

Author: Aaron Ben-Ze'ev
Quote: Sometimes loneliness makes the loudest noise.

Author: Robert Browning
Quote: how sad and bad and mad it was - but then, how it was sweet

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: If I could bronze my love, it’d be worthy of a silver medal.

Author: Timothy Keller
Quote: Falling in love in a Christian way is to say,'I am excited about your future and I want to be part of getting you there. I'm signing up for the journey with you. Would you sign up for the journey to my true self with me? It's going to be hard but I want to get there.

Author: Jodi Picoult
Quote: You don't have to say I love you to say I love you,"you said with a shrug. "All you have to do is say my name and I know."..."Can't you hear it?"you said. "When you love someone, you say their name different. Like it's safe inside your mouth.

Author: David Levithan,  The Lover's Dictionary
Quote: breathtaking, adj.Those mornings when we kiss and surrender for an hour before we say a single word.

Author: Chuck Klosterman,  Sex, Drugs, and Cocoa Puffs: A Low Culture Manifesto
Quote: I once loved a girl who almost loved me, but not as much as she loved John Cusack.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  This Side of Paradise
Quote: You know I'm old in some ways-in others-well, I'm just a little girl. I like sunshine and pretty things and cheerfulness-and I dread responsibility.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  November 9
Quote: You can’t leave yet. I’m not finished falling in love with you.

Author: Michael Ondaatje,  The Cat's Table
Quote: We all have an old knot in the heart we wish to untie.

Author: Banana Yoshimoto,  Goodbye Tsugumi
Quote: Love is the kind of thing that's already happening by the time you notice it, that's how it works, and no matter how old you get, that doesn't change. Except that you can break it up into two entirely distinct types -- love where there's an end in sight and love where there isn't.

Author: Kristin Hannah,  The Nightingale
Quote: If I have learned anything in this long life of mine, it is this: in love we find out who we want to be; in war we find out who we are.

Author: Heather Brewer,  Ninth Grade Slays
Quote: It never gets easier, missing you. And sometimes I wonder if it ever will.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: He who is in love is wise and is becoming wiser, sees newly every time he looks at the object beloved, drawing from it with his eyes and his mind those virtues which it possesses.

Author: Jack Johnson
Quote: But you're so busy changing the worldJust one smile can change all of mine

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Wedding
Quote: Every time I read to her, it was like I was courting her, because sometimes, just sometimes, she would fall in love with me again, just like she had a long time ago. And that's the most wonderful feeling in the world. How many people are ever given that chance? To have someone you love fall in love with you over and over?

Author: Josephine Angelini,  Starcrossed
Quote: I only have so much willpower, Helen,"he whispered. "And since you apparently sleep in the most ridiculously transparent tank top I've ever seen, I'm going to have to ask you to get under the covers before I do something stupid.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Plain Truth
Quote: If you didn't remember something happening, was it because it never had happened? Or because you wished it hadn't?

Author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic
Quote: Unrequited love is the only possible way to give yourself to another without being held in indentured servitude.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life
Quote: Love is an art. Mine could fill a museum the size of your heart.

Author: Gretchen Rubin
Quote: I have a lucky perfume. I love beautiful smells, but I save one of my favorite perfumes to wear only when I feel like I need some extra luck.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: My love is rare, like a hornless unicorn.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love when my cat crushes his forehead into mine like my skull is an empty beer can. But it’s not—there’s still a sip left.

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: You know that I could as soon forget you as my existence!

Author: Erich Fromm
Quote: Love is not primarily a relationship to a specific person; it is an attitude, an ordination of character which determines the relatedness of the person to the whole world as a whole, not toward one object of love

Author: Sarah Ockler,  Twenty Boy Summer
Quote: I really don't even know you, and yet, in my life, you are forever entangled; to my history, inextricably bound.

Author: Coco J. Ginger
Quote: Growth in love comes from a place of absence, where the imagination is left to it’s own devices and creates you to be much more then reality would ever allow.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Twelfth Night
Quote: If music be the food of love, play on.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Tender Is the Night
Quote: Think how you love me,"she whispered. "I don’t ask you to love me always like this, but I ask you to remember. Somewhere inside me there’ll always be the person I am to-night.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Lightning doesn’t thunder twice. Let that be a lesson in love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love you the way ice melts in vodka—slowly, seamlessly, and invisibly. It’s a feel-good feeling whether you see it or not.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Blood Promise
Quote: Yet, it had been Dimitri’s gentleness and thoughtfulness mixed with that deadliness that made him so wonderful. The same hands that wielded stakes with such precision would carefully brush the hair out of my face. The eyes that could astutely spot any danger in the area would regard me wonderingly and worshipfully, like I was the most beautiful and amazing woman in the world.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Silence
Quote: Right now, I had everything I could ask for. It wasn't a long list, but it was a very satisfying one, starting with the love of my life back in my arms.

Author: Wendelin Van Draanen,  Flipped
Quote: It's easy to look back and see it, and it's easy to give the advice. But the sad fact is, most people don't look beneath the surface until it's too late.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you want to steal my heart, you must realize it's not a one-time heist. This theft will take every minute of the rest of your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: I don’t mind waiting rooms. I’m waiting on the love of my life, so I may as well have a seat, right?

Author: John Edward Williams,  Stoner
Quote: In his forty-third year William Stoner learned what others, much younger, had learned before him: that the person one loves at first is not the person one loves at last, and that love is not an end but a process through which one person attempts to know another.

Author: James Patterson,  Max
Quote: If you love something let it go.. if it comes back its yours

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Don’t ever let the sun set on our love. Not even if it’s so gorgeous it’d make a great postcard. $1.99, if interested.

Author: Molly Ringle,  Relatively Honest
Quote: And I got out of there without punching anyone, kicking anyone, or breaking down in tears. Some days the small victories are all you achieve.

Author: Channing Tatum
Quote: I don't know if I'm very complicated at all. I wish I was. I wish I was one of these deep, intricate people. But I just love having fun really.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I'm not crying because of you; you're not worth it. I'm crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: I'm like a starving man who has been given food. Maybe he's cold, and his clothes are torn, and he's ashamed, but he's not unhappy.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  Anansi Boys
Quote: They were kissing. Put like that, and you could be forgiven for presuming that this was a normal kiss, all lips and skin and possibly even a little tongue. You'd miss how he smiled, how his eyes glowed. And then, after the kiss was done, how he stood, like a man who had just discovered the art of standing and had figured out how to do it better than anyone else who would ever come along.

Author: J. California Cooper
Quote: Love entered in my heart one dayA sad, unwelcome guest.But when it begged that it might stayI let it stay and restIt broke my nights with sorrowingIt filled my heart with fearsAnd, when my soul was prone to sing,It filled my eyes with tears.But...now that it has gone its way,I miss the dear ole pain.And, sometimes, in the night I prayThat Love might come again.

Author: Junot Díaz,  The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao
Quote: She was the kind of girlfriend God gives you young, so you'll know loss the rest of your life.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: No one compares to you, but there's no you, except in my dreams tonight.

Author: John Boyne,  The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
Quote: ...Despite the mayhem that followed, Bruno found that he was still holding Shmuel's hand in his own and nothing in the world would have persuaded him to let go.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Linger
Quote: What are you wishing for?' Grace interrupted. 'To kiss you,' I said to her.

Author: Henry James,  The Portrait of a Lady
Quote: I'm yours for ever--for ever and ever. Here I stand; I'm as firm as a rock. If you'll only trust me, how little you'll be disappointed. Be mine as I am yours.

Author: Franz Kafka
Quote: May I kiss you then? On this miserable paper? I might as well open the window and kiss the night air.

Author: Hubert Selby Jr.,  Requiem for a Dream
Quote: But you cant shut everyone out. I mean you have to have someone to love. . .someone to hold on to. . . someone--

Author: Margaret Mitchell,  Gone with the Wind
Quote: Say you’ll marry me when I come back or, before God, I won’t go. I’ll stay around here and play a guitar under your window every night and sing at the top of my voice and compromise you, so you’ll have to marry me to save your reputation.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Sugar Daddy
Quote: If loneliness was a choice, what was the other option? To settle for second-best and try to be happy with that? And was that fair to the person you settled for?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The size of your sighs tell how deeply you’re in love. How I feel is very much like a stressed and distressed midget trying to breathe.

Author: Kim Sowol
Quote: When you leave,weary of me,without a word I shall gently let you go.

Author: Koushun Takami,  Battle Royale
Quote: Loving someone always requires you to not love others.

Author: Louisa May Alcott,  Little Women
Quote: You don’t need scores of suitors. You need only one… if he’s the right one.

Author: Anne Sexton
Quote: Do you like me?”No answer.Silence bounced, fell off his tongueand sat between usand clogged my throat.It slaughtered my trust.It tore cigarettes out of my mouth.We exchanged blind words,and I did not cry,I did not beg,but blackness filled my ears,blackness lunged in my heart,and something that had been good,a sort of kindly oxygen,turned into a gas oven.

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: I am lonely, yet not everybody will do. I don’t know why, some people fill the gaps and others emphasize my loneliness.

Author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips,  Ain't She Sweet
Quote: When male authors write love stories, the heroine tends to end up dead.

Author: Dean Ornish
Quote: The need for love and intimacy is a fundamental human need, as primal as the need for food, water, and air.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: In high school I used to write my love notes backwards, so she'd have to flip the paper upside-down to read it. Either that or read it in a mirror, so she can see herself as I see her, and see why I admire her.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me
Quote: I touch the tip of my finger to his lips. "There are secrets in here,"I say. "I want them out."He tries to bite my finger.I steal it back.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You approached all relationships with authenticity and honesty? Let today be the day…You dedicate yourself to building relationships on the solid foundation of truth and authenticity.

Author: Audrey Niffenegger
Quote: Clare, I want to tell you, again, I love you. Our love has been the thread through the labyrinth, the net under the high-wire walker, the only real thing in this strange life of mine that I could ever trust. Tonight I feel that my love for you has more density in this world than I do, myself: as though it could linger on after me and surround you, keep you, hold you.

Author: Tony DeLiso,  Legacy: The Power Within
Quote: Happiness is part of who we are. Joy is the feeling

Author: Leo Tolstoy
Quote: I wanted movement and not a calm course of existence. I wanted excitement and danger and the chance to sacrifice myself for my love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I spoke like a spoke on a wheel, as I went around and around without actually saying what I wanted to say. I was love flustered.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love is like learning to ride a midget, which I’ve never done because I’m afraid of heights.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The fragrance of romance is gratitude. Nothing says I love you like saying I love you. Sure, it’s better to show your love, but why not also say it?

Author: Khaled Hosseini,  A Thousand Splendid Suns
Quote: And the past held only this wisdom: that love was a damaging mistake, and its accomplice, hope, a treacherous illusion. And whenever those twin poisonous flowers began to sprout in the parched land of that field, Mariam uprooted them. She uprooted them and ditched them before they took hold.

Author: Gwen Hayes,  Falling Under
Quote: Do you think it’s easy for me? No, I don’t remember you.
