I don’t remember holding you or talking to you or falling in love with you—but I walk around with a giant hole in my heart all the time. I feel your absence every second of the day. It aches and nothing soothes it. Losing you is bad enough, but I don’t even get the comfort of remembering that I had you once.-Haden

Author: John Green,  An Abundance of Katherines
Quote: The feeling of loving her and being loved by her welled up in him, and he could taste the adrenaline in the back of his throat, and maybe it wasn't over, and maybe he could feel her hand in his again and hear her loud, brash voice contort itself into a whisper to say I-love-you as if it were a secret, and an immense one.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She makes my heart melt. There is a limited supply of sips, so grab a straw and start slurping while you can.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: I told you,"he whispers back. I can feel his breath just tickling the space behind my ear, making my hair prick up on my neck. "I like you.""You don't know me,"I say quickly."I want to, though.

Author: Gayle Roper,  Shadows on the Sand
Quote: Find a woman who makes you feel more alive. She won't make life perfect but she'll make it infinitely more interesting. And then love her with all that's in you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love is the most amazing feeling in the world. Let me double check. Yep, love is a feeling.

Author: Jennifer Salaiz
Quote: How 'bout a shot of truth in that denial cocktail.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Relationships are like Rome -- difficult to start out, incredible during the prosperity of the 'golden age', and unbearable during the fall. Then, a new kingdom will come along and the whole process will repeat itself until you come across a kingdom like Egypt... that thrives, and continues to flourish. This kingdom will become your best friend, your soul mate, and your love.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Linger
Quote: Right now, it's hard to imagine that it is raining anywhere in the world.

Author: Erich Segal
Quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Betrayal is an ironic thing. He or she betrays you then you betray yourself. You think you’re showing strength with your anger, but in reality you’re showing how much you still care.

Author: Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum
Quote: I want Dubai to be a place where everybody from all over the world meets each other, don't think of fighting or hate, just love it, enjoy their sport, and that's it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I wrote you a love letter. I used invisible ink to show I was being transparent with my feelings. And also to hide my feelings.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez
Quote: Never stop smiling not even when you're sad, someone might fall in love with your smile.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Mine Till Midnight
Quote: The question, love, is whether you want me enough to take the risk.

Author: Amit Kalantri
Quote: I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me
Quote: I feel like I’ve been split open and stuffed with sunshine.

Author: Jenny Han,  To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Quote: If love is like a possession, maybe my letter are like my exorcisms

Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote: Sometimes that mountain you've been climbing is just a grain of sand, and what you've been up there searching for forever, is in your hands. When you figure out love is all that matters after all it sure makes everything else seem so small.

Author: Emilie Autumn,  The Asylum for Wayward Victorian Girls
Quote: I cut myself because you wouldn't let me cry.I cried because you wouldn't let me speak.I spoke because you wouldn't let me shine.I shone because I thought you loved me...

Author: Faraaz Kazi
Quote: No matter how bad your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief.

Author: Mia Asher,  Arsen: A Broken Love Story
Quote: Love is never supposed to hurt. Love is supposed to heal, to be your haven from misery, to make living fucking worthwhile.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  1Q84
Quote: I've been lonely for so long. And I've been hurt so deeply. If only I could have met you again a long time ago, then I wouldn't have had to take all these detours to get here.'Tengo shook his head. 'I don't think so. This way is just fine. This is exactly the right time. For both of us. [...] We needed that much time.... to understand how lonely we really were.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She plants love, and she grows roses. The fragrance of romance comes from the blossom that blooms in the heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The strands of DNA are like strings, and it’s as if I am a walking guitar, a musical being whose vibration can be heard as love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My cup is full of air. I should empty it and fill it with love. Or coffee, as the two are synonymous to me.

Author: Robert James Waller,  The Bridges of Madison County
Quote: In a universe of ambiguity, this kind of certainty comes only once, and never again, no matter how many lifetimes you live.

Author: Jennifer E. Smith,  The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight
Quote: Is it possible not to ever know your type-not to even know you have a type-until quite suddenly you do?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  My love can only occupy one person at a time
Quote: We got into an argument over the color of love. I said it was pink, and he said it was red. So you see, I had no other choice but to stab him.

Author: Ellen Barkin
Quote: You've got a movie where the pro-choice family gives their daughter no choice. The pro-life family murders. What seems to be the good mother, the kind of hippie painter, sweet and cute mother has no love for her daughter really.

Author: Renee Ahdieh,  The Wrath and the Dawn
Quote: You honestly expect me to breathe in a world without air?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The roses of romance grow when you water your relationship with gratitude. Love will bloom and blossom when you recognize the awesome.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love may make you feel blue, love may make you feel green, and sometimes love may even make you feel turquoise or teal. Depression and envy get all the pretty shades of description, and I love that, but in a pink/purple kind of way.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The word long is short, and so is the word short, but why is the word love as long as long? Shouldn’t it be longer?

Author: Diablo Cody,  Juno: The Shooting Script
Quote: He is the cheese to my macaroni.

Author: Michel de Montaigne,  The Complete Essays
Quote: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.

Author: Sue Monk Kidd,  The Secret Life of Bees
Quote: We are so limited, you have to use the same word for loving Rosaleen as you do for loving Coke with peanuts. Isn't that a shame we don't have many more ways to say it?

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Human relationships always help us to carry on because they always presuppose further developments, a future - and also because we live as if our only task was precisely to have relationships with other people.

Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote: You smiled and talked to me of nothing and I felt that for this I had been waiting long.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Ink is drinkable and printable. The words “I love you” don’t take up much space, but they can quench your thirst forever.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The going rate for love is going away. And the more you go away, the more expensive it gets.

Author: Dorothy Parker
Quote: Love is like quicksilver in the hand. Leave the fingers open and it stays. Clutch it and it darts away.

Author: Michael Ondaatje,  The English Patient
Quote: I believe this. When we meet those we fall in love with, there is an aspect of our spirit that is historian, a bit of a pedant who reminisces or remembers a meeting when the other has passed by innocently…but all parts of the body must be ready for the other, all atoms must jump in one direction for desire to occur.

Author: Francesca Lia Block,  Dangerous Angels
Quote: I want him to see the flowers in my eyes and hear the songs in my hands.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My heart is locked away in a cage surrounded by ribs. That’s to protect it, and to keep the world safe. It’s currently serving a life sentence.

Author: Andrew Davidson,  The Gargoyle
Quote: Accidents ambush the unsuspecting, often violently, just like love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: Water can be as hard as ice and as soft as fog, which is why my love is so drinkable, because it is fluid and forgiving. It's easy to love until there's nothing left. Eventually, the water runs out, the ice melts, and the fog fades into an abyss.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Message in a Bottle
Quote: I am lost without you. I am soulless, a drifter without a home, a solitary bird in a flight to nowhere. I am all these things, and I am nothing at all. This, my darling, is my life without you. I long for you to show me how to live again.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love is powdered sunshine. Just add water. (Warning: Do NOT attempt to snort it or distribute as a healthy cocaine substitute.)

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: The New King James Version
Quote: And though I have the gift of prophecy, and understand all mysteries, and all knowledge; and though I have all faith, so that I could remove mountains, but have not love, I am nothing.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: My heart is burning a hole in my chest and every time you speak to me, it keeps sinking, and I'm left with nothing but ashes. I wish she were talking to me, because the more she speaks to me, the more my heart flutters like a rising phoenix.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Princess Diana
Quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.

Author: William R. Alger
Quote: Words of love, are works of love.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: Because I trust in the ever-changing climate of the heart. (At least, today I feel that way.) I think it is necessary to have many experiences for the sake of feeling something; for the sake of being challenged, and for the sake of being expressive, to offer something to someone else, to learn what we are capable of.

Author: Alexandra Potter,  Do You Come Here Often?
Quote: ...when you decide you want to be with someone forever, you want forever to start right now.

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: When your beauty struck me, it dissolved me. Deep down, I am not different from you. I dreamed you, I wished for your existence. I see in you that part of me which is you. I surrender my sincerity because if I love you it means we share the same fantasies, we share the same madness.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Handle with Care
Quote: What we all want, really, is to be loved. That craving drives our worst behavior.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  Lady Windermere's Fan
Quote: My life-my whole life- take it, and do with it what you will. I love you-love you as I have never loved any living thing. From the moment I met you I loved you, loved you blindly, adoringly,madly!You didn't know it then-you know it now.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Quote: I am beginning to understand,"said the little prince. "There is a flower... I think that she has tamed me...

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love for you grows daily, and all it takes is exposure to your sunny disposition, coupled with watering it with coffee.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  One Hundred Years of Solitude
Quote: Gaston was not only a fierce lover, with endless wisdom and imagination, but he was also, perhaps, the first man in the history of the species who had made an emergency landing and had come close to killing himself and his sweetheart simply to make love in a field of violets.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  November 9
Quote: If we’re going to kiss, it has to be book-worthy.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To be angry is easy, but to forgive is hard. That's why to love is easy, and to love is hard. I try to be so hard that I'm soft, like a liquid rock, fluid and forgiving, but unmovable in my resolve.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love was too cold, like an anti-oven. That's called a freezer, and sometimes it burns food. She gave me heartburn, just like coffee, and it really woke me up to the reality of relationships.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  What Happened to Goodbye
Quote: You asked me to go out with you. I know you probably changed your mind. But you should know, the answer was yes. It's always been yes when it comes to you.

Author: Irène Némirovsky,  Suite Française
Quote: Waiting is erotic

Author: Alice Hoffman,  Local Girls
Quote: ...he had a way of taking your hand which made it clear he'd have to be the one to let go."From Alice Hoffman's "Local Girls", pg.102.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote: Once the realization is accepted that even between the closest human beings infinite distances continue, a wonderful living side by side can grow, if they succeed in loving the distance between them which makes it possible for each to see the other whole against the sky.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Silence
Quote: I missed you, Angel. Not one day went by that I didn't feel you missing from my life. You haunted me to the point that I began to believe Hank had gone back on his oath and killed you. I couldn't escape you and I didn't want to. You tortured me, but it was better than losing you.

Author: Rae Carson,  The Bitter Kingdom
Quote: I think sometimes when we find love we pretend it away, or ignore it, or tell ourselves we’re imagining it. Because it is the most painful kind of hope there is.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Water is translucent, but not invisible. But a glass half full is half translucent, half invisible, and you cannot drink what you cannot see, which may be why I am so thirsty for her love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: What reading level is the word love? It’s a four-letter word everybody knows the meaning of, but nobody can define it.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Carry On
Quote: What you are is a fucking tragedy, Simon Snow. You literally couldn't be a bigger mess."He tries to kiss me, but I pull back- "And you like that?""I love it."He says"Why?""Because we match.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Love, and you shall be loved.

Author: Miguel Ruiz,  The Mastery of Love: A Practical Guide to the Art of Relationship
Quote: You don't need to justify your love, you don't need to explain your love, you just need to practice your love. Practice creates the master.

Author: Anirban Bose,  Bombay Rains, Bombay Girls
Quote: The desire to love someone always exceeds the desire to be loved by someone & that's exactly why we end up loving the person who doesn't deserve that LOVE.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Destroy Me
Quote: That this girl would know exactly how to shatter me.

Author: Stephen Kendrick,  The Love Dare
Quote: Love chooses to believe the best about people. It gives them the benefit of the doubt. It refuses to fill in the unknowns with negative assumptions. And when our worst hopes are proven to be true, love makes every effort to deal with them and move forward. As much as possible, love focuses on the positive.

Author: Philippa Gregory,  The Other Boleyn Girl
Quote: I can't sleep, I can't eat, I can't do anything but think about him. At night I dream of him, all day I wait to see him, and when I do see him my heart turns over and I think I will faint with desire.

Author: Jenny Han,  To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Quote: I delete the picture of him from my phone; I delete his number. I think that if I just delete him enough, it will be like none of it ever happened and my heart won't hurt so badly

Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote: Love keeps the cold out better than a cloak.

Author: William Shakespeare,  A Midsummer Night's Dream
Quote: I’ll follow thee and make a heaven of hell,To die upon the hand I love so well.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you find yourself thirsting for my love, don’t forget that I sell straws in a variety of flavors. What is the price of romance? Good question. Today only it’s on sale for half-off wholesale prices. Everything must go. My entire inventory of straws is being liquidated.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is a Heaven Cake, with clouds for icing. If there are two pieces left, I guess I can have seconds.

Author: Emma Thompson,  The Sense and Sensibility Screenplay and Diaries: Bringing Jane Austen's Novel to Film
Quote: Can he love her? Can the soul really be satisfied with such polite affections? To love is to burn - to be on fire, like Juliet or Guinevere or Eloise...

Author: W.B. Yeats,  The Collected Poems of W.B. Yeats
Quote: How many loved your moments of glad grace,  And loved your beauty with love false or true;  But one man loved the pilgrim soul in you, And loved the sorrows of your changing face.

Author: Alexandre Dumas
Quote: True love always makes a man better, no matter what woman inspires it.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Forever
Quote: Many, many readers have written asking me wistfully about the nature of Sam and Grace's relationship, and I can assure you, that sort is absolutely real. Mutual, respectful, enduring love is completely attainable as long as you swear you won't settle for less.

Author: Jim Valvano
Quote: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: Love is like a forest, I think as I kill trees by squandering toilet paper while “decorating” my ex girlfriend’s front yard.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Either I will love you, or I will love you if and only if you love me in return. I prefer the former.

Author: Charlotte Eriksson,  Empty Roads & Broken Bottles; in search for The Great Perhaps
Quote: So for now,I will miss you like I’ll never see you again,And the next time I see you,I will kiss you like I’ll never kiss you again,And when I fall asleep beside you I will fall asleep as if I’ll never wake up again,because I don’t know if I will.I don’t know if I will.- I Will Love You Like The World Is Ending

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have the superhero gift of invisibility. I must be invisible, because the woman I love doesn’t see me. I might as well be into Helen Keller.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I could bronze my love, it’d be worthy of a silver medal. I would pour you a large glass of Michael Phelps, but I don’t have that much water.

Author: Cher
Quote: A girl can wait for the right man to come along but in the meantime that doesn't mean she can't have a wonderful time with all the wrong ones

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: I know I love her, because when I see her my heart beats like a drum. If she played guitar and sang, we could start a band.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  Mrs. Dalloway
Quote: To love makes one solitary.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The thirstiest bird is surely the swallow. My love is so fluid I’ll bet drinking it would give you the gift of flight.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: Under loves heavy burden do I sink.--Romeo

Author: Jorge Luis Borges
Quote: To fall in love is to create a religion that has a fallible god.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 2: The Doll's House
Quote: For love is no part of the dreamworld. Love belongs to Desire, and Desire is always cruel.

Author: Pearl Cleage,  Just Wanna Testify
Quote: ...no woman can love a weak man hard enough to make him strong.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: White letters plus white paper equals invisibility. Just because you can’t see my love for you, doesn’t mean I didn’t write about it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have a lot of love to give, because free samples are the best way to encourage sales.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My I love yous were watered down, which was how I was able to grow such a beautiful garden. I’m a relationship farmer, and I’m growing as a person.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Vanishing Acts
Quote: Sometimes I think my whole life has been about holding on to you.

Author: Sara Zarr,  Sweethearts
Quote: Because love, love is never finished. It circles and circles, the memories out of order and not always complete.

Author: John Bytheway,  When Times Are Tough: 5 Scriptures That Will Help You Get Through Almost Anything
Quote: If our testimonies are strong onthis point and if we feel the absolute assurance that God loves us, we will change our questons. We won't ask, 'Why did this happen?' or 'Why doesn't God care about me?' Instead, our questions will become, 'What can I learn from this experience?' or 'How does the Lord want me to handle this?

Author: Seth Brown
Quote: True friends will always push you towards the great possibilities of your future, false friends will always chain you to the mistakes in your past.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.
Quote: Hydrogenated and androgynous milky white love is all I have to offer you. Would you like me to pour it in your coffee, or directly into your soul?

Author: Sarah Dessen,  What Happened to Goodbye
Quote: You want to take me to a movie?"I asked. "Well, not really,"he said. "What I really want is for you to be my girlfriend. But I thought saying that might scare you off.

Author: Al Pacino,  Al Pacino
Quote: I don’t understand the hatred and fear of gays and bisexuals and lesbians…it’s a concept I honestly cannot grasp. To me, it’s not who you love…a man, a woman, what have you…it’s the fact that you love. That is all that truly matters.

Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote: The Eskimo has fifty-names for snow because it is important to them; there ought to be as many for love.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: She was stuck in between two worlds while her heart was pulling them both together. In a perfect world, she'd have both, or none at all. The symbol for love is two circles trying to merge in a Venn diagram that comes to a point down below, and only mostly separate are the two orbs one whole heart.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson,  In Memoriam
Quote: I hold it true, whate'er befall;I feel it when I sorrow most;'Tis better to have loved and lostThan never to have loved at all.

Author: Stefan Zweig,  The Burning Secret and other stories
Quote: The strength of a love is always misjudged if we evaluate it by its immediate cause and not the stress that went before it, the dark and hollow space full of disappointment and loneliness that precedes all the great events in the heart's history.

Author: Diana Wynne Jones,  Fire and Hemlock
Quote: To love someone enough to let them go, you had to let them go forever or you did not love them that much.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Married By Morning
Quote: You are not a perfect woman.You have an evil temper, you’re as blind as a mole, you’re a deplorable poet, and frankly, your French accent could use some work.” Supporting himself on his elbows, Leo took her face in his hands. “But when I put those things together with the rest of you, it makes you into the most perfectly imperfect woman I’ve ever known.

Author: Amy Tan,  The Joy Luck Club
Quote: Isn't hate merely the result of wounded love?

Author: Rick Astley
Quote: My success set me up for life, and it meant that I could retire from the music industry at 27 to spend time with my newborn daughter and my wife. My time away from the spotlight allowed me to rediscover my love for music, and I'm doing it for me now and no one else.

Author: Abdul Qadeer Khan
Quote: I have to ask Allah's forgiveness and not get angry, because they come to me out of love, and it's not fitting that I should turn to them in hatred.

Author: Alex Flinn,  Beastly
Quote: I love you, I thought. But I didn’t say it. It was not that I feared she would laugh in my face. She was far too kind for that. My fear was a greater one— that she won’t say it back.

Author: Stephanie Perkins,  Lola and the Boy Next Door
Quote: I look at you, and I think about you, and ... I don't know. No one has ever confounded me the way you do.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My goal is to be as forgiving as a man with amnesia, but love as if I remember and cherish all the things you do that make me smile.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: Love has a shape, but no color. You’re probably wondering, “If it’s transparent, how do you know what shape it is?” Good question. Well, for one thing, I put it together, and for another, I’m currently wearing it like body armor (though to the casual observer, I appear naked).

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: I feel…and I have reason to believe…that we could come to mean something to each other.

Author: Dan Pearce,  Single Dad Laughing
Quote: People who love themselves, don’t hurt other people. The more we hate ourselves, the more we want others to suffer.

Author: E.M. Forster,  A Room with a View
Quote: This desire to govern a woman -- it lies very deep, and men and women must fight it together.... But I do love you surely in a better way then he does."He thought. "Yes -- really in a better way. I want you to have your own thoughts even when I hold you in my arms.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: No."Magnus strode toward him. "I didn't call you because I'm tired of you only wanting me around when you need something. I'm tired of watching you be in love with someone else-someone, incidentally, who will never love you back. Not the way I do.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: Every time I close my eyes, it's like a dark paradise. No one compares to you, but there's no you, except in my dreams tonight

Author: David Viscott
Quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.

Author: Katherine Owen,  Not To Us
Quote: There are all kinds of ways for a relationship to be tested, even broken, some, irrevocably; it’s the endings we’re unprepared for.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace
Quote: Everything I know, I know because of love.

Author: Gayle Forman,  Just One Year
Quote: Love is not something you protect. It’s something you risk.

Author: Sylvia Day,  Reflected in You
Quote: You put me through hell. On purpose. Made me suffer. And there’s no end in sight. I don’t know what the fuck you’re doing, ace, but this Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde shit ain’t cutting it with me.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: You have killed my love. You used to stir my imagination. Now you don't even stir my curiosity. You simply produce no effect. I loved you because you were marvelous, because you had genius and intellect, because you realized the dreams of great poets and gave shape and substance to the shadows of art. You have thrown it all away. You are shallow and stupid

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She cuts me deep with her words, with her withholding of words, and with her knife. I’m not sure which is the most painful.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: When the world is cold, use bridges for firewood. And for extra warmth, give off an aura of love, and you won't need a bridge, because the other side will come to you.-Amanda Mosher and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The Sacred and The Scared. Which of these two categories does your love fall under? I should write a love poem on a rolled-up scroll so you’d know which one categorizes mine.

Author: Jodi Picoult
Quote: Take it from me: love has all the lasting permanence of a rainbow- beautiful while it's there, and just as likely to have disappeared by the time you blink.

Author: Gregory David Roberts,  Shantaram
Quote: One of the reasons why we crave love, and seek it so desperately, is that love is the only cure for loneliness, and shame, and sorrow. But some feelings sink so deep into the heart that only loneliness can help you find them again. Some truths about yourself are so painful that only shame can help you live with them. And some things are just so sad that only your soul can do the crying for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Gold is liquid sunlight frozen in time, and that’s why I love the way ice melts in vodka. I also love the way ice melts in vodka. I’ll have another shot, if you’ll reload the revolver.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: The reality of loving God is loving him like he's a Superhero who actually saved you from stuff rather than a Santa Claus who merely gave you some stuff.

Author: George Burns
Quote: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate.

Author: Thomas de Quincey
Quote: Cows are amongst the gentlest of breathing creatures; none show more passionate tenderness to their young when deprived of them; and, in short, I am not ashamed to profess a deep love for these quiet creatures.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I am so extreme that I do parkour like a caterpillar gyrates. My movements are slow and methodical, but eventually my free running takes flight. I love the same exact way, and my romance has the essence of a butterfly.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can sell you wine and I can sell you flowers, but I can't sell you romance, because that comes from your heart, and it's free.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A love story in six words: Hello. Goodbye. In between was marriage.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Poor is the man who thinks money makes him wealthy. Love is the true treasure, and the more you give away, the more you have.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: Without love we all like birds with broken wings.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Keeping Faith
Quote: My mother used to tell me that when push comes to shove, you always know who to turn to. That being a family isn't a social construct but an instinct.

Author: Hāfez
Quote: Your love should never be offered to the mouth of a Stranger / Only to someone who has the valor and daring to cut pieces of their soul off with a knife / Then weave them into a blanket to protect you.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me
Quote: Please,"he says. "I'm begging you to stop."I still. "I can't stomach your pain,"he says. "I can feel it so strongly and it's making me crazy- please,"he says to me. "Don't be sad. Or hurt. Or guilty. You've done nothing wrong.""I'm sorry-""Don't be sorry, either,"he says. "God, the only reason I'm not going to kill Kent for this is because I know it would only upset you more.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Blood Rites
Quote: Love is another kind of power, which shouldn't surprise you. Magic comes from emotions, among other things. And when two people are together, in that intimacy, when they really, selflessly love each other it changes them both. It lingers on in the energy of their lives, even when they are apart.

Author: Allan Rufus,  The Master's Sacred Knowledge
Quote: Life is like a game of chess.To win you have to make a move.Knowing which move to make comes with IN-SIGHTand knowledge, and by learning the lessons that areacculated along the way.We become each and every piece within the game called life!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Every day I’m growing as a man. I’m not growing in height, but rather I’m growing in love, which makes me seem taller than I really am.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I used to gorge on gorgeous women, but now I look for things that can’t be seen with the eyes, but are only detected by the heart. This is love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To wait on love is to tie a weight on your heart and slowly drown. Why sink when you can fly by freely giving love away?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: People don't care what I wear or don't wear, and even if I don't wear anything people will cover for me if they know that I care about them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
Quote: Kevin Love has a last name that sums up my feelings for you. But then again, so does Renaldo Letsfucktonight.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You can use your mouth to speak the words I love you, or you can use your mouth to kiss me and transport love from your mind to my heart.

Author: Kaui Hart Hemmings,  The Descendants
Quote: Why is it so hard to articulate love yet so easy to express disappointment?

Author: Abbi Glines,  Fallen Too Far
Quote: I had fallen too far. I was in love with Rush Finlay.

Author: Rumi
Quote: If in thirst you drink water from a cup, you see God in it. Those who are not in love with God will see only their own faces in it.

Author: Anonymous,  The New Testament
Quote: Beloved, let us love one another, because love is from God; everyone one who loves is born of God and knows God. Whoever does not love does not know God, for God is love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My sole possession is my passion, for no one can rob me of it. More fiery than love, it does not depend on another to blaze.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My coffee cup is empty. Why don't you pour your love in and wake up my soul?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is a process, either growing or shrinking, but never stagnant. My love for you was David, and now it is Goliath. Also, my love for you was Goliath, and now it is David.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love is more aww than awe, and even if were awesome, I want aweall, not merely some awe. I’m greedy for the amazing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I give 110% in love. If that seems absurd, just know that I used presidential voting machines to calculate that number. It's totally legit.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: To love someone as much as you love yourself, that is the ideal. Especially if that someone is your clone.

Author: Stephenie Meyer
Quote: Her existence alone was excuse enough to justify the creation of the entire world.

Author: A.C. Gaughen,  Scarlet
Quote: You are my whole heart, Scarlet. And this is breaking it.'My heart cracked open and clear dropped out of me. My mouth opened, and I looked round me and stamped my foot. 'Does this look like a good time to tell me that, you damn stupid boy?' I meant to sound mean but my voice wobbled. 'Now?'He gave a little smile. 'My foul-mouthed warrior.

Author: Catherynne M. Valente,  The Girl Who Fell Beneath Fairyland and Led the Revels There
Quote: For there are two kinds of forgiveness in the world: the one you practice because everything really is all right, and what went before is mended. The other kind of forgiveness you practice because someone needs desperately to be forgiven, or because you need just as badly to forgive them, for a heart can grab hold of old wounds and go sour as milk over them.

Author: Amy Bloom
Quote: Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels
Quote: I just don't see why the past has to matter.

Author: Françoise Sagan
Quote: I have loved to the point of madness; that which is called madness, that which to me, is the only sensible way to love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said she'd love me forever. That was two days ago, so I should probably ask her again if she still feels the same way.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Half-assing it twice isn’t giving it 100%, but both can be yours for the one-time low-price of half off. Also on SALE now: My love. Order yours today.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Spirit Bound
Quote: Love fades. Mine has.

Author: Tasaro G.K.,  Muhammad: Lelaki Penggenggam Hujan
Quote: ...mencintai itu, kadang mengumpulkan segala tabiat menyebalkan dari seseorang yang engkau cintai, memakinya, merasa tak sanggup lagi menjadi yang terbaik untuk dirinya, dan berpikir tak ada lagi jalan kembali, tapi tetap saja engkau tak sanggup benar-benar meninggalkannya.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I could make tea out of your love, would it be hot, or iced? Would it be black, or green? Would it be sweet, or unsweet? Would you offer free refills?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I mined my mind, and I found no love. My heart is where excavation yields gold, and if you dig me as much as I dig you, we can both get rich.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I'm here at The Container Store looking for something large enough to hold all my love for her. It's a flood, so I hope they sell Shipping Container Ships.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You can’t win in love. But if you could, I’d be the clear victor. Vodka is also clear, and I must be drunk.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Read her poetry before you make love to her. That way she’ll be asleep when you do. I’m as romantic as a rocking chair with wheels.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I strum a fishing pole line like a guitar string. I hunt like a bow and arrow is a partial harp. And I make love like I’ve got a Buy One Get One FREE coupon.

Author: Compton Mackenzie
Quote: Love makes the world go round? Not at all. Whiskey makes it go round twice as fast.

Author: David Gemmell,  Shield of Thunder
Quote: Nothing of real worth can ever be bought. Love, friendship, honour, valour, respect. All these things have to be earned.

Author: Lang Leav
Quote: Love is a game of tic-tac-toe,constantly waitingfor the next x or o.

Author: Renee Ahdieh,  The Wrath and the Dawn
Quote: You have a beautiful laugh. Like the promise of tomorrow.

Author: Shiloh Fernandez
Quote: Innately, there are qualities in human beings that are always repetitive. There are things like love and hate and jealousy that are just going to be there forever.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Lying in bed listless, I wrote a list. I then had a list, but I was still listless. Perhaps because my list was of all the things I love, and every entry was you.

Author: Katie McGarry,  Dare You To
Quote: That must be love: when everything else in the world could implode and you wouldn't care as long as you had that one person standing beside you.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Slammed
Quote: Does he treat you with respect at all times? That's the first question. The second question is, if he is the exact same person twenty years from now that he is today, would you still want to marry him? And finally, does he inspire to be a better person? You find someone you can answer yes to all three, then you've found a good man.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: When we first met, I didn't want to get involved with anyone. I didn't have the time or energy, and I wasn't sure that I was ready for it. But you were so good to me, and I got swept up in that. And little by little, I found myself falling in love with you.

Author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables
Quote: If people did not love one another, I really don't see what use there would be in having any spring.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: That I shall love always, I argue theethat love is life,and life hath immortality

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love, that’s real. Our currency, the dollar, that’s imaginary. Invest in us, and I promise you that you won’t lose your life’s savings.

Author: Nicole Kidman
Quote: It's a very brave thing to fall in love. You have to be willing to trust somebody else with your whole being, and that's very difficult, really difficult and very brave.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey
Quote: I've never wanted more, until I met you.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Iron King
Quote: I guess the sacrifice of my dignity is the only thing that will save us now. The things I endure for love. The Fates laugh at my torment.

Author: Jenny Han,  We'll Always Have Summer
Quote: Don’t marry him. Don’t be with him. Be with me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can't throw away cologne because that is Nostalgia in a Bottle, the scent of yesterday, and it reminds me of her more clearly than her picture.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have a Rubik’s Cube for a rearview mirror, because the past is the only time puzzle I can solve. My love for her only looks clear there.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I chased the chaste, and they got scared and scurried. Then I stood still and loved where I was at, and all approached without fear of reproach.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I go off the grid, my main source of light will be fireflies. Oh, and the glow that will come from the epic love poem I am writing for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Every day I think today could be my last day. My only fear is dying without telling her I love her one more time. All I pray for is one more time.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: Angels walk amongst those with broken wings. Those with broken wings only need to be given a little love before their hearts can flutter and take flight once again.-Amanda Mosher and Jarod Kintz

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: There will never be a good time, financially, to get married, unless you're Shaq or Ray Romano. But somehow people manage. If your man is using money as an excuse not to marry you, it's your relationship that's insecure, not his bank account.

Author: bell hooks
Quote: Knowing how to be solitary is central to the art of loving. When we can be alone, we can be with others without using them as a means of escape.

Author: Judith McNaught,  Paradise
Quote: Some people feel love in their hearts, Julie. Some of us feel it all way into our souls. We're the ones who can't forget.

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Retribution of Mara Dyer
Quote: Maybe sometimes we can only see the truth about ourselves if someone shows us where to look.

Author: Louise Erdrich,  The Painted Drum
Quote: Life will break you. Nobody can protect you from that, and living alone won’t either, for solitude will also break you with its yearning. You have to love. You have to feel. It is the reason you are here on earth. You are here to risk your heart. You are here to be swallowed up.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Love always creates, it never destroys. In this lies man's only promise.

Author: Julian Gough,  Juno & Juliet
Quote: You said you didn't want to get involved with me,that one of us would get hurt and how you couldn't bear it. Well that just isn't good enough..Look what happens to people just living their lives. They get hurt, it's not fair they get hurt but they do, all the time, no matter how careful they are. Somebody can just just come along and hurt them, for no stupid reason..

Author: Umberto Eco,  The Name of the Rose
Quote: What is love? There is nothing in the world, neither man nor Devil nor any thing, that I hold as suspect as love, for it penetrates the soul more than any other thing. Nothing exists that so fills and binds the heart as love does. Therefore, unless you have those weapons that subdue it, the soul plunges through love into an immense abyss.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi,  The Story of My Experiments With Truth
Quote: What barrier is there that love cannot break?

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  Love, Rosie
Quote: Ruby: ...What's so good about being 20? I call them the materialist years. The years we get distracted by all the bullshit. Then we cop on when we hit our 30s and spend those years trying to make up for the 20s. But your 40s? Those years are for enjoying it.Rosie: Hmmm good point. What are the 50s for?Ruby: Fixing what you fucked up in your 40s.Rosie: Great. Looking forward to it.

Author: Deb Caletti,  The Secret Life of Prince Charming
Quote: When what you want is a relationship, and not a person, get a dog.

Author: Alice Walker,  The Color Purple
Quote: Everything want to be loved. Us sing and dance and holler, just trying to be loved.

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Written on the Body
Quote: You said, 'I love you.' Why is it that the most unoriginal thing we can say to one another is still the thing we long to hear? 'I love you' is always a quotation. You did not say it first and neither did I, yet when you say it and when I say it we speak like savages who have found three words and worship them.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Fallen Angels
Quote: Simon: So were you following me? Or is it just an amazing coincidence that you happened to be on the roof of a building I was walking by when I got attacked?Jace: I was following you.Simon: Is this the part where you tell me you're secretly in love with me?

Author: Steve Martin,  The Pleasure of My Company
Quote: I understood that as much as I had resisted the outside, as much as I had constricted my life, as much as I had closed and narrowed the channels into me, there were still many takers for the quiet heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: What is the shape of love? Is it shaped like you? For me it is, but for you maybe it is shaped like me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She’s twelve hours in the future, and exactly half a world away. No matter how hard I try, I will always be a part of her past.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.
Quote: Death cannot stop true love. That’s why it’s pointless for me to try to murder all my adoring female fans.

Author: Susan Fletcher,  Eve Green
Quote: Love is blind, they say--but isn't it more that love makes us see too much? Isn't it more that love floods our brain with sights and sounds, so that everything looks bigger, brighter, more lovely than ever before?

Author: Jodi Picoult,  My Sister's Keeper
Quote: The bottom line is that we never fall for the person we're supposed to.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I fight like a rocking chair in a boxing ring. That’s also how I make love. I should probably sell popcorn at my shows to boost revenue.

Author: Libba Bray,  Beauty Queens
Quote: I love you for who you are, not who the world thinks you should be.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse
Quote: We looked at each other for a minute, not saying anything, but I could feel the air between us shift. It became thick, sultry, and tangible—like when the air changes right before a storm. I could feel its power envelop me as it brushed across my skin. Even though I couldn’t see it, I knew a storm was coming.

Author: Ricky Lee,  Para Kay B
Quote: Me quota ang pag-ibig. Sa bawat limang umiibig, isa lang ang magiging maligaya. Ang iba, iibig sa di sila iniibig. Iibig nang di natututo. O iibig sa wala. O di iibig kailanman.

Author: Ayn Rand
Quote: Have you ever felt the longing for someone you could admire? For something, not to look down at, but up to?

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  New Moon
Quote: Only you could be more important than what I wanted...what I needed. What I want and what I need is to be with you, and I know I'll never be strong enough to leave again.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: You are mistaken, Mr. Darcy, if you suppose that the mode of your declaration affected me in any other way, than as it spared the concern which I might have felt in refusing you, had you behaved in a more gentlemanlike manner."(Elizabeth Bennett)

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The wealthier I get, the more money I will have to not have, because my goal in getting is giving, and nothing is better than charity.

Author: Michael Ondaatje,  The English Patient
Quote: There are betrayals in war that are childlike compared with our human betrayals during peace. The new lovers enter the habits of the other. Things are smashed, revealed in a new light. This is done with nervous or tender sentences, although the heart is an organ of fire.

Author: Sergei Lukyanenko,  Night Watch
Quote: Love is happiness, but only when you believe it will last forever. Even though every time it turns out to be a lie, it’s only faith that gives love its strength and its joy.

Author: Milla Jovovich
Quote: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.

Author: Michael Jackson
Quote: When I see children, I see the face of God. That's why I love them so much. That's what I see.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Silence
Quote: I loved you long before you loved me. It's the only thing I have you beat at, and I'll bring it up every chance I get.

Author: Lao Tzu,  The Teachings of Lao-Tzu: The Tao-Te Ching
Quote: LoveEmbracing Tao, you become embraced.Supple, breathing gently, you become reborn.Clearing your vision, you become clear.Nurturing your beloved, you become impartial.Opening your heart, you become accepted.Accepting the World, you embrace Tao.Bearing and nurturing,Creating but not owning,Giving without demanding,Controlling without authority,This is love.

Author: Faraaz Kazi
Quote: The most difficult aspect of moving on is accepting that the other person already did.

Author: Alessandra Torre
Quote: A gentleman holds my hand.A man pulls my hair.A soulmate will do both.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: I loved him as we always love for the first time; with idolatry and wild passion.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Quote: And he knew that at that moment, they understood each other perfectly, and when he told her what he was going to do now, she would not say ‘be careful’ or ‘don’t do it’, but she would accept his decision because she would not have expected anything less of him.

Author: Jennifer E. Smith,  The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight
Quote: People who meet in airports are seventy-two percent more likely to fall for each other than people who meet anywhere else.

Author: George Bernard Shaw,  Pygmalion
Quote: What you are to do without me I cannot imagine.

Author: Samantha Young,  On Dublin Street
Quote: I love you. You’re mine. I’ll kill any bastard who tries to take you from me.

Author: Gautama Buddha
Quote: True love is born from understanding.

Author: Flannery O'Connor,  Everything That Rises Must Converge: Stories
Quote: He loved her because it was his nature to do so, but there were times when he could not endure her love for him. There were times when it became nothing but pure idiot mystery...

Author: Jenny Han,  To All the Boys I've Loved Before
Quote: Smirking, he says, "Whatever spell you just tried to cast on me, it didn't work, so I think you need to go back to Hogwarts.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: We join spokes together in a wheel, but it is the center hole that makes the wagon move.We shape clay into a pot, but it is the emptiness insidethat holds whatever we want.We hammer wood for a house, but it is the inner spacethat makes it livable.We work with being, but non-being is what we use.

Author: Tiffanie DeBartolo,  God-Shaped Hole
Quote: Just knowing you exist changed the world for me.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I'll sleep forever and meet you in my dreams; it'll hurt less anyway. But the pain of losing you was worth the pleasure of having you, and I rest in bed knowing you'll know for the rest of your life what you are missing.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: No human should mislead another by promising them something they know to be untrue.

Author: Anaïs Nin,  House of Incest
Quote: I have such a fear of finding another like myself, and such a desire to find one! I am so utterly lonely, but I also have such a fear that my isolation be broken through, and I no longer be the head and ruler of my universe.

Author: Katy Perry
Quote: You said move on, where do I go?

Author: Brad Henry
Quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.

Author: Thornton Wilder,  The Bridge of San Luis Rey
Quote: The knowledge that she would never be loved in return acted upon her ideas as a tide acts upon cliffs.

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  This Side of the Grave
Quote: Kitten, your hands are heaven and your eyes are my home.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: When I like people immensely I never tell their names to anyone. It is like surrendering a part of them. I have grown to love secrecy.

Author: Ann Aguirre,  Doubleblind
Quote: I'll always want him. Until every sun goes dark in every sky, until I am nothing more than long-forgotten cosmic dust, I will want him. And even then I suspect my particles will long for his.

Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote: I’ve become skeptical of the unwritten rule that just because a boy and girl appear in the same feature, a romance must ensue. Rather, I want to portray a slightly different relationship, one where the two mutually inspire each other to live - if I’m able to, then perhaps I’ll be closer to portraying a true expression of love.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Sputnik Sweetheart
Quote: Maybe it's just hiding somewhere. Or gone on a trip to come home. But falling in love is always a pretty crazy thing. It might appear out of the blue and just grab you. Who knows — maybe even tomorrow.

Author: Dorothy Parker
Quote: The sun's gone dim, and the moon's gone black. For I loved him, and he didn't love back.

Author: Mike Gayle,  Turning Thirty
Quote: I'm telling you this for one reason and one reason only: No matter how sure you are of someone's love, it's always nice to hear it.

Author: Alice Hoffman,  Here on Earth
Quote: When all is said and done, the weather and love are the two elements about which one can never be sure.

Author: Marty Rubin
Quote: One is never wounded by the love one gives, only by the love one expects.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Maybe Not
Quote: The only difference between falling in love and being in love is that your heart already knows how you feel, but your mind is too stubborn to admit it.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: Does that count as an argument? Can we kiss and make up now?”"It was only half an argument.”“Fine. Then, you kiss and I’ll make up.”I laughed until he effectively shut me up with his lips.

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Return to Paradise
Quote: I gave you my heart, but it wasn't enough.

Author: Leah Raeder,  Unteachable
Quote: Who fixes broken people? Is it only other broken people, ones who've already been ruined? And do we need to be fixed? It was the messiness and hurt in our pasts that drove us, and that same hurt connected us at a subdermal level, the kind of scars written so deeply in your cells that you can't even see them anymore, only recognize them in someone else.

Author: Suzanne Collins
Quote: Having an eye for beauty isn't the same thing as a weakness...except possibly when it comes to you.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I'll miss looking through the forest–your green and hazel eyes. I love the way they shimmered and changed shade with your mood, and how I could see the desire in your emerald gaze.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve spent a lifetime learning to love—the lifetime of a chameleon. But hey, I’ve learned a lot in the last year, though you couldn’t tell because I camouflage my feelings.

Author: Anne Fortier,  Juliet
Quote: There is lust and then there is love. They are related, but still very different things. To indulge in one requires little but honeyed speech and a change of clothes; to obtain the other, by contrast, a man must give up his rib. In return, his woman will undo the sin of Eve, and bring him back into Paradise.

Author: Sigmund Freud,  Civilization and Its Discontents
Quote: It is that we are never so defenseless against suffering as when we love, never no helplessly unhappy as when we have lost our loved object of its love.

Author: Steve Harvey,  Act Like a Lady, Think Like a Man: What Men Really Think About Love, Relationships, Intimacy, and Commitment
Quote: Don't be afraid to lose him, because if a man truly loves you, he's not going anywhere

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Maybe we shouldn't be looking for love. Maybe we should be looking for a person. Because maybe you can find love in a person, but not have that person. So if you look for love, what you will find is love. But if you want to belong to someone, and you want someone to belong to you, you should look for a person.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My past is black and my future is blank. My only canvas is the present. The best color to paint with is love.

Author: Morgan Matson,  Second Chance Summer
Quote: Daddy,"I whispered, feeling my own breath hitch in my throat. "I love you."Just when I was sure he was asleep, the one corner of his mouth lifted in a smile. "I knew that,"he murmured. "Always knew that.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: Wow,” said Adrian. He sat down on the bed and tested its bounciness, giving it a nod of approval. “This is amazing. What do you think, buttercup?”“I have no words,” I said honestly.He patted the spot beside him. “Want to try it out?

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: This is the true measure of love: when we believe that we alone can love, that no one could ever have loved so before us, and that no one will ever love in the same way after us.

Author: Christina Rossetti,  Poems of Christina Rossetti
Quote: Ah me, but where are now the songs I sangWhen life was sweet because you call’d them sweet?

Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: If music be the food of love, play on.

Author: John Lennon
Quote: I was feeling insecure you might not love me anymore

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: You have within you,right now,everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.

Author: bell hooks,  All About Love: New Visions
Quote: Individuals who want to believe that there is no fulfillment in love, that true love does not exist, cling to these assumptions because this despair is actually easier to face than the reality that love is a real fact of life but is absent from their lives.

Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote: Once you figure out who you are and what you love about yourself, I think it all kind of falls into place.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: You think I'm cute?"He said thinkly, pulling on her hand.She was glad he couldn't see her face. "I think you're..."Beautiful. Breathtaking. Like the person in a Greek myth who makes one of the gods stop caring about being a god.

Author: David Mitchell,  The Thousand Autumns of Jacob de Zoet
Quote: We have just enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love.

Author: Beth Revis,  A Million Suns
Quote: Choice or no, my heart is his.

Author: Warsan Shire
Quote: Loving you was like going to war; I never came back the same.

Author: S.C. Stephens,  Thoughtless
Quote: I know...and I love you. But I don't think we love each other in the same way. And...I think keeping you near me, would destroy me.

Author: William Shakespeare,  As You Like It
Quote: I pray you, do not fall in love with me, for I am falser than vows made in wine.

Author: Wendelin Van Draanen,  Flipped
Quote: The room fell quiet. And as I read down the list of over one hundred and fifty eight-grade boys, I realized that to me, there had only ever been one boy.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Carry On
Quote: You were the sun, and I was crashing into you.

Author: Ricardo Montalban
Quote: True love doesn't happen right away; it's an ever-growing process. It develops after you've gone through many ups and downs, when you've suffered together, cried together, laughed together.

Author: Marie Lu,  Legend
Quote: Day leans in toward me. He reaches up to touch my face. I can tell it still hurts him to use his fingers, and his nails are dark with dried blood. "You're brilliant,"he says. "But you're a fool to stay wish someone like me."I close my eyes at the touch of his hand. "Then we're both fools.

Author: Hannah Harrington,  Saving June
Quote: It always struck me in years after how bizarre it was, how two people could look at one another with such tenderness and complete love, and how quickly that could dissolve into nothing but bitterness.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: So many believe that it is love that grows, but it is the knowing that grows and love simply expands to contain it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: When we were we, with you is the only place I wanted to be. When we were just two separate souls, I used to dream of a place where we'd come together as one.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Tallulah Bankhead
Quote: I'll come and make love to you at five o'clock. If I'm late start without me.

Author: Hilary Duff,  Devoted
Quote: Soulmate"is an overused term, but a true soul connection is very rare, and very real.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Married By Morning
Quote: You seem to think you have a choice,"Cam said. "But you have it backwards. Love chooses you. The shadow moves as the sun commands.

Author: Taylor Mali
Quote: Falling In Love Is Like Owning A Dog.Throw things away and love will bring them back,again, and again, and again.But most of all, love needs love, lots of it.And in return, love loves you and never stops.

Author: Marie Lu,  Champion
Quote: Now, as we stand three feet apart and stare at each other, I feel the full distance that comes with spending so much time apart, a moment filled with the electricity of a first meeting and the uncertainty of strangers.

Author: Shannon L. Alder,  300 Questions LDS Couples Should Ask Before Marriage
Quote: If he can't handle you at your worst then he does not deserve you at your best. Real love means seeing beyond the words spoken out of pain, and instead seeing a person's soul.

Author: Ann Brashares
Quote: He wanted to take his love back from her so badly. The old techniques didn’t work anymore. In fact, they’d never worked. How do you stop loving someone? It was one of the world’s more brutal mysteries. The more you tried, the less it worked.

Author: Mignon McLaughlin
Quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: I could feel the warmth of his presence as if a soft blanket had been wrapped around my soul, around my heart. It held me and protected me. It sheltered me and I knew I wasn’t alone anymore.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: Loving you forever can't be wrong. Even though you're not here, can't move on

Author: Virginia Satir
Quote: I want to love you without clutching, appreciate you without judging, join you without invading, invite you without demanding, leave you without guilt, criticize you without blaming, and help you without insulting. If I can have the same from you, then we can truly meet and enrich each other.

Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote: If you follow the will of God, you know that in spite of all the terrible things that happen to you, you will never lose a final refuge. You know that the foundation of the world is love, so that even when no human being can or will help you, you may go on, trusting in the One that loves you.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Quote: Then she was kissing him as she had never kissed him before...and it was blissful oblivion, better than firewhisky; she was the only real thing in the world.

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: Kids chase the love that eludes them.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: You know,"he said, "under normal circumstances, you inviting me to the bedroom would be the highlight of my day."I crossed my arms and sat on the bed. I did so out of simple fatigue, but a moment later, I was struck by what I was doing. This is where Adrian sleeps. I'm touching the covers he's wrapped in every night. What does he wear? Does he wear anything?I jumped up.

Author: L.M. Montgomery
Quote: A broken heart in real life isn't half as dreadful as it is in books. It's a good deal like a bad tooth, though you won't think THAT a very romantic simile. It takes spells of aching and gives you a sleepless night now and then, but between times it lets you enjoy life and dreams and echoes and peanut candy as if there were nothing the matter with it.

Author: William Shakespeare,  As You Like It
Quote: Love is merely a madness; and, I tell you, deserves as well a dark house and a whip as madmen do; and the reason why they are not so punish'd and cured is that the lunacy is soordinary that the whippers are in love too.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay
Quote: You'll never be able to let him go. You'll always feel wrong about being with me.

Author: Marilyn Vos Savant
Quote: I believe that love--not imitation--is the sincerest form of flattery. Your imitator thinks that you can be duplicated; your lover knows you can't.

Author: David Levithan,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson
Quote: he is both the source of my happiness and the one i want to share it with.

Author: Ann Brashares,  Forever in Blue: The Fourth Summer of the Sisterhood
Quote: She knew whose love she doubted. It wasn't her parents' and it wasn't her friends: It was her own.

Author: Arthur Conan Doyle,  The Musgrave Ritual
Quote: A man always finds it hard to realize that he may have finally lost a woman's love, however badly he may have treated her.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: ... it’s a blessed thing to love and feel loved in return.

Author: Julio Cortázar,  Save Twilight: Selected Poems
Quote: Creo que no te quiero, que solamente quiero la imposibilidad tan obvia de quererte. Como el guante izquierdo enamorado de la mano derecha.

Author: Jess Rothenberg,  The Catastrophic History of You and Me
Quote: Sometimes, remembering hurts too much.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: The greatest gift that you can give to others is the gift of unconditional love and acceptance.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drink like a fish, and I swim in my thirst. I’m so parched for her love that I think I may drown in my desire.

Author: Audre Lorde
Quote: I want to live the rest of my life, however long or short, with as much sweetness as I can decently manage, loving all the people I love, and doing as much as I can of the work I still have to do. I am going to write fire until it comes out of my ears, my eyes, my noseholes--everywhere. Until it's every breath I breathe. I'm going to go out like a fucking meteor!

Author: Emery Allen
Quote: You don't need another Human Being to make your life complete, but let's be honest. Having your wounds kissed by someone who doesn't see them as disasters In your soul, but cracks to put their love into, Is the most calming thing In this World.

Author: David Levithan,  How They Met, and Other Stories
Quote: Love doesn’t have to be on Valentine’s Day. It doesn’t have to be by the time you turn eighteen or thirty-three or fifty-nine. It doesn’t have to conform to whatever is usual. It doesn’t have to be kismet at once, or rhapsody by the third day.It just has to be. In time. In place. In spirt.It just has to be.

Author: Susan Fletcher,  Eve Green
Quote: Kisses open doors, I've noticed. That one gesture can unlock secrets, ease open feelings. It can't be prevented--these kisses just are. It's how they work. They break into basements you never knew you had.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Ignite Me
Quote: Lift your hips for me, love.

Author: Tina Reber,  Love Unscripted
Quote: I never understood how men could remember all those details about sports but, yet, were incapable of remembering where they set their car keys or wallet.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Better to put your heart on the line, risk everything, and walk away with nothing than play it safe. Love is a lot of things, but “safe” isn’t one of them.

Author: Ann Brashares
Quote: He loved her for being so beautiful, and he hated her for it. He loved how she put shiny stuff on her lips for him, and he also reviled her for it. He wanted her to walk home alone, and he wanted to run after her and grab her up before she could take another step.

Author: Edmond de Goncourt
Quote: Today I begin to understand what love must be, if it exists... When we are parted, we each feel the lack of the other half of ourselves. We are incomplete like a book in two volumes of which the first has been lost. That is what I imagine love to be: incompleteness in absence.

Author: P.G. Wodehouse,  The Small Bachelor
Quote: Marriage is not a process for prolonging the life of love, sir. It merely mummifies its corpse.

Author: Shannon Hale,  Book of a Thousand Days
Quote: You're better than seven years of food. You're better than windows. You're even better than the sky.

Author: Nalini Singh,  Kiss of Snow
Quote: You have the power to tear me to pieces, to wound me so deep and true that I'll never recover. What Rissa's death did to the boy I was? You have the ability to do a thousand times worse to the man I've become.

Author: Leonard Cohen,  Book of Longing
Quote: ... i didn't fall in love of courseit's never up to youbut she was walking back and forthand i was passing through

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: I realized when you look at your mother, you are looking at the purest love you will ever know.

Author: Ian McEwan,  Atonement
Quote: The anticipation and dread he felt at seeing her was also a kind of sensual pleasure, and surrounding it, like an embrace, was a general elation--it might hurt, it was horribly inconvenient, no good might come of it, but he had found out for himself what it was to be in love, and it thrilled him.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Eternity Cure
Quote: Oh, don't mind me,"came an extremely sarcastic voice near the wall. “You two go ahead and make out–I'll just sit here and bleed quietly.

Author: Brenna Yovanoff,  The Replacement
Quote: I wanted to tell her that I loved her, and not in the complicated way I loved our parents, but in a simple way I never had to think about. I loved her like breathing.

Author: Jane Austen,  Persuasion
Quote: Dare not say that man forgets sooner than woman, that his love has an earlier death.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey
Quote: I want my world to start and end with you.

Author: Eartha Kitt
Quote: It’s all about falling in love with yourself and sharing that love with someone who appreciates you, rather than looking for love to compensate for a self love deficit.

Author: Francesca Lia Block,  Weetzie Bat
Quote: What sexual preference do you hope she has?” “Happiness.” Isnt that cool?

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
Quote: It is impossible to manufacture or imitate love.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant
Quote: I feel like myself, strong and weak at once - allowed, at least for a little while, to be both.

Author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic
Quote: Love leads people to become lost in their own feelings and ignore the world, so it’s no surprise their love for the world goes unrequited.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: Love can rebuild the world, they say, so everything's possible when it comes to love.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Fiery Heart
Quote: You know I love you, right?” The urge to kiss her goodbye was so strong that I almost broke our rules.She smiled, beautiful and golden in the late morning light. “Not as much as I love you.”“Oh, man. This is my dream come true: having an ‘I love you more’ debate. Here, I’ll start. I love you more. Your turn.”Sydney laughed and opened the door. “I’ve taken debate classes. You’d lose to my logic.

Author: Rumi
Quote: I am yours.Don't give myself back to me.

Author: Chad Sugg
Quote: Something amazing happens when you're in love and don't give a damn about what day it is anymore.

Author: Ann Brashares,  Girls In Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood
Quote: She thought she was independent and strong, but she got one small taste of love and she was hungrier than anyone. She was ravenous.

Author: Hugh Elliott
Quote: Just because you love someone, doesn't mean you have to be involved with them. Love is not a bandage to cover wounds.

Author: Tess Gerritsen,  Keeping The Dead
Quote: The heart makes its choices without weighing the consequences. It doesn't look ahead to the lonely nights that follow.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Succubus Heat
Quote: I don't care,"said Seth. "I would have done it. I would have sold my soul for you. You and me...I told you. Something's always going to keep us near each other...even if we aren't together.

Author: David Gest
Quote: Liza, I love you more than any words can say. You have made me a complete person. You are everything to me. And I cannot think of living life without you. And I love you forever.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: When someone you love says goodbye you can stare long and hard at the door they closed and forget to see all the doors God has open in front of you.

Author: Alexandra Adornetto,  Halo
Quote: I prayed for all his dreams to come true. I prayed that I would always be able to connect with him--even if I was no longer on earth.

Author: Stephen King
Quote: love is what moves the world, I've always thought...it is the only thing which allows men and women to stand in a world where gravity always seems to want to pull them down...bring them low...and make them crawl...

Author: H.L. Mencken
Quote: Happiness is the china shop; love is the bull.

Author: Ricky Lee,  Para Kay B
Quote: Ang great love mo, hindi mo makakatuluyan. Ang makakatuluyan mo ay yung correct love.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Something Borrowed
Quote: I love him wholly and unconditionally and without reservation. I love him enough to sacrifice a friendship. I love him enough to accept my own happiness and use it, in turn, to make him happy back.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: Love is like a door knob that I’ve mistaken for a shower handle, and I’m trying to turn up the heat on our relationship, but the handle won’t turn and I’ve got shampoo in my eyes and my wetsuit is dry and I started crying just as the zookeeper asked me to leave.

Author: William Shakespeare,  The Merchant of Venice
Quote: love is blindand lovers cannot see the pretty follies that themselves commit

Author: Jasmine Warga,  My Heart and Other Black Holes
Quote: Sometimes I wonder if my heart is like a black hole--it's so dense that there's no room for light, but that doesn't mean it can't still suck me in.

Author: Leah Raeder,  Unteachable
Quote: Part of falling in love with someone is actually falling in love with yourself. Realizing that you're gorgeous, you're fearless and unpredictable, you're a firecracker spitting light, entrancing a hundred faces that stare up at you with starry eyes.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It takes guts to love with gusto. Most people love as if they wish they were invisible, and then they wonder why their affections go unnoticed.

Author: Stephen King,  Bag of Bones
Quote: For men, I think, love is a thing formed of equal parts lust and astonishment. The astonishment part women understand. The lust part they only think they understand.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: Leave the cage open. If you love someone, give them a chance to leave. You can always lock them up again should they return to you.

Author: Alexandre Dumas,  The Three Musketeers
Quote: Love is the most selfish of all the passions.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times and within reach of every hand.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  Stardust
Quote: They kissed for the first time then in the cold spring rain, though neither one of them now knew that it was raining. Tristran's heart pounded in his chest as if it was not big enough to contain all the joy that it held. He opened his eyes as he kissed the star. Her sky-blue eyes stared back into his, and in her eyes he could see no parting from her.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Apparently I’m transparent—with my feelings, not with my body. I’m an emotional ghost, and if you can’t see my love for you it’s because it’s dead.

Author: David Levithan,  Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
Quote: Maybe that's it, [...] [w]ith what you were talking about before. The world being broken. Maybe it isn't that we're supposed to find the pieces and put them back together. Maybe we're the pieces."[...] "Maybe [...] what we're supposed to do is come together. That's how we stop the breaking.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I grew a garden in her heart. There was plenty of space for flowers, because her heart was completely empty of love.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: Love moderately. Long love doth so.Too swift arrives as tardy as too slow.*Love each other in moderation. That is the key to long-lasting love. Too fast is as bad as too slow.*

Author: Jeremy Aldana
Quote: It’s not so much the journey that’s important; as is the way that we treat those we encounter and those around us, along the way

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Written on the Body
Quote: Love demands expression. It will not stay still, stay silent, be good, be modest, be seen and not heard, no. It will break out in tongues of praise, the high note that smashes the glass and spills the liquid.

Author: V.C. Andrews,  Flowers in the Attic
Quote: I wish the night would end,I wish the day'd begin,I wish it would rain or snow,or the wind would blow,or the grass would grow,I wish I had yesterday,I wish there were games to play...

Author: Antonio Porchia
Quote: I know what I have given you... I do not know what you have received.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  $3.33
Quote: Any lustful fool can love a million women, but only a real man can love one woman cloned a million times.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: The spiritualization of sensuality is called love: it is a great triumph over Christianity.

Author: Michael Grant,  Lies
Quote: No you sick, stupid creep, I love you. I shouldn't. I shouldn't. You're sick inside, Caine, sick! But I love you. - Diana

Author: Annette Curtis Klause,  Blood and Chocolate
