Quote: Why me?"she asked, holding on to him."Because you cared,"he whispered. "You cared so much for your people, it broke your heart to see the pack in ruins. You cared so much for your mother, you risked your life for hers. You cared enough to save someone who wanted you dead. And because you walk like a queen.

Author: Ovid
Quote: I am the poet of the poor, because I was poor when I loved; since I could not give gifts, I gave words.

Author: Steven Wright
Quote: It was the first time I was ever in love, and I learned a lot. Before that I'd never even thought about killing myself.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades Freed
Quote: AnatasiaYou Are My More My Love, My LifeChristian

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: As a sculptor, I prefer busts. As a lover of women, I prefer busts. And as a football enthusiast, I prefer Robert Griffin III.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Dance Dance Dance
Quote: People fall in love without reason, without even wanting to. You can't predict it. That's love.

Author: Amanda Howells,  The Summer of Skinny Dipping
Quote: The surest way to hurt yourself is to give up on love, just because it didn’twork out the first time.

Author: Dylan Thomas,  Under Milk Wood
Quote: The only sea I saw Was the seesaw sea With you riding on it. Lie down, lie easy. Let me shipwreck in your thighs.

Author: Matthew Quick,  The Silver Linings Playbook
Quote: And I still love you in my own fucked-up way. I miss you, I really do. Can we still be friends?

Author: Etgar Keret,  The Nimrod Flipout: Stories
Quote: It's amazing how people can sound like retards when they're talking to their girlfriend, especially if they really love her a lot. Because when you're just fucking someone you make a point of keeping your cool, but when you're really in love - it can sound pretty repulsive.

Author: Julia Quinn,  An Offer From a Gentleman
Quote: It suddenly made sense. Only twice in his life had he felt this inexplicable, almost mystical attraction to a woman. He’d thought it remarkable, to have found two, when in his heart he’d always believed there was only one perfect woman out there for him. His heart had been right. There was only one.

Author: Roman Payne,  Rooftop Soliloquy
Quote: Mine was the twilight and the morning. Mine was a world of rooftops and love songs.

Author: Christopher Poindexter
Quote: It was rather beautiful: the way he put her insecurities to sleep. The way he dove into her eyes and starved all the fears and tasted all the dreams she kept coiled beneath her bones.

Author: Coco J. Ginger
Quote: I want your most vital organ. I want it to be mine.

Author: Christopher Pike,  Black Blood
Quote: The opposite of love is not hate. It is indifference.

Author: Washington Irving
Quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Mark of Athena
Quote: She had to go on this quest. The fate of the world might depend on it. But part of him wanted to say: Forget the world. He didn’t want to be without her.

Author: Rachel Hawthorne,  Full Moon
Quote: Falling in love should be the easiest thing in the world, but it's not.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: I don't like customer service, because I don't believe the customer should have to pay and help out too.

Author: Tera Lynn Childs,  Forgive My Fins
Quote: I don't believe it,' Quince says with absolute certainty. ' I don't believe anything magical can make someone more in love.' [...] He looks me right in the eye as he says, 'Love is already the strongest magic in the world.

Author: Judith McNaught,  Paradise
Quote: He will love only once - but it will be for always.

Author: W.B. Yeats
Quote: To long a sacrifice can make a stone of a heart

Author: Niall Horan
Quote: You'll never love yourself half as much as I love you and you'll never treat yourself right darling but I want ya too if I let you knoooowww Im here for you then maybe you'll love yourself like I love you ohhhhh

Author: Deb Caletti,  The Secret Life of Prince Charming
Quote: It took me years to figure out that upset was upset, and tumultuousness was not the same thing as passion. Love isn't drama.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  1Q84
Quote: A person learns how to love himself through the simple acts of loving and being loved by someone else.

Author: R.L. LaFevers,  Grave Mercy
Quote: Whenever you are ready, or if you never are, my heart is yours, until Death do us part. Whatever that may mean when consorting with one of Death’s handmaidens.

Author: Carrie Jones,  Entice
Quote: I want you to want me because you want me, not because of grief, not because he is not here. I want you to love me for me. I want you to kiss me first and not because you need me to help you, but because you need to kiss me.

Author: Gaston Leroux,  The Phantom of the Opera
Quote: Know that it is a corpse who loves you and adores you and will never, never leave you!...Look, I am not laughing now, crying, crying for you, Christine, who have torn off my mask and who therefore can never leave me again!...Oh, mad Christine, who wanted to see me!

Author: Sarah Alderson,  Hunting Lila
Quote: I felt his other hand sear hot against my cheek. He bent his head, and in a voice that Jack couldn’t hear, said, “When you came down the stairs, and fell into me, that was the moment.” Then his lips pressed against mine.

Author: Peter S. Beagle,  The Last Unicorn
Quote: Marveling at his own boldness, he said softly, "I would enter your sleep if I could, and guard you there, and slay the thing that hounds you, as I would if it had the courage to face me in fair daylight. But I cannot come in unless you dream of me.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: But let there be spaces in your togetherness and let the winds of the heavens dance between you. Love one another but make not a bond of love: let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.

Author: Rick Riordan
Quote: As his raft skimmed over the water, taking him back to the mortal world, he understood a line from the Prophecy better-an oath to keep with a final breath.He understood how dangerous oaths could be. But Leo didn't care."I'm coming back for you, Calypso,"he said to the night wind. "I swear it on the River Styx.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: He studied my appearance carefully. “You cut your hair.” “Yes. Do you like it?” “That depends. How long is it?” I pulled a curl down and showed him it ended just past my shoulder. He grunted, “That’s still long enough, so I like it.” “Long enough for what?” “Long enough for a man to run his hands through.

Author: Ellen Hopkins,  Burned
Quote: Real love finds you once, if you're lucky.

Author: Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu,  Carmilla
Quote: You will think me cruel, very selfish, but love is always selfish; the more ardent the more selfish. How jealous I am you cannot know. You must come with me, loving me, to death; or else hate me, and still come with me, and hating me through death and after. There is no such word as indifference in my apathetic nature.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love deeply. I love long. I love wide and high. That's right, my love is interdimensional, and my vortex will heal your body and soul.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  November 9
Quote: I would never let anyone else borrow my heart if I know there’s a chance in hell you might want it back.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Handle with Care
Quote: Maybe you expected marriage to be perfect - I guess that's where you and I are different. See, I thought it would be all about making mistakes, but doing it with someone who's there to remind you what you learned along the way.

Author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife
Quote: ‎I never wanted to have anything in my life that I couldn't stand losing. But it's too late for that.

Author: Richard Matheson,  What Dreams May Come
Quote: Let this hell be our heaven.

Author: Suzanne Young,  The Program
Quote: ...some things are better left in the past. And true things are destined to repeat themselves.

Author: Michael Jackson,  Dancing the Dream
Quote: When I step out on stage in front of thousands of people, I don't feel that I'm being brave. It can take much more courage to express true feelings to one person. [...] In spite of the risks, the courage to be honest and intimate opens the way to self-discovery. It offers what we all want, the promise of love.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby
Quote: You know, when it works, love is amazing. It's not overrated.

Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I lost her I gained the future, because she was my past, and she freed me to become who I was born to be.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The sunset sky fades from blue to orange over Gainesville, Florida, and what I lost is less than what I gained. I gained love, I lost love, and if could do it all again, I would.

Author: Thomas Moore,  Care of the Soul: Guide for Cultivating Depth and Sacredness in Everyday Life
Quote: Disappointments in love, even betrayals and losses, serve the soul at the very moment they seem in life to be tragedies. The soul is partly in time and partly in eternity. We might remember the part that resides in eternity when we feel despair over the part that is in life.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Forever
Quote: In the darkness, he is invisible, but I can still feel him beside me. Sometimes you don't have to see something to know it is there.

Author: Dorothy Koomson,  My Best Friend's Girl
Quote: Far too many people opened their hearts and lives at the drop of a hat. Why give someone that power over you? Why endow them with the ability to hurt you that much? Let someone in and you were asking for an emotional kicking some day.

Author: Simone de Beauvoir,  The Second Sex
Quote: Two separate beings, in different circumstances, face to face in freedom and seeking justification of their existence through one another, will always live an adventure full of risk and promise."(p. 248)

Author: Tori Spelling
Quote: With friends, if you keep making an effort to reach out and you keep getting hurt, you eventually stop trying. But it's much harder to give up on family. Somewhere deep down you want it to work so badly that you keep making the same mistake over and over again.

Author: bell hooks,  All About Love: New Visions
Quote: Contrary to what we may have been taught to think, unnecessary and unchosen suffering wounds us but need not scar us for life. It does mark us. What we allow the mark of our suffering to become is in our own hands.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Quote: Tomas did not realize at the time that metaphors are dangerous. Metaphors are not to be trifled with. A single metaphor can give birth to love.

Author: Sylvia Plath,  The Bell Jar
Quote: What a man wants is a mate and what a woman wants is infinite security,’ and, ‘What a man is is an arrow into the future and a what a woman is is the place the arrow shoots off from.

Author: Katy Perry
Quote: You think I'm prettyWithout any make-up onYou think I'm funnyWhen I tell the puch line wrongI know you get meSo I'll let my walls come down, down

Author: Allen L. Roland
Quote: Love is making friends with fear because fear is the constant companion of intimacy ~ and when you bring fear out of the darkness and into the light, you realize it was an illusion based on our own insecurities.

Author: Mercedes Lackey,  Magic's Pawn
Quote: The great love is gone. There are still little loves - friend to friend, brother to sister, student to teacher. Will you deny yourself comfort at the hearthfire of a cottage because you may no longer sit by the fireplace of a palace? Will you deny yourself to those who reach out to you in hopes of warming themselves at your hearthfire?

Author: Ann Druyan
Quote: Ten long trips around the sun since I last saw that smile, but only joy and thankfulness that on a tiny world in the vastness, for a couple of moments in the immensity of time, we were one.

Author: Theodore Zeldin
Quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.

Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I haven't measured it, but I'll bet cat purrs vibrate at a healing frequency. Also, a whispered I love you almost certainly resonates with heart and DNA repair.

Author: Elizabeth Gaskell,  North and South
Quote: I wanted to see the place where Margaret grew to what she is, even at the worst time of all, when I had no hope of ever calling her mine...

Author: Torquato Tasso
Quote: Any time not spent on love is wasted.

Author: Dodie Smith,  I Capture the Castle
Quote: I am a restlessness inside a stillness inside a restlessness.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: Time expands, then contracts, all in tune with the stirrings of the heart.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Choke
Quote: Love is bullshit. Emotion is bullshit. I am a rock. A jerk. I'm an uncaring asshole and proud of it.

Author: Vincent van Gogh,  The Letters of Vincent van Gogh
Quote: There is peace even in the storm

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: There are not enough days in forever to allow me to fully express the depth of my love for you.

Author: Yolanda Joe
Quote: When a man finds the woman he really loves, the one he respects and wants to call wife, there is nothing on earth he won't do for her. No mountain he won't hike. No river he won't wade. No door he won't open. She is Eve and there's not a snake crawling that can keep them apart.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Carry On
Quote: I let myself slip away... Just to stay sane. Just to get through it. And when I felt myself slipping too far, I held on to the one thing I'm always sure of - Blue eyes. Bronze curls. The fact that Simon Snow is the most powerful magician alive. That nothing can hurt him, not even me. That Simon Snow is alive. And I'm hopelessly in love with him.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Love in the Time of Cholera
Quote: and the two of them loved each other for a long time in silence without making love again.

Author: Julia Quinn,  The Viscount Who Loved Me
Quote: Suddenly it was too hard to be in his presence, too painful to know that he would belong to someone else.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: You could empty the trash and my love for you still wouldn’t fit inside. But just because it won’t fit, doesn’t mean you shouldn’t empty the trash.

Author: Blaise Pascal
Quote: Truth is so obscure in these times, and falsehood so established, that, unless we love the truth, we cannot know it.

Author: Chelsea M. Cameron,  My Favorite Mistake
Quote: I love you, Missy girl. Even if I can't be with you, know that I'm here. So, that's it. More than the stars, Taylor. More than the stars.

Author: Stephanie Perkins,  Anna and the French Kiss
Quote: Yes, St. Claire. I like you. But I can't say it aloud, because he's my friend. And friends don't let other friends make drunken declarations and expect them to act upon them the next day

Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote: It's funny. No matter how hard you try, you can't close your heart forever. And the minute you open it up, you never know what's going to come in. But when it does, you just have to go for it! Because if you don't, there's not point in being here.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: If one unlabeled bottle holds nonfat milk, what does the second unlabeled bottle contain? If you answered “Whole milk” then you’re obviously not ready to receive a jug of my love. So I’ll just pour it in someone else’s coffee.

Author: Katie McGarry,  Pushing the Limits
Quote: Not sure how I felt about Antonio and Echo, I linked my fingers with hers. Antonio cocked a surprised eyebrow. Damn straight, bro. I just marked my territory.

Author: Frederick Buechner,  Whistling in the Dark: A Doubter's Dictionary
Quote: If we are to love our neighbors, before doing anything else we must see our neighbors. With our imagination as well as our eyes, that is to say like artists, we must see not just their faces but the life behind and within their faces. Here it is love that is the frame we see them in.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life
Quote: My love is like one of those wooden Russian nesting dolls (matryoshka doll). I know, because your heart fits perfectly inside mine.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The House of Hades
Quote: Love is on every side, and no one's side. Don't ask what Love can do for you.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

Author: David A. Bednar
Quote: A home with a loving and loyal husband and wife is the supreme setting in which children can be reared in love and righteousness and in which the spiritual and physical needs of children can be met.

Author: Louise Erdrich,  The Last Report on the Miracles at Little No Horse
Quote: To love another human in all of her splendor and imperfect perfection , it is a magnificent task...tremendous and foolish and human.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Eleven Minutes
Quote: What made you fall in love with a prostitute?”“I didn’t understand it myself at the time. But I’ve thought about it since, and I think it was because, knowing that your body would never be mine alone, I had to concentrate on conquering your soul.

Author: Augustine of Hippo,  Homilies on the First Epistle of John
Quote: Once for all, then, a short precept is given thee: Love, and do what thou wilt: whether thou hold thy peace, through love hold thy peace; whether thou cry out, through love cry out; whether thou correct, through love correct; whether thou spare, through love do thou spare: let the root of love be within, of this root can nothing spring but what is good.

Author: Nayyirah Waheed
Quote: Desire is the kind of thing thateats youandleaves you starving.

Author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón,  The Shadow of the Wind
Quote: One loves truly only once in a lifetime, Julian, even if one isn’t aware of it.

Author: Meg Cabot,  Queen of Babble
Quote: There will be no more British guys. Unless they are members of the royal family, of course.

Author: Victor Hugo,  Les Misérables
Quote: Love is the only future God offers.

Author: Tudor Chirilă,  Exerciţii de echilibru
Quote: In definitiv, cu cat vei ridica un zid mai inalt in jurul tau cu atat va fi mai bun cel care-l va sari.

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: We were very different, and we disagreed about a lot of things, but he was always so interesting, you know?

Author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet
Quote: Doubt thou the stars are fire;Doubt that the sun doth move;Doubt truth to be a liar;But never doubt I love .

Author: Gail McHugh,  Collide
Quote: When you want something this badly, you don't just give up. You fight and fight until you absolutely can't fight anymore.

Author: Saul Bellow
Quote: A man is only as good as what he loves.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Sugar Daddy
Quote: I'd sell my soul to have you. In my whole life, you'll always be what I wanted most."~ Hardy Cates

Author: Dorothy Day,  The Long Loneliness: The Autobiography of the Legendary Catholic Social Activist
Quote: We have all known the long loneliness and we have learned that the only solution is love and that love comes with community.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Seduce Me at Sunrise
Quote: I'm not good enough for you. But no one is. And most men, good or bad, have limits to what they would do, even for someone they love. I have none. No God, no moral code, no faith in anything. Except you. You're my religion. I would do anything you asked. I would fight, steal, kill for you."-Kev to Win

Author: Michael Bassey Johnson
Quote: Buy a gift for a dog, and you'll be amazed at the way it will dance and swerve its tail, but if don't have anything to offer to it, it won't even recognize your arrival; such are the attributes of fake friends.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.

Author: Jeffrey McDaniel
Quote: There's two kinds of women--those you write poems about and those you don't.

Author: Richelle Mead,  The Indigo Spell
Quote: My nails dug into his back, and he trailed his lips down the edge of my chin, down the center of my neck. He kept going until he reached the bottom of the dress’s V-neck. I let out a small gasp, and he kissed all around the neckline, just enough to tease.

Author: Kahlil Gibran,  Love Letters in the Sand: The Love Poems of Khalil Gibran
Quote: Darkness may hide the treesand the flowers from the eyesbut it cannot hidelove from the soul.

Author: John Donne,  The Complete Poetry and Selected Prose
Quote: Yet nothing can to nothing fall,Nor any place be empty quite;Therefore I think my breast hath allThose pieces still, though they be not unite;And now, as broken glasses showA hundred lesser faces, soMy rags of heart can like, wish, and adore,But after one such love, can love no more.

Author: Edith Wharton,  The House of Mirth
Quote: Do you remember what you said to me once? That you could help me only by loving me? Well-you did love me for a moment; and it helped me. It has always helped me.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Committed: A Skeptic Makes Peace with Marriage
Quote: Infatuation is not quite the same thing as love; it's more like love's shady second cousin who's always borrowing money and can't hold down a job.

Author: Viktor E. Frankl,  Man's Search for Meaning
Quote: Love goes very far beyond the physical person of the beloved. It finds its deepest meaning in his spiritual being, his inner self. Whether or not he is actually present, whether or not he is still alive at all, ceases somehow to be of importance.

Author: Diana Gabaldon,  Voyager
Quote: It wasn't a thing I had consciously missed, but having it now reminded me of the joy of it; that drowsy intimacy in which a man's body is accessible to you as your own, the strange shapes and textures of it like a sudden extension of your own limbs.

Author: Cynthia Hand,  Hallowed
Quote: Tucker strokes my hair. There's something so tender about the gesture. It might as well have been him whispering I love you.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: The most introspective of souls are often those that have been hurt the most.

Author: Sarah Orne Jewett
Quote: The process of falling in love at first sight is as final as it is swift in such a case, but the growth of true friendship may be a lifelong affair.

Author: Megan Whalen Turner,  The King of Attolia
Quote: He didn't marry you to become king. He became king because he wanted to marry you.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: She wanted to lose herself in him. To tie his arms around her like a tourniquet.If she showed him how much she needed him, he'd run away.

Author: Alice Hoffman,  Practical Magic
Quote: Do you ever just put your arms out and just spin and spin and spin? Well, that's what love is like; everything inside of you tells you to stop before you fall, but for some reason you just keep going.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Quote: He didn't realize that love as powerful as your mother's for you leaves its own mark.

Author: Rachel Vincent,  Before I Wake
Quote: You're not lost, Kaylee. You can't ever be lost, because I'll always know where you are. And if I'm not there with you, I'm on my way, and nothing standing between us will be standing for very long.

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer
Quote: He didn't look like the same person who picked me up this morning. Noah--sarcastic, distant, untouchable Noah--cared. And that made him real.

Author: Mother Teresa
Quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do... but how much love we put in that action.

Author: Allan Rufus
Quote: Your inner strength is your outer foundation

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I wrote a thesis on love, and I wrote it in lipstick. Of course, I also got blood on the paper, because the lipstick was still attached to her cheating lips.

Author: Karl A. Menninger
Quote: Love cures people, both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.

Author: Margaret Atwood,  Power Politics
Quote: If I love you, is that a fact or a weapon?

Author: J.D. Robb,  Big Jack
Quote: Do you remember the first time we made love?"He touched his lips to hers as he said it. "We rode up in the elevator like this and couldn't keep our hands off each other, couldn't get to each other quick enough. I was mad for you. I wanted you more than I wanted to keep breathing. I still do."He deepened the kiss as the elevator doors opened. "It's never going to change.

Author: L.J. Smith,  The Forbidden Game
Quote: I'm as cruel as life. As cruel as love.

Author: Franny Billingsley,  Chime
Quote: If you say a word, it leaps out and becomes the truth. I love you. I believe it. I believe I am loveable. How can something as fragile as a word build a whole world?

Author: E. Joseph Cossman
Quote: LOVE is a friendship set to music

Author: Laini Taylor,  Daughter of Smoke & Bone
Quote: I'm afraid they're in love,"he said, concerned. "They don't want to leave you."He lifted one hand from her waist to gently brush a pair from her neck, where their wings fanned against her jaw. Melancholy, he said, "I know just how they feel.

Author: Joel Osteen
Quote: Don't ever criticize yourself. Don't go around all day long thinking, 'I'm unattractive, I'm slow, I'm not as smart as my brother.' God wasn't having a bad day when he made you... If you don't love yourself in the right way, you can't love your neighbour. You can't be as good as you are supposed to be.

Author: Kaori Yuki
Quote: In my crazy world, above all others...you were the only one who was the ugliest. And you were the only one...who was the most beautiful.... This is the unspoken truth.

Author: Stephanie Perkins,  Lola and the Boy Next Door
Quote: It's become impossible to deny he means something to me.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez,  Love in the Time of Cholera
Quote: He recognized her despite the uproar, through his tears of unrepeatable sorrow at dying without her, and he looked at her for the last and final time with eyes more luminous, more grief-stricken, more grateful than she had ever seen them in half a century of a shared life, and he managed to say to her with his last breath: “Only God knows how much I loved you

Author: Warsan Shire
Quote: How far have you walked for men who’ve never held your feet in their laps?

Author: Hermann Hesse,  Wer lieben kann, ist glücklich. Über die Liebe
Quote: You know quite well, deep within you, that there is only a single magic, a single power, a single salvation...and that is called loving. Well, then, love your suffering. Do not resist it, do not flee from it. It is your aversion that hurts, nothing else.

Author: Rascal Flatts
Quote: I wake up and tear drops, they fall down like rain. I put on that old song we danced to and then, I head off to my job cause not much has changed. Punch the clock, head for home, check the phone. Just in case. Go to bed, dream of you. That's what I am doing these days.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: and all I could think was that I would like to spend every morning for the rest of my life waking up beside her

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: I will be generous with my love today. I will sprinkle compliments and uplifting words everywhere I go. I will do this knowing that my words are like seeds and when they fall on fertile soil, a reflection of those seeds will grow into something greater.

Author: Rachel Caine,  Bite Club
Quote: You'd be surprised what people will do for money that they wouldn't do forlove.Myrnin.

Author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie
Quote: A wonderful gift may not be wrapped as you expect.

Author: George Eliot
Quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love is you wearing her favorite shirt of yours, just like you did yesterday and the day before. And the day before that too.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: I didn't call you because I'm tired of you only wanting me around when you need something. I'm tired of watching you be in love with someone else - someone, incidentally, who will never love you back. Not the way I do.

Author: Monica Murphy,  One Week Girlfriend
Quote: But this girl...she doesn’t feel pointless. She’s real and she’s beautiful and she fits perfectly when she’s in my arms. She makes me want to feel.

Author: Rumi
Quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.

Author: John Irving,  The Cider House Rules
Quote: It´s natural to want someone you love to do what you want, or what you think would be good for them, but you have to let everything happen to them. You can't interfere with people you love any more than you're supposed to interfere with people you don't even know. And that's hard, ..., because you often feel like interfering -you want to be the one who makes the plans.

Author: Mary Ann Shaffer,  The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
Quote: Think of it! We could have gone on longing for one another and pretending not to notice forever. This obsession with dignity can ruin your life if you let it.

Author: Michael Morpurgo,  War Horse
Quote: I can hate you more, but I'll never love you less.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: I think that when we look for love courageously, it reveals itself, and we wind up attracting even more love. If one person really wants us, everyone does. But if we’re alone, we become even more alone. Life is strange.

Author: Edwin Morgan,  A Book of Lives
Quote: Valentine WeatherKiss me with rain on your eyelashes,come on, let us sway together,under the trees, and to hell with thunder.

Author: Christopher Brennan
Quote: Were knowledge all, what were our needTo thrill and faint and sweetly bleed?

Author: Veronica Rossi,  Into the Still Blue
Quote: What I was trying to say,” he whispered, “is that I see you in everything. There isn’t a word for you that means enough, because you’re everything to me.

Author: Robin LaFevers,  Grave Mercy
Quote: One heart cannot serve two masters.

Author: Pittacus Lore,  I Am Number Four
Quote: My heart is breaking,"she says. "I want to be strong for you right now but the thought of you leaving is killing me inside.

Author: Charles Frazier,  Cold Mountain
Quote: I'm ruined beyond repair, is what I fear...And if so, in time we'd both be wretched and bitter.""I know people can be mended. Not all, and some more immediately than others. But some can be. I don't see why not you.""Why not me?

Author: Neil Gaiman,  Smoke and Mirrors
Quote: Belinda stared into the fire for some time, thinking about what she had in her life, and what she had given up; and whether it would be worse to love someone who was no longer there, or not to love someone who was.

Author: John Ajvide Lindqvist,  Let the Right One In
Quote: Real love is to offer your life at the feet of another.

Author: Ahmed Deedat
Quote: Language is the key to the heart of people.

Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: If you claim to be a real friend then be real in your soul. If you claim to be fake then be an enemy instead.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: For some people, “the point of no return” begins at the very moment their souls become aware of each others’ existence.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I'm hanging on to her memory like Spanish moss on an ancient Florida oak, and unlike the sunset, my love won't fade.

Author: Ann Brashares,  My Name Is Memory
Quote: You have been with me from the very first life. You are my first memory every time, the single thread in all of my lives. It`s you who makes me a person.

Author: Julie Hockley,  Crow's Row
Quote: You'll probably die if you stay with me,' he told me.'Then I'm dead either way, because I won't survive without you.

Author: Johnny Depp
Quote: People say I make strange choices, but they’re not strange for me. My sickness is that I’m fascinated by human behavior, by what’s underneath the surface, by the worlds inside people.

Author: Tony Parsons,  Man and Boy
Quote: to love means to realize there is a time to let the beloved one go

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Nights in Rodanthe
Quote: I love you now for what we've already shared, and I love you now in anticipation of all that's to come.

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: I love you every day. And now I will miss you every day.

Author: Thomas Merton
Quote: The beginning of love is to let those we love be perfectly themselves, and not to twist them to fit our own image. Otherwise we love only the reflection of ourselves we find in them.

Author: Lois Lowry,  The Giver
Quote: Gabe?"The newchild stirred slightly in his sleep. Jonas looked over at him. "There could be love", Jonas whispered.

Author: Haruki Murakami
Quote: Quizás aun no te comprenda. Pero, con un poco de tiempo, llegaré a entenderte. Y no habrá nadie en el mundo que te comprenda mejor que yo.

Author: Fulton J. Sheen,  Life Is Worth Living
Quote: The difference between the love of a man and the love of a woman is that a man will always give reasons for loving, but a woman gives no reasons for loving.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I was in love one time, I said as I held up my pinky. I would have held up my index finger, but I wasn't in love that long.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Hard-Boiled Wonderland and the End of the World
Quote: Losing you is most difficult for me, but the nature of my love for you is what matters. If it distorts into half-truth, then perhaps it is better not to love you. I must keep my mind but loose you.

Author: Tasha Alexander,  A Fatal Waltz
Quote: It's delicious to have people adore you, but it's exhausting, too. Particularly when your own feelings don't match theirs.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I found 20 dollars on the ground, I’d be willing to bet I’d find someone in desperate need of money that I could give it to. And I’d bet 20 dollars, so even after finding and giving away 20 dollars, I’d have made 20 dollars.

Author: Chetan Bhagat,  One Night at the Call Center
Quote: Love? I need a lot of love."Of course you do. Everyone does. It's funny that we never say it. It's OK to scream, 'I'm starving' in public if you are hungry; it's OK to make a fuss and say, 'I'm so sleepy', if you are tired; but somehow we cannot say, 'I need some more love.' Why can't we say it? It's just as basic a need.

Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Xazaqazax
Quote: I bought a faucet, but water wasn’t included. That’s like when you buy my love—it’s dirty and used, but soap isn’t included.

Author: Ernest Hemingway,  The Sun Also Rises
Quote: Never fall in love?""Always,"said the count. "I am always in love.

Author: Karen Quan,  Write like no one is reading 2
Quote: How beautiful would it be if we could just see souls instead of bodies? To see love and compassion instead of curves.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: You catch more flies with honey than you do with chopsticks. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Katie McGarry,  Pushing the Limits
Quote: I've got you. I swear to God, I've got you,"said Noah. "Stay with me, Echo."I wanted to. I wanted to stay with him, but the shouting and screams and glass breaking in my mind grew louder. "Make it stop."He tightened his grip on my arms. "Fight, Echo! You've got to fucking fight. Come on, baby. You're safe.

Author: Lang Leav,  Love & Misadventure
Quote: Like time suspended, a wound unmended-- you and I.  We had no ending, no said goodbye;  For all my life, I'll wonder why.

Author: Rick Yancey,  The Infinite Sea
Quote: People die. Love endures.

Author: Madonna
Quote: Deep in my heart I'm concealing things that I'm longing to say. Scared to confess what I'm feeling - frightened you'll slip away.

Author: L.M. Montgomery,  Emily's Quest
Quote: Why did dusk and fir-scent and the afterglow of autumnal sunsets make people say absurd things?

Author: Michael Jordan
Quote: The game of basketball has been everything to me. My place of refuge, place I've always gone where I needed comfort and peace. It's been the site of intense pain and the most intense feelings of joy and satisfaction. It's a relationship that has evolved over time, given me the greatest respect and love for the game.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: I believe the love shared between two people shouldn’t be secretly shared with a third. Not even if I am vacationing on the moon, and that third person is my clone.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I always wear gloves when I wash my hands. That’s also how I make love, and if you buy now I’ll throw in an extra bar of soap for FREE.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Best of Me
Quote: You're still alive. And that means you'll love and be loved...and in the end, nothing else really matters.

Author: Shinji Moon,  The Anatomy of Being
Quote: I look at you and see all the ways a soul can bruise, and I wish I could sink my hands into your flesh and light lanterns along your spine so you know that there's nothing but light when I see you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: Love gives you wings. Icarus and the Challenger both had wings, and so did my first love letter, after I folded it up and flung it at my crush.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.

Author: Stacy London
Quote: Don't let fear or insecurity stop you from trying new things. Believe in yourself. Do what you love. And most importantly, be kind to others, even if you don't like them.

Author: Amit Ray,  Yoga and Vipassana: An Integrated Life Style
Quote: We all are so deeply interconnected; we have no option but to love all. Be kind and do good for any one and that will be reflected. The ripples of the kind heart are the highest blessings of the Universe.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: The six squares of our love didn’t add up to a cube. Still, I took the oddly-shaped box down to the post office and tried to mail it into the future, when I’d be more prepared to open it.

Author: Satchel Paige
Quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Who Moved My Choose?: An Amazing Way to Deal With Change by Deciding to Let Indecision Into Your Life
Quote: Love means the world to me. But so does a globe.

Author: Eminem
Quote: I say what I want to say and do what I want to do. There's no in between. People will either love you for it or hate you for it.

Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: As much as I want to make love to you, I’d rather make love to your clone.

Author: Michel Houellebecq
Quote: You know, you don't have to have permanent opinions. You can think, every morning, 'I love the world' and go to bed every night thinking, 'I hate the world.'

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Days of Yay are Here! Wake Me Up When They're Over.
Quote: Love will find you eventually, I guarantee it. That’s why you need to buy an invisible cloak from me for the one-time low price of $77,777.77. Offer valid for emotional invalids only.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: I skimmed the pond scum with a spoon like broth in a soup bowl. Why does everything have to remind me of her?

Author: Gary Coleman
Quote: I know the difference between true love and the love of my fans.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: Napoleon made war like I make love—from a height of about 68 centimeters. (I wear platform shoes while I’m on my knees)

Author: Imogen Heap
Quote: I just love crafting and shaping sounds. Actually, many of the sounds that I work with start off as organic instruments - guitar, piano, clarinet, etc. But I do love the rigidity of electronic drums.

Author: Deborah Mailman
Quote: My school friends thought I was outgoing and bubbly, but that masked a lot of insecurities, and maybe that's the reason I chose drama - to build a bit of self-confidence. I had a great teacher, and I won a few speech and drama competitions and just fell in love with it.

Author: Michael Levitt
Quote: I love the Swedish people for their detective novels, their archipelago, their sense of humor, their carbonated vodka, and most especially, for their wonderful hospitality.

Author: Maurice Maeterlinck
Quote: When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: The first symptom of love in a young man is timidity; in a girl boldness.

Author: Gary Zukav
Quote: Unworthiness is the inmost frightening thought that you do not belong, no matter how much you want to belong, that you are an outsider and will always be an outsider. It is the idea that you are flawed and cannot be fixed. It is wanting to be loved and feeling unlovable, or wanting to love and feeling that you are not capable of loving.

Author: Gary Zukav
Quote: When someone fears losing your affection, he or she will strive to keep it. Perhaps you have strived to keep someone's affection, too. Fear of loss is not love.

Author: Paul McCartney
Quote: And I loved Fats Waller. I love his instrumental abilities, his vocal abilities and his sense of humor.

Author: Wiz Khalifa
Quote: I love my wife. We FaceTime and we talk on the phone and she travels to come see me when she can. But she works as well. But we see each other a lot more than people would think, though, because we make it happen and we love each other so much.

Author: Jimmy Connors
Quote: I hate to lose more than I love to win.

Author: Robert Browning
Quote: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.

Author: Margaret Chase Smith
Quote: In real love you want the other person's good. In romantic love, you want the other person.

Author: Thomas Carlyle
Quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.

Author: Nhat Hanh
Quote: When we recognise the virtues, the talent, the beauty of Mother Earth, something is born in us, some kind of connection; love is born.

Author: Helen Fisher
Quote: Any kind of novelty or excitement drives up dopamine in the brain, and dopamine is associated with romantic love.

Author: Maeve Binchy
Quote: I was lucky enough to be fairly quick at understanding what was taught, but unlucky enough not to be really interested in it, so I always got my exams but never had the scholar's love of learning for its own sake.

Author: Pele
Quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.

Author: Jeanette Winterson
Quote: However it is debased or misinterpreted, love is a redemptive feature. To focus on one individual so that their desires become superior to yours is a very cleansing experience.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.

Author: Blake Lively
Quote: You can't be an entrepreneur for other people. You can't start a company for other people. You have to love it more than you ever thought of loving something that wasn't a human being. The demands will kick you down and rob your life - but yet, it is so rewarding.

Author: Ice Cube
Quote: The moral is that a career can be gone in an instant. And all you have in this world are the people you love.

Author: Jason Statham
Quote: I love to get behind the wheel and get competitive.

Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote: I love fresh citrus and always keep lemons, limes, and oranges on hand; they come in handy for spritzing up quickly grilled meats, seafoods, and vegetables, especially when followed up by a quick drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.

Author: Amanda Harlech
Quote: At home, I love reaching out into that absolute silence, when you can hear the owl or the wind.

Author: Levon Helm
Quote: We all love musical architecture; there's no doubt about that.

Author: Leighton Meester
Quote: I love live music and I love to see people's faces when I'm performing.

Author: Ashley Greene
Quote: In California, I do like to just chill out and go to the beach, but I love the energy here. I feel very productive when I'm in New York.

Author: Lea Michele
Quote: I love myself, the way I look, my body, but sometimes I can't help but feel insecure.

Author: Ryan Sheckler
Quote: My life path has been a blessing and a great learning experience. Skateboarding is my passion and I don't see that changing. When I'm not skating, I love to surf. I'm open to the new experiences and opportunities.

Author: Charles Eastman
Quote: Love between a man and a woman is founded on the mating instinct and is not free from desire and self-seeking. But to have a friend and to be true under any and all trials is the mark of a man!

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the gods.

Author: Euripides
Quote: Down on your knees, and thank heaven, fasting, for a good man's love.

Author: Robert Browning
Quote: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.

Author: Hans Urs von Balthasar
Quote: The inner reality of love can be recognized only by love.

Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.

Author: Ann Landers
Quote: If you have love in your life, it can make up for a great many things that are missing. If you don't have love in your life, no matter what else there is, it's not enough.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery
Quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.

Author: Jose Ortega y Gasset
Quote: Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.

Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.

Author: John Dryden
Quote: Pains of love be sweeter far than all other pleasures are.

Author: Victor Hugo
Quote: To love another person is to see the face of God.

Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote: The journey from teaching about love to allowing myself to be loved proved much longer than I realised.

Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: All mankind love a lover.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool and the folly of the wise.

Author: Lorraine Hansberry
Quote: There is always something left to love. And if you ain't learned that, you ain't learned nothing.

Author: Laura Ingalls Wilder
Quote: Suffering passes, while love is eternal. That's a gift that you have received from God. Don't waste it.

Author: Francis Beaumont
Quote: Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.

Author: Euripides
Quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.

Author: John Ciardi
Quote: Love is the word used to label the sexual excitement of the young, the habituation of the middle-aged, and the mutual dependence of the old.

Author: Stendhal
Quote: People happy in love have an air of intensity.

Author: Leslie Fiedler
Quote: I long for the raised voice, the howl of rage or love.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.

Author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton
Quote: If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.

Author: Alphonse de Lamartine
Quote: There is a woman at the begining of all great things.

Author: Mena Suvari
Quote: A year or so ago I went through all the people in my life and asked myself: does this person inspire me, genuinely love me and support me unconditionally? I wanted nothing but positive influences in my life.

Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote: The first magic of love is our ignorance that it can ever end.

Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote: In every living thing there is the desire for love.

Author: Janice Dickinson
Quote: The past explains how I got here, but the future is up to me - and I love to live life at full throttle.

Author: Samuel Johnson
Quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool and the folly of the wise.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.

Author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca
Quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.

Author: John Gay
Quote: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.

Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.

Author: Thornton Wilder
Quote: Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.

Author: Ovid
Quote: All love is vanquished by a succeeding love.

Author: Billie Holiday
Quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.

Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote: Love dies only when growth stops.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: Love is a gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.

Author: Corita Kent
Quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: The ear is the avenue to the heart.

Author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld
Quote: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.

Author: Bryan Procter
Quote: The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.

Author: John Keats
Quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it.

Author: George Eliot
Quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.

Author: Lionel Messi
Quote: Money is not a motivating factor. Money doesn't thrill me or make me play better because there are benefits to being wealthy. I'm just happy with a ball at my feet. My motivation comes from playing the game I love. If I wasn't paid to be a professional footballer I would willingly play for nothing.

Author: Thomas Aquinas
Quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.

Author: George Herbert
Quote: A gentle heart is tied with an easy thread.

Author: Louise L. Hay
Quote: Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: Passion is momentary; love is enduring.

Author: Plato
Quote: The god of love lives in a state of need. It is a need. It is an urge. It is a homeostatic imbalance. Like hunger and thirst, it's almost impossible to stamp out.

Author: Sarah Bernhardt
Quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.

Author: George Harrison
Quote: With our love, we could save the world.

Author: Euripides
Quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.

Author: Boethius
Quote: Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.

Author: Mortimer Adler
Quote: Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless.

Author: Jean Racine
Quote: The quarrels of lovers are the renewal of love.

Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.

Author: Tom Robbins
Quote: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplacable being.

Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote: Love is a friendship set to music.

Author: Stendhal
Quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
